title: REGULARIZING TARGETS IN MODEL DISTILLATION UTILIZING PAST STATE KNOWLEDGE TO IMPROVE TEACHER-STUDENT MACHINE LEARNING MODELS
abstract_text: This disclosure describes one or more implementations of systems, non-transitory computer-readable media, and methods that regularize learning targets for a student network by leveraging past state outputs of the student network with outputs of a teacher network to determine a retrospective knowledge distillation loss. For example, the disclosed systems utilize past outputs from a past state of a student network with outputs of a teacher network to compose student-regularized teacher outputs that regularize training targets by making the training targets similar to student outputs while preserving semantics from the teacher training targets. Additionally, the disclosed systems utilize the student-regularized teacher outputs with student outputs of the present states to generate retrospective knowledge distillation losses. Then, in one or more implementations, the disclosed systems compound the retrospective knowledge distillation losses with other losses of the student network outputs determined on the main training tasks to learn parameters of the student networks.

title: HYBRID INSTRUCTOR-MACHINE ASSESSMENT SYSTEM, DYNAMIC INSTRUCTOR INTERFACE AND ADAPTIVE TRAINING
abstract_text: A computerized system for assessing performance includes an interactive computer simulation station for providing a simulation of a machine to train a student in how to operate the machine and an instructor operating station communicatively connected to the interactive computer simulation station to receive instructor assessment data from an instructor at the instructor operating station. The system includes an automatic rules-based assessment module for automatically assessing a performance of the student during the simulation based on one or more rules to thereby provide automatic assessment data. The system includes an artificial intelligence (AI) module for receiving both the instructor assessment data and the automatic assessment data and for providing a hybrid performance assessment of the student based on an AI assessment model trained using training sets of instructor assessment data and training sets of automatic assessment data.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR ASSESSING PET RADIOLOGY IMAGES
abstract_text: In one embodiment, the disclosure provides a computer-implemented method comprising: receiving a first labeled training data set comprising a first plurality of images each associated with a set of labels; programmatically training a machine learning neural Teacher model on the first labeled training data set; programmatically applying a machine learning model trained for NLP to an unlabeled data set comprising digital electronic representations of natural language text summaries of a second plurality of images, thereby generating a second labeled training data set comprising the second plurality of images; using the machine learning neural Teacher model, programmatically generating soft pseudo labels; programmatically generating derived labels using the soft pseudo labels; training one or more programmed machine learning neural Student models using the derived labels; receiving a target image; and applying an ensemble of one or more of the Student models to output one or more classifications of the target image.

title: Student network training method for knowledge distillation in mixed learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student network training method for knowledge distillation in mixed learning. The method comprises the following steps: 1) selecting a training sample of a target domain from training data; 2) preprocessing the training samples, and inputting the preprocessed training samples into a student network and a teacher network respectively to obtain a corresponding student network logit and a teacher network logit; 3) respectively carrying out Z-score standardization processing on each student network logit and each teacher network logit; 4) converting the teacher network logit and the student network logit after Z-score standardization into a probability form; and 5) randomly selecting a probability corresponding to a teacher network logit and a probability corresponding to a student network logit, calculating a KL divergence between the two selected probabilities as a loss function, and performing gradient descent to optimize and distill the student network. According to the invention, the problem of capability gap between a teacher network and a student network in a deep learning knowledge distillation algorithm is solved.

title: Classroom student state analysis method and system based on face monitoring
abstract_text: The invention provides a classroom student state analysis method and system based on face monitoring, and relates to the technical field of face recognition and machine learning, and the method comprises the steps: collecting face images of students in a classroom; carrying out adaptive threshold filtering processing on the acquired face image to obtain a preprocessed image; performing feature extraction on the preprocessed image by using a trained facial expression recognition model to obtain expression features; based on a machine learning algorithm, the state of the student is analyzed according to the extracted expression features, and an analysis result is obtained; the analysis result comprises the attention concentration degree and the fatigue degree. According to the invention, the expression features of the students can be accurately obtained, so that the analysis and judgment precision of the classroom states of the students is improved.

title: Student accompanying intelligent analysis method based on AI
applicants: GUANGZHOU ZHIWEI INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an AI-based student accompanying intelligent analysis method, which comprises the following steps of: regularly recording position changes of students, collecting personal information and behavior data of the students by using a student information system and a student behavior recording system, and monitoring whether irregular behaviors exist or not; judging whether the student complies with the student with the non-standard behavior or not, if so, judging whether the student is influenced or not according to the behavior data, and if not, continuing regular monitoring; evaluating whether the non-standard behavior exists or not from the non-verbal communication level of the students; whether non-standard behaviors exist or not is evaluated from the aspects of speech communication of students and social network data; and collecting patrol data of managers and non-standard behavior data of the students, generating a school student non-standard behavior trend chart, and evaluating a current management effect.

title: Inspection and detection informatization method and system based on big data analysis
applicants: LANZHOU RESOURCES & ENVIRONMENT VOC TECH UNIV
GANSU CHINA BUSINESS FOOD QUALITY INSPECTION AND TESTING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of informatization, and discloses an inspection and detection informatization method and system based on big data analysis, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the desensitization of existing commodity inspection data, and carrying out the classification and data cleaning according to different application levels; a big data model is established and data is trained to generate trend decision information, and meanwhile, the detection technology is improved by utilizing artificial intelligence characteristics of an algorithm; other databases are associated, strategy suggestions are provided for guaranteeing food safety, enhancing student physique and balancing diet matching through association analysis means, and a new application path is provided for social service of commodity inspection data; and carrying out data visualization by using a platform. According to the method, association rules in application data mining are mined by adopting an association analysis technology, so that the correlation between item sets in a large amount of data can be found, the method is suitable for analysis of food safety detection data, potential risk points in a food safety link can be explored, and a basis can be provided for sampling inspection task arrangement and supervision decision making of a food supervision department.

title: A SYSTEMATIC AND COMPREHENSIVE LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: The invention relates to a learning system developed to efficiently learn bibliographymanagement programs and at least one interface (100.2) comprising at least one applicationfor citation and bibliography creation, reference processes Etc. training for those who writetheses, articles, and books and those who need citations and a bibliography in their studies. Italso comprises at least one learning application unit (100.3) configured to monitor learningstatus. It contains learning application features and at least one educational content databasethat stores text, screenshots, and video educational content (100.5). The learning applicationunit (100.3) and at least one educational chatbot unit (100.6) work as an intelligent answeringsystem that uses artificial intelligence and machine learning while performing these operationsand transmits the appropriate content to the student with an appropriate response by matchingthe student's questions with the educational content in the mentioned database.

title: User credit evaluation model training method, evaluation method, device and equipment
applicants: INDUSTRIAL & COMMERCIAL BANK OF CHINA CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a user credit evaluation model training method and device, an evaluation method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The training method comprises the following steps: acquiring a sample user credit feature associated with a first sample financial user and a corresponding sample user credit rating; constructing prior distribution by using student T distribution and Laplace distribution to obtain a to-be-trained user credit evaluation model; inputting the sample user credit features and the sample user credit rating into a to-be-trained user credit evaluation model, and obtaining posterior distribution by using prior distribution corresponding to the user credit evaluation model; and utilizing the difference between the prior distribution and the posterior distribution to train mapping relation parameters between the user credit characteristics and the user credit rating so as to obtain a trained user credit evaluation model. By adopting the method, the accuracy of user credit assessment classification can be improved.

title: Artificial intelligence-based vocational training management platform
applicants: BEIJING HUAPU YIFANG TECH GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of vocational training management, in particular to an artificial intelligence-based vocational training management platform, which comprises a data collection and arrangement module, a feature engineering module, a model generation module and an automatic evaluation and feedback module. According to the invention, firstly, a data collection and arrangement module collects student data, sends the student data to a feature engineering module for feature processing, and sends the processed student data to a model generation module, and the model generation module uses a neural network algorithm to train an algorithm model according to the student data; and the model is sent to the automatic evaluation and feedback module, and the automatic evaluation and feedback module predicts the academic records and course recommendation degrees of the students according to the real-time student data and the trained model, and formulates related guidance schemes according to the academic records.

title: Lightweight vehicle re-identification method based on multi-source information fusion
abstract_text: The invention discloses a lightweight vehicle re-identification method based on multi-source information fusion, and relates to the technical field of computer vision and machine learning, and the method comprises the steps: constructing a neural network; the neural network comprises a ResNet50 network, a local feature fusion network and a mixed attention module which are connected in sequence; performing joint training on the neural network by using supervised comparison loss and multi-source information identification loss until convergence to obtain a teacher network; selecting a model of which the calculated amount and the parameter amount are smaller than those of the teacher network as a student network; through knowledge distillation, the student network is supervised and trained until convergence, and a lightweight vehicle re-identification model is obtained; and outputting a re-identification result based on the lightweight vehicle re-identification model. According to the method, data of different sensors are coordinated in a multi-source information fusion mode to improve re-identification performance, knowledge distillation is supplemented, high-quality re-identification is achieved under limited computing resources, and therefore more flexibility is provided for various application scenes.

title: Image classification method based on graph representation knowledge distillation
applicants: ZHONGKE XIAMEN DATA INTELLIGENT RES INSTITUTE
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and particularly discloses an image classification method based on graph representation knowledge distillation, a graph convolutional neural network is introduced, a target sample set is regarded as a graph node to construct a relation graph, each sample in the graph can aggregate information of other samples, and the information of the other samples can be classified. A graph representation knowledge distillation error is constructed from two angles of graph nodes and graph relationships, a student network is guided to adaptively learn better graph representation of a teacher network by utilizing meta learning, the graph modeling capability of the student network is improved, and the relationship between samples is modeled by introducing a graph convolutional neural network, so that global sample dependence is captured, and the learning efficiency of the student network is improved. According to the method, the feature learning ability of samples is improved, graph representation knowledge distillation guides a student network to learn better graph information of a teacher network from the perspective of graph node features and graph relationships, the graph modeling ability of the student network is improved, the student network is guided to learn a discriminative feature space, and then the image classification effect is improved.

title: Paper draft extraction and correction method and system based on computer vision and deep learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to a paper draft extraction and correction method and system based on computer vision and deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: transmitting a desktop image to a paper draft edge processing model of deep learning when the desktop image of a student shot by an image recognition terminal is received; when the edge processing model receives the desktop image, the desktop image is compared with a plurality of instance images which are pre-stored in the edge processing model and represent the abnormal edges of the paper draft, and the positions, matched with the instance image features, in the desktop image are marked as the abnormal areas of the edges of the paper draft; restoring the paper draft edge abnormal area based on the instance image, and outputting a restored desktop image; extracting a target paper draft image from the restored desktop image; and performing correction processing on the target paper draft image based on a preset paper draft correction standard, and sending the corrected target paper draft image to a display terminal. The method has the effect that the obtained desktop paper draft images of the students in the classroom are more regular.

title: Student mental health prediction method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of mental health prediction, in particular to a student mental health prediction method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a restaurant consumption time sequence and a drug name sequence of each student; obtaining an excellent dietary habit index of the student in combination with the dining regularity index and the dining attendance index of the student; calculating a correlation coefficient between the treatment medicines, and further obtaining a psychological unhealthy correlation degree of the treatment medicines; calculating the psychological imperfection weight of the medicine application in the doctor-seeing medicine set; constructing a psychological unhealthy treatment coefficient of the medicine purchased by the student and a judgment coefficient containing the psychological unhealthy treatment medicine, and calculating the suspected psychological unhealthy medical treatment frequency and the psychological unhealthy medicine use degree of the student so as to obtain a medical treatment index of the student; and completing the prediction of the psychological health state of the student by using a multi-layer perceptron neural network in combination with the excellent dietary habit index and the medical treatment index of each student. Therefore, comprehensive and accurate prediction of student mental health is realized.

title: Single-lead atrial fibrillation identification system based on knowledge distillation
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a knowledge distillation-based single-lead atrial fibrillation recognition system, which comprises a twelve-lead preprocessing module for preprocessing original twelve-lead data; the II lead extraction module is used for extracting the II lead in the data processed by the 12-lead preprocessing module; the teacher identification network training module is used for training twelve-lead data by using a ResNet34 network as a teacher network; the student identification network training module uses a ResNet10 network as a student network and uses the knowledge of the teacher identification network training module to perform knowledge distillation; and the attention-based feature fusion intermediate layer knowledge transmission module performs feature fitting on two adjacent layers of the student identification network training module by using an attention-based mechanism to form a new intermediate layer. According to the method, the knowledge distillation single-lead electrocardio recognition model is used, high performance can be kept, meanwhile, the network memory requirement is reduced, the method can be deployed in a resource-limited environment, and the prediction speed is higher.

title: Online deep learning grade prediction method and device based on process and result fusion
abstract_text: The invention relates to an online deep learning level prediction method and device based on process and result fusion. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring and analyzing learning behavior track data and learning result data of a learner within a period time; inputting the learning behavior track data and the learning result data into a pre-trained online deep learning level prediction model to obtain a learning process level and a learning result level of the learner; and classifying the learners based on the deep level categories of the learners. According to the method, the condition of the learner can be comprehensively described from the two levels of process and result, and online deep learning level prediction of the student is realized.

title: Automatic evaluation method and device based on graph-to-text large model
applicants: SHANGHAI XIDING INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an automatic evaluation method and device based on a graph-to-text large model. In the method, the automatic evaluation device detects a target picture frame through a target detection model to obtain first object combination information, and determines an experiment step corresponding to a current operation of an examinee and an operation score point corresponding to the experiment step according to the first object combination information, and meanwhile, inputting the target picture frame into the image-text big model, outputting a step text description corresponding to the target picture frame, and comparing the step text description with the operation score point to obtain an operation score of the examinee. The automatic scoring of the experiment operation of the student is realized, and the scoring efficiency and accuracy are further improved.

title: University classroom attendance checking method and system based on machine learning
applicants: SHENZHEN DEKE ZHONGCHUANG TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of attendance checking, in particular to a university classroom attendance checking method and system based on machine learning, which can more comprehensively reflect the class condition of students. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a class timestamp and a class-after timestamp of a class and information of students in the class; the method comprises the following steps: presetting classroom seat area image acquisition time according to a class time stamp and a class time stamp of a classroom, wherein the image acquisition time comprises a first time node, a second time node, a third time node and a fourth time node; performing image acquisition according to preset image acquisition time to obtain a classroom student attendance image set; the classroom student attendance image set comprises a classroom seat area image collected at a first time node, a classroom seat area image collected at a second time node, a classroom seat area image collected at a third time node and a classroom seat area image collected at a fourth time node.

title: Student model generation method and device based on large model
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a student model generation method and device based on a large model, and relates to the technical field of computers, in particular to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as large models, natural language processing, deep learning and knowledge distillation. Comprises: obtaining a sample data set; inputting the input data and the prompt information into the large model to obtain first content generated by the large model; converting the first content into a first prediction result of which the type is the same as that of the annotation result; inputting the input data into the initial student model to obtain a second prediction result output by the initial student model; determining a correction gradient according to differences between the second prediction result and the first prediction result and between the second prediction result and the labeling result; and based on the correction gradient, correcting the initial student model to obtain a target student model. Therefore, the capability of the large model is extracted according to needs, the capability of deployable models is improved, the parameter scale of the models is reduced, and conditions are provided for improving the performance of application services.

title: Multi-teacher knowledge distillation method based on reinforcement learning
applicants: ZHONGKE XIAMEN DATA INTELLIGENT RES INSTITUTE
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and particularly discloses a multi-teacher knowledge distillation method based on reinforcement learning, which introduces reinforcement learning into multi-teacher knowledge distillation, allocates different weights to different teacher network models, outputs different weights by training an intelligent agent, highlights the difference between different teacher network models, and improves the multi-teacher knowledge distillation efficiency. Therefore, knowledge from different teacher network models is better mixed, the performance of the student network model is further improved, more effective mixed supervision signals can be provided for the student network model in the visual identification task, and compared with an average weighting method, the method is beneficial to further improving the performance of the student network model.

title: Target detection method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: SHENZHEN XUMIYUNTU SPACE TECH CO LTD
CHONGQING JIKAI TECH SERVICE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a target detection method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: dividing a first feature map obtained by student network extraction into N student network candidate areas, and determining N teacher network candidate areas in one-to-one correspondence with the N student network candidate areas in a second feature map obtained by teacher network extraction, and aligning the features in each group of corresponding student network candidate areas and teacher network candidate areas, thereby solving the technical problem that the teacher network cannot well guide student network learning due to large difference between the feature maps of the student network and the teacher network, reducing the learning difficulty of the student network, and improving the learning efficiency of the student network. The knowledge migration effect is improved, so that higher detection precision can be obtained when the student network trained by the method is used for performing target detection on the to-be-detected image.

title: Image classification model training method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses an image classification model training method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a source domain image and a target domain image; enhancing the source domain image by using the target domain image to obtain an enhanced image; training the teacher model by using the source domain image and the enhanced image to obtain a trained teacher model; and using the trained teacher model to supervise the training process of the student model, wherein the student model is a pathological image classification model trained by using the target domain image. According to the method, the teacher model is trained by using the source domain image and the enhanced image, and then the student model is subjected to knowledge migration, so that the performance of the student model in image classification can be improved.

title: College classroom student individual behavior tracking identification system and method
abstract_text: The invention relates to a college classroom student individual behavior tracking identification system and method, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The system comprises a student identity information acquisition module, a student identity information pre-training module and an individual behavior tracking identification module, wherein an automatic identity registration module is arranged in the student identity information acquisition module. The method comprises the following steps: performing frame extraction on an input video within a certain time, performing automatic identity registration, collecting student face identity data, training an individual information model by using the data, performing real-time frame extraction on the input video, performing human body recognition, human body skeleton key point detection and behavior recognition, and performing real-time identification on the input video. And the trained individual information module is utilized to determine student identities and store identification results. According to the method, a server does not need to be erected, the implementation cost is low, the student behavior state can be analyzed online in real time, the identity can be sampled and registered online automatically, the flexibility is high, identity information does not need to be collected in advance, the student recognition rate is high, and the individual behavior tracking generalization is good.

title: Image classification method based on feature cluster center compression
abstract_text: The invention discloses an image classification method based on feature cluster center compression, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence image classification, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a plurality of types of original feature clusters, and carrying out the expansion according to the types, and obtaining a corresponding expanded feature cluster; training a backbone network and a classifier based on the expanded feature cluster; integrating an original feature cluster moving process with a knowledge distillation mechanism, and obtaining a teacher model in combination with the trained backbone network and a classifier; and constructing a student model and a joint loss function, training a new backbone network for the student model through a sampler, carrying out iterative training on the student model based on the joint loss function and the teacher model, and carrying out image classification by adopting the trained student model. According to the method, a two-stage training framework is introduced, a feature cluster center compression method is put forward in the framework to increase available space between a feature cluster and a decision boundary, a larger fault-tolerant area is provided for difficult sample points, and the image classification problem of an unbalanced data set is solved from the feature level.

title: COMPREHENSION MODELING AND AI-SOURCED STUDENT CONTENT RECOMMENDATIONS
abstract_text: A system generates a training dataset based on historical consumption information and historical comprehension information of historical users, and uses the training dataset to train a machine-learned model to predict a measure of comprehension for a user consuming educational content. The system applies the machine-learned model to behaviors of a target user to determine a target measure of comprehension for target educational content, identifies one or more characteristics of the target educational content, applies a content identification model to identify supplemental educational content, and generates an educational content interface to present the supplemental educational content to the target user. In some examples, the system trains the machine-learned model to predict a collective measure of comprehension for a set of users consuming educational content, identifies a set of supplemental educational content, and generates a teacher interface to present the set of supplemental educational content.

title: Network security awareness drilling device and method and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING WUYI JIAYU TECH CO LTD
YONGXIN ZHICHENG TECH GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a network security awareness drilling device and method and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of network security training platforms. The device comprises an administrator end and a student end, the administrator end creates a plurality of virtual machines, configures the operation environment of each virtual machine, and sets an independent safety awareness virtual drilling scene in each configured virtual machine; the student end makes a training request to the administrator end; the administrator side distributes the idle virtual machine and the virtual machine learning path to the student side; the student end performs drilling through the distributed safety awareness virtual drilling scene in the virtual machine to generate drilling data; and the administrator end performs feature similarity analysis on the drill data to obtain recommended learning content, and sends the recommended learning content to the student end. The administrator end can create a plurality of independent virtual machines to carry out scene drilling of safety awareness virtualization, customized learning content and paths can be provided for students, and the learning effect and learning motivation of the students are improved.

title: Image generation and model training method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an image generation and model training method and device, equipment and a storage medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical fields of computer vision, deep learning, large models and the like, and can be applied to scenes such as image processing and the like. The training method of the image generation model comprises the steps of obtaining a first generation result of a teacher model; obtaining a second generation result of the student model; the student model is a to-be-trained image generation model; constructing a loss function based on the first generation result and the second generation result; updating the first parameter matrix and the second parameter matrix based on the loss function, and obtaining an updated target parameter matrix according to the updated first parameter matrix and the updated second parameter matrix; the rank of the first parameter matrix and the rank of the second parameter matrix are both smaller than the rank of the target parameter matrix. According to the invention, computing resource overhead can be reduced.

title: Comprehension Modeling and AI-Sourced Student Content Recommendations
abstract_text: A system generates a training dataset based on historical consumption information and historical comprehension information of historical users, and uses the training dataset to train a machine-learned model to predict a measure of comprehension for a user consuming educational content. The system applies the machine-learned model to behaviors of a target user to determine a target measure of comprehension for target educational content, identifies one or more characteristics of the target educational content, applies a content identification model to identify supplemental educational content, and generates an educational content interface to present the supplemental educational content to the target user. In some examples, the system trains the machine-learned model to predict a collective measure of comprehension for a set of users consuming educational content, identifies a set of supplemental educational content, and generates a teacher interface to present the set of supplemental educational content.

title: Computed tomography image generation method and system based on deep learning
applicants: CHANGSHA WEIMIAO MEDICAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a computed tomography image generation method and system based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining more than two groups of image pairs, and each group of image pair comprises a CBCT image and a CT image; training the image pair based on the mask, and obtaining a training CBCT image and a training CT image; extracting shallow layer features of the training CBCT image by using a convolutional layer; using a deep feature extraction module to extract shallow features and obtain deep features; fusing the shallow-layer features and the deep-layer features by using an image generation module, and inputting the fused features to a convolutional layer with a residual module to obtain a fused CT image; constructing two neural network models with the same architecture, and respectively defining the two neural network models as a teacher model and a student model; a model updating step; loading the stored weight of the teacher model to the neural network model, and constructing a computed tomography image generation model; and collecting a clinical CBCT image, and inputting the clinical CBCT image into the computed tomography image generation model to obtain a corresponding generated CT image.

title: Model training method and device based on knowledge distillation, equipment and medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a model training method and device based on knowledge distillation, equipment and a medium, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a first training data set and a second training data set; training a first deep learning model based on the first training data set to obtain a first teacher model; in the training process of the student model, obtaining knowledge distillation intensity according to the first type of indexes; wherein the knowledge distillation intensity is used for reflecting the knowledge transmission degree in the knowledge distillation process; the first type of indexes comprise at least one of a training state and model performance of a student model, a temperature parameter in a knowledge distillation process and a model training parameter; and training a second deep learning model for executing the target deep learning task based on the second training data set and the output probability distribution of the first teacher model under the constraint of the knowledge distillation intensity to obtain a student model. The training efficiency and performance of the student model can be improved.

title: Labor protection article detection model training method based on knowledge distillation
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of computer vision, and particularly relates to a knowledge distillation-based labor protection article detection model training method, which comprises the following steps of: training a detection network serving as a teacher model by utilizing a first detection article data set; according to the number of types which do not appear in the first detection article data set in the second detection article data set, the number of neurons in the student model is increased, the student model is initialized by using the trained teacher model, and the newly added neurons are randomly initialized; constructing a distillation loss function between the student model and the teacher model; establishing a loss function of the student model based on the established distillation loss function, and training the student model by using the second detection article data set; according to the method, the problem that catastrophic forgetting is generated after a traditional deep learning algorithm is trained on a new sample is solved, and a target detector capable of continuously learning is constructed.

title: Medical image quality evaluation method and system based on deep learning
applicants: CHANGSHA WEIMIAO MEDICAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a medical image quality evaluation method and system based on deep learning. The method comprises the following steps: extracting a medical image by using a ConvNeXt model to obtain a local feature map; extracting a medical image by using a Transform model to obtain a global feature map; obtaining a first prediction score; constructing a teacher model and a student model with the same architecture; an iterative training step: inputting the medical image into a student model to obtain a Gaussian vector of a second prediction score; calculating a loss function according to the vector of the first prediction score and the Gaussian vector of the second prediction score; a model updating step: updating the weight of the student model and the weight of the teacher model; judging whether the number of iterations is greater than or equal to a preset number of times, if so, storing the weight of the teacher model, and if not, circulating the feature extraction step to the model updating step; loading the weight of the teacher model to the neural network model to obtain a medical image quality evaluation model; and inputting the clinical medical image into the medical image quality evaluation model to obtain quality evaluation.

title: Container accidental damaged sample mining and learning method, device, equipment and medium
applicants: NEZHA GANGHANG SMART TECH SHANGHAI CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a container accidental damaged sample mining and learning method, device, equipment and medium suitable for a container application scene, and is applied to the technical field of container damaged defect detection. Multi-level multi-attribute category division is performed on container accidental damage defect types, and a small amount of container damage sample data is labeled according to multi-level multi-attribute categories, so that a semi-supervised learning model corresponding to each level can perform semi-supervised learning training of comparative learning optimization based on a small amount of corresponding labeled samples. Therefore, the trained student model can be used for carrying out container damage defect sample mining on massive unlabeled data, so that a training data basis is provided for container accidental damage detection when a deep learning model is applied.

title: Student activity wonderful instant shooting and analysis method based on AI algorithm
applicants: GUANGZHOU ZHIWEI INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a student activity wonderful instant shooting and analysis method based on an AI algorithm, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining student activities through a camera, and employing a convolutional neural network model to recognize and determine the video content and theme; performing wonderful degree evaluation on the image frame to obtain a wonderful degree score; the content of the image frame is deeply analyzed, images which do not accord with the theme or are not wonderful enough are judged in combination with the wonderful degree evaluation result, and the image needing to be replaced is determined; obtaining a replaceable image list according to the video content and the theme, and replacing the moments which do not conform to the theme or are not wonderful enough in the image frame; analyzing the relationship between event plots and pictures, and sorting different picture segments; and adding special effect connection between the image frames based on the obtained wonderful moments and the sequence of the pictures, and carrying out video presentation of specific contents.

title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR DETERMINING THE CAPACITY OF INTERNATIONAL STUDENTS OR SCHOLARS TO PAY FOR HOUSING IN THE UNITED STATES
abstract_text: A method for automatically determining a financial capacity of an international student, scholar, and/or other individual who is attending and/or otherwise associated with an educational institution in the United States and has little or no domestic credit history. The method is configured to assist the international student, scholar, and/or other individual in securing housing with landlords who would otherwise have limited resources for determining the financial capacity of the international student, scholar, and/or other individual. The automatic determination may be performed by a trained electronic financial capacity machine learning algorithm. The financial capacity machine learning algorithm is executed by one or more processors of a computing device.

title: College student mental health monitoring system based on AI technology
applicants: HEFEI ZHISHENG XINCHUANG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an AI technology-based college student psychological health monitoring system, which comprises an acquisition module for acquiring facial micro-expressions of students and a processing module for analyzing the micro-expressions, the acquisition module comprises a camera assembly used for continuously acquiring facial micro-expressions of students in a long distance, and a wire winding and unwinding assembly used for arranging wires of the AI camera when the AI camera moves in a long distance. According to the monitoring system, a closed video acquisition module is arranged, one-way transparent glass is adopted to acquire facial expressions of normally walking students, the facial expressions of the students during walking are natural and do not have subjective concealment, an AI camera is arranged during moving to perform long-distance tracking acquisition on the students, and a flexible electric wire winding and unwinding assembly is arranged to realize remote tracking acquisition of the students. And the electric wire is always tensioned in a free area beside the AI camera to prevent the AI camera from shielding shooting.

title: Deep learning model acquisition method and device, electronic equipment and medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a deep learning model obtaining method and device, electronic equipment and a medium, and belongs to the technical field of computers. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a teacher model and a to-be-trained lightweight student model; setting a training set and a maximum round, wherein the training set comprises a plurality of training subsets; and performing repeated pruning processing and round training on the to-be-trained lightweight student model until a preset termination condition is reached to obtain a trained lightweight student model, the preset termination condition being at least one of the following conditions: an error between an output result of the to-be-trained lightweight student model and a real label is less than a preset error threshold, and the error is less than a preset error threshold. The total number of rounds reaches the maximum round, the sparseness of the to-be-trained lightweight student model reaches the target sparseness, an efficient depth estimation algorithm can be realized under limited computing resources, and the robustness is high.

title: Intelligent campus student behavior analysis system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: NANJING DAERSHENG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of student behavior analysis, and discloses an intelligent campus student behavior analysis system based on artificial intelligence, and the system comprises a data collection module which collects student information; the video acquisition module is used for acquiring campus monitoring video data; the video analysis module is used for analyzing the monitoring video data, judging whether a suspicious target area is generated or not, and generating voice acquisition information if the suspicious target area is generated; the voice acquisition module is used for acquiring voice data of the suspicious target area according to the voice acquisition information; the voice recognition module is used for recognizing the voice data of the suspicious target area and judging whether a deception behavior statement exists or not; if the campus spoofing behavior exists, the actor is determined in real time, and according to the student information corresponding to the determined actor, the class owner makes contact with and stops the behavior in time according to the contact way corresponding to the student information, so that the behavior is prevented from causing greater harm to others, and the campus spoofing is effectively reduced.

title: SCALABLE KNOWLEDGE DISTILLATION TECHNIQUES FOR MACHINE LEARNING
abstract_text: A data processing system implements a dynamic knowledge distillation process including dividing training data into a plurality of batches of samples and distilling a student model from a teacher model using an iterative knowledge distillation. The process includes instantiating an instance of the teacher model and the student model in a memory of the data processing system and obtaining a respective batch of training data from the plurality of batches of samples in the memory. The process includes training the teacher and student models using each of the samples in the respective batch of the training data, evaluating the performance of the student model compared with the performance of the teacher model, and providing feedback to student model to adjust the behavior of the student model based on the performance of the student model.

title: Prediction model training method and device, equipment, medium and program product
abstract_text: The invention discloses a prediction model training method and device, equipment, a medium and a program product, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of performing transformation processing on target domain sample data to obtain target domain transformation data, and performing encoding processing on the target domain transformation data through a first encoder to obtain encoded data; training the first encoder based on the coded data and the target domain sample data to obtain a second encoder; updating the first prediction network based on a second encoder to obtain a teacher network and a student network; and based on the source domain sample data and the target domain sample data, training the student network through a pseudo tag output by the teacher network to obtain a second prediction network. The target domain feature learning is carried out on the shared encoders of the teacher network and the student network, so that the teacher network and the student network can adapt to the target domain features in advance, thereby improving the quality of generated pseudo tags and improving the training effect of the student network.

title: Image recognition model training method and device, equipment, storage medium and product
abstract_text: The invention discloses an image recognition model training method and device, equipment, a storage medium and a product, and relates to the field of machine learning. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a first sample image, wherein the first sample image corresponds to a sample enhancement image and a down-sampling image; performing image content identification on the first sample image through a sample student model to obtain a first prediction result used for indicating the image content in the first sample image; performing image content identification on the first fusion feature representation of the sample enhancement image and the down-sampling image through a sample expert model to obtain a reference pseudo tag; determining a first loss value based on a difference between the first prediction result and the reference pseudo tag; and training the sample student model based on the first loss value to obtain a target recognition model. That is, the accuracy of the generated pseudo tag can be higher by inputting the images of different sizes, so that the accuracy of the target recognition model is improved.

title: Prediction model training method and device, equipment, medium and program product
abstract_text: The invention discloses a prediction model training method and device, equipment, a medium and a program product, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: training a target domain student model obtained by updating the ith round based on first source domain task loss to obtain a candidate target domain student model; predicting target domain sample data through the target domain expert model obtained through the (i + 1) th round of updating to obtain a target domain pseudo label, and supervising a prediction result of the target domain sample data by the candidate target domain student model through the target domain pseudo label to obtain first target domain task loss; and training the candidate target domain student model based on the first target domain task loss to obtain the target domain student model updated in the (i + 1) th round until a first prediction model is obtained through training. And the prediction accuracy of the target domain student model obtained by final training on the target domain data in the target prediction task is improved.

title: Environment-specific training of machine learning models
abstract_text: A method for environment-specific training of a machine learning model includes receiving a data stream for a local environment that includes a plurality of sequential data segments. A programming flag is generated for each data segment using a student version machine learning model. A portion of the data segment and associated programming indicia for evaluation by the teacher version machine learning model are selected and uploaded to a server-side computing device. An environment-specific training update is received from a server-side computing device. The training update is based on a comparison of the selected programming flag and a pseudo flag generated by the teacher version for the selected portion of the data segment. The environment-specific training update is applied to the student version to generate an updated student version. The updated student-version machine learning model is then used to generate programming flags for newly received data fragments.

title: Learning task generation method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: SHANGHAI ABLE DIGITAL & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a learning task generation method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: generating a student learning portrait based on a learning result of a student for an original course, the learning result comprising a learning habit, a learning progress, a knowledge point mastering degree, a test condition and a course completion degree; an artificial intelligence model is called to generate a first learning task according to the student learning portrait, the first learning task is sent to a learning platform to obtain a first learning result corresponding to the first learning task, and the artificial intelligence model is obtained through training according to a student learning portrait sample and a learning task sample corresponding to the student learning portrait sample; a second learning task is generated according to the first learning result and a knowledge graph of the original course, the second learning task is used for being sent to a learning platform to obtain a second learning result corresponding to the second learning task, and the knowledge graph comprises a knowledge relation path of the original course. And the generated learning task is more suitable for the learning condition of the student.

title: Student exercise quality monitoring method and device
abstract_text: The invention provides a student exercise quality monitoring method and device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence and monitoring, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the original exercise data of a student; training a student exercise quality monitoring model based on the original exercise data; inputting to-be-monitored exercise data of students into the trained student exercise quality monitoring model; and based on the output of the student exercise quality monitoring model, determining whether the student has an alternative practice condition. According to the student exercise quality monitoring method and device provided by the invention, the appropriate training set containing the alternative exercise data can be constructed through the original non-alternative exercise data, so that the trained student exercise quality monitoring model can accurately identify whether the student has the alternative exercise condition, manual supervision is not needed, the labor cost is saved, and the training efficiency is improved. And the monitoring identification efficiency is improved.

title: Model training method and device, nonvolatile storage medium and electronic equipment
abstract_text: The invention discloses a model training method and device, a nonvolatile storage medium and electronic equipment. The method comprises the steps that a first image set is acquired, and the first image set comprises a plurality of first images and pseudo labels corresponding to the first images; a plurality of first images in the first image set are analyzed by using a preset student model, a prediction label corresponding to each first image is determined, and the preset student model is trained by using a second image set through machine learning; calibrating the prediction label according to the pseudo label, and determining an optimization label corresponding to each first image; and training a preset student model by using a third image set to obtain a target student model, the third image set comprising a plurality of first images and an optimization label corresponding to each first image. The technical problem that a student model trained based on a traditional pseudo-label method is low in accuracy is solved.

title: Method and system for developing learning habits of students
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a student learning habit forming method and system, and the method comprises the steps: a sensing system detects that a student sits down, and gives a voice prompt to the student, i.e., first review, second homework, multi-review and second preview; the judgment unit analyzes behaviors of the students; and when the student makes a corresponding behavior, the voice unit sends out a corresponding voice prompt. By adopting the technical scheme of the invention, the process of'triggering and usual learning behavior 'can be provided for different students by using artificial intelligence ability through 90 days or other individualized and customized days in combination with the behavior psychological characteristics of children, and the students can obtain awards through own efforts, so that the intellectual property of the students is improved. Therefore, the universal learning habit formation suitable for different types of students is realized, the learning habit formation efficiency is improved, and the self-learning ability of accompanying the whole life is cultivated. Contradictions between children and parents in the traitor period are reduced, dissatisfactory moods of the children are transferred, relationships between parents and children are relieved, emergencies are reduced, and social stability is maintained.

title: Intelligent classroom behavior analysis method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: JIANGXI TOPSIGHT INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a smart classroom behavior analysis method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a first target image corresponding to a teacher and second target images corresponding to students; performing posture recognition on the first target image to obtain view field data; associating the first target image with the second target image, and performing region division on the second target image based on the visual field range data to obtain a part of target images corresponding to the outside of the visual field range of the teacher; and performing facial posture recognition on the student in the partial target image to judge whether an abnormal behavior exists or not. Compared with detection and identification of all student targets in the prior art, through identification and analysis of part of target images, the data processing amount of student images which can be observed by teachers in real time is relatively reduced, the detection efficiency is improved, whether students outside the current visual field have abnormal behaviors or not can be conveniently judged in real time, and the user experience is improved. And the application scene of classroom real-time monitoring is facilitated.

title: Remote sensing image cross-domain small sample classification method based on pseudo label uncertainty perception
abstract_text: The invention discloses a remote sensing image cross-domain small sample classification method based on false label uncertain sensing. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring source domain remote sensing image data and target domain remote sensing image data; pre-training the deep learning backbone network model by using the source domain remote sensing image data to obtain pre-training initialization parameters of the deep learning backbone network model; constructing a teacher-student network model used for semi-supervised cross-domain training; inputting the source domain remote sensing image data and the target domain remote sensing image data into a teacher-student network model for training to obtain a trained deep learning backbone network model; and inputting to-be-tested remote sensing image data into the trained deep learning backbone network model to obtain a classification result of the to-be-tested remote sensing image data. According to the method, the defect of high-uncertainty pseudo-label damage model cross-domain learning in the prior art can be overcome, and the performance of the deep learning method on remote sensing image cross-domain small sample classification is improved.

title: Teacher-student network for three-dimensional palate wrinkle data identification
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teacher-student network for three-dimensional palate wrinkle data identification, and belongs to the technical field of image identification, and the specific technical scheme is as follows: three-dimensional palate wrinkle data is preprocessed and converted into two-dimensional palate wrinkle slice data, so that a deep learning network can conveniently extract the features of the data; a teacher double attention feature extraction network for two-dimensional palate wrinkle slice data feature extraction solves the problem that detail features in palate wrinkle slice images are not easy to extract, calibrates the main body position of palate wrinkles, and reduces the influence of complex backgrounds. The extracted features are coded into 128-bit binary codes, so that the storage space is compressed, and the storage efficiency and the matching efficiency are improved; designing a loss function combining supervision loss, distillation loss and coding quantization loss to further improve the function of each network; the problems that the features of the three-dimensional palate wrinkle image are difficult to extract in the existing deep learning framework and the network framework is too deep and cannot be used on mobile equipment are solved.

title: MOBILE APPLICATION FOR GENERATING AND VIEWING VIDEO CLIPS IN DIFFERENT LANGUAGES
abstract_text: A system may receive lesson information comprising a plurality of lessons and may receive student information associated with a student. The system may prepare a lesson plan based in part on the lesson information and the student information. The system may present a first lesson of the plurality of lessons to the student. The system may determine, based on an interaction between the student and the first lesson, a student engagement information and may apply the student engagement information as input to a machine learning model, and cause the machine learning model to output a lesson success evaluation. The system may determine a lesson success based on the lesson success evaluation. The system may modify the lesson plan based on the lesson success to generate an adjusted lesson plan. The system may present a second lesson of the plurality of lessons to the student based on the adjusted lesson plan.

title: TRAINING NEURAL NETWORK TROUGH DENSE-CONNECTION BASED KNOWLEGE DISTILLATION
abstract_text: A neural network can be trained through knowledge distillation. A support neural network is generated based on a target neural network. The support neural network is a teacher model, and the target neural network is a student model. The support neural network may have same layers as the target neural networks. Some or all layers of the support neural network may be connected to facilitate data transfer between these layers. The support neural network and target neural network are merged into a merged network. The merged network is trained. At least one layer in the support neural network is connected to a layer in the target neural network to facilitate data transfer from the target neural network to the support neural network during the training. After the training, the target neural network is separated from the merged network and can be used to perform machine learning tasks.

title: Method and device for generating training music based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHENZHEN REAL WISDOM TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence-based exercise song purpose generation method and device. The generation method comprises the following steps: A10, collecting student data in multiple dimensions; a20, processing the collected student data through a multi-task deep learning network, and constructing a student model; and A30, using a reinforcement learning algorithm and combining the student model to generate a practice track. According to the method, the data of the students are collected and analyzed by using the deep learning technology, and the personalized student model is constructed, so that the technical level and music preference of the students are accurately reflected. The track is generated based on deep reinforcement learning, the practice track matched with the technical level and music preference of the student can be generated, the diversity of the practice track is enriched, and the learning interest and the practice effect are improved. Moreover, the student model can be updated according to the feedback information, the track generation strategy can be improved, the development and change of students can be continuously adapted, and the quality and satisfaction degree of music generation can be improved.

title: MOOCs student learning prediction method based on time convolution network
abstract_text: The invention discloses an MOOCs student learning prediction method based on a time convolution network, and the method comprises the following steps: calculating three course participation indexes according to a learning matrix and courses, namely, a maximum ratio, an overall ratio and a ranking, and generating three corresponding matrixes; mapping values in the three index matrixes to an interval of 0-255; synthesizing the three index matrixes into a three-dimensional learning matrix; extracting features of the three-dimensional learning matrix based on the image convolutional neural network; extracting time sequence features in the learning records based on a time convolution network TCN; and training and testing the SE-TCN deep learning model. The method comprises the following steps: converting MOOCs learning behavior data into a three-dimensional learning matrix through learning behaviors of students in a platform, and inputting the matrix as an image into a deep learning model; the feature extraction capability of the image convolutional network and the advantages of parallel operation, receptive field adjustment and the like of the time convolutional network are re-utilized, learning prediction can be performed according to learning behaviors of students, and the prediction accuracy is improved.

title: Semi-supervised medical image segmentation method, system, equipment and medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a semi-supervised medical image segmentation method, system, device and medium, relates to the field of artificial intelligence medicine, and aims to solve the technical problem of negative optimization caused by wrong knowledge accumulation in a student-teacher model in the prior art, and the method comprises the steps of obtaining sample data, building and training a segmentation model, and carrying out real-time segmentation. The segmentation model comprises a teacher network, two student networks and an uncertainty feature extractor; inputting a medical image sample without a label into a teacher network, inputting a sample with a label into a student network, taking the output of the teacher network as the input of an uncertainty feature extractor, and carrying out confidence coefficient screening output by a teacher model in the uncertainty feature extractor by using an uncertainty evaluation method; and guiding the uncertainty constraint between the teacher network and the student network according to the obtained uncertainty feature map, verifying the consistency through the cross constraint existing between the double student networks, and finally obtaining a mature student network.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ACCENT-AGNOSTIC FRAME-LEVEL WAKE WORD DETECTION
abstract_text: A method includes accessing, using at least one processor of an electronic device, a machine learning model. The machine learning model is a trained student model that is trained using audio samples in a plurality of accent types. The method also includes receiving, using the at least one processor, an audio input from an audio input device. The method further includes providing, using the at least one processor, the audio input to the trained student model. The method also includes receiving, using the at least one processor, an output from the trained student model including frame-level probabilities associated with the audio input. In addition, the method includes instructing, using the at least one processor, at least one action based on the frame-level probabilities associated with the audio input.

title: Semantic segmentation method, system and equipment based on knowledge distillation and medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a semantic segmentation method, system and equipment based on knowledge distillation and a medium, relates to semantic segmentation in the field of artificial intelligence, and aims to solve the technical problems that an existing semantic segmentation method ignores high-difference regions learned by a teacher model and a student model and is poor in segmentation performance. The method comprises the following steps: inputting a feature map and logit features through a teacher/student network model, and inputting the logit features into a difference perception knowledge distillation model for logic difference calculation and probability distribution difference calculation to obtain a logic difference mask and a probability distribution difference mask; through the features covered by the two mechanisms together, students can learn from differences by minimizing reconstruction errors of a difference region, a student model tends to generate features of a teacher by using a feature generation module, the students can learn from a high-difference region and pay more attention to a boundary region when a feature map generated by the teacher is recovered, and the learning efficiency is improved. Therefore, better representation is realized, and the semantic segmentation performance is greatly improved.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ACCENT-AGNOSTIC FRAME-LEVEL WAKE WORD DETECTION
abstract_text: A method includes accessing, using at least one processor of an electronic device, a machine learning model. The machine learning model is a trained student model that is trained using audio samples in a plurality of accent types. The method also includes receiving, using the at least one processor, an audio input from an audio input device. The method further includes providing, using the at least one processor, the audio input to the trained student model. The method also includes receiving, using the at least one processor, an output from the trained student model including frame-level probabilities associated with the audio input. In addition, the method includes instructing, using the at least one processor, at least one action based on the frame-level probabilities associated with the audio input.

title: MOBILE APPLICATION FOR GENERATING AND VIEWING VIDEO CLIPS IN DIFFERENT LANGUAGES
abstract_text: A system may receive lesson information comprising a plurality of lessons and may receive student information associated with a student. The system may prepare a lesson plan based in part on the lesson information and the student information. The system may present a first lesson of the plurality of lessons to the student. The system may determine, based on an interaction between the student and the first lesson, a student engagement information and may apply the student engagement information as input to a machine learning model, and cause the machine learning model to output a lesson success evaluation. The system may determine a lesson success based on the lesson success evaluation. The system may modify the lesson plan based on the lesson success to generate an adjusted lesson plan. The system may present a second lesson of the plurality of lessons to the student based on the adjusted lesson plan.

title: Flower classification method, system and equipment based on knowledge distillation and medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a flower classification method, system and equipment based on knowledge distillation, and a medium, belongs to flower identification and classification in the field of artificial intelligence, and aims to solve the technical problem of poor flower identification and classification effects of a knowledge distillation network model in the prior art. According to the method, neighborhood relation knowledge distillation is adopted to consider a neighborhood structure as new relation knowledge, a similarity matrix is calculated according to logits features output by a teacher network to select neighborhood samples, and each element in the similarity matrix generally represents the similarity of feature representation between two samples. The method comprises the following steps of: establishing a knowledge distillation model, calculating neighborhood characteristic relation distillation loss and neighborhood logits relation distillation loss by utilizing a neighborhood sample, introducing the neighborhood characteristic relation distillation loss and the neighborhood logits relation distillation loss into a total loss function for training a student network model, and establishing neighborhood structure knowledge of knowledge distillation so as to complete better knowledge transfer and improve flower identification and classification effects.

title: Knowledge distillation-based bone mineral density prediction method and system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a bone mineral density prediction method and system based on knowledge distillation. The method comprises the following steps: respectively extracting image features of an X-ray plain film and a CT (Computed Tomography) through a computer vision technology; mapping the 2D image features of the X-ray plain film and the 3D image features of the CT in the teacher model to the same feature space by using a deep learning technology; splicing and fusing the 2D image features of the X-ray plain film and the 3D image features of the CT on the same feature space in the teacher model to serve as fusion features; performing distillation between the fusion features of the teacher model and the 2D image features of the X-ray plain films of the student models by using a fusion feature and knowledge distillation method, and calculating distillation loss; the bone mineral density prediction regression device of the teacher model and the student model is jointly trained in an online distillation mode. According to the method, the bone mineral density value can be well predicted only by using X-ray plain film data in a prediction stage, patients are helped to screen osteoporosis earlier, the cost of screening osteoporosis is reduced, and the risk of fracture is reduced.

title: Intelligent classroom attendance system based on face recognition
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent classroom attendance system based on face recognition, and the system comprises a student face image collection module which is used for building a face feature database according to pictures uploaded by students, and carrying out the detection and recognition of faces in an environment; the framework training matching module is used for constructing a deep learning training network framework for extracting student face feature information according to the characteristics of classroom attendance; the student attendance result detection output module is used for storing attendance records and counting and analyzing attendance data; the user function module is used for registering and using different users and receiving attendance information at the same time, the face recognition technology is applied to school classroom attendance, inherent equipment in a classroom is used for collecting student face images to conduct automatic face detection and recognition to achieve classroom sign-in, and the system is free of contact and perception and high in efficiency. The rapid and convenient sign-in mode can greatly improve the student attendance statistics efficiency of the school.

title: Image feature extraction model training method, image matching method and device
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of image processing, can be applied to various scenes such as cloud technology, artificial intelligence, intelligent traffic, auxiliary driving and the like, and particularly relates to a training method of an image feature extraction model, and an image matching method and device. The training method comprises the steps that a first sample image and a second sample image are obtained by performing image scale transformation on a target sample image; based on the first key point thermodynamic diagram and the second key point thermodynamic diagram, performing thermodynamic loss processing to obtain image thermodynamic loss information; performing feature loss processing based on the first image feature and the second image feature to obtain image feature loss information; and performing model training on a student model to be trained based on the image thermal loss information and the image feature loss information to obtain a trained student model for extracting the image features. According to the method, the problems of calculation duration and extraction accuracy of local image feature extraction are considered.

title: Small sample SAR image target identification method and system based on uncertainty
applicants: PEOPLE'S LIBERATION ARMY NATIONAL UNIVERSITY OF DEFENSE TECHNOLOGY
