abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of image recognition, and discloses a small sample SAR image automatic target recognition method and system based on uncertainty, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the modeling of a classification result through Dirichlet distribution; a Dempster-Shafer theory and Dirichlet distribution are combined, and a loss function of evidence deep learning is derived; in combination with prior information from a source domain, a target identification and uncertainty estimation loss function suitable for passive FSDA is derived; and a teacher-student network structure is adopted, a passive FSDA loss function is utilized, a small amount of target domain labeling data is combined to carry out fine tuning on the model, and finally small sample automatic target identification and uncertainty estimation of the SAR are realized. According to the method, the passive FSDA is used for SAR small sample automatic target recognition, the problem that the traditional FSDA is limited is solved, and a new method is provided for a reliable SAR automatic target recognition technology under small samples.

title: Feature recognition model training method and device, computer equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention can be applied to various scenes such as artificial intelligence, intelligent traffic and auxiliary driving, and relates to a feature recognition model training method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The training method comprises the following steps: acquiring a feature cache queue, a teacher identification model and a student identification model; reading feature recognition training data, and respectively inputting the feature recognition training data into the teacher recognition model and the student recognition model to obtain a first recognition feature and a second recognition feature; calculating feature distribution loss between the first identification feature and the second identification feature based on the feature cache queue, and updating the feature cache queue based on the first identification feature and the second identification feature; and carrying out network parameter updating on the student identification model based on the feature distribution loss, skipping to the step of reading the feature identification training data until a model training termination condition is met, and taking the latest student identification model as the feature identification model. By adopting the method, the object recognition accuracy can be improved.

title: Data privacy protection method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a data privacy protection method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of privacy data protection, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining learning data of a student subject, carrying out the desensitization processing of the learning data, and outputting the desensitized learning data; grouping is carried out, and generalization processing is carried out on each group of sample data; counting observation confidence, and calculating expected confidence based on the probability that an attacker attacks from generalization data to obtain privacy data; if the preset data standard is met, retaining the corresponding first data; and inputting the first data into a machine learning model, detecting the machine learning model based on a preset safety criterion, and obtaining the machine learning model meeting the preset safety criterion. The privacy of data is protected in the whole process of the input end, the model and the output end of the machine learning model.

title: Campus self-service catering management system and method
applicants: GANZHOU SHENGXIN RESTAURANT MAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of intelligent recognition, and particularly discloses a campus self-service catering management system and method, which adopt an artificial intelligence recognition technology based on deep learning to recognize what food is a dish by performing feature extraction on an image of food. And after the identification result is generated, the charge of the dish can be automatically added on the payment bill of the student. In this way, manual dish charging is not needed any more, the checkout efficiency is improved, and better dining experience is brought to students.

title: Federal learning and data processing method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention provides a federal learning and data processing method and device, equipment and a storage medium, which can be applied to scenes such as privacy, safety, artificial intelligence, intelligent traffic and auxiliary driving. The federated learning method comprises the steps that a first computing platform obtains first forward output data, the first forward output data is obtained by processing sample data of a second computing platform through a second bottom model in the second computing platform, and the sample data of the first computing platform is processed through the first bottom model to obtain second forward output data, processing the first forward output data and the second forward output data through the top teacher model to obtain a first processing result, processing the second forward output data through the first top student model to obtain a second processing result, and training the first top student model based on the first processing result, the second processing result and the label. And during subsequent reasoning, the first top student model does not communicate with the second computing platform, so that the communication overhead is reduced.

title: Multi-factor intelligent learning condition analysis method and device based on machine learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to a multi-factor intelligent learning condition analysis method and device based on machine learning. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a classroom scene image shot from a platform perspective to a seat as a to-be-analyzed image; inputting the to-be-analyzed image into a feature preprocessing module to obtain attendance data, action data and distance data of each student; and inputting the attendance data, the action data, the distance data, the course assessment score data and the usual homework information into a multi-factor intelligent learning condition analysis model to obtain a learning condition analysis result of each student. By adopting the method, comprehensive and accurate student learning condition analysis can be realized.

title: Knowledge distillation-based acoustic-electric dual-mode congenital heart disease prediction device
abstract_text: The invention relates to an acoustoelectric dual-mode congenital heart disease diagnosis device based on knowledge distillation, which comprises an acoustoelectric signal acquisition module, a data preprocessing module, a teacher model training module, a student model training module and a diagnosis module, the data are combined with modeling data and serve as input of a teacher model, knowledge of experts is coded into the model through a deep learning algorithm, and a diagnosis model is formed; the student model training module is used for training a student model based on a teacher model and simultaneously using the congenital heart disease patient data set through a knowledge distillation algorithm; model parameters in the teacher model are converted and migrated to the student model, and the student model is trained and optimized; in the training process, auxiliary output is extracted from the teacher model, and the auxiliary output is represented by the features of the middle layer.

title: Multimedia content extraction system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: GUANGZHOU BIDI DATA TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multimedia content extraction system based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a data retrieval module, an extraction processing module, a push analysis module and a push self-selection module, and relates to the technical field of content extraction. According to the multimedia content extraction system based on artificial intelligence, the obtained time difference of the subtitle nodes is compared with the preset subtitle interval value, the subtitle interval segment is obtained according to the comparison result, and then the extracted video is obtained according to the subtitle interval segment, so that analysis of the whole video is avoided, and the extraction efficiency is improved. The method does not need to construct a complex model or feature vector, does not need to consider complex grammar rules, greatly reduces the complexity of evaluation information extraction, calculates the difficulty coefficient of each subtitle interval segment, pushes the subtitle interval segment to a target student according to the difficulty coefficient, enables the target student to timely and effectively obtain a desired extraction video, and improves the extraction efficiency. The review efficiency of students is improved, and the user experience is further improved.

title: Text prediction model training method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN LIFE INSURANCE CO CHINA LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a text prediction model training method, which comprises the following steps of: obtaining a sample data set; training a first preset model according to the historical text data, the collaborative conversation data and the sample labels to obtain a teacher model; performing knowledge distillation on a second preset model according to the historical text data and the teacher model to obtain a student model; predicting all sample data through a student model to obtain a first prediction label; according to the sample label and the first prediction label, determining a prediction loss value of the student model; and when the predicted loss value reaches a convergence condition, determining the student model as a text prediction model. According to the method, knowledge distillation is performed on the second prediction training model through the teacher model, so that the prediction ability of the teacher model is migrated to the student model, offline trained data is migrated to the online prediction model, the processing efficiency and accuracy of text data in the insurance field industry are improved, and the performance of the text prediction model is improved.

title: Middle school experiment scoring method and device, computing equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of machine learning, in particular to a scoring method and device for a middle school experiment, computing equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an experiment video of a target student; the target student experiment video is input into a detection model, a quaternary sequence of the target student experiment video is obtained, and the detection model comprises an action detection model, an experiment apparatus detection model and an experiment phenomenon detection model; and inputting the quaternary sequence into a scoring algorithm to obtain a scoring result, the scoring result being obtained by matching the target student experiment video with the quaternary sequence of the standard experiment process. According to the scheme, the degree of freedom of students in the operation process can be improved, and the accuracy of an experiment video scoring system is improved.

title: Image recognition method and related device
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses an image recognition method and a related device, at least relates to a computer vision technology, machine learning and other technologies in artificial intelligence, and can also be applied to various scenes such as a cloud technology, artificial intelligence, intelligent traffic, auxiliary driving and the like. Through the method provided by the embodiment of the invention, the face recognition accuracy can be improved. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a biological image of a target object; furthermore, knowledge distillation training processing is performed on the biological image sample according to a plurality of target teacher models to obtain a target student model, and feature distribution of each target teacher model in the plurality of target teacher models is the same; performing feature extraction on the biological image based on the target student model to obtain a target biological feature of the target object; and determining a recognition result based on the target biological characteristics of the target object, wherein the recognition result is used for indicating the face recognition condition of the target object.

title: METHOD FOR KNOWLEDGE DISTILLATION AND MODEL GENERATION
abstract_text: The present techniques generally relate to a system and method for knowledge distillation between machine learning, ML, models. In particular, the present application relates to a computer-implemented method for training a condenser model to learn how to transfer knowledge between a teacher model and a student model, and using this trained condenser model to more quickly generate new student models.

title: UNIFICATION OF SPECIALIZED MACHINE-LEARNING MODELS FOR EFFICIENT OBJECT DETECTION AND CLASSIFICATION
abstract_text: The described aspects and implementations enable efficient calibration of a sensing system of a vehicle. In one implementation, disclosed is a method and a system to perform the method of obtaining a plurality of target outputs generated by processing a training input using a respective teacher machine learning model (MLM) of a plurality of teacher MLMs. The training input includes a representation of one or more objects, and each of the plurality of target outputs includes a classification of the objects among a respective set of classes of a plurality of sets of classes. The method further includes using the training input and the plurality of target outputs to train a student MLM to classify the one or more objects among each of the plurality of sets of classes.

title: METHOD FOR KNOWLEDGE DISTILLATION AND MODEL GENERTATION
abstract_text: The present techniques generally relate to a system and method for knowledge distillation between machine learning, ML, models. In particular, the present application relates to a computer-implemented method for training a condenser model to learn how to transfer knowledge between a teacher model and a student model, and using this trained condenser model to more quickly generate new student models.

title: METHOD OF PERFORMING COMMUNICATION LOAD BALANCING WITH MULTI-TEACHER REINFORCEMENT LEARNING, AND AN APPARATUS FOR THE SAME
abstract_text: A server may be provided to obtain a load balancing artificial intelligence (AI) model for a plurality of base stations in a communication system. The server may obtain teacher models based on traffic data sets collected from the base stations, respectively; perform a policy rehearsal process including obtaining student models based on knowledge distillation from the teacher models, obtaining an ensemble student model by ensembling the student models, and obtaining a policy model by interacting with the ensemble student mode; provide the policy model to each of the base stations for a policy evaluation of the policy model; and based on a training continue signal being received from at least one of the base stations as a result of the policy evaluation, update the ensemble student model and the policy model by performing the policy rehearsal process on the student models.

title: Road scene segmentation method, system and equipment based on knowledge distillation, and medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a road scene segmentation method, system and device based on knowledge distillation and a medium, and belongs to road scene segmentation in the field of artificial intelligence. The objective of the invention is to solve the technical problems in the prior art that a model cannot effectively extract difference knowledge between samples and the road scene segmentation effect of the model is poor due to the fact that a structured dependency relationship between pixels is easy to ignore. A trunk network in a teacher network model and a student network model outputs a dense feature graph, a classifier outputs a class probability graph, then a distillation loss function is determined based on the dense feature graph and the class probability graph, and finally iterative training is performed on the student network model based on the distillation loss function to obtain a maturely trained student network model. The student model is guided to learn more discriminative inter-sample difference knowledge of the teacher model from pixel and category dimensions through knowledge distillation, so that a more comprehensive and detailed spatial dependency relationship is captured, and the road scene segmentation capability of the model is remarkably improved.

title: Method for hiding sensitive information of students in examination video
applicants: SHANGHAI DAFENG LABORATORY EQUIPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a method for hiding sensitive information of students in an examination video, and relates to the technical field of Internet. Identity information, facial features and personal writing features of students can be effectively hidden, the privacy of the students is protected, and personal information leakage is avoided; information which may leak student school messages in an examination environment is effectively printed, and it is ensured that the video does not contain any sensitive information; the examination question content is subjected to coding processing to protect the copyright of the question knowledge and prevent the examination content from being leaked; through dynamic virtual characters and automatic processing, the authenticity and availability of the video are kept, and the accurate supervision effect is ensured; and the AI character model library is updated regularly to adapt to the change and diversity of global student group characteristics, so that the system applicability is improved.

title: Image detection model, training method and device thereof, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides an image detection model and a training method and device thereof, equipment and a storage medium, and is at least applied to the field of artificial intelligence and the field of medical detection.The method comprises the steps that a pre-trained student language model is called, text label prediction is conducted on unlabeled text data, and at least one first student text prediction label is obtained; calling a pre-trained teacher vision model, and performing image label prediction on the unlabeled image data to obtain at least one teacher vision prediction label; performing label filtering on the at least one teacher visual prediction label based on the at least one first student text prediction label to obtain at least one filtered false detection label; and performing parameter optimization processing on model parameters in a to-be-trained student vision model based on each filtering false detection label and an image labeling label corresponding to the labeled image data to obtain an image detection model. According to the invention, the detection performance of the image detection model can be improved.

title: Training method, recommendation method, device and equipment based on neural network model
abstract_text: The invention provides a training method based on a neural network model, an information recommendation method and device based on the neural network model, electronic equipment, a computer readable storage medium and a computer program product. The artificial intelligence technology is involved; the method comprises the steps of obtaining training sample data; performing feature extraction processing on the training sample data through a plurality of teacher models to obtain a teacher embedding vector output by each teacher model; performing feature extraction processing on the training sample data through a plurality of student models to obtain a student embedding vector output by each student model; wherein the model structures of the plurality of teacher models are mutually independent, each teacher model corresponds to one prediction task, partial model structures of the plurality of student models are shared, and each student model corresponds to one prediction task; and based on the teacher embedded vectors and the student embedded vectors, performing distillation training processing on the plurality of teacher models and the plurality of student models to obtain the plurality of trained student models.

title: Object classification model training method and device, object classification method and device and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses an object classification model training method and device, an object classification method and device and a storage medium, which can be applied to various scenes such as cloud technology, artificial intelligence, smart traffic, Internet of Vehicles and the like, and the method comprises the following steps: obtaining a sample image of a sample object; inputting the sample image into a teacher model, and determining a sample label graph of the sample image based on a label graph extraction network of the teacher model; cutting the sample image to obtain a sample cut image; based on first coordinate information of the sample clipping image in the sample image, clipping the sample label graph to obtain a sample sub-label graph; inputting the sample cutting image into a student model for category label prediction processing to obtain a sample label prediction result; and training a student model based on a first difference between the sample tag prediction result and the sample category tag and a second difference between the sample tag prediction result and the cut sub-tag to obtain an object classification model. The accuracy of the object classification model is improved.

title: Video transmission method and device, electronic equipment and readable storage medium
applicants: RES INST CHINA MOBILE COMMUNICATIONS CORP
CHINA MOBILE COMMUNICATIONS GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a video transmission method and device, electronic equipment and a readable storage medium, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. The video transmission method provided by the embodiment of the invention comprises the following steps: acquiring a to-be-transmitted target video; decomposing the target video into a plurality of short videos; performing low-resolution processing on each short video to obtain a plurality of low-resolution videos; and sending the plurality of low-resolution videos and a teacher model to a client, the teacher model being capable of recovering the plurality of low-resolution videos into a high-resolution video for the client to obtain a student model corresponding to the teacher model, and using the student model to recover the plurality of low-resolution videos, and a corresponding high-resolution video is obtained. Therefore, the resolution of the transmitted video can be reduced, so that the transmission efficiency is greatly improved, and the video transmission time delay is reduced.

title: Mobile student physique detection system and detection method
applicants: QINGDAO WANRUIBAO INTELLIGENT MEDICAL CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a mobile student physique detection system and detection method, which comprises a server, a mobile intelligent terminal device and a detection device, and is characterized in that the detection device comprises a body weight tester and a vital capacity tester; the mobile intelligent terminal equipment comprises a main controller, and an AI distance measuring module, an AI action recognition module, a GPS positioning and distance measuring module, a Bluetooth module and a network module which are controlled by the main controller; and the mobile intelligent terminal is connected with the body weight tester and the vital capacity tester through the Bluetooth module. The main controller communicates with the server through the network module, and the database is used for storing and recording student scores, tracking long-term physical test results of students, collecting physical test scores of students of the same age, analyzing physical change conditions of the students through data comparison, and transversely comparing scores of the students in the students of the same age. The real physical test score of the student can be comprehensively and accurately tested and calculated, so that the physical score of the student has a higher reference value.

title: Image segmentation model training method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides an image segmentation model training method and device, equipment and a storage medium, which are used for reducing the data heterogeneity influence of third-party unlabeled data and improving the accuracy of image segmentation. Comprising the steps of obtaining a training sample set, an initial student model and an initial teacher model; performing supervised training on the initial student model to obtain supervised loss; obtaining a local unlabeled feature prototype of the local unlabeled sample and a third-party unlabeled feature prototype of the third-party unlabeled sample based on the initial teacher model; obtaining unlabeled loss according to the local unlabeled feature prototype, the third-party unlabeled feature prototype, the first feature map and the real label; and training the initial student model according to the supervised loss and the unlabeled loss to obtain the image segmentation model. The technical scheme provided by the invention can be applied to the fields of artificial intelligence, computer vision, cloud technology and the like.

title: METHODS FOR ONLINE LANGUAGE LEARNING USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND AVATAR TECHNOLOGIES
abstract_text: In embodiments, a computer implemented method for language learning includes delivering a user or student's speech into a computer using speech recognition software and sending the output of the speech recognition software to a language adaptive encoding module which outputs a positional encoding matrix; inputting the positional encoding matrix to a trained attention neural network module comprising an encoder and decoder block and a feed forward neural network layer, wherein the trained attention neural network module is trained using course materials for language learning, receiving the output of the trained attention neural network module into a speech synthesis module, delivering the output of the speech synthesis module to an avatar on the computer; and delivering speech from the avatar to the student.

title: KNOWLEDGE DISTILLATION AND GRADIENT PRUNING-BASED COMPRESSION OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED BASE CALLER.
abstract_text: The technology disclosed compresses a larger, teacher base caller into a smaller, student base caller. The student base caller has fewer processing modules and parameters than the teacher base caller. The teacher base caller is trained using hard labels (e.g., one-hot encodings). The trained teacher base caller is used to generate soft labels as output probabilities during the inference phase. The soft labels are used to train the student base caller.

title: Content identification method and device, equipment, storage medium and program product
abstract_text: The invention discloses a content recognition method and device, equipment, a storage medium and a program product, and relates to the field of machine learning. The method comprises the steps that a first data set and a second data set are acquired, target content in first data is recognized through a teacher recognition model and a student recognition model, and a first recognition result output by the teacher recognition model and a second recognition result output by the student recognition model are obtained; obtaining an unsupervised loss value based on the first recognition result and the second recognition result; obtaining a supervised loss value based on an identification result of the student identification model on the second data and the sample label; and training the teacher identification model through the unsupervised loss value and the supervised loss value to obtain a content identification model. An end-to-end semi-supervised training process is formed through the data set with the label and the data set without the label, so that the training process of the content recognition model is more concise, and the flexibility and the training efficiency of model training are improved.

title: College auxiliary bedroom checking device and method based on unmanned aerial vehicle and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a college auxiliary sleep checking device and method based on an unmanned aerial vehicle and artificial intelligence, the device comprises the unmanned aerial vehicle, the unmanned aerial vehicle comprises a power system module, a flight control system module, a link system module and a task load module, and the unmanned aerial vehicle performs remote control according to a set route or a ground control station to move in a preset route. Through the task load module, the dormitories are shot and recorded, data are uploaded to the ground control station terminal, and the ground control station terminal carries out data summarization, data processing, simulation training and unified scoring. According to the system, the conflict problem caused by unreasonable bedroom checking is avoided, meanwhile, an online real-time data processing algorithm can ensure that privacy of students is not invaded from the source, bedroom checking efficiency is high, evaluation is objective, and safety management work of schools on student dormitories can be effectively assisted.

title: Model training method and device, image recognition method and device, equipment and medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a model training method, an image recognition method, an image recognition device, equipment and a medium, which are used for reducing the training cost and improving the recognition robustness of an image recognition model, and can be applied to various scenes such as artificial intelligence, cloud technology, intelligent traffic, auxiliary driving and the like. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an initial student model and an initial teacher model which have the same network structure, and a first training image; training the initial student model based on the first training image to obtain a student model with a first network parameter; performing iterative training on the initial teacher model based on the second training image to obtain a teacher model, and updating the network parameters of the student model according to the network parameters of the teacher model by using exponential moving average in the iterative training process; and outputting a target student model until the iterative training reaches the convergence condition of the teacher model.

title: Virtual classroom display method and system based on meta universe
abstract_text: The invention discloses a virtual classroom display method and system based on meta universe, and the method comprises the steps: scene collection: obtaining first scene information and second scene information, each piece of master terminal equipment being used for shooting a corresponding first target object, and each piece of slave terminal equipment being used for shooting a corresponding second target object; an information extraction step: extracting to obtain related information of at least one first target object, and extracting to obtain related information of a plurality of second target objects; a first virtual scene building step: generating a meta cosmic environment, and integrating the first simulation area and the second simulation area to generate a first virtual scene; and a first virtual display step: transmitting the first virtual scene to at least one master device for display, and transmitting the first simulation area to a plurality of slave devices for display. Through combination of artificial intelligence and the meta universe technology, a more convenient observation mode is provided for teachers to facilitate supervision of student states, and the teachers are assisted in improving class quality and student participation degree.

title: Model training method, training data acquisition method and related equipment
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a model training method, a training data acquisition method and related equipment, the method can be used in the field of text processing in the field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the following steps: inputting a first text comprising a third text and a first prompt into a machine learning model to obtain a second text output by the machine learning model, the third text belongs to the first data set; inputting the second text into the teacher model to obtain a first prediction result output by the teacher model; executing a first training operation based on the first prediction result to update the first prompt; training data used when knowledge distillation is carried out on the student model by utilizing the teacher model is obtained based on the trained first prompt; according to the scheme, the text generated by the machine learning model is guided to approach the privacy data by means of the ability of the teacher model, and the training data adopted when knowledge distillation is carried out on the student model is similar to the privacy data, so that the accuracy of the trained student model when a natural language processing task is executed is improved.

title: Incremental learning method based on knowledge distillation and parameter isolation
applicants: ZHONGKE XIAMEN DATA INTELLIGENT RES INSTITUTE
abstract_text: The invention discloses an incremental learning method based on knowledge distillation and parameter isolation, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: initializing the parameters of a teacher model feature extractor through the parameters of a student model feature extractor, and training a teacher model in an auxiliary manner through a multi-pooling branch module, in the mask learning stage, the teacher model obtained in the fine tuning stage is utilized to guide learning of binary masks in a knowledge distillation mode, the teacher model is abandoned when the model is inferred after training is finished, and corresponding masks and classifiers are found according to provided task ID information to act on student models for inference prediction. Parameters of different tasks are isolated through binary masks, space consumption caused by parameter increase of the model in an increment task is greatly reduced, mask updating is guided through a teacher model on a new task, the plasticity of the model is enhanced, and the efficiency is improved. The multi-pooling branch auxiliary fine-tuning model method can improve the model performance on different tasks.

title: Operation and maintenance and Internet of Things management method and platform based on artificial intelligence, and storage medium
applicants: GUANGZHOU YUNTIAN DATA TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an operation and maintenance and Internet of Things management method and platform based on artificial intelligence, and a storage medium. The operation and maintenance and Internet of Things management method based on artificial intelligence comprises the following steps: a monitoring system collects facial expression data of students in real time and uploads the facial expression data; an artificial intelligence system obtains the facial expression data uploaded by the monitoring system in real time, and obtains an emotion data model according to the facial expression data and an emotion expression data material library; the artificial intelligence system judges whether the current emotional state of the student is abnormal or not according to the emotional data model; when the current emotional state of the student is abnormal, the artificial intelligence system sends the abnormal information of the current emotional state of the student to a communication terminal device; the platform mainly comprises a monitoring system and an artificial intelligence system. The storage medium includes a memory and a processor. The system has the advantages of high intelligent degree of operation, maintenance and management and the like.

title: Psychological state assessment system and method based on physical activity behavior mode monitoring
abstract_text: According to the psychological state evaluation system and method based on physical activity behavior mode monitoring, an artificial intelligence monitoring technology based on deep learning is adopted, and action label features of students in each monitoring key frame are recognized through feature extraction of physical activity monitoring videos of students with normal psychology and students to be monitored; further performing context semantic understanding on the time sequence distribution of the action label features in each monitoring key frame to obtain action mode understanding feature representation, and representing difference feature distribution between the psychological normal students and the to-be-monitored students based on a transfer matrix of the action mode understanding features of the psychological normal students and the to-be-monitored students; therefore, the psychological state of the to-be-monitored student is judged. Therefore, the mental health state of the student can be monitored and evaluated intelligently and accurately.

title: Model training method, non-motor vehicle cross-mirror tracking method and device and medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of deep learning, particularly provides a model training method, a non-motor vehicle cross-mirror tracking method and device and a medium, and aims to solve the problem of how to efficiently, timely and accurately realize cross-mirror tracking of a non-motor vehicle. In order to achieve the purpose, marking is performed according to image data, collected by different lenses, of a non-motor vehicle, marking data is obtained, a deep learning model is trained by applying the marking data, a trained teacher model is obtained, knowledge distillation is performed on the teacher model to obtain a student model, and model adjustment is performed on the student model according to target domain data. According to the non-motor vehicle cross-mirror tracking method, a trained non-motor vehicle cross-mirror tracking model is obtained, a deep learning model can obtain a better recognition effect, under the condition that precision is hardly lost, the reasoning speed of the model is increased, the model space size and the feature storage size are reduced, and the problem that the recognition precision of the model is reduced due to the difference of data from different sources is solved.

title: Student information privacy protection method based on deep learning fusion
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student information privacy protection method based on deep learning fusion, the method combines deep learning and block chain technologies to ensure that personal information of students is safely protected, student personal information data uploaded by users are preprocessed, and a deep learning algorithm is used to ensure that the personal information of the students is safely protected. The method comprises the following steps of: preprocessing data, training the preprocessed data to mainly encrypt and decrypt personal information, storing the encrypted information on a block chain in a Hyperledger Fabric network, and in order to protect the privacy of the personal information of students, managing the access authority of the student information by using an intelligent contract and an access control strategy, so that the privacy of the personal information of the students is protected. Only authorized users can check or modify the personal information of the students, the security and privacy of the personal information of the students are ensured through the tamper-resistant and distributed characteristics of the block chain, and when authorized users use the personal information of the students, the encrypted information is decrypted by using corresponding secret keys and deep learning models.

title: Data processing method and device
abstract_text: The invention discloses a data processing method, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a first query corresponding to a first neural network, and a second query corresponding to a second neural network; the first query is a query obtained after maximizing the information entropy of the query corresponding to the first neural network; the first neural network is a model obtained by compressing the second neural network; the first neural network and the second neural network are used for target detection; according to the first query and the second query, determining a first loss; the first loss indication minimizes an information difference between the second query and the first query; and updating the first neural network and the first query according to the first loss. According to the method, the information gap between the student model and the teacher model is minimized by minimizing the information gap between the query of the student model and the query of the teacher model, so that the model precision of the compression model is improved.

title: Positive emotion perception-oriented emotion participation degree detection method
abstract_text: The invention discloses an emotion participation degree detection method for positive emotion perception, relates to the technical field of data analysis, and aims at performing feature extraction on data of different dimensions in classroom learning of students to realize information identification of each dimension, and then performing decision fusion and result application analysis to obtain an emotion participation degree detection result. According to the method, feature extraction is carried out on data of all dimensions in classroom learning of students, then a fusion strategy based on a deep learning network is adopted and applied to subsequent supervision classification, and a student positive emotion participation degree model is constructed. Different multi-modal information of cognition, emotion, thinking and the like of the students acquired by different channels is integrated into a framework to comprehensively reflect the positive emotions of the students.

title: Student catering preference recommendation system based on deep learning algorithm
applicants: SHANGHAI JIAOTONG UNIV SCHOOL OF MEDICINE
abstract_text: The invention provides a student catering preference recommendation system based on a deep learning algorithm, which is characterized in that a user terminal is connected with a cloud application server, the student catering preference recommendation system based on the deep learning algorithm is installed in the cloud application server, and the cloud application server is connected with a cloud database; a system software part comprises a user portrait module; a shop entering module; an evaluation and scoring module; a distribution information tracking module; a student user dish recommendation module; a personal body health monitoring module; a data report module; the student catering preference recommendation system based on the deep learning algorithm is operated by TensorFlow. According to the invention, the health level of student catering and the economic benefits of merchants are improved.

title: Civil aircraft point cloud marking efficient semantic segmentation system and method
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a civil aircraft point cloud mark efficient semantic segmentation system and method based on weak supervised learning, and the system comprises a WSSS module which is used for abstracting a geometric structure from the input of a plurality of levels of receptive fields based on a semantic query network SQN, obtaining the point embedding of a mark point in an input point cloud in a non-abnormal manner, and obtaining the point embedding of the mark point in the input point cloud; the method comprises the following steps: marking data DL, obtaining point classification scores, training according to the marked data DL to learn a semantic segmentation model f theta, and establishing a WSSS teacher network, DL < DU, and Du representing unmarked data; and the self-training ST module is used for generating a high-confidence pseudo tag PL of the Du, marking the Du by using the PL, performing retraining based on the WSSS teacher network by using a combined data set of the DL and the Du, and generating WSSS student network refinement f theta.

title: College student mental health state assessment model and early warning method based on campus behavior data analysis
abstract_text: The invention provides a college student mental health state assessment model and early warning method based on campus behavior data analysis. A traditional psychological health assessment method has the limitation of subjectivity and manual intervention, and cannot accurately and timely assess the psychological health state of a student. According to the invention, behavior data of students in a campus, such as school canteen consumption data, school hospital inquiry data, academic data, classroom attendance data, daily campus travel data and face recognition facial expression data, are utilized, and machine learning and statistical analysis technologies are combined, so that an evaluation model is established and data analysis is carried out; accurate assessment of the psychological health state of the college students and early warning of potential problems are realized. According to the invention, through analysis of student behavior data, features related to psychological health can be extracted, and a psychological health assessment and early warning model is constructed. The model can accurately evaluate the psychological health state of the student and timely discover potential problems, and provides a scientific evaluation tool and a decision basis for schools and educational institutions. Meanwhile, the students can benefit from personalized psychological support and intervention measures, and improvement and comprehensive development of psychological health of the students are promoted.

title: Traffic regulation shorthand and pushing method and system
abstract_text: The invention provides a traffic regulation shorthand and pushing method and system, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The traffic regulation shorthand pushing method comprises the steps of obtaining basic information, historical test scores and current driving knowledge points of a target student, and performing knowledge point classification in combination with historical driving test contents and the current driving knowledge points to generate keywords; according to keywords generated by classifying the knowledge points of the target student, determining current knowledge points of the road safety law knowledge points, the safety civilization knowledge points and the knowledge points to be learned belonging to the keywords, and storing the current knowledge points in a knowledge model database; and calculating a learning reference value according to the learning content of the target student, comparing the learning deviation value of the target student with the learning reference value, and pushing optimal learning resources to the target student. The technical effect of improving the review efficiency of the corresponding subject can be achieved, and the technical problem that the effect of the question setting method is not good is solved.

title: Deep learning model distillation method, device, equipment and medium
abstract_text: The invention provides a deep learning model distillation method, apparatus and device, and a medium. The method comprises the following steps: converting a one-dimensional rolling mill audio signal into a two-dimensional spectrogram through Mel spectrum analysis; constructing everything divisible models respectively based on the ViT-H and the ViT-tiny, and taking the everything divisible models as teacher and student models in model distillation; fixing the two models to prompt parameters of an encoder and a decoder, and training spectrum image encoders of the two models based on embedded KL divergence; and generating prompt points second by second on a time axis, realizing segmentation based on a ViT-tiny encoder parameter, filtering invalid segmentation through mIoU, and generating a final whole image segmentation result. According to the method, through distillation from a large model to a small model, rolling mill no-load identification based on audio is realized, and the performance of deep learning rolling mill no-load audio identification can be effectively improved.

title: Malicious software detection method and system based on knowledge search
abstract_text: The invention discloses a malicious software detection method and system based on knowledge search. A model training mode based on a knowledge distillation algorithm and a neural network structure search technology is used for improving an existing deep learning training mode. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, extracting a required feature file from an Android software sample, extracting a required feature type from the feature file, and screening features to form a feature data set for representing the Android software sample; and secondly, the multi-layer perceptron network can effectively capture correlation and dependency between original features, and has a good classification advantage. Knowledge distillation and neural network structure search technologies are introduced, the teacher network model participates in and guides the training process of the student network model, and the student network model with the strongest learning ability is adaptively searched, so that the performance gap between the teacher network model and the student network model is solved; and a feasible scheme is provided for the field of malicious software detection based on deep learning.

title: Autism rehabilitation course recording method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and discloses an autism rehabilitation course recording method and device, equipment and a medium. The method comprises the following steps: identifying teacher voice data and student voice data from audio and video data of a rehabilitation classroom, and performing mood and intonation identification on the student voice data; converting the teacher voice data and the student voice data into first text data and second text data respectively; analyzing matching data between the question of the teacher in the first text data and the corresponding answer of the student in the second text data; extracting a facial image of the student from the audio and video data, and performing micro-expression recognition operation on the facial image to obtain a micro-expression label of the student; and obtaining a classroom record text of the rehabilitation classroom according to the tone, the first text data, the second text data, the matching data and the micro expression label. According to the invention, objectivity and accuracy of autism rehabilitation course recording can be improved.

title: Transform model training method based on self-supervised learning
applicants: GUANGKONG TERMINUS CHONGQING INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a Transform model training method based on self-supervised learning. The method is applied to the field of deep learning and comprises the steps that a training data set is input into a preset Transform model containing a teacher model and a student model, output of each model comprises two parts, one part corresponds to a target class task and the other part corresponds to a non-target class task, the two parts are input into a decoupling Kullback-Leibler divergence formula with hyper-parameters, a loss value is obtained, and the loss value is calculated. And updating the parameters of the student model and continuously adjusting hyper-parameters by using gradient back propagation, and updating the parameters of the teacher model based on the parameters of the student model until the student model achieves convergence. In this way, the traditional knowledge distillation thought is decoupled into the target knowledge distillation and the non-target knowledge distillation, the weights of the target knowledge distillation and the non-target knowledge distillation are easier to adjust, and finally the knowledge transfer effectiveness between the teacher model and the student model is improved.

title: Model training method based on knowledge distillation, quality inspection method and related equipment
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a knowledge distillation-based model training method, a quality inspection method and related equipment, which can be applied to various scenes such as cloud technology, artificial intelligence, intelligent traffic and aided driving, and can be applied to scenes such as model training and equipment quality inspection. The model training method comprises the following steps: acquiring a first target feature and a second target feature which are respectively extracted from an input image by a teacher model and a student model and comprise a content feature and a dense feature; determining weight matrixes corresponding to the content feature and the dense feature of the first target feature through an attention mechanism; respectively determining respective corresponding feature loss values for the content features and the dense features based on the weight matrix; calculating a category loss value between a prediction category indicated by the dense feature of the second target feature and a real category corresponding to the input image; and adjusting network parameters of the student model based on the category loss value and the feature loss value. The performance of the student model can be improved.

title: Vehicle re-identification method, system and device and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a vehicle re-identification method, system and device and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of image processing, computer vision and deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a to-be-identified picture and a picture library set; inputting a to-be-recognized picture into the trained student network, and recognizing a vehicle picture having the highest similarity with the vehicle in the to-be-recognized picture from the picture library set; the trained student network can enlarge the receptive field range of the network and establish the correlation between remote features, facilitates the extraction of features with higher robustness, and finally identifies the vehicle image with the highest similarity with the vehicle in the to-be-identified image from the image library set, and the identification accuracy is high.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR EVALUATING A PET RADIOLOGICAL IMAGE
abstract_text: In one embodiment, the present disclosure provides a computer-implemented method comprising: receiving a first tag training dataset comprising a first plurality of images each associated with a set of tags; training a machine learning neural Teacher model on the first mark training data set in a programming mode; programmatically applying a machine learning model trained for NLP to an untagged dataset, the dataset comprising a digital electronic representation of a natural language textual summary of a second plurality of images, thereby generating a second tagged training dataset comprising the second plurality of images; using a machine learning neural Teamer model to generate a soft pseudo label in a programming mode; using the soft pseudo tag to generate a derivative tag in a programming manner; using the derivative labels to train one or more machine learning neural Student models; receiving a target image; an integration of the one or more Student models is applied to output one or more classifications of the target image.

title: Campus power consumption management system based on deep learning algorithm
applicants: SHANGHAI JIAOTONG UNIV SCHOOL OF MEDICINE
abstract_text: The invention provides a campus power consumption management system based on a deep learning algorithm, and the system is characterized in that intelligent ammeters are installed and deployed in all student apartments and dormitories; the plurality of intelligent electric meters are connected with a digital signal collector; the digital signal collector is in network connection with the application server through a campus network, and the power consumption management system is arranged in the application server; the application server is in network connection with the cloud database; the application server is in network connection with the client terminal and operates the power consumption management system through software in the client terminal; and the application server is in network connection with the mobile terminal, and operates the power consumption management system through a program in the mobile terminal. The system facilitates power utilization of students and power utilization management of schools.

title: Intelligent auxiliary system based on large language model
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent auxiliary system based on a large language model. The intelligent auxiliary system comprises a vocabulary generating module, a vocabulary generating module, a vocabulary generating module and a vocabulary generating module, the input sequence generation module is used for performing word segmentation according to the vocabulary to obtain an input sequence; and the output result display module is used for inputting the input sequence into the language model to obtain an output result and displaying the output result. The advanced natural language processing technology and the machine learning algorithm are utilized, and deep understanding and personalized tutoring learning of course content are achieved. According to the invention, through answering the student questions in real time, automatically generating personalized exercises and automatically summarizing and extracting course contents, the problem of uneven distribution of educational resources is greatly improved, the educational quality is improved, and better learning experience is provided for students.

title: Equipment manufacturing control method based on augmented reality and electronic equipment
applicants: INDUSTRIAL CLOUD MFG SICHUAN INNOVATION CENTER CO LTD
abstract_text: According to the equipment manufacturing control method based on augmented reality and the electronic equipment, the production state of a real production line is visually displayed through the digital twin model, the production state is displayed in the digital twin model, augmented reality display is carried out, production line state information can be further highlighted, the production management level is improved, and the production efficiency is improved. The response time is shortened. In the production line state recognition process, an artificial intelligence model is adopted for recognition, during model debugging, related production line state information is obtained through recognition in a production line state detection teacher model through a production line state recognition network, and debugging of a production line state detection student model is taught based on the recognized production line state information. Knowledge migration is achieved, the production line state recognition network is adopted as a medium for completion, the dependency of migration learning on a network architecture is low, the configurability is high, and meanwhile the accuracy of production line state recognition of the production line state detection student model can be improved.

title: Power field knowledge graph relationship discovery method based on deep learning
applicants: LANGFANG POWER SUPPLY CO STATE GRID JIBEI ELECTRIC POWER CO LTD
SMART GRID RES INSTITUTE CO LTD OF STATE GRID
abstract_text: The invention discloses an electric power field knowledge graph relationship discovery method based on deep learning, and relates to the technical field of the electric power field, professional field knowledge is utilized to construct an electric power field knowledge graph, and entities and relationships between the entities are added in the electric power field knowledge graph; extracting Chinese text features by using a BERT model obtained by incremental training, and performing sequence labeling learning in combination with entities and relationship information in the knowledge graph; and meanwhile, the stacked convolutional neural network and the student reordering network are combined, so that knowledge graph completion and prediction of the relationship between entities can be performed with high precision. According to the method, professional knowledge in the electric power field can be utilized, accurate, efficient and automatic mining of the relation between the entities is achieved, and the knowledge graph is rapidly and accurately maintained and updated.

title: Human body posture estimation method based on multi-modal attention network
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of wireless sensing and deep learning, in particular to a human body posture estimation method based on a multi-modal attention network. In video modal learning, an FCN-based multi-resolution network is designed to extract attitude features, and a local self-attention network is applied to a generated thermodynamic diagram to adaptively adjust weights and attention of different regions so as to capture finer key point information. In CSI modal learning, a spatial position linear change layer based on a space-time attention network and guided by multiple modes is designed to meet self-learning of space-time features. In the whole multi-mode learning network, a teacher-student architecture is adopted, so that the posture estimation model based on the Wi-Fi signal can learn more deep learning capability of a video mode. Correct information of human body posture estimation is transferred from a video learning network to a Wi-Fi signal learning network, and finally human body posture information can be accurately estimated only by inputting a CSI mode.

title: Physical experiment scoring system and instrument based on AI and use method
applicants: SHANGHAI DAFENG LABORATORY EQUIPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an AI-based physical experiment scoring system and instrument and a use method, the AI-based physical experiment scoring system comprises an experiment operation table, a deep learning server, a teacher end and a student end, the deep learning server is divided into an algorithm module and a data management module, and the experiment operation table comprises a top view camera, a side view camera and a tracking camera. The objective of the invention is to solve the problem that a monitoring system in the prior art can only record general operations of students, cannot accurately read experimental data of the students, and cannot accurately photograph and identify real images on a projection light screen. Through the arrangement of the top view camera, the tracking camera and the rightmost sliding base, the tracking camera synchronously moves along with the movement of the sliding base, and the tracking camera is always aligned to the center of the projection light screen, so that the experiment data of students can be accurately read; and an image on the projection light screen is accurately photographed, so that the examination of the student is accurately scored.

title: Target detection model training method, target detection method, device and equipment
applicants: APOLLO ZHILIAN BEIJING TECH CO LTD
APOLLO ZHIXING TECH GUANGZHOU CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a target detection model training method, a target detection method, a target detection device and target detection equipment, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of automatic driving, intelligent traffic and deep learning. According to the specific implementation scheme, a teacher detection model is adopted to process a sample to-be-detected image, and distillation characteristics and distillation results of a sample object are obtained; wherein the distillation characteristics comprise global distillation characteristics and local distillation characteristics; the distillation result comprises a two-dimensional distillation result and a three-dimensional distillation result; and training a student detection model according to the sample to-be-detected image, the supervision data of the sample to-be-detected image, the distillation characteristics and the distillation result to obtain a target detection model. According to the technical scheme, the target detection precision can be improved.

title: Training method, using method, device and equipment of multi-modal pre-training model
abstract_text: The invention provides a training method, a use method, a device and equipment of a multi-modal pre-training model, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring first image block sequence information of a sample image; the first image block sequence information is input into a visual word segmentation device, a first semantic feature is obtained, and the visual word segmentation device is a teacher network in knowledge distillation; masking at least one image block in an image block sequence indicated by the first image block sequence information to obtain second image block sequence information; inputting the second image block sequence information into a multi-modal pre-training model to obtain a second semantic feature, the multi-modal pre-training model being a student network in knowledge distillation; based on the first semantic feature and the second semantic feature, a first loss value is determined, and the first loss value is used for indicating the difference between the first semantic feature and the second semantic feature; and the visual word segmentation device and the multi-modal pre-training model are trained based on the first loss value, so that the generalization ability of the visual word segmentation device and the multi-modal pre-training model is improved.

title: Image target recognition method and device, equipment and medium
applicants: THUNDER CHONGQING AUTOMOTIVE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an image target recognition method and device, equipment and a medium, which are applied to a feature learning algorithm model for recognizing image features, and the method comprises the steps: receiving a plurality of to-be-recognized image data; calculating each piece of image data based on the feature learning algorithm model to obtain a feature recognition result corresponding to each piece of image data so as to determine at least one image target corresponding to each piece of image data; wherein the feature learning algorithm model is obtained through a training method combining multi-AI training chip parallel computing and a knowledge distillation method based on a teacher model and a student model, supervision of similar relation distribution between training data is achieved, and more information is learned. The method can give full play to the feature recognition capability of the feature learning algorithm model, optimizes the accuracy of the image target recognition result, and improves the application experience.

title: Semi-supervised image segmentation method based on artificial intelligence and related equipment
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence and digital medical treatment, and provides a semi-supervised image segmentation method and device based on artificial intelligence, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: collecting a label image and a non-label image; building a student model and a teacher model; inputting the label-free image into a teacher model and a student model to obtain first teacher output and first student output, and training the student model according to a first cost function; performing data enhancement on the unlabeled image, inputting the unlabeled image into the teacher model to obtain second teacher output, and calculating a second cost function in combination with the first teacher output to train the teacher model; inputting the label image into a student model to obtain a second student output, and counting the number of pixel points which are wrongly segmented to obtain a segmentation error coefficient; constructing a third cost function based on the segmentation error coefficient to train a teacher model; and when all the cost functions are smaller than a preset value, taking the student model as a semi-supervised image segmentation model. According to the invention, the precision of semi-supervised image segmentation can be improved.

title: ADAPTIVE LEARNING IN A DIVERSE LEARNING ECOSYSTEM
abstract_text: A system for training a student to operate an actual machine includes an electronic learning module and a simulation system for simulating operation of the actual machine. An adaptive learning artificial intelligence (ALAI) module receives student performance data to adapt training of the student. The student performance data includes instructor-graded performance results of the student based on the student operating the actual machine, simulation performance results for the student operating a simulated machine in a simulation system that simulates operation of an actual machine and electronic learning content results from an electronic learning module that delivers electronic learning content to a student computing device used by the student. The ALAI module comprises a learner profile module that profiles the student, a training task recommendation module that generates AI-generated recommendations, and an explainability and pedagogical intervention module for displaying on the instructor computing device explanations for the AI-generated recommendations.

title: MMETHOD AND SYSTEM FOR TWO-STEP HIERARCHICAL MODEL OPTIMIZATION
abstract_text: State of art approaches independently use a Pruning-weight Clustering-Quantization (PCQ) or Knowledge Distillation (KD) for model optimization and require critical manual intervention. Embodiments of the present disclosure provide a method and system for the two-step hierarchical model optimization approach for generating optimized model DL model. The method comprises a AutoPCQ technique followed by conditional application of an automated KD (AKD) technique. The AutoPCQ technique formulates a problem of configuration selection of the DL model as an optimization problem by iteratively applying Bayesian optimization and Reinforcement Learning. Further, the AKD technique formulates automated search of a student model as the optimization problem with the DL model representing a teacher model. A search space for the student model is defined by a restricted Neural Network Architecture Search that restricts the search space. The method automates the model optimization, in time efficient manner without compromising accuracy of the optimized model.

title: ADAPTIVE LEARNING IN A DIVERSE LEARNING ECOSYSTEM
abstract_text: A system for training a student to operate an actual machine includes an electronic learning module and a simulation system for simulating operation of the actual machine. An adaptive learning artificial intelligence (ALAI) module receives student performance data to adapt training of the student. The student performance data includes instructor-graded performance results of the student based on the student operating the actual machine, simulation performance results for the student operating a simulated machine in a simulation system that simulates operation of an actual machine and electronic learning content results from an electronic learning module that delivers electronic learning content to a student computing device used by the student. The ALAI module comprises a learner profile module that profiles the student, a training task recommendation module that generates AI-generated recommendations, and an explainability and pedagogical intervention module for displaying on the instructor computing device explanations for the AI-generated recommendations.

title: Attendance management system and management method based on big data and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides an attendance management system and management method based on big data and artificial intelligence. The attendance management system comprises an information acquisition module, a region delimiting module, an attendance storage module, an attendance statistics module, an attendance analysis module, an anomaly analysis module, a summarization module and an application module. Carrying out deep learning according to student information, course activity information and classroom information, and carrying out regional division on attendance sites to obtain an attendance region set; when attendance information statistics is carried out on the students, current attendance information is obtained in combination with the attendance area set, the attendance information is classified, normal attendance information is subjected to attendance processing, and meanwhile abnormal attendance information is subjected to anomaly analysis; the attendance processing result and the abnormal information analysis result are summarized and processed, and the summarized result is stored in an attendance storage module to provide a data basis for attendance management. According to the invention, the technical effects of implementing more comprehensive management on attendance and improving the attendance management efficiency are realized.

title: Backdoor attack confrontation method and system for artificial intelligence model migration security
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence model migration security-oriented backdoor attack confrontation method and system. According to the method, transfer of a backdoor attack trigger mode is resisted based on optimization of a knowledge distillation transfer normal form; wherein the student model does not directly simulate the output of the teacher model, but carries out matching learning on the output of the teacher model in a global interaction information mode after carrying out interlayer fusion on the output of the student model by utilizing Transform, and the information of the teacher model is dispersed and disassembled into the parameter weight of each stage of the student model by the fused information. Therefore, the student model can be prevented from being influenced by the attack backdoor based on local information contained in the teacher model, and meanwhile, the semantic learned by the student model can be improved by global information fusion, so that the precision is improved. According to the method provided by the invention, when the artificial intelligence model capability of an untrusted source is migrated, the safe student model capable of removing the back door based on the local information attack can be obtained.

title: Knowledge distillation confrontation type distillation temperature adjusting method, device, equipment and medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, machine learning, intelligent medical treatment and financial science and technology, and discloses a knowledge distillation confrontation type distillation temperature adjusting method, device and equipment and a medium. According to the method, all parameters in a student model are iterated through a gradient descent algorithm, so that the value of a target loss function is minimum, and the minimum loss value is determined; iterating the temperature parameter through a gradient rising algorithm to maximize the value of the target loss function, and determining the maximum loss value; and the iteration process is alternately executed, so that the absolute value of the difference value between the maximum loss value and the minimum loss value is smaller than a preset threshold value. And determining the current distillation temperature. Therefore, the efficiency of student model learning is improved, the learning process from easy to difficult is met, and the problem of model performance bottleneck caused by fixed temperature hyper-parameters is relieved.

title: Intelligent student tutoring system and method based on digital calculation
applicants: BEIJING BEIMING SHUKE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent student tutoring system and method based on digital calculation. The method comprises the steps of collecting student data and performing data cleaning and data conversion on the student data; developing a script tool and carrying out statistical induction on student data based on the developed script tool; performing index management and quality management on the student data and improving the quality of the student data; creating and externally providing a knowledge base data interface and an analysis base data interface; generating an AI algorithm, and classifying and predicting the student data according to the generated AI algorithm; according to an analysis prediction result of the AI algorithm module, assigning a classification label to the student data; performing uplink processing on the student data; and obtaining student data of the target student from the block chain and displaying the student data.
