According to the method, knowledge base contents are recommended for students through tags and an intelligent recommendation algorithm, and after various learning data of the students are analyzed, the students and parents or an off-school tutoring institution can obtain the data, so that targeted learning is improved.

title: Drug action mechanism prediction method based on deep learning model
applicants: MEDICILON PUHUI MEDICAL TECH SHANGHAI CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a drug action mechanism prediction method based on a deep learning model, and the method comprises the following steps: 1, building a data set according to a drug gene expression library and a cell survival library, carrying out the data preprocessing, and dividing the data set into a training set and a test set; 2, constructing a transfer learning model as a prediction model, wherein the transfer learning model comprises a teacher model and a student model; step 3, training the teacher model based on the training set, and then supervising and training the student model by using the trained teacher model through a knowledge distillation mode; and 4, inputting a to-be-predicted drug into the trained student model to obtain a prediction result of a to-be-predicted mechanism of the drug. According to the method, historical data can be fully utilized, the parameter quantity of the model is compressed and reduced, the robustness is higher, a prediction result is made for the drug action mechanism through limited data, examples are saved, and the accuracy is higher.

title: System and method for knowledge-preserving neural network pruning
abstract_text: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on computer storage media, for knowledge-preserving sparse pruning on neural networks are described. An exemplary method includes obtaining a pre-trained machine learning model trained based on a plurality of general-purpose training data; training a task-specific machine learning model by tuning the pre-trained machine learning model based on a plurality of task-specific training data corresponding to a task; constructing a student network based on the task-specific machine learning model; simultaneously performing (1) knowledge distillation from the trained task-specific machine learning model as a teacher network to the student network and (2) network pruning on the student network; and obtaining the trained student network for serving the task.

title: Semi-supervised semantic segmentation method and device based on knowledge distillation
applicants: NEUSOFT REACH AUTOMOTIVE TECH SHENYANG CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a semi-supervised semantic segmentation method and device based on knowledge distillation, relates to the technical field of deep learning, and trains a teacher network and a student network according to a preset iterative algorithm until a trained student model meets a preset segmentation condition. According to the preset iterative algorithm, the large model newly trained each time is used as a new round of teacher model to complete model training until the finally trained student model meets the preset segmentation condition. A large model is introduced into semi-supervised training as a teacher model, a student model learns richer feature extraction ability through a large model iteration mode, and the semantic segmentation performance of the model is improved.

title: Ray-based cloud edge collaborative data analysis workflow optimization method and system
applicants: SHANDONG COMPUTER SCIENCE CT NAT SUPERCOMPUTER CT JINAN
QILU UNIV OF TECHNOLOGY SHANDONG ACADEMY OF SCIENCES
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of deep learning data analysis workflow, and provides a Ray-based cloud edge collaborative data analysis workflow optimization method and system. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a data set, and training a first student model and a first teacher model on terminal equipment by adopting the data set based on Ray to obtain a distillation training method; and uploading the data set and a distillation training method to a cloud, setting the number and hyper-parameters of parallel working devices, training a second student model and a second teacher model on the cloud by using the data set and the distillation training method to obtain a trained second student model, and deploying the trained second student model to a terminal. According to the method, an optimized model compression method is adopted to perform compression operation on a large model trained in a cloud end to obtain a small model, and the small model is deployed on a resource-limited terminal device in a one-key manner.

title: Student skill assessment method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: GUOXIN LANQIAO EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student skill assessment method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: constructing a personnel management framework of a target student according to basic information and learning environment information of the target student; acquiring performance data of the target student in skill assessment based on a personnel management framework to obtain current performance data of the target student; obtaining historical performance data and historical evaluation results of a plurality of historical students, and constructing a target artificial intelligence evaluation model according to the historical performance data and the historical evaluation results; and inputting the current performance data into the target artificial intelligence evaluation model to obtain a skill evaluation result. Through the technical scheme of the invention, the artificial intelligence technology can be utilized to directly and accurately obtain the evaluation result, which is convenient and fast.

title: Neural network model compression method and system based on anticlockwise block-by-block knowledge distillation
applicants: SHANDONG KAITAI METAL ABRASIVE CO LTD
SHANDONG KAITAI INTELLIGENT LET SHOT BLAST TECH RESEARCH INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a neural network model compression method and system based on anticlockwise block-by-block knowledge distillation, and relates to the technical field of machine learning, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a constructed and trained teacher model, and storing a loss function used when the teacher model is trained; dividing the teacher model into N sub-net blocks from shallow to deep, and constructing N-1 student model sub-net blocks on the basis of the N-1 sub-net blocks; using the loss function to sequentially replace N-1 sub-net blocks except the shallow-most layer sub-net block in the teacher model with the obtained N-1 student model sub-net blocks from top to bottom to obtain an intermediate model; and training the intermediate model by using a loss function until convergence to obtain a compressed target student model. The dependency of the student model on the teacher model is reduced, and the student model finds more suitable parameter distribution; the student model is enabled to pay attention to higher-level information in the teacher model so as to alleviate the channel generation problem between the student model and the teacher model.

title: Member inference attack defense method and system based on strong member information prediction
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of machine learning, and discloses a member inference attack defense method and system based on strong member information prediction, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a real training data set, and dividing the real training data set into a model training data set and a test data set which are not intersected with each other; dividing the training data set into two training data subsets; training a teacher model in the test data set, and respectively distilling two student sub-models in the two training data subsets by using the teacher model; resetting labels for the data in the two training data subsets; in a model prediction process, a defender determines strong member information in model prediction output by utilizing a strong member information prediction model before an attacker attacks, and removes the strong member information, and remaining content is reserved as final output of the model. According to the method, the strong member information in the model prediction result is determined and eliminated, so that the problem of member privacy leakage of the model in the prediction process is prevented, and relatively good model performance is reserved on the basis.

title: Online reading sharing and interaction evaluation method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online reading sharing and interactive evaluation method based on artificial intelligence, which comprises the following steps that: each book in a library is bound and pasted with an RIFD label, and a young campus digital library system identifies various books through an RIFD code scanning gun; books can be automatically recorded into a background management young campus digital library system after being identified according to different classifications; the parents fill in student status information by scanning the two-dimensional code; on the youth campus digital library system, book online borrowing, reading and sharing publishing activity and teacher evaluation activity are carried out; the young campus digital library system carries out big data analysis according to the types of books which children like to borrow, wherein the big data analysis comprises reading preference analysis, interest recommendation, book category recommendation and ranking evaluation; the system can assist in improving the decision-making level and the management level of related departments of a school, and provides effective technical guarantee for reducing errors, saving manpower, reducing book taking time of students and improving the satisfaction degree of teachers and students.

title: Panoramic knowledge training method and device based on artificial intelligence, equipment and medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence and financial science and technology, and discloses a panoramic knowledge training method and device based on artificial intelligence, equipment and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining panoramic knowledge points of a to-be-trained project, and the panoramic knowledge points comprise a plurality of knowledge points; according to different knowledge points, multiple virtual reality scenes are established; training the trainee in the virtual reality scene; the learning data of the students are analyzed, and the students are divided into different levels and ability portraits; and outputting a learning path plan according to the grade and the ability portrait of the student. Panoramic knowledge points of a to-be-trained project can be obtained, various virtual reality scenes are established for training according to different knowledge points, comprehensiveness of training content can be ensured, students are trained through an artificial intelligence digital virtual person, the students are automatically trained by adopting an artificial intelligence technology, a learning path is planned, and training efficiency is improved. The training efficiency is improved, and a preferential training effect is achieved.

title: Energy consumption prediction method based on deep learning and spatio-temporal joint knowledge distillation
applicants: SHANDONG INSPUR SCIENCE RES INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an energy consumption prediction method based on deep learning and spatio-temporal joint knowledge distillation, and relates to the technical field of energy consumption data prediction. An energy consumption prediction system is constructed, characteristics of related energy consumption data are collected, preprocessed and extracted through a data processing module, the related energy consumption data comprise building structures, meteorological data and people flow data, and characteristics capable of representing spatio-temporal characteristics of predicted objects are extracted through the data processing module according to the related energy consumption data. A deep learning prediction model is trained by using features representing spatio-temporal features of a prediction object, parameters of the prediction model are continuously optimized according to a defined loss function in the training process, and the prediction model is compressed and optimized through a knowledge distillation module. Wherein the teacher model and the student model are learned and identified through the knowledge distillation module, a loss function of a knowledge distillation function is defined, a corresponding prediction model is obtained according to the fact that the loss function reaches a minimum value under the condition of no overfitting, and building energy consumption is predicted through the prediction module by utilizing the optimized prediction model.

title: Differential privacy-based tagged data synthesis method and system, and medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a differential privacy-based tagged data synthesis method and system and a medium, and relates to the technical fields of image processing, computer vision, machine learning, privacy protection and the like. The method comprises the following specific steps: 1) collecting and sorting image samples containing high privacy information; 2) using the private image to train a generation model in a differential privacy mode so as to generate synthetic data; 3) training a student model by using the private image in a knowledge migration and differential privacy mode; 4) endowing the synthetic data with a pseudo label by using a student model; and (5) aligning the synthesized data with the pseudo labels to obtain the synthesized data with the labels, which is distributed as same as the private data set. According to the method, the original image is published in the form of the synthesized data set in a differential privacy mode, the privacy of the original data set is protected, and the synthesized data set has high-quality pseudo labels, can be applied to real-time scenes such as face recognition and target recognition, and has practical significance.

title: Application of visual language knowledge distillation in cross-modal hash retrieval
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an application of visual language knowledge distillation in cross-modal hash retrieval, comprising: defining symbols and questions; a VLKD framework is established, visual language knowledge distillation and Hash coding are unified in VLKD, the VLKD framework is an end-to-end depth model, and the VLKD framework comprises a student Hash coding network, a teacher knowledge distillation network, an auxiliary graph convolution network and a Hash code reconstruction module; and establishing an objective function and an optimization algorithm, and iteratively updating parameters of the whole VLKD framework by an SGD algorithm until the student hash coding network converges. According to the method, the hash representation learning ability of a student hash coding network can be improved through a visual language knowledge distillation method, the performance on multiple evaluation indexes is superior to that of a recent representative unsupervised cross-modal hash method, and the best cross-modal retrieval performance is achieved; the technical problem that the method cannot be directly applied to unsupervised cross-modal hash is solved.

title: Translation model compression method and device, mobile terminal and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention provides a translation model compression method and device, a mobile terminal and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of training a teacher machine learning model according to a training corpus to obtain a teacher translation model; training a student machine learning model according to the training corpus to obtain a student translation model; inputting the training corpus into a teacher translation model to obtain a first output result; inputting the training corpus into a student translation model to obtain a second output result; acquiring a distribution distance between the first output result and the second output result; and performing loss calculation on the first output result, the second output result and the distribution distance according to a preset loss function to obtain a loss calculation result, and performing parameter adjustment on the student translation model to obtain a first translation model compression result. According to the translation model compression method provided by the invention, the distribution distance between the first output result and the second output result is considered, so that the problem that student translation model adjustment is too sensitive is avoided.

title: Defect detection model training and defect detection method and device
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a defect detection model training and defect detection method and device, relates to the technical field of computer vision, image processing, deep learning and the like, and can be applied to scenes such as smart industry and the like. According to the scheme, a teacher defect detection model is adopted to carry out regression prediction and category prediction of product defects on an unlabeled image, and a first regression feature and a first classification feature are obtained; adopting a student defect detection model to carry out product defect regression prediction and category prediction on the unlabeled sample image to obtain a second regression feature and a second classification feature; determining a regression loss value according to the first regression feature and the second regression feature; determining a classification loss value according to the first classification feature and the second classification feature; and performing joint training on the teacher defect detection model and the student defect detection model according to the regression loss value and the classification loss value. Therefore, through an unsupervised learning mode, the two models are jointly trained by using the unlabeled images, and the generalization ability and reliability of the models can be enhanced.

title: Self-training iterative artificial intelligence model training method
applicants: ZIRAN YUYI QINGDAO TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent models, and particularly discloses a self-training iterative artificial intelligence model training method, which comprises the steps of initialization of an artificial intelligence model, data preparation, knowledge reconstruction, incremental learning circulation and iteration and tuning of the model. New data and an original artificial intelligence model are organically fused, forgetting and information loss are avoided, meanwhile, knowledge of a teacher model is transmitted to a student model in a knowledge distillation mode, so that the performance and generalization ability of the artificial intelligence model are improved, unmarked data are fully utilized, the requirement for marking data is reduced, the training efficiency of the model is improved, and the training efficiency of the model is improved. The defects that labels generated by an existing artificial intelligence model training method contain noise, knowledge learned before is easily forgotten when only unmarked data and labels generated by a model are used for training the model, the training process is low in efficiency, and computing resource consumption is large are overcome.

title: Three-dimensional face reconstruction method, system and device based on deep learning and medium
applicants: HUNAN MANGGUO WUJI TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a three-dimensional face reconstruction method, system and device based on deep learning and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: inputting a two-dimensional face image into a rough model parameter encoder, obtaining rough feature parameters outputted by the rough model parameter encoder, and obtaining a rough three-dimensional reconstruction face according to the rough feature parameters; inputting the two-dimensional face image into the trained detail model parameter codec network to obtain detail feature parameters; wherein the detail model parameter codec network is obtained by training a two-dimensional face image confrontation sample and a two-dimensional face image sample set based on a teacher network and a student network; the detail feature parameters comprise expression features, skin wrinkle features and detail texture features of five sense organs; integrating the detail feature parameters into the rough three-dimensional reconstructed face to obtain a three-dimensional reconstructed face with detail features; and obtaining a reconstructed three-dimensional face according to the three-dimensional reconstructed face with the detail features. According to the invention, the three-dimensional face reconstruction accuracy can be improved.

title: Campus image management method, client, server and class cloud album system
abstract_text: The invention provides a campus image management method, a client, a server and a class cloud album system. The method relates to a class cloud album server, a school client and a parent client. The method comprises the following steps: receiving student face information sent by a parent client; receiving student images sent by the school client; according to the student face information of at least one target student, performing AI identification on the student image to obtain a student identifier of at least one target student contained in the student image; and associating the student image with the at least one target student, so that when a student image viewing request of a first target student in the at least one target student is received, the student image associated with the first target student is displayed. By adopting the campus image management method, the student images uploaded by the teacher can be subjected to AI identification and classification through the pre-recorded student face information.

title: SELF-SUPERVISED MULTI-SENSOR TRAINING AND SCENE ADAPTATION
abstract_text: A sensing system including at least a first sensor sensing first data from a scene, at least a second sensor sensing second data from the scene, a first teacher/student machine learning subsystem employable by the first sensor to process the first data and a second student/teacher machine learning subsystem employable by the second sensor to process the second data, the first teacher/student machine learning subsystem being operative to teach the second student/teacher machine learning subsystem in a first instance, and the second student/teacher machine learning subsystem being operative to teach the first teacher/student machine learning subsystem in a second instance.

title: KNOWLEDGE DISTILLATION TECHNIQUES
abstract_text: Techniques are disclosed for performing knowledge distillation in the context of machine learning model training. A fixed pool of "teacher" models are provided, which meet predefined conditions. A machine learning model is then trained to provide a "student," by applying a random selection of the teachers to unlabeled sample data, which accelerates the training process. The algorithm implemented for this purpose ensures that the trained student provides low error.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR AUTOMATICALLY PROVIDING CUSTOMIZED FINANCIAL CARD INCENTIVES
abstract_text: Disclosed embodiments may include a method for automatically providing customized financial card incentives where the system can identify if a transaction is eligible for additional bonus rewards by determining if the user is a student using a clustering algorithm with user similarity data to generate a probability. Then, if the probability is above a predetermined threshold, a machine learning model with comprehensive user data classifies the user as a student or non-student. Once the user is determined to be a student, the transaction is verified as being an educational purchase using the transaction data or by having the user provide an image of a receipt. Once the transaction is verified, the transaction or items within the transaction qualify for additional rewards that are applied to the user’s account. Users who are not identified as students may qualify for a standard amount of rewards.

title: Student physical exercise training evaluation system and method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: NINGBO YUYUE NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student physical exercise training evaluation system and method based on artificial intelligence, and the system comprises an information obtaining module, an information storage module, an artificial intelligence evaluation module and a result output module, the information obtaining module is used for obtaining the basic information of a to-be-evaluated student and the image information of completing a physical exercise item; the information storage module is used for storing basic information of students, standard actions of various sports items, standard action analysis and scoring rules; the artificial intelligence evaluation module is used for processing and analyzing the image information of the to-be-evaluated student completing the physical exercise item, and scoring the to-be-evaluated student completing the physical exercise item in combination with the standard action and the scoring rule in the information storage module to obtain a scoring result; and the result output module is used for outputting a scoring result. The system can objectively evaluate the physical exercise items of the students to obtain evaluation results.

title: Personalized wrong question book based on artificial intelligence
applicants: KEZHI NINGBO ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of educational products, and discloses an artificial intelligence-based personalized error book, which comprises an error book, and is characterized in that the error book comprises an applet student terminal and an operation platform, and the applet terminal is in electric signal connection with the operation platform. According to the error question collection function based on artificial intelligence, the collection efficiency is greatly improved; a personalized wrong question book can be generated through parameter setting; error questions can be classified and summarized according to the knowledge point module; the wrong question book PDF printing and re-practicing support artificial intelligence correction again; and full-disciplinary wrong question collection and PDF typesetting are supported.

title: Deep learning model collaborative deduction method, device and equipment based on knowledge distillation
abstract_text: The invention provides a deep learning model collaborative deduction method, device and equipment based on knowledge distillation. The deep learning model collaborative deduction method comprises the steps of obtaining FLOPS, storage capacity and data successful transmission probability corresponding to each edge node; based on the FLOPS, the storage capacity and the data successful transmission probability, performing clustering processing on each edge node to obtain K target node clusters for redundant backup; performing set division processing on a plurality of convolution filters of the last convolution layer of the preset teacher model to obtain K filter sets; based on the K target node clusters, the K filter sets and a plurality of preset models, determining a to-be-trained model matched with the capability of each target node cluster; based on a plurality of preset sample data, jointly training the to-be-trained model of each target node cluster by adopting a knowledge distillation technology to obtain a student model of each target node cluster; and for each target node cluster, deploying the student model of the target node cluster to each edge node in the target node cluster so as to improve the deduction performance.

title: Knowledge distillation method and device of CTR prediction model
applicants: SHENZHEN XUMIYUNTU SPACE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of machine learning, and provides a knowledge distillation method and device for a CTR prediction model. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a plurality of trained heavy-weight teacher models and an untrained light-weight student model; respectively inputting the training data into the student model and the plurality of teacher models to obtain respective outputs of the student model and the plurality of teacher models; determining weights corresponding to respective outputs of the plurality of teacher models by using the gating model, and calculating weighted sums of respective outputs of the plurality of teacher models based on the weights corresponding to respective outputs of the plurality of teacher models; and calculating a loss value by utilizing a target loss function based on the output of the student model and the weighted sum, and updating model parameters of the student model based on the loss value to complete knowledge distillation from the plurality of teacher models to the student model. By means of the technical means, the problem that in the prior art, a small-scale CTR prediction model obtained through knowledge distillation is often unsatisfactory in use effect is solved.

title: Online learning concentration identification analysis method based on AI technology
applicants: ZHEJIANG YOUTU EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of concentration recognition, and particularly discloses an online learning concentration recognition analysis method based on an AI technology, which comprises the steps of student learning video acquisition, student instruction execution analysis, student eye concentration analysis, student lip action analysis, student learning concentration analysis and non-concentration student display. The concentration degree of the students during learning is analyzed according to the execution conditions, eye concentration and lip concentration conditions of the students on the target courseware instruction, the problem of limitation existing in the prior art is solved, intelligent analysis of the online target courseware learning concentration degree is achieved, and the learning efficiency is improved. The method effectively improves the concentration of the students in the online learning process, greatly reflects the enthusiasm and initiative of the students in the online learning process, and provides an effective reference for the subsequent development of targeted courseware for a platform side.

title: Physical and chemical experiment operation automatic evaluation method based on spatio-temporal characteristics
abstract_text: The invention provides a physical and chemical experiment operation automatic evaluation method based on spatio-temporal characteristics, and belongs to the technical field of physical and chemical experiment operation automatic evaluation. The problem that an existing automatic evaluation method for experimental operation is difficult to evaluate due to multiple experimental items is solved; comprising the following steps: analyzing scoring detailed rules of a physical and chemical experiment operation test; performing video acquisition on the correct scoring process and the lost scoring process of the physical and chemical experiment operation through a camera device to obtain an experiment operation data set; according to the requirements of each score point and each lost score point of different physical and chemical experiment operation examination scoring detailed rules, mapping the score points and the lost score points into an experiment operation automatic evaluation model for identifying experiment equipment and student actions based on a deep learning network; training the experimental operation automatic evaluation model through the experimental operation data set; according to the trained experimental operation automatic evaluation model, performing automatic evaluation on experimental operation of an experimenter, and giving out an automatic evaluation result of physical and chemical experimental operation; the method is applied to physicochemical experiment automatic scoring.

title: MACHINE LEARNING PROCESSING FOR STUDENT JOURNEY MAPPING
abstract_text: Generating a predictive mapping of an educational journey of a student. The method includes receiving, over a computer network, from a database of student records, unstructured data about a particular student of the educational institution. The unstructured data is normalized to classify the unstructured data consistent with a machine learning classification model to classify the unstructured data into a plurality of classifications. Based on the classifications of the unstructured data, A plurality of friction points that hinder a particular student's progress in the educational journey and a plurality of achievement points that promote the particular student's progress in the educational journey are identified. Using the friction points and achievement points, prediction information is generated of the particular student's progress in the educational journey. The prediction information is consistent with a machine learning prediction model. The prediction information is transmitted over the computer network to an administrator machine.

title: Radar altimeter height measurement method based on image noise suppression
applicants: INST ELECTRONIC ENG CHINA ACADEMY ENG PHYSICS
abstract_text: The invention discloses a radar altimeter height measurement method based on image noise suppression, and the method comprises the steps: firstly constructing a teacher network and a student network, carrying out the training, carrying out the noise suppression of a radar altimeter echo image through the trained student network, and finally reading the height from the processed image, and achieving the precise height measurement. According to the method provided by the invention, an image denoising technology based on deep learning is applied to a radar altimeter echo distance Doppler image, so that the radar height measurement precision is improved; the knowledge of the large model is distilled into the small model to meet the running environment with scarce computing resources; the multi-scale feature fusion image denoising teacher network is adopted, local prediction is carried out while global prediction is obeyed, and a finer denoising effect is achieved.

title: CONNECTING A TUTOR WITH A STUDENT
abstract_text: A system and a method for connecting a tutor with a student in real time. Initially, the system receives a student profile. Further, the system receives a question from the student. Furthermore, the system synthesizes the question based on a set of predefined machine learning model. Subsequently, the system determines a cohort of the students from the set of the cohort of the students. The cohort of the students is determined based on the one or more parameters related to the question. Further, the system identifies a tutor assigned to the cohort of the students. Subsequently, the system notifies the tutor in real time. Further, the system receives an acknowledgement from the tutor within a predefined time. Finally, the system connects the tutor with the student in real time when the acknowledgement is the positive acknowledgement.

title: Data identification method and related equipment
applicants: ANT BLOCKCHAIN TECH SHANGHAI CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a data identification method and related equipment. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring to-be-identified data; inputting the to-be-identified data into a data identification model for key data identification; wherein the data identification model comprises a deep learning model which is obtained by training a deep learning model which is used as a teacher model in a knowledge distillation framework and is used as a student model.

title: Image recognition model training method, recognition method, equipment, medium and product
abstract_text: The invention provides an image recognition model training method, a recognition method, equipment, a medium and a product, and relates to the technical field of deep learning. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a sample image and an identification tag of current training; identifying the sample image according to a teacher model and a student model chalk to obtain a first identification result and a second identification result; calculating distillation loss according to the first identification result and the second identification result; calculating task loss according to the second identification result and the identification tag; the gradient of the distillation loss and the cumulative gradient of the distillation loss are subjected to weighted summation, the gradient of the task loss and the cumulative gradient of the task loss are subjected to weighted summation, the cumulative gradient of the distillation loss is a first weight, the cumulative gradient of the task loss is a second weight, and the first weight is larger than the second weight; and updating parameters of the student model according to a total gradient calculated from the cumulative gradient of the new distillation loss and the cumulative gradient of the new task loss. The training effect of the student model can be improved.

title: Design and implementation of ancient poetry VR interaction system based on deep learning recommendation algorithm
abstract_text: The invention relates to an ancient poetry interaction system based on a virtual reality technology and a working method thereof. The system comprises VR equipment, a virtual ancient poetry interaction system server and a virtual ancient poetry interaction system information database. The poems, the information of the poems, the corresponding poems and the scene sites corresponding to the poems are input and set in the early stage, and then the virtual ancient poem interaction system can be entered for experience. The virtual reality technology is utilized to provide a VR virtual scene selection module, a VR poetry selection module is further provided, the background of a poetry and the poetry making style can be deeply understood by experiencing the poetry of a designated poetry, and a VR ancient poetry character interaction module and a VR ancient poetry game module are provided. In combination with a recommendation algorithm, experience scenes are recommended according to student preferences by using a deep learning technology, so that students do not experience ancient poems blindly or due to curiousness, but experience ancient poems due to liking of ancient poems; the interactive system is good in immersion, students can understand the learned ancient poems more deeply, the interestingness of learning the ancient poems is improved, and the effect of improving the learning efficiency is achieved.

title: Target detection model training method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a target detection model training method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the fields of deep learning, image processing, computer vision and the like. According to the specific implementation scheme, a current pseudo tag is obtained based on a sample image and a teacher model; based on the current pseudo tag and at least one pseudo tag in a historical pseudo tag library, obtaining a memory smooth pseudo tag; obtaining a target detection result based on the sample image and a student model; obtaining a first loss based on the memory smooth pseudo tag and the target detection result; and training the student model based on the first loss to obtain a target detection model. According to the invention, the training effect of the target detection model can be improved, and the target detection accuracy is improved.

title: AI motion visual analysis method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of AI, and discloses an AI motion visual analysis method based on deep learning, comprising the following steps: collecting data and constructing a training data set; obtaining an image based on the leapfrog video data, and obtaining human body key points in the image through an OpenPose model; preprocessing the human body key points; constructing an LSTM recurrent neural network model; constructing a training set and training an LSTM recurrent neural network model; inputting sequence data corresponding to one image of the leapfrog video data of the current student into the LSTM recurrent neural network model, and outputting a deviation angle of each limb in the image; mapping the output deviation angle of each limb with an image corresponding to the group of sequence data; the method comprehensively considers the limb movement of the student movement and the incidence relation between the limb movements, can output the limb deviation of the student based on the neural network model of deep learning, and can accurately correct the movement posture of the student.

title: ADAPTIVE LEARNING IN A DIVERSE LEARNING ECOSYSTEM
abstract_text: A system for training a student to operate an actual machine includes an electronic learning module and a simulation system for simulating operation of the actual machine. An adaptive learning artificial intelligence (ALAI) module receives student performance data to adapt training of the student. The student performance data includes instructor-graded performance results of the student based on the student operating the actual machine, simulation performance results for the student operating a simulated machine in a simulation system that simulates operation of an actual machine and electronic learning content results from an electronic learning module that delivers electronic learning content to a student computing device used by the student. The ALAI module comprises a learner profile module that profiles the student, a training task recommendation module that generates Al-generated recommendations, and an explainability and pedagogical intervention module for displaying on the instructor computing device explanations for the Al-generated recommendations.

title: Detection optimization method for similar duplicate records based on density clustering algorithm DBSCAN algorithm
abstract_text: The invention discloses a detection optimization method for similar duplicate records based on a density clustering algorithm DBSCAN algorithm, belongs to the field of machine learning and data mining, and is divided into four steps. In the first step, data standardization processing and data set preliminary division are carried out on a data set, and in the second step, an initial point optimization and parameter self-adaption method is introduced based on a DBSCAN algorithm so as to improve the non-uniformity of similar duplicate record clustering results; thirdly, performing secondary clustering on the similar duplicate record clusters in the second step by using an N-Gram algorithm to effectively improve the detection precision; and 4, training and testing the constructed method by using a student data set, and verifying the effectiveness of the method. On the basis of a density clustering algorithm, the detection precision of similar duplicate records is effectively improved, the influence of noise points is avoided, and the calculation cost is reduced.

title: Flying student psychological pressure data acquisition method based on skin electric signals
abstract_text: The invention discloses a flight student psychological pressure data acquisition method based on skin electric signals, and relates to the technical field of machine learning. According to the technical key points, the method comprises the following steps: collecting skin electric signals of a plurality of flight students during flight simulation training as a physiological signal data set; removing motion artifacts from the collected skin electric signals; frequency domain, time domain and nonlinear feature extraction is carried out on the skin electric signals after artifacts are removed, and a skin electric signal feature set is formed; training a psychological stress data acquisition model based on a parallel neural network according to the skin electric signal feature set; and inputting a skin electric signal of a new flight student during flight simulation training into the trained psychological stress data acquisition model to acquire psychological stress data of the new flight student. According to the method, the psychological state fluctuation condition of the flight trainee during simulated flight training can be accurately expressed, the flight trainee is helped to summarize flight experience, and help is provided for targeted follow-up flight training of the flight trainee.

title: Student healthy diet management system based on full life cycle
applicants: PINGAN YUNCHU TECH GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student healthy diet management system based on a full life cycle, which comprises a meal ordering module, a menu management module and an AI nutritionist module, and is characterized in that the AI nutritionist module comprises a diet type analysis module, a diet structure intake data analysis module, a reasonable diet suggestion module, a reasonable diet optimization module and a reasonable diet recommendation module. According to the invention, parents can help children to order food from an APP parent entrance, and the food ordering process is cared by an AI nutritionist in the whole process, so that reasonable set meal suggestions can be recommended to children through big data analysis according to the previous week historical intake in combination with the current body fat data, the exercise condition of the week, the course condition of the week and the physical health development trend; and meanwhile, in the ordering process, analysis can be carried out in real time according to nutritional ingredients of dishes ordered by parents for children, so that the parents can enable the children to eat delicious and nutritional dishes.

title: Semi-supervised remote sensing image semantic segmentation method based on double consistency
abstract_text: The invention relates to a semi-supervised remote sensing image semantic segmentation method based on double consistency, and the method comprises the steps: building a semi-supervised learning model based on a teacher-student architecture, carrying out the supervised learning training of a teacher model through label data, and optimizing the parameters of the teacher model; the student model is composed of a single-coding double-decoding deep learning model, the information entropy predicted by the student model is reduced by using a sharpening function, and firstly, non-label data generates a pseudo label through a teacher model to semi-supervise the prediction result of the student model; secondly, performing cross supervision through two groups of pseudo labels converted from prediction results between two groups of student models, and performing alternate training on a student network through the two groups of consistency tasks, so that the models can fully understand a large amount of information in label-free data; after training is completed, test data directly obtain a predicted semantic mark graph through a student network, the semantic mark graph is mapped to an original image, and visualization of a segmentation result is achieved.

title: Language model training method, electronic equipment, storage medium and product
abstract_text: The invention provides a language model training method, electronic equipment, a storage medium and a product, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of performing preset normal form training on a pre-training language model based on a first training sample corpus to obtain a teacher language model; calling a teacher language model, and identifying the second training sample corpus to obtain category probability distribution of the second training sample corpus; based on the category probability distribution of the second training sample corpus, calculating a deterministic value of a pseudo tag of the second training sample corpus; based on the deterministic numerical value of the pseudo tag of the second training sample corpus, obtaining an easy-to-distinguish training sample corpus of which the deterministic numerical value meets a threshold condition from the second training sample corpus; and performing preset normal form training on the teacher language model based on the easy-to-distinguish training sample corpora to obtain a student language model completing the target training task. According to the method and the device, the language model with relatively high model precision can be trained based on the training sample corpora with a small number of labeled labels.

title: Multi-target tracking model compression method based on knowledge distillation
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multi-target tracking model compression method based on knowledge distillation, belongs to the technical field of computer vision, machine learning and the like, and particularly relates to a multi-target tracking knowledge distillation method based on deep learning. The lightweight multi-target tracking model trained by the method can extract more discriminative target ID features, the tracking continuity and stability of the model are improved, the conditions of target missing detection, false detection and identity drifting of the model are less, the detection performance is greatly improved, and the detection efficiency is improved. The tracking capability of the teacher model is effectively migrated to the student model, and model compression of multi-target tracking is realized. The method can also be applied to various multi-target tracking algorithms and lightweight structures, and has good universality and practical value.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR ASSESSING PET RADIOLOGY IMAGES
abstract_text: In one embodiment, the disclosure provides a computer-implemented method comprising: receiving a first labeled training data set comprising a first plurality of images each associated with a set of labels; programmatically training a machine learning neural Teacher model on the first labeled training data set; programmatically applying a machine learning model trained for NLP to an unlabeled data set comprising digital electronic representations of natural language text summaries of a second plurality of images, thereby generating a second labeled training data set comprising the second plurality of images; using the machine learning neural Teacher model, programmatically generating soft pseudo labels; programmatically generating derived labels using the soft pseudo labels; training one or more programmed machine learning neural Student models using the derived labels; receiving a target image; and applying an ensemble of one or more of the Student models to output one or more classifications of the target image.

title: PREDICTION DEVICE, PREDICTION METHOD, AND RECORDING MEDIUM
abstract_text: In the prediction device, the acquisition means acquires student data related to the student. The preprocessing means generates training data based on the student data. The learning means generates at least one model that predicts the promotion situation of students based on the training data, by machine learning. The prediction means predicts the promotion situation of a subject student from the student data of the subject student using the generated model.

title: METHOD FOR PERFORMING CONTINUAL LEARNING USING REPRESENTATION LEARNING AND APPARATUS THEREOF
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a continual learning technology using machine learning, and a method for performing continual learning by a learning apparatus includes generating a teacher network and a student network from a pre-trained model using knowledge distillation, generating a representation memory configured of a plurality of storages as many as the number of classes to store feature representation values in the teacher network and the student network, extracting the feature representation value for target data through the teacher network and storing the feature representation value in the storage before learning is entered, entering the learning to extract the feature representation value for the target data through the student network and storing the feature representation value in the storage, and calculating a representation loss using values derived from the storage of the teacher network and the storage of the student network.

title: Multi-target detection method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a multi-target detection method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: inputting a plurality of training sample data into a first network structure of a student model for training, and obtaining a plurality of first prediction class labels; and inputting into a second network structure of the teacher model for training to obtain a plurality of second prediction category labels, updating network parameters of the student model according to the plurality of first prediction category labels and the plurality of second prediction category labels, and according to the updated network parameters of the student model, obtaining a plurality of second prediction category labels. Network parameters of the teacher model are updated, when iteration training ending conditions are met, the training process of the student model and the teacher model is ended, a multi-target detector is obtained, and the multi-target detector is used for detecting target data. According to the method, the model parameter quantity can be reduced, model overfitting can be prevented, the model generalization ability is improved, and thus the detection accuracy is improved.

title: Three-dimensional target detection method based on knowledge distillation
abstract_text: The invention provides a three-dimensional target detection method based on knowledge distillation, which is a deep learning method for visual three-dimensional target detection in the field of automatic driving. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, respectively constructing a teacher network taking laser point cloud as input and a student network taking RGB images as input, and obtaining multi-scale feature maps of the laser point cloud and the RGB images and a 3D detection result; then, three types of knowledge distillation modes are adopted, and depth information extracted from the laser point cloud data by the teacher network is transmitted to RGB image features; according to the method, the detection result of the RGBNet student network is known by constructing the LiDARNet as the teacher network, the middle guiding module is provided with three sub-modules for guiding depth information, and the three sub-modules provide certain guidance from the feature level and the result level respectively. The method can be applied to any three-dimensional target detection network, the calculation amount does not need to be increased, the real-time reasoning speed can be ensured, and the method is easy to implement.

title: Target detection method based on self-distillation
applicants: SHENZHEN SOUTH SILICON VALLEY SEMICONDUCTOR CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a target detection method based on self-distillation, relates to the technical field of deep learning, and solves the technical problems that the current self-distillation technology for target detection is not flexible enough, the matching relationship between different layers is not uniform, and a student layer and a teacher layer need to be manually selected. The method comprises the following steps: S1, constructing a neural network model for target detection, selecting a candidate network layer and adding an adaptive structure; s2, through initial training, obtaining the mean average precision of the target detection result of each candidate network layer and the error rate of each sample; s3, automatically matching the current candidate network layer with other candidate network layers according to a matching condition based on a gravitational search algorithm and average precision of a mean value; s4, performing self-distillation training on the two automatically matched candidate network layers according to the sample error rate; and S5, obtaining a trained target detection model. According to the method, knowledge cross-layer efficient distillation of the network layer is realized, so that the self-distillation efficiency is improved.

title: Model training method and device, task processing method and device, electronic equipment and medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a model training method and device, a task processing method and device, electronic equipment and a medium, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to image recognition and face recognition technologies, and can be applied to smart cities, urban governance and emergency management scenes. Comprising the following steps: performing feature extraction on at least one first sample by using a teacher model and an initial student model to obtain a first feature and a second feature of each first sample; adjusting parameters of the initial student model based on the difference between the first feature and the second feature of each first sample to obtain a transition student model; performing feature extraction on the at least one sample pair by using a teacher model and a transition student model to obtain a third feature and a fourth feature of a second sample in each sample pair; determining a first similarity of the third features of the two second samples in each sample pair and a second similarity of the fourth features of the two second samples in each sample pair; and adjusting parameters of the transition student model based on the corresponding first similarity and the second similarity to obtain a target student model.

title: Knowledge distillation method and device oriented to small sample learning and storage medium
applicants: JIANGSU WEBACE INTELLIGENT IND INNOVATION CENTER CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a knowledge distillation method and device oriented to small sample learning and a storage medium, and relates to the field of computer vision application of deep learning. The method specifically comprises three types of methods: a distillation method based on an auxiliary classifier; a distillation method based on image local features; the invention discloses a distillation method based on image internal relations. According to the novel knowledge distillation method, aiming at the limitation of traditional distillation in small sample learning tasks, improvement is carried out from a distillation loss calculation mode, knowledge migration between teacher and student models is assisted by utilizing image interlayer features or output of an auxiliary classifier, and the method is more suitable for the characteristic that small sample learning comprises a large number of random tasks. According to the invention, a new distillation method is applied to a small sample learning task, and a competitive experimental result is obtained on a related data set. Especially in a distillation experiment using light-weight setting, the method provided by the invention has a more obvious effect of improving the performance of the student model.

title: Rank Distillation for Training Supervised Machine Learning Models
abstract_text: Computer-implemented method and systems to improve training and performance of artificial intelligence (AI) systems having one or more machine learning models stored in one or more data storage mediums connected in at least one computing network is provided. The method comprises receiving student machine scores, generated by a student machine learning model stored in a data storage medium, the student machine learning model having a primary loss function; receiving teacher scores provided by one or more analytic resources, the teacher scores being provided based on known results and behavior of pre-existing machine learning models used for accomplishing a first series of classification objectives; transforming the teacher scores into transformed teacher scores.

title: Systems and methods for knowledge-conserving neural network pruning
abstract_text: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on a computer storage medium, are described herein for sparse pruning of neural networks in a knowledge-saving manner. An exemplary method includes obtaining a pre-trained machine learning model trained based on a plurality of general training data; training a specific task machine learning model by trimming the pre-trained machine learning model based on a plurality of specific task training data corresponding to a task; constructing a student network based on the specific task machine learning model; simultaneously performing (1) knowledge distillation from the trained task-specific machine learning model as a teacher network to the student network and (2) network pruning of the student network; and obtaining the trained student network for serving the task.

title: Psychological emotion analysis early warning system based on vibration image algorithm and machine learning
applicants: NANJING KUNYUAN BOWEN DIGITAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of emotion analysis based on images, and discloses a psychological emotion analysis early warning system based on a vibration image algorithm and machine learning, which comprises the following steps: 1) capturing facial expressions of students, shooting and recording facial picture information of the students, and processing the information to obtain stable and clear images; the system has the advantages that external shooting equipment is arranged, a vibration image algorithm is utilized, facial information of a student in a walking state is captured and recorded, a stable and clear picture is obtained and uploaded to the server through a network, the server stores related information, a related image library is established, and the information is displayed through the image library. The server judges the facial emotion expression of the student, reminds teachers and parents through the network, judges the life of the student at school, plays a good auxiliary role in studying the life style and learning condition of the student at school, and effectively solves the problems in the prior art.

title: Pseudo tag processing method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a pseudo tag processing method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of deep learning and image processing. The specific implementation scheme is as follows: inputting first sample data into a first teacher model to obtain a first prediction result; inputting the first prediction result into a first selector to obtain a first score; wherein the first selector is obtained based on second sample data and real label training of the second sample data; and under the condition that the first score meets a preset condition, taking the first prediction result as a pseudo tag of the first sample data. The quality of the pseudo tag can be improved, and the performance of the student model can be improved.

title: Surface defect classification method based on semi-supervised deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a semi-supervised deep learning-based surface defect classification method, which comprises the following steps: S1, randomly selecting 70% of data from each category of a data set as a training set, and taking the remaining data as a test set; s2, performing off-line data enhancement on the training set, and expanding the training set by three times; s3, data preprocessing; s4, 30% of marked samples are randomly extracted from the extended training set, and the remaining training samples serve as unmarked samples; s5, constructing and initializing a student network f (theta st); s6, constructing and initializing a teacher network f (theta tt); s7, iteratively training weight parameters of the student network and the teacher network; s8, storing the weight of the network model, preprocessing the surface defect images needing to be classified, and inputting the surface defect images into the student network; and the student network predicts classification categories to complete classification. According to the method, the surface defect classification task can be realized under the condition that only a small number of marked samples exist, the classification task can be completed in the class imbalance data set, and the application range is wider.

title: Model training method, face recognition method, electronic equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of deep learning, and discloses a model training method, a face recognition method, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: inputting a batch of sample images into a first model and a second model, a first feature extracted by a first model and a second feature extracted by a second model are obtained, the first model is a trained weight type model, and the second model is a to-be-trained lightweight type model; determining a first inter-class distance of the ID in the batch according to each first feature, and determining a second inter-class distance of the ID in the batch according to each second feature; constructing a loss function, wherein the loss function comprises an L2 loss item and an inter-class loss item constructed based on the first inter-class distance and the second inter-class distance; and training the second model according to the loss function until convergence to obtain the trained second model, thereby effectively improving the identification accuracy and generalization ability of the student model.

title: Intelligent course arrangement method, device and equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent course arrangement method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: responding to the establishment of connection with terminal equipment, and obtaining a physical address of the terminal equipment; determining a target course type associated with the physical address based on a preset mapping relationship; the learning progress label of each student corresponding to the target course type in a preset list and the class available time corresponding to each student are acquired, and the students in the preset list are students who can be used for a training institution to have a class at the current date; generating a course arrangement list of the current date corresponding to the terminal equipment according to the learning progress label and the class available time corresponding to each student; and sending the course arrangement list to the terminal device. The implementation and deployment cost is saved, the flexibility and controllability are high, the workload of mechanism management personnel is greatly reduced, the process is simple, and the efficiency is high.

title: Distillation training method and system of deep learning image coding and decoding network
applicants: SHANGHAI SHUANGSHEN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a distillation training method and system for a deep learning image coding and decoding network, which are used for carrying out lightweight distillation operation on the deep learning image coding and decoding network, effectively reducing the network parameter quantity by 70% under the condition that the compression performance is basically not reduced, and reducing the cost in actual production application. The student network after distillation learning occupies less equipment memory, has higher encoding and decoding reasoning speed, and can encode and decode high-definition images on central end and edge end equipment.

title: Student learning feedback method and device based on artificial intelligence, and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention provides a student learning feedback method and device based on artificial intelligence and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining first learning result information; extracting second learning result information from the first learning result information based on an information extraction algorithm; obtaining personality characteristics of the student based on a preset personality diagnosis algorithm; taking the second learning result as a first feedback information set, and generating an unmastered knowledge point consolidation scheme according with the personality characteristics through an artificial intelligence learning feedback algorithm model; taking a learning result of the student through the non-mastered knowledge point consolidation scheme as a third learning result, and obtaining an information set of non-mastered knowledge points from the third learning result as a second feedback information set; and judging the second feedback information set, and if a judgment result meets a threshold value, completing learning of the knowledge points which are not mastered. The learning scheme conforming to the personality characteristics of the students is formulated based on the learning feedback mode, the scientific and reasonable learning method is provided for the students, and therefore the good learning effect is achieved.

title: Incremental learning-based labor insurance article target detection method and system
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of computer vision, and particularly relates to a labor protection article target detection method and system based on incremental learning, and the method comprises the steps: constructing a first labor protection article target detection data set to train a teacher network; obtaining a second labor insurance article target detection data set, and according to the number of more label categories in the second labor insurance article target detection data set than the number of label categories in the first labor insurance article target detection data set, increasing the number of output layer neurons of the student network to expand the network; initializing the student model, and constructing a distillation loss function between the student model and the teacher model; constructing a loss function of a student model based on the constructed distillation loss function, and training the student model by using the second labor protection object target detection data set; deploying the trained student model to an intelligent construction site platform, and carrying out target detection in a construction site; according to the method, the problem that catastrophic forgetting is generated after a traditional deep learning algorithm is trained on a new sample is solved.

title: Semi-supervised non-independent identically distributed federated learning distillation method and device
applicants: ANHUI KEXUN JINFU TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a semi-supervised non-independent identically distributed federal learning distillation method and device, and the method can enable a soft label and a hard label of non-label data to be more accurate and reliable by means of a prediction result of non-label data of a target terminal through partial teacher models of other terminals. The training efficiency of the basic model can be greatly improved, and the generalization ability of the obtained student model can be stronger, so that the accuracy of the aggregation model obtained by federal learning can be improved. Besides, the method combines knowledge distillation and federated learning, so that the student model can learn knowledge of other terminals which do not exist at all, that is, data of the student model do not have related labels, but the student model can learn related knowledge through federated learning, which is an extreme non-independent identically distributed scene for data labels. Meanwhile, the method can enable the student model to have better fitting ability through federal learning.

title: Underground drainage pipeline defect intelligent detection method and system based on deep learning
abstract_text: An underground drainage pipeline defect intelligent detection method based on deep learning comprises the following steps: acquiring a plurality of sample pictures of an underground drainage pipeline, including a normal sample picture, a defect sample picture and an unknown sample picture; obtaining a gray difference matrix of the sample picture, wherein the gray difference matrix is used for representing difference information between the gray in the sample picture and the gray of the adjacent image point; dividing an unknown sample picture into M parts as M parts of iterative sample sets; pre-training the teacher model and a Scaled-YOLO algorithm according to the gray difference matrix of the normal sample picture and the defect sample picture; training of the student model is completed at the same time; and inputting a to-be-detected underground drainage pipeline picture into the trained student model so as to carry out defect detection. According to the method, a semi-supervised method is adopted, unknown defect samples are also fused into a deep learning network algorithm, and the learning efficiency of the algorithm is greatly improved.

title: Deep learning model distillation method and system using knowledge isomerism
abstract_text: The invention discloses a deep learning model distillation method and system using knowledge isomerism. The method comprises the steps of obtaining target text data; inputting the target text data into the trained student model for prediction; the trained student model outputs a prediction result; wherein the trained student model is trained by the following steps: constructing an initial teacher network model, and obtaining a trained teacher model; and obtaining an initial student model, and performing distillation according to the obtained trained teacher model to obtain a trained student model. According to the method, during training, the Bi-LSTM keeps own knowledge, i.e., a word segmentation mode is used, but after the Bi-LSTM is online, a Bert mode, i.e., a single word mode is used, the two modes are heterogeneous, it is guaranteed that the Bi-LSTM does not learn from zero, it is guaranteed that the learned knowledge is used during use, and a good effect is achieved in practice. By utilizing the method, the Bert is used for distilling the Bi-LSTM, and the accuracy rate is obviously improved from 70% to 91%.

title: Student departure management method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and particularly discloses a student departure management method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the feature information of a first pick-up person from identity verification equipment; querying a pick-up database according to the feature information of the first pick-up person, and determining the identity information of the picked-up student; according to the identity information of the accepted student, determining a target classroom where the accepted student is currently located, and inputting the identity information of the accepted student into a list of students to leave the school; sending a pick-up prompt voice to a first audio playing device in the target classroom so as to play the pick-up prompt voice through the first audio playing device to prompt the picked-up students to go to the entrance and exit and leave the school; acquiring feature information of the person to leave the school from the identity verification device; and when the feature information of the to-be-departed person is matched with the identity information in the to-be-departed student list, a release instruction is sent to the identity verification equipment, so that the identity verification equipment controls the gate of the entrance and exit to be opened, and the to-be-departed person is released.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM FOR GENERATION OF PERSONALIZED STUDY PLANS
abstract_text: A system for providing study plans to a user includes a topic catalog storing multiple topics and multiple keywords associated with each topic, and includes a plan generator configured to receive multiple sample study plans. The plan generator uses the sample study plans and the topic catalog to train a topic model to identify which topics are associated with each resource, resulting in a trained topic model. The plan generator receives a profile of a student from a user and uses the trained topic model and the profile to identify a subset of the resources that are associated with the selected topics, generates a customized study plan for the student using the subset of identified resources and the preferences.

title: CONTROLLING DISTRIBUTION OF TRAINING DATA TO MEMBERS OF AN ENSEMBLE
abstract_text: A machine learning system includes a coach machine learning system that uses machine learning to help a student machine learning system learn its system. By monitoring the student learning system, the coach machine learning system can learn (through machine learning techniques) “hyperparameters” for the student learning system that control the machine learning process for the student learning system. The machine learning coach could also determine structural modifications for the student learning system architecture. The learning coach can also control data flow to the student learning system.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR ASSESSING PET RADIOLOGY IMAGES
