abstract_text: In one embodiment, the disclosure provides a computer-implemented method comprising: receiving a first labeled training data set comprising a first plurality of images each associated with a set of labels; programmatically training a machine learning neural Teacher model on the first labeled training data set; programmatically applying a machine learning model trained for NLP to an unlabeled data set comprising digital electronic representations of natural language text summaries of a second plurality of images, thereby generating a second labeled training data set comprising the second plurality of images; using the machine learning neural Teacher model, programmatically generating soft pseudo labels; programmatically generating derived labels using the soft pseudo labels; training one or more programmed machine learning neural Student models using the derived labels; receiving a target image; and applying an ensemble of one or more of the Student models to output one or more classifications of the target image.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM FOR GENERATION OF PERSONALIZED STUDY PLANS
abstract_text: A system for providing study plans to a user includes a topic catalog storing multiple topics and multiple keywords associated with each topic. The system also includes a plan generator configured to receive multiple sample study plans, each sample study plan having one or more resources, each resource having one or more portions, and each portion being assigned a duration. The plan generator uses the sample study plans and the topic catalog to train a topic model to identify which topics are associated with each resource, resulting in a trained topic model. The plan generator receives a profile of a student from a user, the profile having one or more selected topics the student desires to study and further having multiple preferences associated with the student. The plan generator uses the trained topic model and the profile to identify a subset of the resources that are associated with the selected topics, generates a customized study plan for the student using the subset of identified resources and the preferences, and provides the customized study plan to the user.

title: Lightweight Internet of Things malicious traffic identification method based on knowledge distillation space-time neural network
abstract_text: The invention discloses a lightweight Internet of Things malicious traffic identification method based on a knowledge distillation space-time neural network. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring Internet of Things malicious traffic to be identified; obtaining a pre-trained teacher network model; obtaining a pre-trained student network model based on knowledge distillation; and inputting the to-be-identified malicious traffic of the Internet of Things into a pre-trained student network model to obtain a category prediction vector and a corresponding prediction label. A teacher network model is trained in advance, and the method comprises the following steps that a training set is obtained, and the training set comprises different types of Internet of Things malicious traffic samples, a formatted sample vector set and real labels of the Internet of Things malicious traffic samples; inputting the formatted sample vector set into the constructed teacher network model to obtain a multi-classification prediction sequence; and obtaining a soft label according to the prediction vector value in the multi-classification prediction sequence and storing the soft label. In the test of a plurality of real Internet of Things malicious traffic data sets, the performance is higher than that of a machine learning-based identification method.

title: Target network model obtaining method and device based on fusion features
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence algorithms, in particular to a fusion feature-based target network model acquisition method and device, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining teacher and student network models and a training data set; inputting the training data set into the student network model and the teacher network model, and extracting a student last-layer feature map and a teacher each-layer feature map; respectively processing the student last-layer feature map and the teacher each-layer feature map to obtain a student last-layer target feature map and a teacher each-layer target feature map; fusing the target feature map of the last layer of the student with the target feature map of each layer of the teacher to obtain a fused feature set; based on the fused feature set, determining multi-layer distillation loss; according to the method, the parameters of the student network model are adjusted based on the multi-layer distillation loss to obtain the target network model, and the complexity of the network model is further reduced by fusing the features, compressing the features and reducing the processing amount, so that the target network model can be applied to miniaturized products.

title: Neural network distillation method and device
abstract_text: The invention discloses a neural network distillation method and device in the field of artificial intelligence, and aims to provide a neural network with lower output bias, improve the output precision of the neural network, select a proper distillation mode according to different scenes, and have strong generalization ability. The method comprises: obtaining a sample set, the sample set comprising a biased data set and an unbiased data set (601), the biased data set comprising biased samples, and the unbiased data set comprising unbiased samples; determining a first distillation mode according to data features of the sample set (602), in the first distillation mode, training a teacher model using an unbiased data set, and training a student model using a biased data set; and training the first neural network according to a first distillation mode based on the biased data set and the unbiased data set to obtain an updated first neural network (603).

title: Course recommendation method and device based on feature matching, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a curriculum recommendation method and device based on feature matching, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: taking matching pairs of curriculum feature samples and student feature samples which are in positive correlation as training samples, and taking the matching degree between the matching pairs as output; training a course recommendation model; inputting student features of a target student and course features of alternative courses into the course recommendation model, and outputting a matching degree between the target student and each alternative course; and based on each matching degree, determining a recommended course of the target student. The method can intelligently recommend proper courses for students.

title: Method and device for acquiring target network model, computer equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence algorithms, in particular to a method and device for obtaining a target network model, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a teacher network model and a student network model, the student network model being a simplified model of the teacher network model; in the student network model, adding a residual structure between two initial adjacent convolutional layers to obtain a target network model, so that the training data set passes through the first convolutional layer in the student network model to obtain a convolutional data set; a part of the convolution data set is weighted to the remaining convolution data set after being processed by the residual structure, so that the local features of the convolution data set are enhanced, then the convolution data set is input into the second convolution layer, and feature enhancement is performed on the data through the added residual structure and almost no influence on the overall parameter quantity of the whole network model, so that the network performance is improved. And the performance of the network model is improved.

title: Intelligent job scanning and printing system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: KEZHI NINGBO ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent scanning, and discloses an intelligent homework scanning and printing system based on artificial intelligence, which comprises the following modules: a publishing homework, an uploading/submitting homework, an AI/crowdsourcing correction and a printing homework, the publishing homework is composed of a design homework and an exercise book homework, the uploading/submitting job is composed of an App function and a Web end function, the AI/crowdsourcing correction is composed of the Web end function, the printing job is composed of an App function and a Web end function, a user manually scans a picture to a printer, the printer uploads the picture to an Alicloud OSS, and the Alicloud OSS is used for printing the picture. Then the back-end homework system identifies homework information and student information in the two-dimensional code, the scanner submits homework, then the back-end correction system completes homework correction, and finally the user operates the scanner to be connected to the printer to complete homework mark-leaving printing. According to the invention, a full-automatic homework uploading, correcting and printing system is provided, and the homework correcting time of teachers is greatly saved.

title: Virtual reality-combined flight student simulated flight training psychological stress data acquisition method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a virtual reality-combined flight trainee simulated flight training psychological stress data acquisition method, and relates to the technical field of machine learning. According to the technical key points, the method comprises the following steps: acquiring a skin electric signal of a flight trainee for simulated flight training in a virtual reality environment, and performing feature extraction to serve as a physiological signal feature data set; collecting flight information of flight trainees for simulated flight training in the high-dynamic simulation platform as a flight feature data set; the method comprises the following steps: collecting flight simulation training of a flight trainee by using a manual accelerator and a rocker in a virtual reality environment, outputting a manual accelerator and rocker instruction as a control signal data set, and meanwhile, taking key information of a virtual reality scene as output to form a virtual reality scene information data set; and training a psychological stress data acquisition model based on the deep convolutional neural network by using the physiological signal feature data set, the flight feature data set, the control signal data set and the virtual reality scene information data set.

title: Target detection model training method and device, equipment and medium
applicants: NANTONG TANWEI PHOTOELECTRIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a target detection model training method, which comprises the steps of determining a first training set according to all initial point cloud data with a time sequence within a preset duration and label data corresponding to each frame of initial point cloud data; enhancing the point cloud data of at least one target object corresponding to the multiple frames of target sparse point cloud data included in the first training set to obtain dense point cloud data corresponding to each frame of target sparse point cloud data; determining a second training set according to the multi-frame dense point cloud data, the multi-frame initial point cloud data and all label data; training the teacher model by using the second training set to obtain a trained target teacher model; and training the student model by using the target teacher model, the first training set and the second training set through a knowledge distillation method until the student model converges to obtain a target student model. By adopting the mode, the accuracy of target detection is improved.

title: AUTONOMOUS AND CONTINUOUSLY SELF-IMPROVING LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: Systems and methods are provided in which an artificial intelligence inference module identifies targeted information in large-scale unlabeled data, autonomously learns hierarchical representations from the data, and continually self-improves from self-labeled data points using a teacher model trained to detect known targets from combined inputs of a small hand labeled curated dataset prepared by a domain expert together with self-generated context features derived from the unlabeled dataset by unsupervised and self-supervised processes. The trained teacher model self-generates new weakly-supervised training samples that are self-refined and self-corrected, without human supervision, and then used as inputs to a noisy student model trained in a semi-supervised learning process. With each iteration, the noisy student model continually self-optimizes its learned parameters against a set of configurable validation criteria by replacing the learned parameter of the prior iteration teacher model with optimized learned parameters periodically used to update the artificial intelligence inference module.

title: SCALABLE KNOWLEDGE DISTILLATION TECHNIQUES FOR MACHINE LEARNING
abstract_text: A data processing system implements a dynamic knowledge distillation process including dividing training data into a plurality of batches of samples and distilling a student model from a teacher model using an iterative knowledge distillation. The process includes instantiating an instance of the teacher model and the student model in a memory of the data processing system and obtaining a respective batch of training data from the plurality of batches of samples in the memory. The process includes training the teacher and student models using each of the samples in the respective batch of the training data, evaluating the performance of the student model compared with the performance of the teacher model, and providing feedback to student model to adjust the behavior of the student model based on the performance of the student model.

title: Oral English practice analysis and comparison system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of oral English analysis, and discloses an oral English practice analysis and comparison system based on artificial intelligence, which is characterized in that pronunciation audios and mouth shape videos of each English word practiced by a student user are collected by using a pickup and an image collector, and then the pronunciation audios are subjected to sound wave diagram conversion and segmentation processing; therefore, whether the oral English pronunciation of the student user is standard or not is judged, and refined orientation analysis of pronunciation errors is realized based on concrete segmentation processing of the pronunciation audio data after the judgment is finished, so that the judgment result is deeper, a targeted pronunciation mouth shape guidance direction can be provided for auxiliary pronunciation guidance, and the pronunciation accuracy is improved. Meanwhile, through centralized processing of English words with wrong pronunciation of the student user, spoken English key practice phonemes corresponding to the student user are determined, and a key practice lexicon is constructed according to the spoken English key practice phonemes, so that efficient utilization of wrong pronunciation data of the student user is realized, and effective reference can be provided for future pronunciation practice of a practicer.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: There is provided an information processing device to improve the accuracy of estimation using a student network, the information processing device including an estimation unit that estimates an object class of an object included in an input image using a student network generated based on a teacher network generated by machine learning using images stored in a large-scale image database as training data. The student network is generated by machine learning using, as training data, synthetic images obtained using the teacher network and real environment images acquired by a plurality of different modalities in a real environment in which estimation by the estimation unit is expected to be executed.

title: POLICY DISTILLATION WITH OBSERVATION PRUNING
abstract_text: Machine learning methods and systems include training a teacher model on an environment. Action scores are generated for actions that can be performed within the environment using the teacher model. A student model is trained using pruned states of the environment. A policy is distilled by retraining the student model using labels from the teacher model and the teacher action scores.

title: Cross-campus linkage attendance checking method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: ANHUI YUZHILAN EDUCATION SOFTWARE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a cross-campus linkage attendance checking method and system based on artificial intelligence, and belongs to the technical field of college student attendance checking, and the system comprises a server, a people number identification module and a roll call module; the people number identification module is used for identifying the number of people in a classroom, calculating the attendance rate, obtaining the classroom of the current school, establishing an identification library according to the classroom, identifying the number of the current classroom, and matching a corresponding identification model in the identification library according to the number of the classroom. Monitoring images of a current classroom in class are collected, the collected monitoring images are sent to the recognition model, the number of students in the current classroom in class is obtained, the number of the students in the current course is obtained, the attendance rate of the current course is calculated according to the collected number of the students and the number of the students in the current course, and the calculated attendance rate is sent to the display terminal to be displayed; and the roll call module is used for the teacher to call the roll and obtain the attendance rate of the current course.

title: Image-text retrieval method and system based on cross-modal cross guidance
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an image-text retrieval method and system based on cross-modal cross guidance, and the method comprises the following steps: inputting image data and text data; a cross-modal cross-guidance network model constructed based on a self-distillation algorithm is used for feature extraction and shared semantic learning of two different modal data of an image and a text, model training is completed, the cross-modal cross-guidance network model comprises a teacher network and a student network, the student network comprises two branches of the image and the text, and the teacher network and the student network are connected with each other. The teacher network and the student network have the same structure, and cross-modal cross guidance is performed between the teacher network and the student network; and finally, inputting a to-be-retrieved image or text into the trained cross-modal cross guidance network model to extract corresponding features, calculating the similarity of the to-be-retrieved image or text, and performing retrieval according to the score of the similarity to obtain an optimal retrieval result. Through the method, cross-modal semantic alignment is realized, and the retrieval accuracy is improved.

title: Federal learning distillation method and device oriented to non-independent identically distributed scene
applicants: ANHUI KEXUN JINFU TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a federal learning distillation method and device for a non-independent identically distributed scene. According to the method, by means of the similarity between non-label data of a target terminal and initial label data of the target terminal, the first feature similarity between the non-label data of the target terminal and initial label data of other terminals and the second feature similarity between the initial label data of the target terminal and the initial label data of the other terminals, the non-label data of the target terminal are obtained; according to the technical scheme, the training samples of the initial teacher model and the basic model can be enriched, the training efficiency of the initial teacher model and the basic model can be greatly improved, the generalization ability of the obtained target teacher model and student model can be higher, and the accuracy of the aggregation model obtained through federal learning can be improved. Besides, the method combines knowledge distillation and federated learning, so that the student model can learn knowledge of other terminals which do not exist at all, that is, data of the student model do not have related labels, but the student model can learn related knowledge through federated learning.

title: Classroom environment health data monitoring and processing system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of school air quality detection and analysis under big data, in particular to a classroom environment health data monitoring and processing system based on artificial intelligence, and the system comprises a classroom fresh air control module which can control the operation of a fresh air system in a classroom; the chlorine dioxide disinfection module can release chlorine dioxide gas purification factors into the classroom through the fresh air system; the personnel quantity monitoring module can monitor the quantity of personnel in the classroom and personnel distribution conditions based on whether the student seats are seated; and the classroom control module can control the operation states of the classroom fresh air control module and the chlorine dioxide disinfection module based on the information monitored by the personnel quantity monitoring module. The system can more accurately judge the total number of people in a classroom during class, the device adopts a chlorine dioxide gas factor for disinfection, harmful viruses in the classroom can be actively killed under the condition of man-machine coexistence, early warning information can be generated based on system perception, and the early warning information is uploaded to a disease control system.

title: Expired gas identification method and device, computer equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of medical treatment in artificial intelligence, and discloses an expired gas identification method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring teacher coding parameter information of a target teacher model; acquiring an expiration data set, and inputting the expiration data set and the teacher coding parameter information into an encoder module of a student model to obtain a student coding result; inputting the student coding result into a decoder module of a student model to obtain a first loss; inputting the expiration data set into a target teacher model for encoding to obtain a teacher encoding result, and calculating according to the teacher encoding result and the student encoding result to obtain a second loss; performing iterative training on the student model according to the first loss and the second loss to obtain a target student model; and acquiring to-be-identified expired gas data, and inputting the to-be-identified expired gas data into the target student model to obtain an identification result. According to the embodiment of the invention, the expired gas recognition accuracy can be improved.

title: Artificial intelligence-based score display analysis system and method
applicants: GUANGZHOU JIZHI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a score display analysis system and method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: collecting all historical training records generated by each student in each training period; evaluation scores displayed by the intelligent training assessment system for the historical training records are obtained respectively, the historical training records with score deduction conditions are set as target training records, and feature information extraction is carried out on the target training records respectively; capturing and identifying training items of each trainee showing abnormal training phenomena in each training period; respectively performing distribution carding of assessment loss score events on each feature training item existing in each training period of each trainee; summarizing the mastering degree values of the trainees on the feature training items in the training periods, and generating a training floating curve corresponding to the trainees; and analyzing the training floating curve, and assisting in formulating a personalized training scheme corresponding to each student.

title: NEURAL NETWORK DISTILLATION METHOD AND APPARATUS
abstract_text: This application provides a neural network distillation method and apparatus in the field of artificial intelligence. The method includes: obtaining a sample set, where the sample set includes a biased data set and an unbiased data set, the biased data set includes biased samples, and the unbiased data set includes unbiased samples; determining a first distillation manner based on data features of the sample set, where, in the first distillation manner, a teacher model is trained by using the unbiased data set and a student model is trained by using the biased data set; and training a first neural network based on the biased data set and the unbiased data set in the first distillation manner, to obtain an updated first neural network.

title: Method and device for acquiring target network model based on shallow compression features
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence algorithms, in particular to a method and device for obtaining a target network model based on shallow compression features, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a teacher network model, a student network model and a training data set; respectively training the student network model and the teacher network model based on the training data set, and extracting a first shallow feature set and a second shallow feature set; performing channel compression on the first shallow feature set and the second shallow feature set to obtain a first compression feature and a second compression feature; respectively extracting first texture feature information and second texture feature information from the first compression feature and the second compression feature by adopting a texture feature extraction method; and adjusting the parameters of the student network model based on the first texture feature information and the second texture feature information to obtain the target network model, thereby effectively reducing the data volume through a channel compression mode, and not increasing the parameters of the network model while improving the performance of the network model.

title: Intelligent laboratory management platform based on deep learning and control method thereof
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent laboratory management platform based on deep learning and a control method thereof.The intelligent laboratory management platform comprises a central processing unit, an access control system, a monitoring device and a broadcasting device, the central processing unit is in bidirectional connection with a monitoring learning system, and the central processing unit is in bidirectional connection with a voice recognition system; the central processing unit is in bidirectional connection with the experimental data cloud uploading system, the central processing unit is in bidirectional connection with the IC card information input system, and the monitoring learning system comprises a monitoring video reading module. According to the intelligent laboratory management platform based on deep learning and the control method thereof, when a student performs an experiment in a laboratory by himself/herself, the video of the operation of the student is recorded through the monitoring equipment, then the video of the operation of the student is read, analyzed and learned through the monitoring learning system, and the student learns correct recorded operation, so that the operation efficiency is improved. And the correctness of self-operation of the student can be judged.

title: AI Tool to Improve Music Performance
abstract_text: Disclosed embodiments include systems and methods to teach and analyze a student's progress in learning to play a musical instrument, sing or perform other musical endeavors. Embodiments include the production of an AI score or music AI score which may be an extraction of performance parameters such as a student's tone, speed, rhythm, pitch loudness and other metrics. A musical AI score may also track changes in measured performance while playing a piece of music. Such changes within a piece of music or over time in performing various pieces of music can be valuable is a student's self-assessment or a music teacher's approach tailored to the particular student. A music or signing AI score can help a student to select and to prioritize their music repertoire, focus performance efforts, optimize time schedule, improve appreciation for music, improve the overall quality of music performance and instructor relationship.

title: College course selection recommendation system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHANGHAI XUCAN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a college course selection recommendation system based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of course selection recommendation, historical label information is generated by collecting student course selection information and combining with matching feature information for matching, and a preference dynamic value is generated through analysis and judgment of a large amount of historical label information. A first course selection recommendation set, a second course selection recommendation set and a third course selection recommendation set are constructed through preference dynamic value analysis, the first three courses are sequenced through extracting the preference dynamic values in the first course selection recommendation set to perform page top scrolling, when a student registers and logs in, the professional student is automatically matched, and professional preference recommendation is performed on the student. And non-professional preferences of the same professionals are associated through a matching system of the second course selection recommendation set and the third course selection recommendation set and the recommendation condition of the grade.

title: Intelligent campus safety management early warning method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHENZHEN SUNSHINE BORUI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent campus safety management early warning method and system based on artificial intelligence. The intelligent campus safety management early warning method comprises the following steps: inputting basic information of each student, and sending the basic information of each student to a cloud platform for storage; monitoring student information through a campus access control system, comparing the student information obtained by the campus access control system with the basic information, and performing safety management early warning through a comparison result; the similarity value of each student in the face recognition process is obtained in real time, and whether face information of the students needs to be collected again or not is determined according to the change of the similarity value. The system comprises modules corresponding to the steps of the method.

title: Training examination system based on image AI and element universe
applicants: SHANGHAI ZUNHE MEDICAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a training examination system based on an image AI and a meta universe, which is mainly divided into three aspects of a student end, a meta universe training examination system and a training teacher end, and is characterized in that the student end comprises a meta universe access module, a real-time action recognition and training examination module based on the image AI and a learning plan module; the meta-universe training examination system comprises a meta-universe training space, a communication interaction module and a training examination scoring and rechecking module. The training teacher end comprises a meta-universe access training module, a student management module and an examination rechecking module. Problems existing in remote training are solved by applying the image AI technology and the element cosmic space, the function of remote autonomous examination of the nursing staff is achieved through the AI image and related algorithms, the training efficiency and the training coverage area can be improved, the real-time effect of training can be improved through the element cosmic space, teachers and students can interact in real time, and the training efficiency is improved. And the teacher can correct wrong actions of the students in real time.

title: AI-based learning question personalized recommendation method and system
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an AI-based learning question personalized recommendation method and system, and the method comprises the steps that an information collection module obtains the information of a student and transmits the information to an information evaluation module; the information evaluation module extracts the number of scholars of each student and answers of each student in historical answer sheets of different subjects in the corresponding scholars; the information statistics module performs statistics on knowledge points related to each question in each piece of historical test answer sheet information so as to perform statistics on the total occurrence frequency of each question with the corresponding knowledge point and the average score rate of the questions with the knowledge points; the central control module adjusts the recommendation model and transmits the adjusted recommendation model to the recommendation module; and the recommendation module retrieves the corresponding exercises from the database according to the received central control module so as to generate a recommended test and recommend the recommended test to the student. According to the method, the model is created and continuously adjusted, so that the recommendation efficiency of the method for learning questions is improved.

title: Retina OCT image lesion classification method based on unsupervised heterogeneous distillation framework
abstract_text: The invention relates to a retina OCT image lesion classification method based on an unsupervised heterogeneous distillation framework, and belongs to the technical field of image classification. The method comprises a teacher network and a student network, the teacher network takes parameters pre-trained on a natural image as initial parameters of the teacher network, only a small number of normal retina OCT images are needed when the method is trained, the teacher network does not update the parameters during training, and the student network takes characteristics of the teacher network as input and does not update the parameters during training. In the test stage, whether the to-be-tested image is a lesion image is judged by comparing the difference of the features generated by the teacher network and the student network, so that the problem that a large number of medical image annotations are needed for training the deep learning network can be effectively relieved.

title: Campus attendance system and method based on AI artificial intelligence recognition technology
applicants: SICHUAN JOYOU DIGITAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a campus attendance system and method based on an AI artificial intelligence recognition technology, the attendance system comprises a first AI artificial intelligence recognition device, a second AI artificial intelligence recognition device, a server and a teacher terminal, and the teacher terminal, the first AI artificial intelligence recognition device and the second AI artificial intelligence recognition device are all connected with the server. The first AI artificial intelligence recognition device is arranged at an entrance of a classroom and is used for collecting first face data of a single student; and the second AI artificial intelligence recognition device is arranged in the classroom and is used for acquiring the first face data of the students in the classroom. In actual use, only the face data of the to-be-checked-in person needs to be input, and during later checking-in, queuing card punching and face or fingerprint checking-in are not needed, so that the step of queuing card punching is omitted; in actual use, the purpose of quick attendance checking can be achieved, and the condition of card punching congestion when the number of people is too large is solved.

title: Remote sensing image super-resolution reconstruction method based on LRepSR and I-E knowledge distillation
abstract_text: The invention designs a remote sensing image super-resolution reconstruction method based on LRepSR (Lightweight RepSR) and I-E (Intelligence Exploration) knowledge distillation, which comprises a lightweight RepSR design method based on structural reparameterization design and a model training method based on I-E knowledge distillation. The problems that an existing remote sensing image super-resolution reconstruction network based on deep learning is low in reasoning speed and difficult to apply are solved. The invention provides a convolution design method based on structure re-parameterization, and the method can greatly improve the reasoning speed in an image super-resolution reconstruction reasoning stage. According to the invention, the knowledge distillation mode is expanded at the same time, and I-E knowledge distillation is used to promote the student network to achieve balance between inheriting teacher knowledge and autonomous learning, so that the performance of the student network is improved. Finally, the student network trained based on the method can be deployed in an embedded device to perform an efficient remote sensing image super-resolution reconstruction task.

title: Emotion recognition method and system based on multi-task deep learning and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses an emotion recognition method and system based on multi-task deep learning and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining an emotion data set; the emotion data set comprises a plurality of classroom student images, and an emotion state label of each student is marked in the classroom student images; the constructed multi-task deep learning network model comprises an image representation learning network, an image reconstruction network and a multi-task label generation network; performing feature extraction on the classroom student images by using an image representation learning network to obtain representation vectors; performing image reconstruction on the representation vector by using an image reconstruction network; utilizing a multi-task label generation network to predict an emotional state label according to the representation vector; utilizing the emotion data set to train a multi-task deep learning network model, calculating a loss function and updating the weight of the model; and inputting a to-be-recognized image into the trained multi-task deep learning network model, and predicting an emotional state tag. According to the invention, the accuracy of emotion recognition is improved by using the constructed network model.

title: Target detection model training method and device, target detection method and device and electronic equipment
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a target detection model training method and device, a target detection method and device and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning, image processing and computer vision. The method comprises the following steps: in a teacher model, obtaining teacher sequence features according to a sample image; inputting the teacher query vector and the teacher sequence features into a decoder to obtain an enhanced teacher query vector, and performing prediction according to the enhanced teacher query vector to obtain teacher prediction information; in the student model, obtaining student sequence features according to the sample images; inputting the student query vector and the student sequence features into a decoder to obtain an enhanced student query vector, and performing prediction according to the enhanced student query vector to obtain student prediction information; and according to the teacher prediction information, the student prediction information and the truth value information of the sample image, training a teacher query vector, and training a student model. Through the technical scheme, the target detection performance can be improved.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PREDICTING PERFORMANCE BY CLUSTERING PSYCHOMETRIC DATA USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: A system for predicting performance of a student based on psychometric data includes data storage devices for storing psychometric data for students obtained via psychometric tests, the psychometric data being indicative of a plurality of psychological traits of the students. A training management system having one or more simulation stations collects performance data for the students. One or more processors executing an artificial intelligence module clusters the psychological traits define aptitude clusters and correlates the aptitude clusters with the performance data to thereby associate different levels of performance with each of the plurality of aptitude clusters. A new student performance prediction module receives a set of new psychometric data for a new student and associates the set of new psychometric data for the new student with one of the plurality of aptitude clusters to thereby predict the performance of the new student.

title: Differential privacy knowledge migration method and system for medical data
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of differential privacy machine learning, in particular to a differential privacy knowledge migration method and system oriented to medical data, and the method comprises the steps that a data owner divides owned privacy medical data into n parts, each part adopts logistic regression to train a medical diagnosis classification model, n models form a medical diagnosis teach model, and a medical diagnosis classification model is obtained; the trained model predicts the label-free medical data sent by the data user to obtain a data classification result; after the voting results of the n models are aggregated together, Gaussian noise disturbance is added to the aggregated voting results, and a label with the largest voting number after disturbance is added is sent to a data user to label no-label data; the data user carries out training locally by using the obtained data with the label to obtain a student model; according to the invention, the problem of low model accuracy under the strong privacy requirement of a medical center in the prior art is solved.

title: Target detection model training method, target detection method, device and equipment
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a target detection model training method, a target detection method, a target detection device and target detection equipment, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of deep learning. According to the specific implementation scheme, a target image is input into a student detection model and a teacher detection model, and candidate student features output by the student detection model and candidate teacher features output by the teacher detection model are obtained; according to a target label in the target image, respectively determining a student label corresponding to the candidate student feature and a teacher label corresponding to the candidate teacher feature; based on the student labels and the teacher labels, candidate student features and candidate teacher features having a matching relationship are determined; and training the student detection model according to the candidate student features and the candidate teacher features having the matching relationship. According to the scheme, the consistency of output characteristics of the student detection model and the teacher detection model is guaranteed under the condition that the detection models are output disorderly, and then the model training precision is improved.

title: User interest point recommendation method and device
abstract_text: The invention discloses a user interest point recommendation method. The method comprises the following steps: inputting privacy data and a real label into a teacher model for training; after training of the teacher model is finished, public data are input into the teacher model, and the teacher model outputs a soft label; inputting the public data into the student model, and inputting the soft label into the student model for training; and after the student model training is finished, recommending interest points to the user by using the student model. The characteristic that teacher model knowledge is absorbed by student models in a teacher-student distillation framework can be fully utilized, the student models complete training without directly using teacher model training data (privacy data), isolation of the student models and the privacy data is achieved, and reverse deduction attacks of deep learning models can be effectively coped with; and even if the risk of being attacked exists, the leakage of the privacy data is not caused, so that the protection of the privacy data of the user is realized.

title: Power distribution test cabinet wiring sequence identification method and system based on deep learning
applicants: ZHENGZHOU XINDA ADVANCED TECH RESEARCH INSTITUTE
abstract_text: The invention provides a power distribution test cabinet wiring sequence identification method and system based on deep learning, and the method comprises the following steps: collecting a first to-be-tested picture corresponding to a wiring sequence identification region after the wiring operation of a student is completed; performing identification area zooming on the first to-be-tested picture to obtain a second to-be-tested picture, and intercepting N 50 * 50 rectangular pictures from the second to-be-tested picture; inputting a rectangular picture into the lightweight wiring sequence identification network model to obtain N one-dimensional color arrays; processing the N one-dimensional color arrays by utilizing an argmax function, and predicting category indexes corresponding to the N rectangular pictures; respectively mapping the predicted N category indexes to corresponding color labels to obtain N color labels; removing adjacent and same color labels in the N color labels to obtain M target color labels; and negative samples NG in the M target color labels are removed, so that the lead color sequence can be quickly and accurately detected.

title: Model training method and device based on knowledge distillation and electronic equipment
applicants: SHANGHAI GOLDWAY INTELLIGENT TRANSP SYSTEMS CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a model training method and device based on knowledge distillation and electronic equipment, relates to the technical field of machine learning, and realizes that a student model and a teacher model are heterogeneous models under the conditions of a student model of a single-stage detection network and a teacher model of a two-stage detection network. And training a student model for target detection in a knowledge distillation mode. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a trained teacher model; aligning the feature scale of the student model feature layer with the feature scale of the teacher model feature layer, and determining feature distillation loss; aligning the prediction frame of the student model output layer and the corresponding probability distribution with the prediction frame of the teacher model output layer and the corresponding probability distribution, and determining output distillation loss; improving a loss function of the student model according to the characteristic distillation loss and the output distillation loss; and training a student model based on the improved loss function to obtain a trained model.

title: Distillation method and device of visual transformation model, electronic equipment and medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a distillation method and device of a visual transformation model, electronic equipment and a medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical fields of computer vision, deep learning and the like, and can be applied to image classification or target detection scenes. According to the specific implementation scheme, dimension processing is carried out on student coding parameters in an image encoder of a student model, so that the dimensions of the student coding parameters are aligned with those of teacher coding parameters; the teacher encoding parameter belongs to an image encoder of a teacher model; determining a distillation loss function of the student model according to the student coding parameters and the teacher coding parameters; determining student prediction parameters of the student model for the image processing task based on the student coding parameters, and determining a task loss function of the student model based on the student prediction parameters; and based on the distillation loss function and the task loss function, carrying out distillation training on the student model. The distillation effect of the visual transformation model can be improved, and the prediction performance of the student model can be improved.

title: Intelligent detection method for flaws of ceramic substrate by utilizing knowledge distillation
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for intelligently detecting flaws of a ceramic substrate by utilizing knowledge distillation, and relates to the field of deep learning target detection. According to the method, a high-resolution sample image and a low-resolution sample image are integrated to be respectively input into a teacher network model to obtain a feature map, a total loss function of the teacher network model is calculated to train the teacher network model, and then the teacher network model is utilized to guide and train a student network model based on a knowledge distillation method. And a total loss function of the student network model is calculated by integrating fusion features obtained by inputting the high-resolution and low-resolution sample images into the teacher network model and feature maps obtained by inputting the low-resolution sample images into the student network model, and finally the student network model is guided to train to obtain a defect detection model. The high detection accuracy rate can be achieved even for the low-resolution to-be-detected image, so that the detection speed and the detection accuracy rate are excellent, and the defect detection efficiency of the ceramic substrate is high.

title: Network model training method and device
applicants: CHINA MOBILE COMMUNICATION GROUP TERMINAL CO LTD
CHINA MOBILE COMMUNICATIONS GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention relates to the field of machine learning, in particular to a network model training method and equipment. The network model training method comprises the following steps: pre-training a convolutional neural network (CNN) by using a large sample data set to obtain a CNN model, the CNN pre-training model comprising n sub-networks, and the n sub-networks comprising fully connected sub-networks; replacing the full-connection sub-network in the CNN pre-training model with a restricted Boltzmann machine (RBM) sub-network to obtain a teacher model; the CNN model serves as a student model and forms a migration network model with the teacher model; and training the migration network model by adopting a small sample data set to determine model parameters of the RBM sub-network in the migration network model. In the embodiment of the invention, through the transfer learning method based on the restricted Boltzmann machine, the training of the small sample network model is effectively realized.

title: METHOD OR APPARATUS FOR PERFORMING COMMUNICATION LOAD BALANCING WITH MULTI-TEACHER REINFORCEMENT LEARNING
abstract_text: A server may be provided to obtain a load balancing artificial intelligence (AI) model for a plurality of base stations in a communication system. The server may obtain teacher models based on traffic data sets collected from the base stations, respectively; perform a policy rehearsal process including obtaining student models based on knowledge distillation from the teacher models, obtaining an ensemble student model by ensembling the student models, and obtaining a policy model by interacting with the ensemble student mode; provide the policy model to each of the base stations for a policy evaluation of the policy model; and based on a training continue signal being received from at least one of the base stations as a result of the policy evaluation, update the ensemble student model and the policy model by performing the policy rehearsal process on the student models.

title: METHOD OF PERFORMING COMMUNICATION LOAD BALANCING WITH MULTI-TEACHER REINFORCEMENT LEARNING, AND AN APPARATUS FOR THE SAME
abstract_text: A server may be provided to obtain a load balancing artificial intelligence (AI) model for a plurality of base stations in a communication system. The server may obtain teacher models based on traffic data sets collected from the base stations, respectively; perform a policy rehearsal process including obtaining student models based on knowledge distillation from the teacher models, obtaining an ensemble student model by ensembling the student models, and obtaining a policy model by interacting with the ensemble student mode; provide the policy model to each of the base stations for a policy evaluation of the policy model; and based on a training continue signal being received from at least one of the base stations as a result of the policy evaluation, update the ensemble student model and the policy model by performing the policy rehearsal process on the student models.

title: Three-dimensional object detection model training method and device and three-dimensional object detection method and device
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a three-dimensional object detection model training and three-dimensional object detection method, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as computer vision, image processing, deep learning and augmented reality, and can be applied to scenes such as automatic driving and smart cities. The training method of the three-dimensional object detection model comprises the following steps: acquiring a plurality of data pairs and detection frame labeling information of the plurality of data pairs; acquiring a teacher network and a student network; inputting the point cloud data in the data pair into a teacher network, and inputting the binocular image into a student network to obtain first detection frame information and second detection frame information; obtaining target detection frame information according to the first detection frame information, the second detection frame information and detection frame labeling information of the data pair; obtaining a first loss function value according to the target detection frame information and the second detection frame information, and obtaining a second loss function value according to the second detection frame information and the detection frame labeling information; and adjusting parameters of the student network according to the loss function value to obtain a three-dimensional object detection model.

title: Student apartment load identification method and system based on intelligent electric meter
applicants: SHENZHEN HEZHONG ZHIDA TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a student apartment load identification method and system based on an intelligent electric meter, which are used for improving the identification accuracy and efficiency of malignant loads of student apartments. The method comprises the following steps: establishing a node network corresponding to a student apartment according to electric appliance distribution data; obtaining the student check-in information of the student apartment, and carrying out the layering of the student apartment according to the student check-in information and the node network, and setting load sub-layers, thereby obtaining a plurality of load sub-layers; performing electric energy load detection on the plurality of load sub-layers to obtain electric energy load data, and performing load abnormality analysis on the electric energy load data to obtain at least one abnormal load sub-layer; obtaining illegal electric appliance influence parameters, and carrying out malignant load electric appliance control scheme matching on the at least one abnormal load sub-layer according to the illegal electric appliance influence parameters to generate a target malignant load control scheme; and performing malignant load control on the student apartment according to the intelligent electric meter and the target malignant load control scheme.

title: Model compression and acceleration method for deep learning segmentation task
abstract_text: The invention provides a model compression and acceleration method for a deep learning segmentation task. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a U-net network model; adding a 3 * 3 mean pooling layer in the feature map of the last layer of the U-net network model to obtain an optimal teacher model; constructing a loss function; substituting the optimal teacher model into the loss function to obtain a target teacher model; obtaining a student model, and performing sparse training processing on the student model and the target teacher model to obtain a compression model, the sparse training processing including random mask processing; and carrying out at least one fine tuning iteration training processing on the compression model to obtain a target small model. According to the method, in the pruning process of the large model, feature distillation and edge detection improvement are introduced, so that the model is compressed at a higher ratio and has a higher reasoning speed, and meanwhile, the generalization performance of the compressed small model is effectively improved.

title: Physical and chemical experiment operation behavior identification method based on spatio-temporal characteristics
applicants: TAIYUAN ZHILIN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of behavior recognition, in particular to a physical and chemical experiment operation behavior recognition method based on spatio-temporal characteristics, which comprises the following steps: recognizing the state of experiment equipment by using a lightweight deep learning network, and establishing a physical and chemical experiment operation key step model according to the state transition of the experiment equipment; a video is divided into a plurality of experimental operation video clips through a physical and chemical experimental operation key step model, the video clips are dynamically sampled according to the experimental operation key step model to obtain key experimental operation behavior images, and the key experimental operation behavior images deeply learn a time network and a space network to extract spatial and temporal features. And obtaining a recognition result of the student experiment operation behavior of each video clip, and recognizing the physical and chemical experiment operation behavior.

title: Point cloud data processing model training method and device, equipment and medium
abstract_text: The invention provides a point cloud data processing model training method which can be applied to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: inputting sample point cloud data into a student network, and outputting a first feature map related to a first intermediate stage of the student network; inputting the sample point cloud data into the teacher network, and outputting a second feature map related to a second intermediate stage of the teacher network; performing knowledge reconstruction on the first feature map by using the target feature map to obtain a first reconstructed feature map; determining a first loss value based on the first reconstructed feature map and the second feature map; and adjusting model parameters of the student network by using the first loss value to obtain a target point cloud data processing model. In addition, the invention also provides a point cloud data processing method, a point cloud data processing model training device, a point cloud data processing device, equipment and a storage medium.

title: METHOD OF LOAD FORECASTING VIA KNOWLEDGE DISTILLATION, AND AN APPARATUS FOR THE SAME
abstract_text: A server may obtain teacher artificial intelligence (AI) models from source base stations; obtain target traffic data from a target base station; obtain an integrated teacher prediction based on the target traffic data by integrating teacher prediction results of the teacher AI models based on teacher importance weights; obtain a student AI model that is trained to converge a student loss on the target traffic data; update the teacher importance weights to converge a teacher loss between a student prediction of the student AI model on the target traffic data, and the integrated teacher prediction of the teacher AI models on the target traffic data; update the student AI model based on the updated teacher importance weights being applied to the teacher prediction results of the teacher AI models; and predict a communication traffic load of the target base station using the updated student AI model.

title: Customer service monitoring method and device based on voice and expression emotion recognition
applicants: INDUSTRIAL & COMMERCIAL BANK OF CHINA CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a customer service monitoring method and device based on voice and expression emotion recognition, and relates to the field of deep learning. The method comprises the following steps: synchronously collecting face images and voice audios of customer service personnel in real time; performing feature extraction on the facial image to obtain a facial expression feature vector of the customer service staff; performing feature extraction on the voice audio to obtain an audio feature vector of the customer service staff; obtaining an emotion recognition result of the customer service staff according to the facial expression feature vector, the audio feature vector and a pre-created lightweight student model; wherein the lightweight student model is obtained by training based on multiple groups of facial expression feature vectors and audio feature vectors and a trained teacher model; and executing preset early warning processing according to the emotion recognition result. According to the method, the problems that single-source information recognition correctness is not high enough and uncertainty is high are solved to a certain extent, the difficulties of a deep hierarchical structure and high calculation complexity of a recognition model are solved, and resource space is saved.

title: Course information intelligent distribution-oriented school hall recommendation method and system
applicants: TECH COLLEGE BRANCH OF STATE GRID CORPORATION
abstract_text: The invention provides a course information intelligent distribution-oriented classroom recommendation method and system, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the multi-dimensional course learning data of a student; calculating user similarity by using a cosine similarity algorithm of user feature vectors based on user collaborative filtering, and constructing a user stereo portrait; training courses of the platform are obtained, the training courses are understood as items, and item-based collaborative filtering is adopted to select an association rule similarity algorithm to calculate course similarity; and extracting course association rules based on a recommendation algorithm of the course label association rules and a collaborative filtering recommendation algorithm of course scoring grades, obtaining a strong association degree sequence of course labels, taking the strong association degree sequence as an index of course recommendation, and recommending courses. Through a recommendation algorithm, training learning resources conforming to behavior habits are automatically recommended to the student user, and the learning experience of the student is improved.

title: METHOD OF LOAD FORECASTING VIA KNOWLEDGE DISTILLATION, AND AN APPARATUS FOR THE SAME
abstract_text: A server may obtain teacher artificial intelligence (AI) models from source base stations; obtain target traffic data from a target base station; obtain an integrated teacher prediction based on the target traffic data by integrating teacher prediction results of the teacher AI models based on teacher importance weights; obtain a student AI model that is trained to converge a student loss on the target traffic data; update the teacher importance weights to converge a teacher loss between a student prediction of the student AI model on the target traffic data, and the integrated teacher prediction of the teacher AI models on the target traffic data; update the student AI model based on the updated teacher importance weights being applied to the teacher prediction results of the teacher AI models; and predict a communication traffic load of the target base station using the updated student AI model.

title: AI-Based Device and Method for Evaluating Status of Student
abstract_text: 본 발명의 일 목적은 학습자의 학습 기록에 기초하여 학습자의 현재 학습 상태를 예상 가능하도록 하는 것에 있다. 이를 위해, 본 발명의 일 실시예에 따른 인공 신경망 모듈을 포함하는 학습자 상태 진단 장치는, 상기 인공 신경망 모듈은 학습자 클라이언트로부터의 학습 기록을 입력 받고, 입력 받은 상기 학습 기록을 처리하여 학습자의 예상 현재 학습 상태를 출력하며, 상기 학습 기록은, 상기 학습자가 상기 학습자 클라이언트를 통해 현재까지 입력한 문제들에 대한 풀이를 포함하는 문제 풀이 정보와, 상기 학습자가 풀이한 문제들이 현재 커리큘럼 내 복수의 학습 세션들 중 어떠한 학습 세션들의 조합으로 이루어졌는지를 나타내는 학습 세션 조합 정보와, 상기 학습자가 풀이한 문제들에 대한 문제 식별자 세트를 포함하고, 상기 예상 현재 학습 상태는, 상기 현재 커리큘럼 내 복수의 학습 세션들의 문제들에 대한 정오답 여부와 개별 학습 세션에 대한 예상 점수를 포함하고, 상기 문제 식별자 세트의 문제 식별자 각각은 대응하는 문제의 게임 유형 및 학습 대상의 조합으로 이루어진다.

title: COMPUTATIONALLY EFFICIENT DISTILLATION USING GENERATIVE NEURAL NETWORKS
abstract_text: Methods, systems, and apparatus for training a student neural network having multiple student parameters to perform a machine learning task. In one aspect, a system comprises one or more computers configured to obtain a batch comprising one or more training inputs to generate multiple modified training inputs. The one or more computers process each of the multiple modified training inputs using the student neural network and a teacher neural network to generate a respective student output and a respective teacher output for the machine learning task for each of the modified training inputs. The one or more computers update the student parameters by computing a gradient with respect to the student parameters of a loss function that includes a first term that measures, for each of the modified training inputs, a loss between the student output for the modified training input and the teacher output for the modified training input.

title: Lightweight source code vulnerability detection method based on knowledge distillation
abstract_text: The invention relates to a lightweight source code vulnerability detection method based on knowledge distillation, and the method comprises the following steps: 1, carrying out the data preprocessing of a labeled source code data set in the field of vulnerability detection, carrying out the word-level replacement through combining with a trained language model, and carrying out the data enhancement to obtain a training data set; 2, selecting a teacher model and establishing a student model, and performing knowledge distillation on the student model to obtain a preliminary student model; 3, performing knowledge distillation on the preliminary student model again by using the training data set to obtain a final student model, namely the lightweight source code vulnerability detection model; and 4, performing vulnerability detection by using the vulnerability detection model to obtain a detection result. According to the method, the problem of overlarge time overhead caused by overlarge depth of the neural network in artificial intelligence vulnerability detection can be effectively solved, so that the complexity of the model is reduced, the training time is shortened, the model is more conveniently deployed and used on resource-limited equipment, and application scenes are increased.

title: Method and device for training deep learning network for face recognition
abstract_text: A method and apparatus for training a deep learning network for face recognition are provided. The method includes: performing face alignment processing on at least one captured image using a face coordinate detector to output at least one aligned image; inputting the at least one aligned image into a teacher model to obtain a first output vector; inputting the at least one captured image into a student model corresponding to the teacher model to obtain a second output vector; and adjusting parameter setting of the student model according to the first output vector and the second output vector.

title: Face recognition network model with face alignment based on knowledge distillation
abstract_text: A method for training a deep learning network for face recognition includes: utilizing a face landmark detector to perform face alignment processing on at least one captured image, thereby outputting at least one aligned image; inputting the at least one aligned image to a teacher model to obtain a first output vector; inputting the at least one captured image a student model corresponding to the teacher module to obtain a second output vector; and adjusting parameter settings of the student model according to the first output vector and the second output vector.

title: System and method for knowledge-preserving neural network pruning
abstract_text: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on computer storage media, for knowledge-preserving sparse pruning on neural networks are described. An exemplary method includes obtaining a pre-trained machine learning model trained based on a plurality of general-purpose training data; training a task-specific machine learning model by tuning the pre-trained machine learning model based on a plurality of task-specific training data corresponding to a task; constructing a student network based on the task-specific machine learning model; simultaneously performing (1) knowledge distillation from the trained task-specific machine learning model as a teacher network to the student network and (2) network pruning on the student network; and obtaining the trained student network for serving the task.

title: Target detection model training method and device, target detection method and device, equipment and medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a target detection model training and target detection method and device, equipment and a medium, and relates to the fields of automatic driving, intelligent transportation, deep learning and the like. According to the implementation scheme, target detection is carried out on a first sample image by adopting a first two-dimensional detection network and a first three-dimensional detection network in a teacher detection model to obtain first detection information and second detection information, performing target detection on the first sample image by adopting a second two-dimensional detection network and a second three-dimensional detection network in the student detection model to obtain third detection information and fourth detection information; and training a student detection model according to the difference between the first detection information and the third detection information and the difference between the second detection information and the fourth detection information. Therefore, the two-dimensional detection network and the three-dimensional detection network can be combined for distillation, so that the student detection model after distillation can maintain relatively low operation time consumption, and also can have a relatively good detection effect.

title: Method and system for detecting learning input degree of primary and secondary school students based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a primary and secondary school student learning input degree detection method and system based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of voice analysis. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring voice information and video information in a course learning process of a target student; extracting to-be-detected voice, and performing recognition to obtain first identity information; extracting a to-be-recognized face image, and performing recognition to obtain second identity information; if the first identity information is the same as the second identity information, recognizing the voice information of the target student to obtain a voice recognition result; if the voice recognition result is not matched with the preset classroom learning content, determining that the learning input degree of the target student is not high; otherwise, extracting each frame of image in the video information according to a preset extraction period, and detecting each frame of image to obtain a corresponding image detection result; and judging the learning input degree of the target student. According to the invention, multiple identification detection technologies are combined, and accurate learning input detection of primary and secondary school students is realized.

title: System and methods for automatically providing customized financial card incentives
abstract_text: Disclosed embodiments may include a method for automatically providing customized financial card incentives where the system can identify if a transaction is eligible for additional bonus rewards by determining if the user is a student using a clustering algorithm with user similarity data to generate a probability. Then, if the probability is above a predetermined threshold, a machine learning model with comprehensive user data classifies the user as a student or non-student. Once the user is determined to be a student, the transaction is verified as being an educational purchase using the transaction data or by having the user provide an image of a receipt. Once the transaction is verified, the transaction or items within the transaction qualify for additional rewards that are applied to the user's account. Users who are not identified as students may qualify for a standard amount of rewards.

title: FACE RECOGNITION NETWORK MODEL WITH FACE ALIGNMENT BASED ON KNOWLEDGE DISTILLATION
abstract_text: A method for training a deep learning network for face recognition includes: utilizing a face landmark detector to perform face alignment processing on at least one captured image, thereby outputting at least one aligned image; inputting the at least one aligned image to a teacher model to obtain a first output vector; inputting the at least one captured image a student model corresponding to the teacher module to obtain a second output vector; and adjusting parameter settings of the student model according to the first output vector and the second output vector.

title: Deep learning-based learning emotion degree analysis method and system, and medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a learning emotion degree analysis method and system based on deep learning and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: collecting a facial expression image of a student during learning, extracting an effective facial region, obtaining a to-be-recognized expression image, and storing the to-be-recognized expression image; constructing a learning expression three-dimensional state space emotion model; analyzing the to-be-recognized expression image to obtain the learning emotion degree of the student, specifically, inputting the to-be-recognized expression image into an emotion classification module, extracting feature vectors for emotion classification, and obtaining the emotion of the to-be-recognized expression; using an emotion projection module to calculate the Euclidean distance between the emotion of the to-be-recognized expression and the standard emotion in the learning expression three-dimensional state space emotion coordinate system, and matching the real emotion of the to-be-recognized expression; and the emotion degree of the to-be-recognized expression is judged in an emotion degree judgment module.
