According to the method, Maxout neurons are introduced innovatively based on the learning expression three-dimensional state space emotion model, the depth of the model is increased, and the problem of model three-dimensional gradient dispersion is solved from the source.

title: Deep learning model distillation poisoning defense method based on contrast learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a deep learning model distillation poisoning defense method based on comparative learning. The method comprises the following steps: preparing a data set; preparing a poisoning model; using the clean sample to generate a positive example; constructing a student model distillation loss function and a learning sample loss function; and model distillation. The method has good applicability, can effectively defend poisoning attacks, and does not affect the accuracy of normal samples after model distillation.

title: Early warning and intervention device for students at top of building
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of automatic alarms, and discloses a building top student early warning and intervention device, which is characterized in that an infrared sensing module is embedded in the surface of a protective shell, the infrared sensing module is linearly connected with an embedded single-chip microcomputer, and the embedded single-chip microcomputer is fixed on a bottom plate in the protective shell through a pin; the embedded single-chip microcomputer is in linear connection with the full-view camera and the bidirectional loudspeaker. The embedded single-chip microcomputer is provided with a networking module and an AI action recognition module, the networking module is used for storing and dialing alarms and psychological hotlines, the networking module has a positioning function, and after the networking module sends an alarm signal, the position of the networking module is sent to a control center of a police and a nearby safety officer at the first time; policemen and safety officers can conveniently arrive at the alarm position at the first time; the infrared sensing module collects action information and the number of the personnel on the roof, and an infrared sensor is adopted, so that the positions and actions of the personnel on the roof can be found in time under the condition of poor weather and illumination.

title: Intelligent remote sensing identification method for large landslide in mountainous area based on semi-supervised deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a semi-supervised deep learning-based intelligent remote sensing identification method for a large landslide in a mountainous area, and belongs to the technical field of surveying and mapping. The method comprises the following steps: S1, selecting a landslide-containing remote sensing image, performing data synthesis on the selected landslide-containing remote sensing image and digital elevation data of a corresponding area to obtain a data set, and performing label labeling on the data to obtain a sample set; s2, constructing a student training network model and a teacher training network model, training and judging the sample set, predicting the sample set to obtain a prediction result, and judging a landslide feature type of the prediction result to obtain a training result; and S3, carrying out cross entropy loss value calculation on the training result obtained in the S2, calculating a mean square error, obtaining an index moving average line, updating the weight in the student training network model according to the index moving average line, and carrying out weighted averaging on continuous prediction to update the weight of the teacher training network model. The landslide in the remote sensing image can be efficiently and accurately identified under the support of a small number of samples and limited computing power.

title: METHOD FOR GENERATING DEEP LEARNING MODEL USING FEATURE TRANSFER AND LOSS TRANSFER
abstract_text: A method for generating a deep learning model using feature transfer and loss transfer is provided. The method comprises the steps of: inputting a plurality of large quantities of image data into a previously trained teacher network model; obtaining feature information extracted from the teacher network model corresponding to the input; obtaining a probability distribution value according to the class of each image data output from the teacher network model corresponding to the input; performing feature transfer learning by inputting the feature information into a student network model that is a learning target; and generating a student network model with a defined loss by applying the probability distribution value to a loss function of the student network model. Through this, a neural network can be easily utilized in a variety of application environments with a relatively small amount of calculation.

title: DISTILLATION METHOD AND APPARATUS SUITABLE FOR BERT MODEL, DEVICE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: The present application relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a distillation method and apparatus suitable for a BERT model, a device, and a storage medium. The method comprises: obtaining a pre-trained BERT model and a gated linear unit; performing model construction according to the pre-trained BERT model and the gated linear unit to obtain a student model; obtaining a first training set and a teacher model, the teacher model being an integrated model obtained by training the pre-trained BERT model; and performing distillation training on the student model according to the first training set and the teacher model to obtain a target model. By means of the gated linear unit, the number of dimensions of the BERT model is reduced, gradient dispersion of the BERT model is effectively reduced, and the nonlinear capability of the BERT model is reserved, thereby improving the calculation speed and accuracy of the student model, and improving real-time performance of the target model. The present application can be applied to the fields of smart government affairs, digital medical treatment, science and technology finance and the like.

title: Image processing model training method and device, equipment and medium
abstract_text: The invention provides an image processing model training method which can be applied to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: inputting sample image data into a student network, and outputting a first feature map related to a first intermediate stage of the student network; inputting the sample image data into a teacher network, and outputting a second feature map related to each intermediate layer in a second intermediate stage of the teacher network; performing group feature calibration on the first feature map by using at least one second feature map related to the middle layer to obtain a first calibration feature map; determining a first loss value based on the first calibration feature map and the first feature map; and adjusting model parameters of the student network by using the first loss value to obtain a target image processing model. In addition, the invention also provides an image processing method, an image processing model training device, an image processing device, electronic equipment and a storage medium.

title: Human body and face joint detection method and device
applicants: SHENZHEN XUMIYUNTU SPACE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of machine learning, and provides a human body and face joint detection method and device. The method comprises the following steps: inputting second human body data into a trained human body detection teacher model, outputting a first heat map of a human body center point and a second heat map of the distance from the human body center point to each frame of a human body detection frame, and inputting second human body data into the trained human body detection teacher model, outputting a third heat map of the face center point and a fourth heat map of the distance from the face center point to each frame of the face detection frame; determining a fifth heat map of the human body and the face center point according to the first heat map and the third heat map, and determining a sixth heat map of the distance from the human body and face center point to each frame of the human body and face detection frame according to the second heat map and the fourth heat map; constructing a human body and face detection student model, and training the human body and face detection student model by using a first loss function based on the fifth heat map and the sixth heat map; and human body and face joint detection is carried out by using the human body and face detection student model.

title: Super-resolution image processing method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a super-resolution image processing method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a first resolution image of a first sample individual; extracting a compact feature image of the first sample individual based on the first resolution image of the first sample individual through a teacher model, and constructing a second resolution image of the first sample individual based on the compact feature image of the first sample individual; based on the feature extraction validity of the compact feature image of the first sample individual and the image construction reduction degree of the second resolution image of the first sample individual, adjusting the parameters of the teacher model to obtain a trained teacher model; and training a student model based on the trained teacher model. According to the technical scheme provided by the embodiment of the invention, excessive requirements on the equipment capability of the deployment equipment are not made, and the deep learning model used for executing super-resolution image processing can be quickly deployed.

title: Depth-constrained knowledge distillation for inference on encrypted data
abstract_text: This disclosure provides a method, apparatus and computer program product to create a full homomorphic encryption (FHE)-friendly machine learning model. The approach herein leverages a knowledge distillation framework wherein the FHE-friendly (student) ML model closely mimics the predictions of a more complex (teacher) model, wherein the teacher model is one that, relative to the student model, is more complex and that is pre-trained on large datasets. In the approach herein, the distillation framework uses the more complex teacher model to facilitate training of the FHE-friendly model, but using synthetically-generated training data in lieu of the original datasets used to train the teacher.

title: Student growth tracking data processing method based on activity flow
abstract_text: The invention discloses an activity flow-based student growth tracking data processing method. The method specifically comprises the following steps: training to obtain five activity flow description models, namely an autonomous learning activity flow, a test learning activity flow, an interactive learning activity flow, a physical activity flow and a science popularization activity flow; collecting data generated by the students in different areas; the collected data are stored in a basic data platform (ODS), and data updating is carried out by adopting log-based change data capture (CDC); active stream information extraction is carried out on unstructured data, texts, images/videos and audios in a basic data platform (ODS) in a deep learning mode; the SQL Merge is called in a polling mode through the packaged ETL Engine, and the updated data are sent into a data warehouse (DW); performing feature-level data fusion and decision-level data fusion on the data of the data warehouse (DW) according to a preset five-activity flow description model; the method can be used for student growth tracking analysis.

title: MODEL DISTILLATION METHOD AND RELATED DEVICE
abstract_text: The present application relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a model distillation method, comprising: at a first computing node of a computing node cluster, distilling a student model by means of some student models and some teacher models, and performing a distillation gradient return process inside of the first computing node, so a responsible network layer is distilled without depending on other computing nodes. In the foregoing manner, a high computing resource utilization rate is achieved, thus accelerating the distillation process.

title: Crowd behavior simulation model training method, crowd simulation method, device and equipment
applicants: BEIJING QINGPENG INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a crowd behavior simulation model training method, a crowd simulation method, a device and equipment, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the training method comprises the steps: obtaining a pedestrian track data set and a pedestrian simulation data set, the pedestrian simulation data set is obtained by inputting the pedestrian trajectory data set into an initial pedestrian interaction simulation model in the initial crowd behavior simulation model; based on the pedestrian trajectory data set and the pedestrian simulation data set, performing teacher-student cooperative driving training on an initial behavior prediction model in the initial crowd behavior simulation model to obtain a behavior prediction model; and symbol regression is carried out on the behavior prediction model based on a symbol set, an updated pedestrian interaction simulation model is determined to obtain a crowd behavior simulation model, and the symbol set comprises at least one operator and a combination mode of the operators. According to the method, accurate and real simulation of the crowd can be realized, and the robustness and generalization of crowd simulation are improved.

title: Coaching system based on learning terminal
applicants: ZHANGZHOU AIGUODONG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a tutoring system based on a learning terminal. The tutoring system comprises the learning terminal, a server and an intelligent terminal for teachers, the learning terminal obtains learning behavior data of the student and sends the learning behavior data to the server; a deep learning model is preset in the server; the server inputs the learning behavior data into the deep learning model to obtain behavior parameters of the student; and judging whether an abnormal learning behavior exists or not according to the behavior parameters of the students, and if the abnormal learning behavior exists, sending a request supervision prompt to the intelligent terminal for the teacher by the server.

title: SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING LEARNING COURSE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND METHOD THEREOF
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence-based learning system to provide commentary content considering a learning level of a student. According to the present invention, the artificial intelligence-based learning system comprises: a server providing lecture content; and a student terminal owned by a student, outputting lecture content corresponding to a selected specific unit title in conjunction with the server when the specific unit title in a unit title item is selected from a lecture attendance screen, performing a problem-solving process on one or more problems related to the specific unit title in conjunction with the server when the output of the lecture content corresponding to the specific unit title is finished, and outputting one of a plurality of step-by-step explanation contents related to an incorrectly answered problem in conjunction with the server when the incorrectly answered problem is selected in the process of solving the one or more problems.

title: Classroom quality evaluation method and device based on face key points
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a classroom quality evaluation method and device based on face key points, which can be applied to the fields of artificial intelligence, cloud computing, computer technology and the like. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a classroom video, and determining at least one frame of classroom image of the classroom video; for each classroom image, determining a target feature map of the classroom image, and determining a classification result of each pixel point of the classroom image based on the target feature map; for each classroom image, determining face key points of the target students in the classroom image based on the target feature map and the classification result, and determining classroom behaviors of the target students in the classroom image based on the face key points; and based on the classroom behavior in each classroom image, determining a classroom quality evaluation result of the target student. By adopting the embodiment of the invention, the face key points can be effectively determined, the evaluation effectiveness of the classroom quality is improved, and the applicability is high.

title: Model distillation method and device, electronic equipment and computer readable medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to a model distillation method and device, electronic equipment and a computer readable medium, and belongs to the technical field of deep learning. The method comprises the following steps: respectively inputting training data in a model training set into a teacher model and a student model to obtain a first output probability corresponding to the teacher model and a second output probability corresponding to the student model; performing dynamic transformation on the first output probability to obtain a first transformation probability, and performing dynamic transformation on the second output probability to obtain a second transformation probability; determining a model loss value according to the first transformation probability, the second transformation probability and a loss function; and performing iterative training on the student model according to the model loss value to obtain a target model after knowledge distillation. Through a dynamic adjustment mechanism, the output probabilities of the teacher model and the student model are dynamically transformed, so that the model output probabilities become smoother, the student model can capture finer-grained information conveniently, and the model distillation effect is improved.

title: Student score prediction method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: HEFEI YUANCHUANG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a student score prediction method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of obtaining text information of a current test paper, and obtaining a test question feature vector of each test question according to the text information; all test question feature vectors form a feature matrix of the current test paper; the test question feature vectors comprise low-dimensional vectors containing semantic information; according to the review data of the to-be-predicted student, obtaining the mastery degree of the to-be-predicted student on the target knowledge point; the review data comprises exercises; obtaining a student feature vector of the to-be-predicted student according to the similarity between the correctly answered exercises and the low-dimensional vectors of the test questions in the current test paper; and obtaining a current test paper score prediction result of the to-be-predicted student according to the feature matrix and the student feature vector. According to the embodiment of the invention, the score of the to-be-predicted student in the current test paper can be accurately obtained.

title: STUDENT-T PROCESS PERSONALIZED ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL
abstract_text: A vehicle includes a controller programed to: collect a set of data related to a driver of the vehicle; predict a driving setting for the driver using the set of data and an initial student-T process (STP) machine learning (ML) model; generate an updated STP ML model based on the prediction of the driving setting as to the set of vehicle data; transmit incremental learning related to the updated STP ML model to a server; and receive, from the server, a personalized driving setting for the driver output from a cloud STP ML model trained by the incremental learning.

title: Adversarial generative neural network compression method
abstract_text: In order to solve the problem that the existing deep learning model compression technology such as pruning and quantification is difficult to be directly applied to a generative adversarial network model, the invention provides a compression method for the generative adversarial network model, which comprises the following steps of: (1) obtaining a to-be-compressed generative adversarial network, and taking the to-be-compressed generative adversarial network as a teacher network; (2) constructing a maximum student network model and pre-training; (3) pruning the student network model; and (4) distilling the student network model. According to the invention, the parameter quantity and the calculation quantity of the network can be effectively reduced. Relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of generative adversarial neural network compression. And the method is of great significance to practical application and deployment of the generative adversarial network. According to the method, the parameter quantity of the cyclican model which is widely used in the industry is compressed by 43 times, the model calculation quantity is compressed by 29 times, the expression capability (FID) of the model is hardly reduced, and the picture generated by the compressed cyclican'and the picture generated by the original cyclican network are difficult to distinguish by naked eyes.

title: Depth limited knowledge distillation for inferring encrypted data
abstract_text: The present disclosure provides a method, apparatus, and computer program product for creating a fully homomorphic encryption (FHE)-friendly machine learning model. The methods herein utilize a knowledge distillation framework where the FHE-friendly (student) ML model closely mimics the prediction of a more complex (teacher) model where the teacher model is a teacher model that is more complex relative to the student model and pre-trained on a big data set. In the methods herein, the distillation framework uses a more complex teacher model to facilitate training of an FHE-friendly model, but uses synthetically generated training data instead of the original dataset for training teachers.

title: Semi-supervised satellite image semantic segmentation network construction method and device and electronic equipment
abstract_text: The invention relates to a semi-supervised satellite image semantic segmentation network construction method and apparatus, and an electronic device. The method comprises the steps of collecting an optical remote sensing image; preprocessing the optical remote sensing image to obtain training data; constructing a full convolution image segmentation network; training the full convolution image segmentation network by using the training data to obtain an optimized full convolution image segmentation network; constructing a semi-supervised knowledge distillation network based on the optimized full-convolution image segmentation network; and training the semi-supervised knowledge distillation network by using the training data. According to the semi-supervised satellite image semantic segmentation network construction method and apparatus, and the electronic device provided by the invention, label sample knowledge is extracted through a deep learning teacher network, and the knowledge is transferred to a student network, so that a label sample category reaches relatively high prediction precision; the accuracy of the target category is improved, and the generalization ability of the model is improved.

title: Zero sample image classification network based on comparative learning and deep learning method
abstract_text: The invention relates to a zero sample image classification network based on comparative learning and a deep learning method. A designed model comprises three parts of comparative learning embedding of semantic attributes, consistency constraint of a student model and a teacher model and a prototype module. Wherein the semantic attribute comparative learning embedding part starts from two layers of instance-level supervision and category-level supervision, and comparative learning is carried out on predicted semantic attributes of positive and negative samples and predicted semantic attributes of positive and negative categories. A Mean Teacher mechanism is introduced into the consistency constraint part, images enhanced by adopting different data are input to a student model and a teacher model, and then the models are enhanced and constrained by enabling output results of the student model and the teacher model to tend to be consistent. The prototype module is arranged in the student model and the teacher model, and converts visual features into predicted attribute scores through learning of attribute prototype vectors.

title: Research student literature resource recommendation method based on big data technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses a graduate student literature resource recommendation method based on a big data technology. The graduate student literature resource recommendation method comprises a similarity-based pre-recommendation method and a deep learning-based personalized recommendation method. A similarity-based pre-recommendation method is used for preliminarily measuring literatures interested by the user, generating a recommendation table for the user, and collecting user-project interaction information through user feedback; according to the personalized recommendation method based on deep learning, firstly, personalized user and project representation is generated, user-project interaction association is constructed by adopting a graph neural network, user-user and project-project global association is established by utilizing a learnable hypergraph network, and a tag optimization recommendation strategy is generated in combination with a pre-recommendation method. According to research student research study activity rules, a personalized recommendation strategy is introduced, and accurate literature resource recommendation taking research student personalized research study study demand driving as a center is realized by adopting a big data information technology.

title: MR deep learning-based school student psychological tutoring method and system
applicants: NANCHANG TELLHOW VIRTUAL REALITY TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a school student psychological guidance method and system based on MR deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the state data of a target student in a target time period through monitoring equipment preset at all parts of a campus, and carrying out the analysis of the state data, so as to at least obtain an expression feature set of the target student; according to the expression feature set, traversing and querying psychological tendency features corresponding to any frame of expression features in the expression feature set; according to the psychological tendency characteristics, traversing and querying psychological tutoring strategies corresponding to the psychological tendency characteristics, and determining a target tutoring strategy; sending a psychological tutoring interaction request to an intelligent terminal held by the target student according to the communication information reserved by the target student; and after the psychological tutoring interaction request is passed, controlling the intelligent terminal to load a psychological tutoring interaction interface to interact with the target student in the psychological tutoring interaction interface based on the target tutoring strategy so as to realize psychological tutoring of the target student.

title: High school student professional ability evaluation system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to an artificial intelligence-based high school student professional ability evaluation system, which comprises a user side unit and a service function unit, the user side unit comprises a teacher client side, a student client side and a manager client side; the service function unit comprises an answering module, a data mining module, a data entry module, a capability evaluation module, a comparison evaluation module and a school selection analysis module; the invention relates to an algorithm in the field of data mining of K-means, SimRank, Apriori and the like, and provides more humanized student service. Through student behavior big data analysis, the school can accurately grasp the dynamic state of the student, evaluate the behavior of the student, accurately judge the student according to the current state of the student, and make reasonable recommendation according to the judgment of the student.

title: KNOWLEDGE DISTILLATION METHOD AND APPARATUS, AND TERMINAL DEVICE AND MEDIUM
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: The present application is applicable to the technical field of artificial intelligence. Provided are a knowledge distillation method and apparatus, and a terminal device and a medium. The method comprises: instructing a student model and a converged teacher model to separately perform entity recognition on test samples in a sample set, so as to obtain predicted sequences and sequence probabilities; according to the predicted sequences and the sequence probabilities of the teacher model and the student model, performing parameter updating on the student model; and if the student model, which has been subjected to parameter updating, does not converge, returning to execute the step of instructing the student model and the converged teacher model to separately perform entity recognition on the test samples in the sample set, until the student model converges. By means of the present application, since the complexity of performing calculation on the basis of predicted sequences and sequence probabilities is relatively low, the speed of performing parameter updating on a student model on the basis of the predicted sequences and the sequence probabilities of a teacher model and the student model is relatively high, such that the knowledge distillation efficiency is improved. In addition, the present application further relates to blockchain technology.

title: Identification method, device and equipment and readable storage medium
applicants: ZHONGYIN FINANCE TECH SUZHOU CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a recognition method, device and equipment and a readable storage medium, and can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence or finance. Acquiring an identification data set of the to-be-identified student, wherein the identification data set comprises feature values of a plurality of target features in a preset identification time period; and inputting the identification data set of the to-be-identified student into a preset identification model to obtain an identification result output by the identification model. The identification model comprises a fusion model and a plurality of different types of judgment models, the judgment model is used for predicting based on the identification data set of the to-be-identified student to obtain a judgment result for indicating whether the to-be-identified student is an economically difficult student, and the fusion model is used for fusing the judgment results output by the judgment models to obtain an identification result. Therefore, by combining the judgment effects of different types of judgment models, the recognition result obtained through fusion is high in accuracy.

title: Feature distillation method and device for generative network, electronic equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of computer vision and deep learning, in particular to a feature distillation method and device for a generative network, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a plurality of feature maps in a target generative network; the image features are input to a preset extrusion module, and preset image features meeting preset transformation invariance are extruded from the image features; randomly sampling an image transformation operator from preset data augmentation, and performing feature distillation on preset image features by using the image transformation operator to obtain an image of the target generation network in the field of synthetic images; and inputting the target generation network into a preset student network, and inputting a real image to carry out self-supervised contrast learning, so that the distillation representation of the target generation network is expanded to the real image field, and feature distillation of the target generation network is realized. Therefore, the problems that the representation information of the value cannot be distilled from the generator of the GAN, the representation cannot be fully utilized or the representation cannot be migrated to a downstream task, and the performance of a representation extraction network is reduced are solved.

title: Content recommendation method based on AI
abstract_text: The invention relates to an AI-based content recommendation method. An information acquisition unit acquires basic information of a student and extracts historical score information of the student from a campus database according to the basic information; the central control unit records browsing footprints and retrieval footprints of the trainees after the trainees complete information browsing or retrieval so as to determine first browsing preferences of the trainees, and retrieves average scores of single subjects of the trainees in previous examinations so as to determine second browsing preferences of the trainees; the central control unit outputs a corresponding information extension link to the display unit according to the first browsing preference and the second browsing preference of the student, and the student clicks the corresponding information extension link on the display unit to obtain content containing corresponding information; by recording the browsing footprint and the retrieval footprint of the trainee and retrieving the total score of the trainee and the score ranking of each subject, it is effectively ensured that the trainee obtains accurate information, and the learning efficiency is further improved.

title: Cross-modal knowledge distillation method and device based on self-learning strategy and storage medium
applicants: ZHUHAI HONGSHENG NEW TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a cross-modal knowledge distillation method and device based on a self-learning strategy and a storage medium, and the method comprises the following steps: extracting modal data from source data, the modal data comprising video data and sound data, and extracting picture feature information and sound feature information in the modal data by using a convolutional neural network; training a teacher model and a student model according to the picture feature information and the sound feature information; outputting a soft target from the teacher model, and learning a student model from the soft target by using a convolutional neural network; and a soft target is adopted to guide the student model for optimization. A neural network self-learning optimization strategy is utilized, and features of different modal data are embedded into a student network of single-modal data, so that on one hand, the performance of the model during prediction can be improved, and on the other hand, a deep learning model can be efficiently operated on low-resource equipment.

title: Face quality evaluation model training method based on fusion knowledge distillation
abstract_text: The invention discloses a face quality evaluation model training method based on fusion knowledge distillation, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The data collection module obtains sample data and corresponding label information required by model training, the teacher model training module respectively trains teacher models of different quality types according to data with labels, and the knowledge fusion module carries out fusion labeling on all data sets according to the obtained five teacher models to obtain a final fusion quality score. The lightweight student network construction module constructs a student model and reduces the calculation overhead of a neural network, and the student model training module trains a lightweight neural network by fusing annotation information to obtain a final student model. According to the method, the accuracy of the face quality evaluation model is ensured, the calculation overhead of the model is greatly reduced, deployment on mobile terminals such as a mobile phone and an attendance machine is facilitated, and the application prospect is wide.

title: Self-adaptive brain glioma segmentation method based on semi-supervised deep learning
applicants: SHENZHEN INST OF ADV TECH CAS
abstract_text: The invention discloses a self-adaptive brain glioma segmentation method based on semi-supervised deep learning. The method comprises the following steps: constructing a deep learning model, wherein the deep learning model comprises a teacher network, a student network and a multi-layer perceptron; the deep learning model is trained based on a set loss function, the teacher network takes a complete multi-modal magnetic resonance image as an input image, the student network takes a modal-missing magnetic resonance image as an input image, and geometric structure priori learned by the teacher network is utilized to guide training of the student network, so that the multi-modal magnetic resonance image is obtained. The multi-layer perceptron is used for estimating the modal missing condition of the modal missing magnetic resonance image based on the features extracted by the student network; and performing brain glioma segmentation on the acquired target image by using the trained student network. According to the method, accurate and effective brain glioma segmentation can be realized, and the method is suitable for images under various modal missing conditions.

title: Examination room abnormal behavior analysis method and system based on deep learning, and terminal
applicants: SHANDONG SHANDA OUMA SOFTWARE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a deep learning-based examination room abnormal behavior analysis method and system and a terminal, and relates to the field of video behavior analysis, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining examination room monitoring video information, and carrying out the preprocessing of the examination room monitoring video information; constructing a convolutional neural network, and performing position detection on invigilators and examinees in the monitoring image; tracking invigilators and examinees in the monitoring image in real time; by using the constructed convolutional neural network, taking one branch behind the decoupling head to carry out behavior classification identification, and identifying two behaviors of sitting and standing; judging whether the individual is a student or not according to the identified behavior category and the standing duration and displacement condition of the individual under the continuous frames; and if the student stands, the system is triggered to give an early warning to prompt the abnormal behavior of the examinee. According to the invention, early warning is carried out on abnormal conditions occurring in the examination room, reviews are assisted to carry out judgment and decision making, and the efficiency and accuracy of abnormal analysis are improved.

title: Image labeling method and device and electronic equipment
abstract_text: The invention provides an image annotation method and device and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: respectively adopting a student model and a teacher model to carry out target detection on an unlabeled first image so as to obtain first detection information output by the student model and second detection information output by the teacher model; determining a target score of the first image according to the first detection information and the second detection information; determining a first target image from the first images according to the target scores of the first images; wherein the first target image is used for carrying out image annotation to obtain an annotated image, and the annotated image is used for updating the student model and the teacher model. Therefore, based on the active learning technology, the first target image with the relatively large target score is selected from a large number of unlabeled first images, and only the first target image is labeled, so that the number of images needing to be labeled for model training can be reduced, and the labeling cost is reduced.

title: Student employment prediction method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: ZHONGYIN FINANCE TECH SUZHOU CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a student employment prediction method and apparatus, an electronic device and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining to-be-processed data of employment prediction of a student; inputting the to-be-processed data into a trained prediction model to obtain an employment prediction result of the student; wherein the prediction model is obtained by taking student data samples in a school business system database as a training set and performing training based on the training set and a prediction label corresponding to the training set. According to the invention, the school data sample in the school business system database is combined with the machine learning algorithm to construct the prediction model, the trained prediction model can be used to predict the employment condition of the student, the employment condition of the student is confirmed in time, and the employment pressure of the student is reduced.

title: MODEL COMPRESSION METHOD AND SYSTEM, ELECTRONIC DEVICE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
abstract_text: Embodiments of the present application relate to the technical field of machine learning. Disclosed are a model compression method and system, an electronic device, and a storage medium. The model compression method comprises: providing N types of trained complex models; fusing the N types of complex models to obtain a trained teacher model; and training a student model on the basis of a training sample, the teacher model, and a loss function of the student model, wherein the loss function of the student model is obtained by fusing a first loss function with a second loss function; the first loss function is used for calculating the loss of a predicted value and a real value of the student model; the second loss function is used for calculating the loss of a logit value of the student model and a logit value of the teacher model. According to the technical solution provided in the embodiments of the present application, the prediction precision of the student model obtained by training can be improved.

title: AI intelligent English auxiliary learning method, system, device and medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to an AI intelligent English auxiliary learning method, system and device and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: when a test request instruction from a user terminal is received, calling an English word data packet from a word library based on the identity data of a student through analyzing the historical calling information of the user terminal in a preset word library, and storing the English word data packet in the word library; inputting the English word data packet into an interval output model; and the interval output model reads the English word data packet to obtain a plurality of word texts, and sends the word texts to the user terminal one by one according to a preset interval duration, so that the user terminal outputs corresponding audios according to the received word texts, obtaining text data in the textbox, and performing proofreading and scoring on the text data and the word text sent to the user terminal; and based on the score results corresponding to all the word texts, generating a test report and sending the test report to the user terminal. According to the invention, students can conveniently carry out English word dictation tests in after-class time, and the learning efficiency of English subjects is improved.

title: Training method of image processing model, and image processing method and device
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a training method of an image processing model and an image processing method and device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning, image processing and computer vision. According to the specific implementation scheme, a teacher model and a first feature vector are adopted to process a first sample image to obtain a first image feature corresponding to the first sample image; processing the original sample image by adopting a to-be-trained student model and the second feature vector to obtain a second image feature corresponding to the original sample image; wherein the first sample image is an image obtained by processing the original sample image by adopting a first parameter; determining a loss function according to the first image feature and the second image feature; and according to the loss function, adjusting at least one of the parameter, the first feature vector, the second feature vector and the first parameter of the to-be-trained student model, and determining an image processing model by using the adjusted data.

title: Development of SAT math learning tools using deep learning and big data
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a development of a national college entrance exam mathematic learning tool and relates to the development of an exclusive national college entrance exam mathematic learning tool for only an individual college entrance exam student through an entire process from goal setting, preparation and review, incorrect answer notes, and to lectures using deep learning and big data. Therefore, the present invention enables examinees to learn on their own.

title: Semantic segmentation model training method, semantic segmentation method and device
applicants: SHANGHAI GOLDWAY INTELLIGENT TRANSP SYSTEMS CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a training method of a semantic segmentation model, and a semantic segmentation method and device, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and is used for improving the accuracy of semantic segmentation. The training method specifically comprises the following steps: acquiring a first training sample set and a second training sample set; wherein the first training sample set comprises a plurality of samples and an image label manually marked for each sample; performing first amplification processing on the training samples in the first training sample set, and performing second amplification processing on the training samples in the second training sample set; wherein the amplification intensity of the second amplification treatment is higher than that of the first amplification treatment; inputting the second training sample set into a teacher model in the semantic segmentation model to obtain a second prediction result; wherein the second prediction result comprises a prediction label of each sample in the second training sample set; and training a student model in the semantic segmentation model according to the first training sample set, the second training sample set and the second prediction result.

title: Medical image segmentation method based on semi-supervised learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a semi-supervised learning medical image segmentation method. The method comprises the steps of 1, pre-training; the method comprises the following steps: pre-training a fine repair network for a first original medical image; obtaining a trained fine repair network; step 2 (fine tuning): combining an encoder in the trained fine repair network with a randomly initialized decoder to obtain a segmentation network; performing manual annotation on the second original medical image set to obtain a segmented data set; training the segmentation network by using the segmentation data set to obtain a trained segmentation network; 3, performing self-training by using the trained segmentation network as a teacher model to obtain a trained student model; and 4, inputting an image to be segmented into the trained student model to obtain a segmentation result. According to the method provided by the invention, the technical problem of low segmentation accuracy caused by insufficient annotation data for training the deep learning segmentation model is solved by utilizing a large amount of original data which is easy to obtain.

title: OMR METHOD FOR AUTOMATIC SCORING OMR ANSWER SHEET AND PROVIDING LEARNING MANAGEMENT SOLUTION THROUGH DEEP LEARNING IMAGE RECOGNITION AND SYSTEM THEREOF
abstract_text: Disclosed is a method for automatically scoring an OMR answer sheet and providing a learning management solution through deep learning image recognition which can resolve problems of a conventional scoring method of an OMR answer sheet. According to one embodiment of the present invention, the method for automatically scoring an OMR answer sheet and providing a learning management solution through deep learning image recognition comprises: a step in which a receiving part receives a photographed image of an OMR answer sheet from a plurality of student terminals; a step in which a recognition part detects the photographed image and recognizes a pattern to generate scoring information; a step in which a transmitting part transmits the scoring information to parent terminals and a teacher terminal along with the student terminals; a step in which the receiving part receives feedback information as evaluation for learning states of the students associated with the scoring information from the parent terminals and the teacher terminal; and a step in which an analysis part analyzes the scoring information and the feedback information to generate solution information for future learning management of the students.

title: Artificial Intelligence vulnerability diagnosis learning recommendation service system and method
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence vulnerability diagnosis learning recommendation service system and method, for providing a user with questions (problems) by level for each unit to solve, finding weak concepts based on incorrect answers to the questions and probability of correct answers for each question predicted by artificial intelligence, and informing the same to the user for the user to learn the weak concepts. The artificial intelligence vulnerability diagnosis learning recommendation service system according to the present invention comprises: a user terminal which inputs student information including a grade, answers to provided diagnostic questions, and then receives probability of correct answer for each question and weak knowledge concept information as a result; a database in which the diagnostic questions are stored as data by subject, unit of subject, and knowledge concept within the unit; and a learning recommendation server which leans diagnostic questions by subject, unit of subject, and knowledge concept within the unit, a student's answers thereto, and details of correct and incorrect answers through deep learning, creates a diagnostic recommendation model that predicts the probability of correct answer using Factorization Machine algorithm, provides diagnostic questions selected based on the student information entered from the user terminal, receives answers to the diagnostic questions, inputs the same into the diagnostic recommendation model, provides a correct answer for each question and weak knowledge concept information, calculates a predicted probability of answering questions within a range of a specific knowledge concept, and based thereon, recommending weak learning questions.

title: METHOD FOR AUTOMATIC SCORING OF SUBJECTIVE ANSWERS THROUGH DEEP LEARNING HANDWRITING RECOGNITION AND SYSTEM THEREOF
abstract_text: Disclosed are a method for automatically scoring subjective answers through deep learning handwriting recognition and a system thereof. According to one aspect of the present invention, the method for automatically scoring subjective answers through deep learning handwriting recognition comprises the steps of: receiving, by a receiving unit, a captured image of an OMR answer sheet from a plurality of student terminals; detecting and recognizing, by a recognition unit, the pattern of the captured image, but recognizing a text of a subjective answer; generating, by the recognition unit, scoring information according to a recognition result of the captured image; and transmitting, by a transmitting unit, scoring information to a parent terminal and a teacher terminal together with a student terminal.

title: LEARNING AMOUNT RECOMMENDATION METHOD AND APPARATUS USING DEEP LEARNING-BASED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE COMPOSED OF A PLURALITY OF HIDDEN LAYERS
abstract_text: Disclosed are a learning amount recommendation method using deep learning-based artificial intelligence composed of a plurality of hidden layers, and an apparatus using the same. The learning amount recommendation method using deep learning-based artificial intelligence composed of a plurality of hidden layers comprises: a learning data collection unit which collects a plurality of pieces of learning data from student terminals corresponding to a plurality of users; an academic achievement prediction unit which predicts an academic achievement type corresponding to a user of each of the student terminals by using the plurality of pieces of learning data; a learning amount table generation unit which generates a learning amount table by pre-processing the pieces of learning data according to the predicted academic achievement type; and a recommended learning amount determination unit which determines a recommended learning amount corresponding to a target user by referring to the learning amount table, and provides the determined recommended learning amount to a student terminal of the target user. The academic achievement prediction unit includes an artificial neural network engine which is subjected to supervised-training using training data composed of training input values corresponding to the learning data of each of the users and training output values labeled with the academic achievement types through a clustering engine, and predicts an academic achievement type corresponding to the target user, based on a deep learning network composed of a plurality of hidden layers. Therefore, the learning amount recommendation method can provide the students with the most efficient amount of learning and maximize learning effects.

title: TRAINING METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR OBJECT DETECTION MODEL, AND IMAGE DETECTION METHOD AND APPARATUS
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and specifically to the technical fields of computer vision and deep learning. Provided are a training method and apparatus for an object detection model, and an image detection method and apparatus, wherein same can be applied to fields such as autonomous driving and smart robots. The specific implementation solution involves: training a student detection model according to a difference position, between a distance map, which corresponds to a feature map output by a teacher detection model, of a training image and a distance map, which corresponds to a feature map output by the student detection model, of the training image, and the difference, between features in the corresponding feature maps, of the difference position. In this way, detection information mining for a teacher detection model can be further improved by means of a student detection model, and the detection precision of the student detection model is improved, such that a simple student detection model can achieve a similar detection precision to that of a complex teacher detection model, thereby reducing the occupied computing resources and deployment costs, and increasing the estimation speed.

title: Multi-model fusion knowledge distillation recommendation model
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multi-model fusion knowledge distillation recommendation model, which comprises an ensemble learning module and a student module, the ensemble learning module uses a full connection layer to carry out weighted voting on prediction results of a DeepFM model, a DIN model and an MMDIN model to obtain a final prediction result, the weighted voting weight is adaptively adjusted by adopting a gradient descent method, and the weight of the weighted voting is adjusted by adopting a gradient descent method. The student module adopts a shallow DIN structure, and uses a soft label to guide student model convergence. According to the method, a full-connection layer is added, the advantages of the three deep learning models, namely, DeepFM, DIN and MMDIN models are integrated, and the parameters of the full-connection layer are updated by using a gradient descent method. Parameters of the model are initialized, and a parameter change range is limited, so that the integrated model is converged faster and better and simulates a voting scene of each model.

title: Student tracking method and system for smart classroom
abstract_text: The invention discloses a smart classroom-oriented student tracking method and system. The method comprises the steps of obtaining classroom video information; based on the video information, obtaining a student position bounding box through a target detection method; constructing two Gaussian probability distribution functions based on the student position bounding box; based on the student position bounding box, comparing the area through an IOU comparison method; and based on the area comparison result, performing integration on the Gaussian probability distribution function, and judging whether the students belong to the same student or not. The position of each student in the image is detected through a target detection method, then a Gaussian probability distribution function is constructed based on the center coordinate and the width and height of the bounding box of each student, and then whether the two bounding boxes belong to the same student is judged by calculating an IOU value and the integral of the Gaussian probability function, so that the student positioning function is realized. By using the method of the invention, other deep learning algorithms are used in a combined manner, so that continuous recording and tracking of the class attending state of the student can be realized.

title: Lightweight model training method and device, image processing method and device and electronic equipment
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a lightweight model training method and device, an image processing method and device and electronic equipment. Relates to the technical field of computers, in particular to the technical fields of machine learning, computer vision, image processing and the like. According to the specific scheme, the method comprises the steps of obtaining a first augmented probability, a second augmented probability and a target weight adopted by the e-th round of iteration; performing data augmentation on the data set based on the first augmentation probability and the second augmentation probability to obtain a first data set and a second data set; obtaining a first output value of the student model and a second output value of the teacher model based on the first data set, and obtaining a third output value and a fourth output value based on the second data set; determining a distillation loss function; determining a truth value loss function; determining a target loss function; and training the student model based on the target loss function, and determining a first augmentation probability or a target weight which should be adopted by the (e + 1) th round of iteration under the condition that e is smaller than E. According to the invention, the training precision of the lightweight model can be improved.

title: KNOWLEDGE SHARING FOR MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEMS
abstract_text: A machine learning system includes a coach machine learning system that uses machine learning to help a student machine learning system learn its system. By monitoring the student learning system, the coach machine learning system can learn (through machine learning techniques) “hyperparameters” for the student learning system that control the machine learning process for the student learning system. The machine learning coach could also determine structural modifications for the student learning system architecture. The learning coach can also control data flow to the student learning system.

title: Weld joint quality real-time online evaluation method and device, storage medium and terminal
abstract_text: The invention provides a real-time online evaluation method and system for weld quality, a storage medium and a terminal. The method comprises the following steps: step 1, acquiring a real-time evaluation model for weld quality established based on a preset machine learning method; and 2, automatic motion control is conducted on the welding process through a welding control platform, a current welding image is collected through an image system, the current welding image is evaluated through the weld joint quality real-time evaluation model, and a weld joint quality evaluation result is generated. The weld pool image is rapidly processed and evaluated, real-time online evaluation of the weld joint quality is achieved, and a student observes the weld joint image and the weld joint quality information through a computer and remotely operates and adjusts welding parameters to obtain an optimal welding scheme. The learning effect is improved through instant feedback; the device is far away from a severe welding environment, remote operation is adopted, the difficulty of a beginner for hard light, high temperature, smoke dust and noise in the welding process is overcome, the working environment is improved, and the fear psychology of students is reduced.

title: Wafer flaw detection method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of wafer detection, and provides a wafer flaw detection method based on deep learning. A teacher network and a student network are obtained through improvement based on an existing YOLOv7 target detection algorithm, and the teacher network and the student network form a double-channel teacher-student network. The input image is trained through a teacher network to obtain a ubiquitous flaw area; ubiquitous flaw information obtained by the teacher network in the training process is migrated to the student network through distillation knowledge; performing student network training on the input image to obtain subdivided flaws in the ubiquitous flaw area; in the final test stage, only the trained student network is reserved, and whether the wafer is normal or not and the defect type of the wafer are obtained by inputting images. According to the method, the real-time performance of flaw subdivision can be ensured, the learning effect is ensured, and the subdivision flaw detection performance is improved.

title: Information processing device and program
abstract_text: [Problem] To further improve the accuracy of estimation using a student network. [Solution] Provided is an information processing device provided with an estimation unit that estimates an object category relating to an object contained in an input image by using a student network generated on the basis of a teacher network generated by performing machine learning using an image stored in a large-scale image database as learning data. The student network is generated by machine learning using a composite image as learning data, the composite image being obtained using the teacher network and an actual environment image, the actual environment image being acquired through a plurality of different modalities in an actual environment in which estimation is expected to be performed by the estimation unit.

title: Financial model knowledge distillation method and device based on reinforcement learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to a financial model knowledge distillation method and device based on reinforcement learning, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, carrying out the model design of an enterprise A and an enterprise B, and carrying out the pre-training distillation and initialization of a student model of the enterprise A; s2, building the student model after pre-training distillation and initialization in a server of an enterprise B, and performing distillation training again; and S3, reasoning prediction is carried out through the teacher reasoning model of the enterprise A, and data enhancement is carried out on the student model of the enterprise B through a reasoning result. According to the financial model knowledge distillation method and device based on reinforcement learning provided by the invention, a cross-mechanism joint modeling scheme is realized, the purpose of protecting data privacy is achieved by utilizing weak interpretability of a deep learning model in knowledge distillation, and meanwhile, the risk control strategy of a credit company is not revealed, so that the risk control strategy of the credit company is not revealed. High-quality and high-response-rate customer groups in a drainage institution meeting the requirements of a credit company are obtained, and the marketing customer obtaining cost is saved.

title: Compression method of generative adversarial network model based on retention factor pruning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a generative adversarial network model compression method based on retention factor pruning. The invention discloses a compression method for a generative adversarial network model, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: giving a pre-trained teacher generative adversarial network model and a to-be-compressed student adversarial network model, and enabling the pre-trained teacher generative adversarial network model to comprise a teacher generator and a teacher discriminator, the to-be-compressed student adversarial network model comprises a student generator and a student discriminator; setting a learnable retention factor for each convolution kernel of the student generator, and converting the retention factor into a proportion of the corresponding convolution kernel participating in forward operation according to the boundary parameter; by adding a constraint condition and a contraction boundary parameter to the retention factor, determining a convolution kernel which participates in forward operation and has a proportion of zero; removing the convolution kernel which participates in the forward operation and has the proportion of zero to obtain a light student generator; according to knowledge in the teacher generator and the teacher discriminator, performing fine tuning training on the student generator; and removing the student discriminator, retaining the student generator, and deploying the student adversarial network model.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR TWO-STEP HIERARCHICAL MODEL OPTIMIZATION
abstract_text: State of art approaches independently use a Pruning-weight Clustering-Quantization (PCQ) or Knowledge Distillation (KD) for model optimization and require critical manual intervention. Embodiments of the present disclosure provide a method and system for the two-step hierarchical model optimization approach for generating optimized model DL model. The method comprises a AutoPCQ technique followed by conditional application of an automated KD (AKD) technique. The AutoPCQ technique formulates a problem of configuration selection of the DL model as an optimization problem by iteratively applying Bayesian optimization and Reinforcement Learning. Further, the AKD technique formulates automated search of a student model as the optimization problem with the DL model representing a teacher model. A search space for the student model is defined by a restricted Neural Network Architecture Search that restricts the search space. The method automates the model optimization, in time efficient manner without compromising accuracy of the optimized model.

title: Student school entering management method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and particularly discloses a student school entry management method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the first feature information of a student to enter a school from first identity verification equipment; when the first feature information is matched with the identity information in the student database, sending a release instruction to the first identity verification device, so that the first identity verification device controls the gate of the entrance and exit to be opened; when the feature information of the student to enter the school is obtained from the second identity recognition device in the target classroom, generating feedback voice; performing analog-to-digital conversion processing on the feedback voice to obtain a first digital signal; compressing the first digital signal to obtain a second digital signal; performing channel coding processing on the second digital signal to obtain a third digital signal; and sending a third digital signal to the audio playing device, playing feedback voice through the audio playing device, and notifying a pick-up person who arrives at the student of the arrival condition of the arrival student.

title: Online AI intelligent exercise management method and detection system
applicants: HANGZHOU SHANDONG INFORMATION SERVICE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online AI intelligent exercise management method and a detection system. The online AI intelligent exercise management method comprises the steps that S101, a school sets exercise duration; s102, the student selects an AI exercise type; s103, checking the position of the portrait; s104, judging whether the portrait is completely recognized or not, if yes, entering S105, and if not, entering S103; s105, starting countdown; s106, continuously establishing a check portrait position; s107, judging whether the portrait is completely recognized or not, if so, entering S108, and if not, pausing countdown and returning to S106; 108, recognizing the action, adding 1 to the standard count of the action, and keeping the nonstandard count of the action unchanged; and S109, counting the completion times, selecting whether to finish normally, if not, returning to the step S102, and if so, uploading the exercise record. The school sets the exercise duration for the students, so that the students can record data through the mobile phone while doing indoor exercise.

title: SYSTEM AND/OR METHOD FOR MACHINE LEARNING USING STUDENT PREDICTION MODEL
abstract_text: Disclosed are a system, method and apparatus to generate service codes based, at least in part, on electronic documents.

title: LEARNING MOTOR PRIMITIVES AND TRAINING A MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEM USING A LINEAR-FEEDBACK-STABILIZED POLICY
abstract_text: A computer-implemented method of training a student machine learning system comprises receiving data indicating execution of an expert, determining one or more actions performed by the expert during the execution and a corresponding state-action Jacobian, and training the student machine learning system using a linear-feedback-stabilized policy. The linear-feedback-stabilized policy may be based on the state-action Jacobian. Also a neural network system for representing a space of probabilistic motor primitives, implemented by one or more computers. The neural network system comprises an encoder configured to generate latent variables based on a plurality of inputs, each input comprising a plurality of frames, and a decoder configured to generate an action based on one or more of the latent variables and a state.

title: TRAINING DISTILLED MACHINE LEARNING MODELS USING A PRE-TRAINED FEATURE EXTRACTOR
abstract_text: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on a computer storage medium, for training a student machine learning model using a teacher machine learning model that has a pre-trained feature extractor. In one aspect, a method includes obtaining data specifying the teacher machine learning model that is configured to perform a machine learning task; obtaining first training data; training the teacher machine learning model on the first training data to obtain a trained teacher machine learning model; generating second, automatically labeled training data by using the trained teacher machine learning model to process unlabeled training data; and training a student machine learning model to perform the machine learning task using at least the second, automatically labeled training data, wherein the student machine learning model does not include the pre-trained feature extractor and instead includes a different feature extractor having fewer parameters than the pre-trained feature extractor.

title: Student composition scoring method and device, computing equipment and storage medium
applicants: HUAYUN HEBEI XIONGAN BIG DATA TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of machine learning, in particular to a scoring method and device for student compositions, computing equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a target student composition; inputting the target student composition into a scoring model generated by pre-training to obtain a scoring result of the target student composition; wherein the scoring model is obtained by training virtual samples with different relevancy based on a plurality of composition topics and composition contents. According to the scheme, the scoring accuracy of the composition of the target student can be improved.

title: Lightweight service identification method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a lightweight service identification method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises data capturing and machine learning: capturing a traffic data packet generated by the equipment through a network capturing tool, carrying out the data preprocessing of the captured data packet into a regularized data format needed by a machine learning module, and carrying out the recognition of the data in the regularized data format. After being preprocessed, the grabbed original data packet is input into a machine learning module and compressed, output probability distribution of a large-scale teacher network is distilled through a knowledge distillation method, and the output probability distribution is transmitted to a small-scale student network for guidance and optimization so as to realize knowledge migration. Therefore, a service identification model with a small number of parameters is trained through a small-scale student network. On the premise of ensuring the recognition accuracy, a large-scale teacher network service recognition model is compressed to meet the requirement of deploying a service recognition lightweight system in a resource-limited scene.

title: Student online network class learning behavior identification method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student online learning behavior identification method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the following steps: a student logs in a student learning account, selects a learning course, obtains the type of the course selected by the student for learning, collects the face information of the student if the course is a live course, and stores the face information of the student; identifying identity information of the student according to the collected face information of the student in the learning process, after verification is passed, collecting learning behavior information of the student in the learning process, obtaining the non-careful degree of the student according to the learning behavior information of the student, rearranging the initial sequence according to the non-careful degree from large to small to obtain a rearranged sequence, and storing the rearranged sequence in a database; sending the rearrangement sequence to the teacher account; if the curriculum is the recorded broadcast curriculum, behavior information of the student learning the recorded broadcast curriculum is obtained, features of the watched recorded broadcast curriculum are obtained according to the behavior information of the student learning the recorded broadcast curriculum, and the obtained features of the recorded broadcast curriculum are sent to the corresponding teacher account. The system is convenient for teachers to find and correct problems of students in time.

title: Interactive knowledge tracking method based on graph neural network
applicants: SHANGHAI BOYU EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
