abstract_text: The invention discloses an interactive knowledge tracking method based on a graph network, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the following steps: constructing a relation graph of questions and knowledge points, and for the questions and knowledge points at each moment in a student learning sequence, aggregating the high-order neighbor features of the questions and knowledge points by using a graph neural network, and extracting features of the represented historical learning sequence by using a long short-term memory network so as to obtain the low-latitude vector representation of the knowledge mastering state of the student at the current moment. Historical information related to a to-be-predicted question is selected through an attention mechanism, and interaction is carried out on the historical information to obtain a prediction reply probability of a target question. According to the method, the accuracy of knowledge tracking prediction can be effectively improved, and the feasibility of adaptive learning is enhanced.

title: Experiment step scoring method, device and equipment and readable storage medium
applicants: CHENGDU XIJIAO ZHIHUI BIG DATA TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an experiment step scoring method, device and equipment and a readable storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining experiment video information and reference experiment video information; preprocessing the experiment video information to obtain first information; the experiment video information is sent to the three-dimensional convolutional neural network model to obtain a first feature vector, and the reference experiment video information is sent to the three-dimensional convolutional neural network model to obtain a second feature vector; according to the method, the experimental video information and the reference experimental video information are preprocessed, and then the spatial-temporal feature vectors of the experimental video information and the reference experimental video information are extracted through the three-dimensional convolutional neural network model, so that the spatial-temporal feature vectors of the experimental video information and the reference experimental video information are extracted; by judging the similarity of the two spatio-temporal feature vectors, automatic identification of student experiment steps is realized, whether the experiment steps are correct or not is judged, and automatic scoring is performed, so that the labor cost is greatly reduced.

title: Training machine learning model of distillation using pre-trained feature extractor
abstract_text: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on a computer storage medium, for training student machine learning models using teacher machine learning models with pre-trained feature extractors are disclosed. In one aspect, a method includes obtaining data specifying a teacher machine learning model configured to perform a machine learning task; obtaining first training data; training a teacher machine learning model on the first training data to obtain a trained teacher machine learning model; generating second automatically tagged training data by processing the untagged training data using the trained teacher machine learning model; and training a student machine learning model to perform the machine learning task using at least the second automatically tagged training data, where the student machine learning model does not include the pre-trained feature extractor, but includes a different feature extractor having fewer parameters than the pre-trained feature extractor.

title: Optimization method suitable for classification task deep learning network
abstract_text: The invention designs an optimization method suitable for a classification task deep learning network. According to an existing deep network optimization method, a large network is mainly used as a teacher network to migrate knowledge to a student network. However, the Soft target is teacher network Softmax output, the Hard target is a data set label, and the method is not suitable for a distributed student network. According to the method, a basic framework of Teacher-Student knowledge distillation is reserved, but a Soft target is changed into a final convolutional layer feature output of a Teacher network, the influence degree of feature points on a final result is comprehensively evaluated and screened according to intra-class and inter-class fluctuations, then feature point sampling is performed according to distributed network composition, and finally, the spatial fluctuations of Teacher-Student are reckoned into a loss function, so that the final result is obtained. And overall training of the network is carried out. According to the invention, the deep learning model can be deployed to the embedded terminal in a distributed manner, and a foundation is laid for the landing of deep learning.

title: AI AI-BASED UNIVERSITY STUDENT DB ANALYSIS INTEGRATED MANAGEMENT AND PERFORMANCE DIFFUSION SYSTEM
abstract_text: An AI-based university student analysis and management support system is disclosed. A student analysis and management support method performed by the student analysis and management support system may comprise the following steps of: collecting data including admission information related to academic matters, life information including grades, and counseling information including counseling details; analyzing student information including the academic matters and reasons of a student from the collected data by using artificial intelligence; and recommending necessary counseling content for the analyzed student information.

title: KNOWLEDGE DISTILLATION AND GRADIENT PRUNING-BASED COMPRESSION OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED BASE CALLER
abstract_text: The technology disclosed compresses a larger, teacher base caller into a smaller, student base caller. The student base caller has fewer processing modules and parameters than the teacher base caller. The teacher base caller is trained using hard labels (e.g., one-hot encodings). The trained teacher base caller is used to generate soft labels as output probabilities during the inference phase. The soft labels are used to train the student base caller.

title: Topic recommendation method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a question recommendation method, device and equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a test paper image uploaded by a student terminal, and recognizing wrong questions in the test paper image; determining error question information of all the error questions, and generating an error question portrait of a user corresponding to the student side according to the error question information; inputting the wrong question portrait and a preset question bank into a preset question recommendation model to obtain a question recommendation result of the student side; and packaging the wrong questions and the corresponding question recommendation results, and pushing the packaged wrong questions and the corresponding question recommendation results to corresponding student sides. According to the method, the wrong questions in the test paper uploaded by the student terminal are obtained by identifying the test paper, and the questions of the related knowledge points are recommended according to the wrong questions, so that targeted practice for the corresponding student is realized, the learning efficiency is improved, and the learning effect is consolidated.

title: Optical remote sensing target detection lightweight method based on knowledge distillation network
applicants: PLA STRATEGIC SUPPORT FORCE AEROSPACE ENGINEERING UNIV
abstract_text: The invention provides an optical remote sensing target detection lightweight method based on a knowledge distillation network, and the method employs a model compression method of knowledge distillation, reduces the network size, and generates a lightweight student network which accords with on-satellite load deployment and is used for target detection, i.e., on the basis of a general deep learning framework, the method achieves the lightweight detection of an optical remote sensing target. According to a satellite-borne GPU with limited computing resources, a reasonable lightweight network structure is designed, so that the model keeps high detection accuracy, rapid, accurate and flexible remote sensing image target detection is realized, in-orbit real-time computing of a key frame remote sensing image is realized, and the method can be applied to a satellite-borne GPU platform with limited computing resources.

title: College student psychological health assessment system based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention provides a college student psychological health assessment system based on deep learning. The system comprises the following steps: collecting and preprocessing psychological health data; fusing multi-source heterogeneous data; key feature extraction and dimension reduction; the college student psychological health data assessment and the college student psychological health condition prediction can help colleges to timely master the college student psychological health condition, facilitate early intervention and early treatment of college student psychological health diseases, and ensure the college student physical and psychological health and comprehensive development.

title: ENVIRONMENT-SPECIFIC TRAINING OF MACHINE LEARNING MODELS
abstract_text: A method for environment-specific training of a machine learning model, comprises receiving, for a local environment, a data stream including a plurality of sequential data snippets. Programmed labels are generated for each data snippet using a student version of a machine learning model. A portion of data snippets and associated programmed labels are selected and uploaded to a server-side computing device for evaluation by a teacher version of the machine learning model. An environment-specific training update is received from the server-side computing device. This training update is based on a comparison of the selected programmed labels and pseudolabels generated for the selected portion of data snippets by the teacher version. The environment-specific training update is applied to the student version to generate an updated student version. The updated student version of the machine learning model is then used to generate programmed labels for newly received data snippets.

title: SchooliT
abstract_text: Disclosed is an artificial intelligence (AI) based system to monitor a plurality of activities of a student over a network. The artificial intelligence (AI) based system includes a memory and a processor. The memory stores machine-readable instructions pertaining to monitoring the activities of the student. The processor is coupled to the memory and operable to execute the machine-readable instructions stored in the memory. The processor is configured to capture the activity data of the student in real-time through a capture module. The processor is configured to analyze the activity data received from the capture module to assign a quantitative value corresponding to each of the activity data through an analysis module. The processor is configured to transmit the activity data analyzed by the analysis module to a computing device through a transmission module. The processor is configured to present the activity data through the computing device.

title: DECENTRALIZED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI)/MACHINE LEARNING TRAINING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A decentralized training platform is described for training an Artificial Intelligence (AI) model where training data (e.g., medical images) is distributed across multiple sites (nodes) and due to confidentiality, legal, or other reasons the data at each site is unable to be shared or leave the site and so cannot be copied to a central location for training. The method comprises training a teacher model locally at each node and then moving each of the teacher models to a central node and using these to train a student model using a transfer dataset. This may be facilitated by setting up the cloud service using inter-region peering connections between the nodes to make the nodes appear as a single cluster. In one variation the student module may be trained at each node using the multiple trained teacher models. In another variation we train multiple student models where each student model is trained by each teacher model at the node the teacher model was trained on, and once the plurality of student models are trained, an ensemble model is generated from the plurality of trained student models. Loss function weighting and node under sampling to enable load balancing may be used to improve accuracy and time/cost efficiency.

title: Teacher-student interaction information interaction system based on machine learning
applicants: NANJING QIANLU YOUGUANG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teacher-student interaction information interaction system based on machine learning, which comprises a computing node, an input node and an operation terminal, and is characterized in that the computing node comprises a machine learning end, an application end and at least one group of databases, the operation terminal is used for sending interaction information, and an interaction module is used for receiving the interaction information and sending the interaction information to the input node. The machine learning end is used for receiving the packaging information and transmitting the interaction information to the pre-processing module in a classified mode, the pre-processing module is used for receiving the interaction information, and the machine learning end is used for receiving the packaging information and calculating a training database based on data of the packaging information, so that parameter values of the database are updated. The system has the effects of real-time interaction and real-time feedback, intelligent training is conducted on teacher-student interaction feedback through machine learning, and therefore the system can automatically simulate feedback, the situation that teachers cannot interact in time is avoided, all teachers and students adopt unified terminal equipment, and standardization is formed.

title: Semi-supervised target detection model training method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a semi-supervised target detection model training method and device, equipment, a storage medium and a program product, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical fields of image processing, computer vision, deep learning and the like, and particularly to scenes of smart cities, intelligent traffic and the like. A specific implementation mode of the method comprises the following steps: respectively performing supervised training on a first teacher model and a first student model by utilizing a labeled sample image to obtain a second teacher model and a second student model; predicting the unlabeled sample image by using a second teacher model to obtain a candidate box set; performing disturbance robustness filtering on the candidate frame set to obtain a target frame set; and training the second student model by taking the target frame set as a pseudo tag to obtain a third student model. According to the embodiment, noise pseudo labels can be prevented from being introduced, the quality of the pseudo labels is improved, and the effect of a student model is improved.

title: Training sample generation method and device, equipment, storage medium and program product
abstract_text: The invention provides a training sample generation method and device, equipment, a storage medium and a program product, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a computer vision and deep learning technology, and can be applied to scenes such as intelligent traffic and intelligent parking. A specific embodiment of the method comprises the steps of obtaining a to-be-recognized image, and inputting the to-be-recognized image into a teacher network and a student network respectively to obtain a first recognition result and a second recognition result; determining whether the first identification result is matched with the second identification result; in response to determining that the first recognition result is not matched with the second recognition result, labeling an image region, in which the first recognition result is not matched with the second recognition result, in the to-be-recognized image as a pre-labeling result; and generating a correct recognition result of the to-be-recognized image by using the pre-labeling result, and determining the to-be-recognized image and the generated correct recognition result as training samples of the teacher network and the student network. According to the embodiment, the image annotation cost can be saved.

title: Model compression method and system, electronic equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of machine learning, and discloses a model compression method and system, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The model compression method comprises the following steps: providing N types of trained complex models; fusing the N types of complex models to obtain a trained teacher model; training the student model based on the training sample, the teacher model and the loss function of the student model; the loss function of the student model is obtained by fusing a first loss function and a second loss function, the first loss function is used for calculating the loss of the predicted value and the true value of the student model, and the second loss function is used for calculating the loss of the logit value of the student model and the logit value of the teacher model. According to the technical scheme provided by the embodiment of the invention, the prediction precision of the student model obtained by training can be improved.

title: AI AI Method and Device for providing AI study plan
abstract_text: As a preferred embodiment of the present invention, an AI learning device includes: a learning information analysis unit which analyzes learning information of a student using a learning application; a comprehension determination unit which determines the comprehension of the student based on the student's answers to learning questions corresponding to the content provided by the learning application for a predetermined period of time using the learning application; and a learning plan revision unit which revises a learning plan of the student after the predetermined period based on the learning information and the comprehension.

title: Language model training method and device and electronic equipment
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a language model training method and device and electronic equipment, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of natural language processing. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the following steps: pre-training a teacher language model based on a first label-free training sample to obtain a pre-trained teacher language model; performing multi-task training on the pre-trained teacher language model based on the first labeled multi-task data to obtain a target teacher language model; based on the second label-free training sample, performing knowledge distillation on the student language model by using the target teacher language model to obtain a trained student language model; and training the trained student language model based on the labeled downstream task data to obtain a target language model. According to the scheme, the trained student language model has high universality and generalization, and the training efficiency of the target language model can be improved.

title: Method, apparatus and medium for providing integrated teacher-student system
abstract_text: Methods, apparatus, and processor-readable media for integrating a teacher-student machine learning system are provided. One or more teacher-student modules are trained as part of teacher neural network training. Each student subnet generates an intermediate feature map using a portion of the teacher neural network, and then provides the intermediate feature map to a student subnet to generate an inference. The student subnet may map the intermediate feature to a subsequent feature map using a feature enhancement block. In some embodiments, a compression block may be used to compress intermediate feature map data for transmission.

title: AI LEARNING DEVICE AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING AI LEARNING PLAN
abstract_text: As a preferred embodiment of the present invention, an AI learning device comprises: a learning information analysis unit for analyzing learning information of a student by using a learning application; a comprehensibility determination unit for determining comprehensibility of the student by using the learning application on the basis of the student's answer to a learning question corresponding to contents provided by the learning application for a preconfigured period; and a learning plan modification unit for modifying a learning plan of the student after the preconfigured period on the basis of the learning information and the comprehensibility.

title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR PREDICTING CONVERSION TO FULL MEMBERSHIP
abstract_text: According to one exemplary embodiment of the present invention, an apparatus for predicting conversion to full membership comprises: a machine learning unit, which uses a data set constructed for each trial experience date for a free trial experience period of a learning application to perform parallel or sequence-based machine learning using a plurality of decision trees, and thus predict a conversion probability value; a priority determination unit for determining, according to the conversion probability value, the priority of a student for whom consultation is to be performed; and a consultation unit, which changes a consultation scheme according to the priority of the student to improve the possibility of converting the use of the learning application to a paid service.

title: Student psychological crisis early warning system based on multi-modal data
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of psychological health monitoring, in particular to a student psychological crisis early warning system based on multi-modal data, and the system comprises a daily abnormal behavior monitoring module which is used for achieving the monitoring of daily abnormal behaviors of students through cameras disposed in a campus and a classroom; the data acquisition terminal is used for realizing acquisition of multi-modal data and comprises a scene simulation test module, a questionnaire module, a physiological parameter monitoring module and a personal behavior monitoring module; the data processing terminal is used for screening users with psychological problems based on artificial intelligence according to the collected multi-modal data, and grading and classifying the users; and the crisis early warning module is used for giving corresponding crisis early warning according to the grading and classification result of the data processing terminal. According to the invention, comprehensive screening of psychological states of students can be realized, students with psychological problems can be found in time, and guarantee is provided for psychological health of the students.

title: Integrated evaluation system for educational training based on integral system
applicants: GUANGZHOU KAIYUAN SOFTWARE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a comprehensive evaluation system for educational training based on an integral system. The comprehensive evaluation system comprises a registration and login module, a student service module, a teacher service module, a server, a controller, an integral terminal and a client module, according to the method, a discrete operation is carried out on the database access amount and the database operation amount at different time periods of a day to respectively obtain the standard deviation of the database access amount and the database operation amount; the integral data are compared with the actual database access amount and the actual database operation amount in each time period to be obtained to store the integral data in different directions, so that a user can check the data more quickly and efficiently, and meanwhile, the data can be changed more quickly; according to the method, the short-term estimation of the points is realized in an artificial intelligence mode, the increment of the user is calculated by acquiring the current point number of the student and the point number of the previous time period, and the increment is continuously and accurately calculated by utilizing a formula, so that the short-term estimation of the points is continuously and accurately realized.

title: Student access control method and system
applicants: ZHEJIANG SPORTS HOME SPORTS DEV CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a student access control method and system, and relates to the technical field of access control, and the method comprises the steps: collecting an image of a person at an exit to obtain a first image; performing target detection on the first image, and judging whether the first image contains a face image or not; if yes, whether the face image is one of a preset face image library is judged through a trained first deep learning model; if yes, obtaining identity information corresponding to the face image through a first deep learning model; judging whether the personnel at the exit are student users or not according to the identity information; if yes, judging whether the current moment is in a preset passing time period or not; if not, judging whether a false strip image is collected within a preset time length; if the false strip image is acquired, an opening instruction is sent to the gate according to the false strip image; the opening instruction is used for controlling gate wings of the gate to be opened. The method has an effect of facilitating management and control of the situation that the students enter and exit the campus.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR DOMAIN-SPECIFIC ENHANCEMENT OF REAL-TIME MODELS THROUGH EDGE-BASED LEARNING
abstract_text: Techniques described herein provide for the use of a heterogeneous artificial intelligence/machine learning (“AI/ML”) architecture, in which relatively complex AI/ML, techniques may be used in conjunction with more lightweight AI/ML techniques in order to leverage the accuracy of relatively complex AI/ML techniques with the reduced processing power and/or time requirements of more lightweight AI/ML techniques. A teacher model system may utilize processing resource and/or time-intensive AI/ML techniques and/or models in order to determine classifications associated with source data, and may provide such classifications to a student model system that may utilize the classifications in accordance with less processing resource and/or time-intensive AI/ML techniques in order to accurately classify sensor data in real time or near-real time.

title: Method for Improving Service Outcomes Using Artificial Intelligence Techniques
abstract_text: This document presents a system and method of applying machine learning and deep learning techniques to improve service outcomes by allowing for a novel method of matching service providers with clients. This system and method involves collecting data on the expressed and latent preferences and attributes of both a service provider and a client as well as outcome data regarding outcome improvement and the quality of the match. By using a deep learning approach to analyze this data and identify latent variables and non-linear relationships, this system is able to predict which pairing of service providers and clients will most likely lead to the desired outcomes. This system and method can be applied to any professional relationship where personality factors and relationship compatibility are predictive of desired outcomes. These include but are not limited to clinician-patient, educator-student, professional-client and salesperson-customer relationships.

title: Short video automatic generation method and system based on artificial intelligence, and storage medium
applicants: CHENGDU TOM JIABEIHAO CULTURAL COMMUNICATION CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a short video automatic generation method and system based on artificial intelligence, and a storage medium. The short video automatic generation method based on artificial intelligence comprises the following steps: uploading a current corresponding training video and a training theme in a martial art venue to a video processing platform; performing preliminary analysis and deep analysis on the uploaded training video; performing selection analysis on each training image corresponding to each training link of each trainee; constructing insertion materials corresponding to the trainees in the training links; generating a student training display short video, and feeding back the student training display short video to the martial arts venue coach for correction and confirmation; according to the method, the problem that a current short video automatic generation method has certain limitation is effectively solved, the value of training and displaying the display content of the short video is highlighted, potential features in the displayed short video are effectively mined, the generation effect of the short video is improved, and a reliable direction is provided for mobilizing a martial art venue training plan.

title: Image processing model training method and device, image processing method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an image processing model training method and device, an image processing method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning, image processing and computer vision. The image processing model training method comprises the following steps: converting a first image feature output by a teacher model into first probability distribution; converting a second image feature output by the student model into second probability distribution; constructing a loss function based on prior probability distribution of the student model, the first probability distribution and the second probability distribution; and adjusting model parameters of the student model based on the loss function. The precision of the trained student model can be improved.

title: AI A Station for AI-Based Personalized Learning Analytics System
abstract_text: Disclosed is a station for an AI-based personalized learning data analysis system, which can improve learning efficiency and manage student learning. According to one aspect of an embodiment of the present invention, an educational station providing a space for a plurality of students to sit and learn comprises: an input unit which receives lecture-related data or discussion data from the outside; display units which output the input data; a mounting unit which supports each of the display units; and an ascending and descending unit which ascends and descends the display units.

title: AI based talent career recognition academic management and talent donation bank service system
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence-based talent and work experience-recognizing academic affairs management and talent donation banking service system. The artificial intelligence-based talent and work experience-recognizing academic affairs management and talent donation banking service system according to the present invention comprises: a user terminal which transmits talent-related data of a student; an associated organization server which provides responses to talent-related matters of the student; a certification organization server which provides responses to work experience-related matters of the student; an artificial intelligence server which provides determination results on the talent-related matters and the career-related matters; a talent career recognition academic affairs management server which receives the talent-related data of the student, assesses the talent-related matters and the career-related matters through the artificial intelligence server, and gives credits corresponding to an assessment result score; and a talent donation banking service server which evaluates the value of the degree of the student through the artificial intelligence server, and manages the student as a talent donor. According to the present invention, human resources can be more effectively utilized.

title: ELECTRONIC APPARATUS FOR DESIGNING LEARNING PROCESS BASED ON COMPARATIVE EVALUATION BETWEEN STUDENT AND ARTIFICIAL INTELIGENCE MODEL AND LEARNING MANAGEMENT METHOD
abstract_text: A learning management method of an electronic device is disclosed. The learning management method may include the steps of: identifying the problem-solving ability of a user based on the answers of the user to a plurality of problems; generating at least one artificial intelligence model matching the identified problem-solving ability; entering at least one problem into the artificial intelligence model and obtaining an answer of the artificial intelligence model for the input problem; and providing evaluation information on the obtained answer of the artificial intelligence model.

title: ELECTRONIC APPARATUS FOR MANAGING LEARNING OF STUDENT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND LEARNING MANAGEMENT METHOD
abstract_text: A learning management method of an electronic device is disclosed. The learning management method may include the steps of: identifying the user's problem-solving ability based on the user's answers to a plurality of problems; generating at least one artificial intelligence model matching the identified problem-solving ability; entering at least one problem into the artificial intelligence model and obtaining an answer of the artificial intelligence model for the input problem; and providing evaluation information on the obtained answer of the artificial intelligence model.

title: Intelligent skin lesion identification method based on deep Bayesian distillation network
abstract_text: According to the skin lesion intelligent identification method based on the deep Bayesian distillation network, when the multi-scale network is constructed, the deep Bayesian distillation network is constructed based on Bayesian deep learning, the accidental uncertainty and cognitive uncertainty of the model are quantified, and the accuracy of skin lesion identification is improved. Through multiple times of sampling, distribution and fitting of a training data model, more accurate modeling is carried out on uncertainty, and the influence of uncertainty on a result is reduced. Furthermore, knowledge distillation is introduced to compress the model, a student network model is constructed to fit the output of the teacher network, and parameters and true value labels of the teacher network are used to train the student network, so that the parameter quantity and time of the model are optimized, and the scale and waiting time of the model are reduced. According to the method, the recognition accuracy is remarkably improved, and meanwhile, the model parameter quantity and the operation time are reduced under the condition that the model accuracy is slightly influenced.

title: Three-dimensional target detection model training method and device
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a training method and device for a three-dimensional target detection model, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of image processing, deep learning and computer vision, and particularly relates to scenes such as 3D vision, virtual reality and automatic driving. The method specifically comprises the steps that point clouds are input into a teacher model and a student model for three-dimensional feature extraction, three-dimensional features output from the teacher model serve as three-dimensional feature true values, three-dimensional features output from the student model serve as three-dimensional feature predicted values, and the teacher model and the student model are three-dimensional target detection models; determining a distillation loss between the three-dimensional feature predicted value and the three-dimensional feature true value, and taking the distillation loss as a first distillation loss; and training a student model based on the first distillation loss to obtain a trained student model. According to the invention, a new training method for the three-dimensional target detection model can be provided, and the detection precision of the model can be improved.

title: Artificial intelligence system for student physical test
applicants: JIANGSU FENGHUANG SMART EDUCATION RES INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of student physical test, and discloses an artificial intelligence system for student physical test, which comprises a test module, an intelligent data collection and analysis module, a system server, an identification module and a self-service query module, the testing module comprises a standing long jump testing area, a pull-up testing area, a sitting body forward bending testing area, a sit-up testing area, a vital capacity testing area, a height and weight testing area and a 50M running testing area. According to the invention, the manpower consumption in the physique testing process is greatly saved, the credibility and efficiency in the testing data collection and circulation process are greatly improved, the original concentrated large-scale testing is changed into fragmented testing, more flexible time selection is provided for subjects, the degree of freedom of testing is improved, meanwhile, personnel gathering is effectively avoided, and the testing efficiency is improved. And test personnel can trace and record all process videos of each test, and the traceability of a detection result is improved.

title: Knowledge distillation and gradient pruning based compression of artificial intelligence based base detector
abstract_text: The disclosed technology compresses a larger teacher base detector into a smaller student base detector. The student base detector has fewer processing modules and parameters than the teacher base detector. The teacher base detector is trained using a hard tag (e.g., one-hot coding). A trained teacher base detector is used to generate soft tags as output probabilities during the inference phase. The soft label is used for training a student base detector.

title: Semi-supervised target detection method based on teach-student model
applicants: BEIJING JINGHANG COMPUTING COMMUNICATION RES INST
abstract_text: The invention provides a semi-supervised target detection method based on a teach-student model. Comprising the following steps: acquiring a semi-supervised target detection data set D; on the labeled data set DL, according to a fully supervised target detection method, obtaining a teach model by using the label of the model prediction sample; using a teach model to predict the unlabeled data XU, generating a pseudo label, and using the pseudo label to update the labeling set YU; performing data enhancement on the unlabeled sample set XU; 5, training a student model; the weight parameter theta s of the student model is updated to the weight theta t of the teach model in an exponential moving average mode; and performing several rounds of iteration, and taking a final teach model as a target model trained by the semi-supervised target detection method based on the teach-student model.

title: Image classification method and device capable of switching online knowledge distillation and storable medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses an image classification method and device capable of switching online knowledge distillation and a storable medium, and relates to the technical field of machine learning, and the method comprises the following steps: obtaining a to-be-processed image; constructing a teacher network and a student network, and determining a distillation gap between the teacher network and the student network; determining a self-adaptive switching threshold value of the distillation gap, and realizing interactive learning switching between the teacher network and the student network by using the self-adaptive switching threshold value to realize compression of the student network; classifying the to-be-processed image by using the processed student network; the obtained compressed student model has the advantages of being high in image recognition accuracy, small in storage space, high in recognition speed and the like.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR KNOWLEDGE-PRESERVING NEURAL NETWORK PRUNING
abstract_text: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on computer storage media, for knowledge-preserving sparse pruning on neural networks are described. An exemplary method includes obtaining a pre-trained machine learning model trained based on a plurality of general-purpose training data; training a task-specific machine learning model by tuning the pre-trained machine learning model based on a plurality of task-specific training data corresponding to a task; constructing a student network based on the task-specific machine learning model; simultaneously performing (1) knowledge distillation from the trained task-specific machine learning model as a teacher network to the student network and (2) network pruning on the student network; and obtaining the trained student network for serving the task.

title: Model training method, data processing method, equipment and computer medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a model training method, a data processing method, equipment and a computer medium, which can be applied to various scenes such as financial risk control and artificial intelligence. The model training method comprises the steps of obtaining a first sample set; obtaining an auxiliary model, a plurality of reference models and a plurality of pieces of unmarked sample feature information; training the initial meta-teacher model based on the first sample set, the auxiliary model and the plurality of reference models to obtain a target meta-teacher model; determining a plurality of sample evaluation index marks corresponding to the plurality of pieces of unmarked sample feature information by using the plurality of pieces of unmarked sample feature information, the plurality of reference models and the target meta-teacher model; and according to the multiple pieces of unmarked sample feature information and the multiple pieces of sample evaluation index marks, training the initial student model to obtain a corresponding target student model. According to the target student model trained by the model training method provided by the invention, risk control capabilities of a plurality of reference models can be fused, and the risk control accuracy is improved.

title: Plant classification identification method, device and equipment based on deep learning and vector retrieval, and storage medium
applicants: GUANGZHOU LIFANG GARDEN ECOLOGICAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a plant classification and identification method and device based on deep learning and vector retrieval, equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps that a plant image is acquired, classification is performed according to plant category names, and a plant main body range in the image is labeled; carrying out plant main body extraction by adopting an improved PP-PicoDet model; inputting the plant main body image into a preset student network model for feature extraction; based on a preset plant image vector feature index database, performing comparison retrieval on the plant image vector features and plant image vector features stored in a file of the plant image vector feature index database to obtain an index code which corresponds to the feature with the highest vector similarity and is stored in the plant image vector feature index database, and finding a corresponding plant type name in the plant image vector feature index database based on the index code. The method has the advantages that the time for training the model is shortened, and the training and reasoning speed of the plant-based image recognition and classification model is increased.

title: Intelligent terminal for action recognition and time statistics
abstract_text: The invention relates to an intelligent terminal for action recognition and time statistics. The intelligent terminal is mainly used for intelligent statistics of the home learning process of students. The microprocessor Internet of Things module with the artificial intelligence capability is matched with the peripheral camera, the pickup circuit, the loudspeaker and the display screen, so that the capabilities of keyword recognition, voice conversation and action recognition are achieved. According to the invention, the artificial intelligence capability is utilized to realize task timing statistics of the student home learning process, and classification identification and time distribution statistics of different actions in each task process. Therefore, the students can observe the time distribution of various activities by themselves and evaluate the home learning efficiency by themselves.

title: DEVICE AND METHOD FOR DETERMINING EVALUATION INFORMATION IN SCHOOL RECORD
abstract_text: A device for determining evaluation information in a student record may include: an information collection unit collecting information on a school desired to be entered and information on a department desired to be applied by a student who prepares an entrance examination; a learning data generation unit generating artificial intelligence learning data corresponding to the information on the school desired to be entered and the information on the department desired to be applied based on a plurality of student records; a model generation unit generating a score measurement model from the artificial intelligence learning data by using at least one artificial intelligence learning algorithm; and a prediction unit determining evaluation information of the student record of the student input by using the score measurement model.

title: - METHOD APPARATUS AND COMPUTER-READABLE RECORDING MEDIUM FOR REGISTERING QUSETION INFORMATION FOR PROVIDING CUSTOMIZED QUSETION TO STUDENTS
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a method for registering question information for providing customized questions to students, which is implemented by a computing device including one or more processors and one or more memories for storing instructions executable by the processors. The method comprises: an information receiving step of receiving a plurality of pieces of question information from a manager account to register the plurality of pieces of question information in a question database; a question registration step of identifying a question corresponding to each of the plurality of pieces of question information when the reception of the plurality of pieces of question information is completed, constructing the identified questions into a plurality of lines, and completing registration of the plurality of pieces of question information in the question database by arranging each of the plurality of lines in blank test paper information having test paper specifications according to specified arrangement conditions and storing the plurality of lines in the question database; and a test paper information generation step of extracting, as customized questions, questions, corresponding to a learning level of a student, which is a user of a user account, based on a pre-stored artificial intelligence algorithm, from the question database, when a first user input is received from the user account in a state in which the function of the question registration step is completed, and generating test paper information corresponding to the learning level of the student through the extracted customized questions. Therefore, the method can prevent breakage of text or images that may occur when various questions are stored in a test paper format. In addition, various embodiments identified through the present document are possible.

title: Target identification method, and target identification model training method and device
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a target recognition method, a target recognition model training method and device, electronic equipment, a computer readable storage medium and a computer program product, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of image processing, computer vision and deep learning, and can be applied to scenes such as 3D vision and virtual reality. According to the implementation scheme, a to-be-trained student model is initialized, and a trained teacher model is determined; obtaining point cloud data, a first label corresponding to each point in the point cloud data and a second label corresponding to the point cloud data, the first label being used for identifying a relationship between the point and an area where a to-be-identified target corresponding to the point cloud data is located, and the second label being a preset target identification result; and inputting the point cloud data into a student model, and inputting the point cloud data and the first label into a teacher model, thereby training the student model based on a knowledge distillation method.

title: AI operation assistant flow rule range statistical method
applicants: JILIN YUNFAN INTELLIGENT ENG CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI homework assistant flow rule range statistical method, which comprises a radian key point recording module, a humpback feature judgment module and an infrared scanning module, and is characterized in that the radian key point recording module is used for recording radian key point information of students; the humpback feature judgment module is used for sensing and judging features of students in the development period during homework doing, the infrared scanning module is used for monitoring and protecting the students in the homework doing period, the radian key point recording module is in network connection with the infrared scanning module, and the humpback feature judgment module is in network connection with the infrared scanning module. The radian key point recording module is electrically connected with the humpback feature judgment module in an induction mode, the radian key point recording module comprises an NFC communication induction piece attaching module and a physical sign parameter book module, and the NFC communication induction piece attaching module is used for attaching and integrating an NFC function chip to the skin surface of a student.

title: AI smart bracelet
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI smart bracelet, and relates to the technical field of bracelets, the AI smart bracelet comprises a bracelet belt, an inner shell is embedded in the top of the bracelet belt, a bottom shell is mounted at the bottom of the inner shell, a controller is fixedly connected in the bottom shell, and the controller comprises a positioning module, a temperature monitoring module, a heart rate monitoring module, an RFID module, a communication module, a processor and a vibration module. The positioning module, the temperature monitoring module, the heart rate monitoring module, the RFID module, the communication module and the vibration module are installed on the controller, and the AI smart bracelet is provided with the temperature monitoring module, the communication module, the RFID module, the heart rate monitoring module and the vibration module; therefore, the bracelet can be applied to the situations of student off-school safety, student epidemic prevention and entrance and exit of a bar entertainment occasion, and can monitor the situations of students in real time, so that parents and schools can know the situations of the students, and dangerous situations can be reduced.

title: Model training method and device, image processing method and device and electronic equipment
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a model training method and device, an image processing method and device and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning, image processing and computer vision. According to the specific implementation scheme, training samples are input into a student model and n teacher models respectively, first output of the student model is obtained, and second output of the n teacher models is obtained; determining a weight corresponding to the training sample based on the label of the training sample and the n second outputs; obtaining a total loss function of the student model based on the first output and the weight; and updating model parameters of the student model based on the total loss function to obtain a trained target model. Therefore, the weight corresponding to the training sample can be determined by comprehensively considering the label of the training sample and the second output of the teacher model, and then the total loss function of the student model is obtained based on the first output and the weight of the student model, so that the model training precision is improved.

title: Student identification alarm system and method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHANDONG XINYIDAI INFORMATION INDUSTRY TECH RESEARCH INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence-based student pick-up identification alarm system and method, belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and aims to solve the technical problems of how to automatically identify parents who pick up children, timely remind teachers and school leaders to pretend to be parents to pick up children and eliminate the risk that the children are abducted. According to the technical scheme, the system comprises a robot body, the robot body comprises a hardware unit and a software unit, the hardware unit comprises a camera and a motion chassis, and the software unit comprises a model training module, a front-end operation module, a decision analysis module, a face recognition and comparison module and an information reporting module. The camera collects picture information of family members of students and uploads the picture information to the model training module, the model training module sends the picture information of the family members of the students to the decision analysis module, and the decision analysis module accesses the face recognition comparison module to carry out face information comparison and obtains a comparison result.

title: IDENTIFYING OPTIMAL WEIGHTS TO IMPROVE PREDICTION ACCURACY IN MACHINE LEARNING TECHNIQUES
abstract_text: A computer-implemented method, system and computer program product for improving prediction accuracy in machine learning techniques. A teacher model is constructed, where the teacher model generates a weight for each data case. The current student model is then trained using training data and the weights generated by the teacher model. After training the current student model, the current student model generates state features, which are used by the teacher model to generate new weights. A candidate student model is then trained using training data and these new weights. A reward is generated by comparing the current student model with the candidate student model using training and testing data, which is used to update the teacher model if a stopping rule has not been satisfied. Upon a stopping rule being satisfied, the weights generated by the teacher model are deemed to be the “optimal” weights which are returned to the user.

title: ANNOTATING UNLABELED IMAGES USING CONVOLUTIONAL NEURAL NETWORKS
applicants: SYSTIMATA YPOLOGISTIKIS ORASIS IRIDA LABS AE [GR]
abstract_text: A method and information storage media having instructions stored thereon for supervised Deep Learning (DL) systems to learn directly from unlabeled data without any user annotation. The annotation-free solutions incorporate a new learning module, the Localization, Synthesis and Teacher/Annotation Network (LSTN) module, which features a data synthesis and generation engine as well as a Teacher network for object detection and segmentation that feeds the processing loop with new annotated objects detected from images captured at the field. The first step in the LSTN module learns how to localize and segment the objects within a given image/scene following an unsupervised approach as no annotations about the objects' segmentation mask or bounding box are provided. The exemplary LSTN module also features significant properties that automate the continuous development and integration of deep learning models by (1) learning to synthesize annotated data given only a few samples of the target objects, (2) continuously increasing the object set by adding newly detected objects via an annotation network and (3) supporting the training of the end-model to be released at edge devices via knowledge transfer using a distillation approach by following a Teacher-Student scheme. The overall approach is related with life-long learning, continuous learning and incremental learning approaches that learn how to improve their performance or augment their knowledge by utilizing data observed during deployment or provided as input by the user.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED TALENT AND WORK EXPERIENCE-RECOGNIZING ACADEMIC AFFAIRS MANAGEMENT AND TALENT DONATION BANKING SERVICE SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence-based talent and work experience-recognizing academic affairs management and talent donation banking service system. The artificial intelligence-based talent and work experience-recognizing academic affairs management and talent donation banking service system according to the present invention comprises: a user terminal which transmits talent-related data of a student; an associated organization server which provides responses to talent-related matters of the student; a certification organization server which provides responses to work experience-related matters of the student; an artificial intelligence server which provides determination results on the talent-related matters and the career-related matters; a talent career recognition academic management server which receives the talent-related data of the student, assesses the talent-related matters and the career-related matters through the artificial intelligence server, and gives credits corresponding to an assessment result score; and a talent donation banking service server which evaluates the value of the degree of the student through the artificial intelligence server, and manages the student as a talent donor.

title: Model training method and related device
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a model training method in the field of artificial intelligence and a related device. The method comprises the steps of obtaining first training data and a labeling result of a training object in an active party; determining a first prediction result of the training object according to the first training data and the second encryption feature through a neural network deployed in an active party in a teacher model; the second encryption feature is obtained by encrypting a second intermediate feature, and the second intermediate feature is obtained by processing second training data of the training object in a passive party through a neural network deployed in the passive party in the teacher model; determining a second prediction result of the training object according to the first training data through a student model deployed in the active party; and training a student model according to the first prediction result, the second prediction result and the labeling result. According to the method, problems in the federated model online process can be avoided, and the advantages of longitudinal federated learning are exerted.

title: Method for compressing YOLOX target detection model based on positioning distillation
abstract_text: The invention discloses a YOLOX target detection model compression method based on positioning distillation, and relates to the technical field of image recognition. According to the method, a deep learning framework is utilized to build a YOLOXX model as a teacher model and a YOLOXNano model as a student model. Extracting a multi-layer feature map of the two models by using an enhanced feature extraction network, selecting a main distillation area MainRegion and a valuable positioning area VLR of the feature map, decoupling the feature map into a classification detection head and a positioning detection head, and respectively designing a classification loss function and a positioning loss function; training a teacher network and a student network, fixing the weight of a network model, and carrying out the back propagation according to a total loss function, thereby achieving the distillation learning. According to the method, respective treatment of the classification head and the regression head is realized for distillation of YOLOX target detection, and a unified distillation framework is provided for classification and regression.

title: Image recognition knowledge distillation method for automatically selecting student model structure
abstract_text: The invention discloses an image recognition knowledge distillation method for automatically selecting a student model structure, and relates to the field of knowledge distillation. The invention aims to solve the problem of low image recognition precision caused by fixed and complicated student model structure and poor flexibility in the existing image recognition knowledge distillation method. The method comprises the following steps: inputting a to-be-predicted picture data set into a classification network to obtain a picture category; the classification network obtaining mode is that a deep convolutional neural network is trained by using a picture training set to obtain a trained deep convolutional neural network; establishing a sub-model space containing a plurality of selectable paths: in each stage of the deep convolutional neural network, presetting'paths' with different depths, convolution channel forms and convolution channel numbers; and automatically selecting the sub-model space according to the trained convolutional neural network, the global objective function and the staged objective function to obtain a classification network. The method is used for compression of the deep learning model.

title: ASSIGNING A STUDENT TO A COHORT ON A PLATFORM
abstract_text: A system and a method for assigning a student to a cohort in real time on a platform. The system receives a set of information from a student for enrolling the student on the platform. Further, the system receives a question from the student. Furthermore, the system extracts a plurality of parameters from the question based on a machine learning model. Subsequently, the system creates a student profile based on the plurality of parameters and the set of information. Further, the system determines a difficulty level of the question using deep learning algorithms. Furthermore, the system computes a similarity score of the student on the platform in real time. Finally, the system automatically assigns the student to a cohort on the platform. The cohort is a subset of the students on the platform.

title: Knowledge distillation and gradient pruning-based compression of artificial intelligence-based base caller
abstract_text: The technology disclosed compresses a larger, teacher base caller into a smaller, student base caller. The student base caller has fewer processing modules and parameters than the teacher base caller. The teacher base caller is trained using hard labels (e.g., one-hot encodings). The trained teacher base caller is used to generate soft labels as output probabilities during the inference phase. The soft labels are used to train the student base caller.

title: Intelligent classroom student concentration low consumption detection method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent classroom student concentration low consumption detection method and system based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of data processing. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a corresponding key frame image; screening to obtain a core key frame image; obtaining a core optimization key frame image; a concentration degree detection model based on an SVM model is obtained; calculating similarities between the effective face image and the face concentration positive sample and between the effective face image and the face concentration negative sample, and generating a similarity judgment result; generating a concentration degree detection result of the student corresponding to the effective face image or a corresponding unidentified result; and importing the corresponding effective face image into a concentration degree detection model based on an SVM model according to the unidentified result, and generating a concentration degree detection result of the corresponding student. According to the method, complex video processing is converted into image processing, the concentration degree of the students in the smart classroom is accurately detected by adopting a low-consumption simple model, and resource consumption is greatly reduced while the detection precision is ensured.

title: Target identification method, and training method and device of target identification model
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a target recognition method, a target recognition model training method and device, electronic equipment, a computer readable storage medium and a computer program product, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of image processing, computer vision and deep learning, and can be applied to scenes such as 3D vision and virtual reality. According to the scheme, a to-be-trained student model is initialized, and a trained teacher model is determined; acquiring sample data and corresponding label data, wherein the label data is used for marking the position of an area where a corresponding to-be-identified target in the sample data is located; respectively inputting the sample data into a student model and a teacher model, and obtaining a first feature map and a target recognition result output by the student model and a second feature map output by the teacher model; determining a distillation loss value based on the first and second feature maps and the tag data; a parameter value of the student model is adjusted based on the distillation loss value and the determined target identification loss value.

title: Image feature extraction model determination method and device and image recognition method and device
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an image feature extraction model determination method and device and an image recognition method and device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of computer vision. According to the specific implementation scheme for determining the image feature extraction model, a training sample set is obtained, the training sample set comprises a plurality of training sample pairs, and each training sample pair comprises a complete image and a shielding image corresponding to the complete image; for each training sample pair, extracting a first image feature in the training sample pair by using a teacher model, and extracting a second image feature in the training sample pair by using a student model; constructing a target loss function based on the first image feature and the second image feature; and iteratively training the student model based on the target loss function to obtain an image feature extraction model which is used for extracting image features of the to-be-recognized image during image recognition.

title: Neural network distillation method, target detection method and device
abstract_text: The invention discloses a neural network distillation method, a target detection method and a target detection device in the field of artificial intelligence, which are used for efficiently obtaining a lightweight model meeting requirements in combination with modes of structure search, pruning or distillation and the like, are high in generalization ability and are used for performing a target detection task or a classification task and the like. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, obtaining a teacher model and a student model; the student model is evolved to obtain an evolved student model, the evolved student model comprises the steps that the structure of the student model is transformed according to evolvement actions to obtain the evolved student model, the evolvement actions comprise at least one of layer adding, layer rearrangement or pruning, the layer adding indicates that at least one network layer is added in the student model, and the layer rearrangement indicates that at least one network layer is added in the student model; the layer rearrangement indicates that at least one network layer in the student model is rearranged, and the pruning indicates that the structure of the student model is reduced; and distilling the evolved student model by using the teacher model to obtain an updated student model.

title: MODEL DISTILLATION METHOD AND APPARATUS, DEVICE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: A model distillation method and apparatus, a device, and a storage medium, relating to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises: acquiring a pre-trained model, a student model, a plurality of labeled training samples, and a plurality of unlabeled training samples, the pre-trained model being a model obtained by training on the basis of a Bert network (S1); using the unlabeled training samples and the student model to perform overall distillation learning on the pre-trained model to obtain a student model after first distillation (S2); using the unlabeled training samples and the student model after the first distillation to perform hierarchical distillation learning on the pre-trained model to obtain a student model after second distillation (S3); and using the labeled training samples to perform hierarchical distillation learning on the student model after the second distillation to obtain a trained student model (S4). Thus, the accuracy of the model obtained after distillations is improved by means of three distillations, the requirements for labeling of training samples are reduced, and distillation costs are reduced.

title: Semi-supervised deep learning defect detection method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a semi-supervised deep learning defect detection method. The method comprises the following steps: classifying training sample data according to whether labels exist or not; initializing a weight parameter m of the student convolutional neural network Fs (m); initializing a teacher convolutional neural network parameter Ft (m) = Cpy (Fs (m)), wherein the teacher convolutional neural network and the parameter are copied from the student convolutional neural network; after a student convolutional neural network Fs (m), a teacher convolutional neural network Ft (m) and initial weight parameters are obtained, training the student convolutional neural network and the teacher convolutional neural network; the trained network can be used for defect detection work through the student convolutional neural network, data needing to be detected are input into the student convolutional neural network, and the student convolutional neural network predicts whether the data have defects or which kind of defects the data belong to. According to the defect detection method based on the semi-supervised deep learning framework Fixmatch and the average teacher model, high-precision industrial product surface defect automatic detection can be realized by a small amount of label data.

title: Method and system for objectively evaluating classroom performance of students based on machine vision
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a method and system for objectively evaluating classroom performance of students based on machine vision, and the method comprises the steps: constructing a classroom behavior judgment model; generating a classroom seat background reference map based on the monitoring data; identifying and tracking the face and human body data of the student to obtain a seat corresponding relation; filling the classroom seat background reference map with the seat corresponding relation to obtain a classroom behavior snapshot map; inputting the classroom behavior snapshot graph into a classroom behavior judgment model to judge the classroom performance behavior of the student, obtaining a classroom performance evaluation result, and judging the classroom participation condition, the classroom activity condition, the speaking condition and the attendance performance of the student through the face data of the student. The problem that the authenticity of ordinary scores evaluated by an existing method for evaluating classroom performance of students is low is solved.

title: BINOCULAR IMAGE-BASED MODEL TRAINING METHOD AND APPARATUS, AND DATA PROCESSING DEVICE
abstract_text: A binocular image-based model training method and apparatus, and a data processing device are provided. An image matching model includes a teacher model and a student model. In the method, two groups of sample images acquired at different time points by a binocular image acquisition apparatus are first obtained; then, for any two sample images in the two groups of sample images, optical flow estimation is performed according to a preset geometric constraint between the two sample images by means of the teacher model, so as to obtain a more accurate high-confidence optical flow estimation result, the preset geometric constraint being a binocular image-based geometric constraint; and finally, machine learning training of image element matching is performed on the student model by using the two sample image, with the high-confidence optical flow estimation result taken as labeling information.

title: Method and device for training text auditing model
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a method and device for training a text auditing model, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of natural language processing. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps of obtaining a pre-training language model, a pre-training language micro model, annotation data and non-annotation data; inputting the annotation data into a pre-training language model for supervised training to obtain a teacher model; inputting the annotation data into a pre-training language micro model for supervised training to obtain a student model; and respectively inputting the unlabeled data into the teacher model and the student model, and distilling the student model by using the teacher model to obtain a text auditing model. According to the embodiment, training can be carried out on small-scale manual annotation data and large-scale non-annotation data, and the text auditing model with a good effect and a high speed is obtained.

title: Comparison self-supervised learning method for remote sensing image characterization
abstract_text: The invention discloses a comparison self-supervised learning method for remote sensing image characterization, which comprises the following steps of: constructing a remote sensing self-supervised learning training data set by collecting different-source satellite images, and ensuring semantic consistency between paired views by utilizing synchronous random cutting; meanwhile, natural data augmentation is formed by relying on imaging differences caused by differences of sensor models, shooting view angles, access time and the like of the heterogenous satellites, and diversity of different views is balanced; and an asynchronous teacher-student network model is combined to realize comparison self-supervised learning of the remote sensing image. Compared with a general comparison self-supervised learning method, the method disclosed by the invention can effectively avoid semantic inconsistency caused by random augmentation and further avoid damage to the performance of remote sensing image self-supervised learning representation. The method can be effectively applied to a remote sensing image interpretation task based on deep learning, and the dependence on manual annotation of the remote sensing image is effectively reduced.

title: Method and device for training text auditing model
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a method and device for training a text auditing model, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of natural language processing. According to the specific implementation scheme, a domain language model, a student model, unlabeled data and labeled data are obtained, and the labeled data comprise text information and auditing labels; taking the text information and the auditing label in the annotation data as input and expected output respectively, and performing fine tuning training on the domain language model to obtain a teacher model; inputting the unlabeled data into the teacher model, and outputting a pseudo-audit label to obtain pseudo-labeled data; and training the student model through the pseudo-annotation data to obtain a text auditing model. According to the embodiment, training can be carried out on small-scale manual annotation data and large-scale non-annotation data, and the text auditing model with a good effect and a high speed is obtained.
