title: Image classification model training method and device and electronic equipment
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an image classification model training method and device and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning and computer vision. According to the specific implementation scheme, a target image sample set is acquired; respectively inputting each image sample in the target image sample set into a target backbone network model and a first teacher model to obtain a first classification probability output by the target backbone network model and a second classification probability output by the first teacher model; determining a loss function based on the first classification probability and the second classification probability; adjusting parameters of the target backbone network model based on the loss function; wherein the target backbone network model is used for determining the category of the image input to the target backbone network model, and the initial parameter of the target backbone network model is determined based on a second student model.

title: Systems and methods for evaluating and selectively distilling machine learning models on edge devices
abstract_text: The present disclosure provides systems and methods for evaluating and selectively distilling a machine learning model on an edge device. A method may include executing, by a user computing device of a computing system, a teacher machine learning model stored by the user computing device to generate output data from input data; evaluating, by the computing system, characteristics of one or more of the user computing device and the teacher machine learning model; determining, by the computing system, a student machine learning model stored in the training user computing device based on the evaluation; and training, by the user computing device, the student machine learning model based on the teacher machine learning model.

title: Online learning state monitoring method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online learning state monitoring method based on deep learning, and the method is characterized in that the method comprises the following steps: S1, carrying out the extraction of a first human body foreground based on edge detection, and then carrying out the preprocessing of an image; s2, based on an MTCNN three-level linked convolutional neural network as a face detector, using an SSD target detection network to realize detection of learning face states, and S3, combining multiple face states to complete judgment of fatigue and fool learning states. According to the invention, the learning state of each student is visually fed back to the teacher through feature action detection and recognition of the students in online learning, so that the teacher can make a corresponding learning plan for each student in a targeted manner.

title: Test paper difficulty coefficient evaluation method, device and equipment based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a test paper difficulty coefficient evaluation method, device and equipment based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring knowledge point category features; obtaining an attention index of each knowledge point according to the category features of the knowledge points and the loss rate of each test question; obtaining the loss score weight of each knowledge point through the combination of the loss score rate vector and the attention index, and obtaining the learning ability index of each student by taking the loss score weight as the weight of the loss score rate vector; clustering the learning ability indexes by using a fuzzy mean value clustering algorithm, obtaining the membership degree of each student belonging to the equally divided students, and obtaining the difficulty coefficient of each piece of historical test paper according to the historical scores and the membership degrees of all the students; and constructing a characteristic matrix of the historical test paper, and establishing a difficulty coefficient evaluation network by using the characteristic matrix and the difficulty coefficient to evaluate the difficulty coefficient of the test paper. According to the embodiment of the invention, an accurate difficulty coefficient can be obtained by utilizing different sensitivity degrees of different students to the difficulty coefficient.

title: CONNECTING A TUTOR WITH A STUDENT
abstract_text: A system and a method for connecting a tutor with a student in real time. Initially, the system receives a student profile. Further, the system receives a question from the student. Furthermore, the system synthesizes the question based on a set of predefined machine learning model. Subsequently, the system determines a cohort of the students from the set of the cohort of the students. The cohort of the students is determined based on the one or more parameters related to the question. Further, the system identifies a tutor assigned to the cohort of the students. Subsequently, the system notifies the tutor in real time. Further, the system receives an acknowledgement from the tutor within a predefined time. Finally, the system connects the tutor with the student in real time when the acknowledgement is the positive acknowledgement.

title: PROMOTING A TUTOR ON A PLATFORM
abstract_text: A system and a method for promoting a tutor on a platform. The system receives a tutor profile from the tutor. The tutor profile comprises a set of information about the tutor and a first cohort of students assigned to the tutor. The system randomly assigns a question received from a student belonging to a second cohort of students to the tutor in real time. The system further receives an answer to the question from the tutor. Further, the system analyses the answer based on a machine learning model. Subsequently, the system requests feedback about the tutor from the student of the second cohort of students. The system evaluates the tutor based on the plurality of parameters and the feedback receiving using deep learning algorithms. Finally, the system promotes the tutor for a group coaching of the students on the platform.

title: Learning scheme recommendation method and system based on learning effect prediction
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of learning scheme recommendation, and provides a learning scheme recommendation method and system based on learning effect prediction, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining basic data of a to-be-predicted user and learning behavior data of a certain course, carrying out the preprocessing, constructing and screening out classification features, obtaining a feature vector of the to-be-predicted user, and carrying out the classification of the to-be-predicted user; inputting the trained online course student learning effect prediction model, predicting the learning effect of the to-be-predicted user on the course, when the learning effect does not pass the assessment, sending early warning information to the to-be-predicted user, and obtaining the learning efficiency and learning scheme of the reference user; sending the learning scheme of the reference user with the highest learning efficiency to the to-be-predicted user; and by integrating a plurality of machine learning models, the generalization ability of the models for different samples is improved, and accurate early warning for students with failure risks and optimal and most suitable learning scheme recommendation for the early warning students are realized.

title: Voiceprint recognition method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a voiceprint recognition method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as deep learning and voice technology. The specific implementation scheme is as follows: obtaining to-be-recognized target audio data, and obtaining corresponding local audio features and global audio features based on the target audio data; inputting the local audio feature into a student network of a voiceprint recognition model to obtain a first voiceprint feature output by the student network; inputting the global audio feature into a teacher network of a voiceprint recognition model to obtain a second voiceprint feature output by the teacher network; and determining a target voiceprint feature corresponding to the target audio data based on the first voiceprint feature and the second voiceprint feature. The target voiceprint feature corresponding to the target audio data is obtained based on the local audio feature and the global audio feature corresponding to the target audio data by using the student network and the teacher network, so that the accuracy of voiceprint recognition is improved.

title: Deep learning knowledge distillation method based on model channel cutting
abstract_text: The invention relates to a deep learning knowledge distillation method based on model channel cutting, in particular to a deep learning knowledge distillation method based on model channel cutting for image classification. The problem that the accuracy of the student model is reduced and the accuracy of image classification is low due to the fact that the parameter quantity of the teacher model and the parameter quantity of the student model are greatly different is solved. Inputting to-be-classified images into the teacher model, and sorting the to-be-classified images from large to small by using average ranks of convolution channels in each convolution layer of the teacher model; calculating a parameter mean value of the teacher model and the student model, and making a change proportion of the parameter mean value and the parameter of the teacher model as a channel clipping overall compression ratio; cutting the redundant convolution channel by using a channel cutting technology to obtain an intermediate model; and performing knowledge distillation on the student model by using the intermediate model to obtain a new knowledge distillation objective function, and training the student model to obtain a trained student model. Belongs to the field of knowledge distillation.

title: English reading accomplishment evaluation method based on machine learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to an English reading literacy evaluation method based on machine learning, and discloses more accurate comprehensive evaluation of English reading literacy of students from multiple aspects of spelling and reading ability, reading fluency, reading understanding and answering accuracy, reading frequency and reading quantity by using a machine learning algorithm. And meanwhile, the reading strategy of the student is adjusted and optimized through evaluation. The method is characterized by specifically comprising the following steps that collected English reading literacy data serve as a training sample, and a student terminal sends the training sample to a data processing center; and a data feature extraction module of the data processing center performs feature set extraction on the received training samples.

title: Deep learning signal modulation identification method based on multi-modal distillation
abstract_text: The invention discloses a deep learning signal modulation identification method based on multi-modal distillation. The method comprises the following steps: S1, generating multiple modal data, such as a real part and an imaginary part, an instantaneous frequency and an instantaneous amplitude, a frequency spectrum amplitude and a phase, a constellation diagram and the like, of a signal by using signal original data, wherein the modal data can represent original signal information; s2, three kinds of modal data are selected and subjected to normalization processing; s3, respectively transmitting the three groups of modal data into three identical and parallel convolutional neural networks for training, performing fusion processing of addition on confidence matrixes output by the three parallel convolutional neural networks, and finally obtaining a classification result of the modulation signal and the classification accuracy of the model to a test set; and S4, a knowledge distillation mechanism is utilized, and three kinds of modal data are used as input of three teacher models, so that the student model obtained by training is improved to a certain extent in the aspects of modulation signal classification accuracy and model robustness compared with a model trained by original single-modal data, and the model complexity is reduced.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR ADVANCING THROUGH A DECK OF DIGITAL FLASH CARDS TO MANAGE THE INCENTIVIZING OF LEARNING
abstract_text: Parents and entities incentivize students to learn using pledges of cash, goods, and services. Students earn incentivized rewards by interacting with lessons on a digital computing device, such as a desktop computer, notebook, tablet, or “smart phone.” The lessons may include digital flash cards, text, pictures, figures, audio and video recordings ranging from classroom lectures, to classical music, to animation of scientific principles. In flashcard embodiments, the accuracy of each answer is recorded on a histogram corresponding to a particular flashcard, or the principles taught therein. The application generates performance metrics from histogram data. The performance metrics are used to generate control parameters that control the frequency and order flashcard presentation. Statistical analysis, adaptive learning and/or artificial intelligence programs refine the control parameters governing flashcard review, thereby optimizing the functionality. As a student satisfies various performance metrics and/or courseware requirements, incentives are released to the student.

title: RADIOTHERAPY PLAN PARAMETERS WITH PRIVACY GUARANTEES
abstract_text: Techniques for producing segmentation with privacy are provided. The techniques include receiving a medical image; processing the medical image with a student machine learning model to estimate radiotherapy plan parameters, the student machine learning model being trained to establish a relationship between a plurality of public training medical images and corresponding radiotherapy plan parameters, the radiotherapy plan parameters of the plurality of public training medical images being generated by aggregating a plurality of radiotherapy plan parameter estimates produced by: processing the plurality of public training medical images with a plurality of teacher machine learning models to generate sets of radiotherapy plan parameter estimates; and reducing respective dimensions of the sets of radiotherapy plan parameter estimates or medical images, the radiotherapy plan parameters of the plurality of public training medical images being perturbed in accordance with privacy criteria; and generating a radiotherapy treatment plan based on the estimated radiotherapy plan parameters.

title: Knowledge distillation-based fitness place layout optimization method
applicants: HAIMEN SANDE SPORTS GOODS CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a fitness place layout optimization method based on knowledge distillation. The method comprises the following steps: performing various clustering on the fitness equipment by utilizing a plurality of clustering features to obtain various clustering results, wherein each clustering result comprises a plurality of clustering sets; clustering all the clustering sets to obtain a plurality of clustering categories; each cluster set generates a first image; constructing a first-order teacher network to obtain a first serial number graph and a first confidence graph corresponding to each first image; forming a plurality of similar combinations, and obtaining a second image of each similar combination; constructing a second-order teacher network to obtain a second serial number graph and a second confidence graph corresponding to the second image; constructing a student network to obtain a third serial number graph; dividing the panoramic image into a plurality of areas, and obtaining a heat distribution evaluation index of each area; judging whether the heat distribution of the current fitness place is balanced or not. According to the embodiment of the invention, the overall utilization rate of the fitness place can be improved by using local information.

title: STUDENT COLLABORATION STATE ASSESSMENT METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON ELECTROENCEPHALOGRAM DATA
abstract_text: Provided in the present invention are a student collaboration state assessment method and system based on electroencephalogram data. The method comprises: determining electroencephalogram data and a vectorized behavior sequence or the electroencephalogram data during a collaborative learning process of a student, wherein the electroencephalogram data is collected by using an electroencephalogram sensor; and inputting the electroencephalogram data and the vectorized behavior sequence or the electroencephalogram data into a trained classifier to classify the state of the collaborative learning of the student, wherein the state of collaborative learning comprises interactive learning, constructive learning, active learning and passive learning, and the classifier is constructed on the basis of a long short-term memory (LSTM) network, and is used for classifying the state of the collaborative learning of the student according to the electroencephalogram data and the vectorized behavior sequence during the collaborative learning process of the student. In the present invention, a brain-computer interface and machine learning technology are used, and the state of the collaborative learning of a student is automatically monitored. Compared with a traditional method for determining the state of a student by means of observation by a teacher, the present invention is more scientific and efficient.

title: Intelligent campus management system based on artificial intelligence core algorithm
applicants: GUANGZHOU LINGCAI OFFICE EQUIPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent campus management system based on an artificial intelligence core algorithm. The intelligent campus management system comprises a user side, an information acquisition module, an information storage module, a data management module and a data application module. The user side is used for obtaining request information of a user through user operation; the information acquisition module is used for acquiring student information; the information storage module is used for storing the student information acquired by the information acquisition module; the data management module is used for managing and reading the information data stored in the information storage module; and the data application module is used for acquiring the target data through the data management module, and analyzing and applying the target data. According to the intelligent campus management system based on the artificial intelligence core algorithm provided by the invention, the students are comprehensively and uniformly managed by adopting the artificial intelligence core algorithm, and the transaction processing efficiency and the intelligent degree of campus management are improved.

title: Course recommendation method and device based on portrait relevance, equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and discloses a course recommendation method based on portrait relevance, which comprises the following steps: acquiring course data classification of a plurality of lecturers to obtain course tags; obtaining a trainee portrait of a target trainee to push the course label, and obtaining course selection behavior data returned by the target trainee according to the course label; obtaining a lecturer portrait of each lecturer, and extracting portrait semantics of the lecturer portraits; and calculating a matching value between the portrait semantics and the behavior portrait, determining a lecturer corresponding to the selected lecturer portrait as a target lecturer, and pushing a course label of the target lecturer to the target student. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the data list can be stored in the nodes of the block chain. The invention further provides a course recommendation device based on portrait relevance, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The course recommendation efficiency can be improved.

title: Statistical method for analyzing outdoor activity duration of student based on AI video structuralization
applicants: SHENZHEN AIWEI IOT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a statistical method for analyzing student outdoor activity duration based on AI video structuralization, which comprises the steps of hardware installation, duration statistics starting, duration statistics neutralization and duration statistics ending, hardware installation for connecting and assembling needed hardware equipment and establishing a connection relationship between the needed hardware equipment, duration statistics starting and duration statistics ending, and the like. The method is used for performing data storage work in the earlier stage of time duration statistics, and counting the total time of outdoor activities of class personnel through video streams recorded by a camera in a time period by setting the time period in which outdoor time duration needs to be counted and information of the number of the class personnel. The method comprises the following steps of: receiving a video stream, transmitting the video stream into an AI box for analysis, identification and people counting and feeding back to a platform server, processing data by the platform server according to a corresponding relation between known classes and equipment IDs, and then storing the data into a DB database, thereby accumulating the total outdoor activity duration of students.

title: Target detection method, electronic equipment, medium and vehicle
applicants: ANHUI WEILAI ZHIJIA TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, particularly provides a target detection method, electronic equipment, a medium and a vehicle, and aims to solve the technical problem that the detection precision corresponding to a target detection method in the existing vehicle automatic driving field is relatively low. In order to achieve the purpose, the target detection method comprises the steps that a to-be-detected image containing a target detection object is acquired; inputting the to-be-detected image into a student network trained by using a knowledge distillation method to obtain a target detection object, and training the student network by using the knowledge distillation method comprising: inputting a traffic scene training image into a trained teacher network to obtain a first feature map and a dynamic region; inputting the traffic scene training image into a to-be-trained student network to obtain a second feature map and a detection loss part; determining a distillation loss portion based on the first feature map, the second feature map, and the dynamic region; a student network is trained based on the distillation loss portion and the detection loss portion. Therefore, the target detection precision is improved.

title: Training game resource issuing method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and discloses a training game resource issuing method, which comprises the following steps of: obtaining game questions, inquiring game URL (Uniform Resource Locator) addresses corresponding to the game questions, and sequentially obtaining game templates and an original game interface; receiving a nesting instruction uploaded by a lecturer end, nesting the game question and the original game interface according to the nesting instruction, and generating a preliminary game interface; loading a pre-uploaded game rule in the initial game interface, and configuring the initial game interface to obtain a final game interface; and publishing the final game interface to a game resource library, and pushing the final game interface to a student end through an interface. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the product portrait and the user portrait can be stored in nodes of a block chain. The invention further provides a training game resource issuing method, electronic equipment and a storage medium. According to the invention, the flexibility of training type online game configuration can be improved.

title: Human head posture estimation method based on classification first and regression second
abstract_text: The invention discloses a human head posture estimation method based on classification and regression, and the method comprises the following steps: 1, processing a data set, constructing a multi-classification neural network based on GhostNet, and carrying out the training, and obtaining a multi-classification network model based on GhostNet; step 2, constructing a neural network model based on first classification and then regression; 3, training a neural network based on classification and regression and a classification neural network based on GhostNet, and fusing the two network models; and step 4, performing head posture estimation by using a neural network based on classification and regression. According to the method, a task splitting mechanism is provided, the three angle values estimated and predicted by the head posture are split into three sub-tasks, the pitch angle, the yaw angle and the roll angle are predicted respectively, the accuracy of the prediction result is improved, the calculated amount is greatly reduced, and the method is suitable for AI automatic evaluation tasks such as student learning or experiment operation.

title: Assistant scholarship distribution method and device and computer readable storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses an assistant scholarship distribution method and device and a computer readable storage medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and is used for balancing the fairness and benefit of assistant scholarship distribution. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring the total amount of assistant scholarship and the subsidy-needing probability of each student in M students, wherein M is an integer greater than 1; on the basis of the subsiding-needing probability of each student in the M students, a benefit objective function is constructed with the purpose of maximizing the amount of assistant scholarship money allocated to the student with the high subsiding-needing probability; constructing a fairness objective function with the aim of balancing the amount of the learning aid money allocated to each student; taking the condition that the sum of the amounts of the assistant scholarship allocated to the M students is equal to the total amount of the assistant scholarship as a constraint condition; and under constraint conditions, based on a multi-objective artificial bee colony algorithm, solving the benefit objective function and the fairness objective function to obtain a non-dominated solution set, the non-dominated solution set comprising at least one solution, and the solution being used for indicating the amount of learning aid money allocated to each student in the M students.

title: Recommendation model configuration method and device based on knowledge distillation, equipment and medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and provides a recommendation model configuration method and device based on knowledge distillation, equipment and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: determining a positive sample set and a negative sample set of user samples according to teacher recommendation scores determined by a teacher model; inputting the positive sample set and the negative sample set into a student model to obtain student recommendation scores; constructing a first loss function corresponding to each user sample according to the student recommendation score, the positive sample set and the negative sample set; adjusting the position of the article sample, and determining an exposure loss value after position exchange; constructing a second loss function according to the exposure loss value and the positive sample set; and determining a target loss function according to the second loss function and the first loss function, and configuring the target loss function to the student model. According to the technical scheme of the embodiment, the second loss function can be constructed according to the exposure loss value determined after the position of the positive article sample is adjusted, the influence of the exposure on the article samples which are sequenced later is reduced, and the accuracy of the recommendation model is improved.

title: Model training method and device, service device and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING WODONG TIANJUN INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CO LTD
BEIJING JINGDONG CENTURY TRADING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a model training method and device, a service device and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of machine learning. The model training method comprises the steps that for each piece of user behavior sample data, the user behavior sample data are processed through a teacher model, a first score value is obtained, a first loss value is determined according to the first score value and a label of the user behavior sample data, and the first loss value is reversely propagated in the teacher model; the user behavior sample data is processed through a student model, a second score value is obtained, a second loss value is determined according to the second score value and a label of the user behavior sample data, and the second loss value is reversely propagated in the student model; and obtaining a third loss value according to the first score value and the second score value, wherein the second loss value and the third loss value are reversely propagated in the student model. Through the method, the training time can be shortened, and the iteration speed and the training efficiency are improved.

title: Vision-based practical training robot operation logic evaluation system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a practical training robot operation logic evaluation system based on vision. The practical training robot operation logic evaluation system comprises a practical training robot platform, an acquisition unit and a processing unit. The practical training robot platform is used for examining the operation environment and object of a trainee; the acquisition unit comprises a video acquisition device including a head-mounted camera and is deployed on an examined student and in a surrounding operation environment, and the processing unit comprises computing equipment including a computer and a server and capable of realizing deep learning image processing; the acquisition unit sends a video stream to the processing unit in real time, and the processing unit calculates and recognizes the received video information and evaluates and scores the logic sequence of the related operations of the examined students at the same time. The practical training robot operation logic evaluation assessment method is wide in applicability and high in robustness, can replace manual work to complete assessment of practical training robot operation logic evaluation, improves the efficiency and objectivity of evaluation scoring, and saves manpower resource consumption at the same time.

title: Student psychological health group screening method and system
applicants: JIANGSU BOZIDAO INTELLIGENT INDUSTRY TECH RESEARCH INSTITUTE CO LTD
JIANGSU BONAO SMART TECH CO LTD
JIANGSU BOZIDAO INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student psychological health group screening method, and relates to the technical field of psychological health prevention and treatment, and the method comprises the following steps: a front-end high-frequency camera collects videos of face and neck muscle groups of students; acquiring micro vibration frequency and amplitude parameters generated by the micro motion of the head muscle from the video; obtaining mapping parameters and brain wave information through a psychological and physiological parameter extraction algorithm; comparing with an emotion algorithm model, and quickly counting the emotion state of the student; evaluating the emotional state of the student, and creating a file; high-risk suspicious trainees with abnormal emotions are screened out, and early warning is automatically given out; abnormal students are recorded, tracked and detected, and consultation and communication are carried out. The invention further provides a student psychological health group screening system. Non-contact AI emotion recognition, rapid detection and large-scale group screening can be achieved, group cognition and psychological changes can be grasped in time, the treatment ability and level are improved, and the psychological stability situation of campus groups is effectively maintained.

title: Face feature extraction method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a face feature extraction method and device, equipment and a storage medium, which are used for improving the accuracy of face feature extraction. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a target image containing a face; inputting the target image into a pre-trained face feature extraction model; wherein the face feature extraction model comprises a feature network and an attention network; outputting initial face features of the face in the target image through a feature network; outputting attention features in the target image through an attention network; wherein the attention network is a student network of a preset teacher network; the attention network is obtained based on teacher network training; the attention features are used for indicating the importance degree of feature factors in the initial face features; and processing the initial face feature based on the attention feature to obtain a final face feature of the face in the target image. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the data of face feature extraction can be stored in a block chain node.

title: Method and device for training text matching model and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a method for training a text matching model, which comprises the following steps: training a pre-trained language model by using a third training set to obtain a first teacher model, and performing knowledge distillation on a pre-established to-be-distilled model by using the first teacher model to obtain a first student model; training the first teacher model by using the first training set to obtain a second teacher model, storing the second training set into a search engine, extracting a feature vector of the second training set by using the second teacher model, and storing the feature vector into an approximate neighbor search library; respectively obtaining a first result set and a second result set from a search engine and an approximate neighbor search library through a first text and a second text contained in the labeled data in the first training set, and determining distillation data; and training a first student model based on the distillation data to generate a trained target model. According to the method, the data of the training set can be enhanced in a targeted manner in the training process, and the knowledge distillation effect is improved.

title: Distributed artificial intelligence (AI)/machine learning training system
abstract_text: A decentralized training platform is described for training an artificial intelligence (AI) model in which training data (e.g., medical images) are distributed across multiple sites (nodes) and, due to confidentiality, law or other reasons, the data of each site cannot be shared or leave the site and thus cannot be copied to a central location for training. The method includes training teacher models locally at each node, then moving each teacher model to a central node and using them to train student models using a migration data set. By using inter-region peer-to-peer connections between nodes to set up cloud services such that these nodes appear in a single cluster, this is facilitated. In one variant, student modules may be trained at each node using a plurality of trained teacher models. In another variant, a plurality of student models are trained, where each student model is trained by each teacher model at its trained node, and once the plurality of student models are trained, an ensemble model is generated from the plurality of trained student models. Load balancing may be achieved using loss function weighting and node downsampling to improve accuracy and time/cost efficiency.

title: Radar-based detection system and method for domain adaptation
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a radar-based detection system using domain adaptation and a method thereof. According to the present invention, the radar-based detection method using the radar-based detection system using domain adaptation comprises: a step of training a first neural network model of a CNN structure using radar data collected from a source domain corresponding to a first environment and a corresponding label; a step of transferring a statistical factor and a weight of each batch normalization layer applied to each convolution layer in the first neural network model to a corresponding layer in a teacher neural network model of the CNN structure for learning a second environment; a step of training a teacher-student network by using an error between a pseudo label and an output label derived by respectively inputting radar data collected from a target domain corresponding to the second environment into the teacher neural network model and a student neural network model; and a step of providing a label derived by inputting the target radar data measured in the target domain to the trained student neural network model as a detection result. Accordingly, a deep domain adaptation technique is used to adjust an artificial intelligence model such to allow an adaptive system processing in a changing clutter environment and provide a reliable radar detection result that is robust to environment changes.

title: Knowledge transfer technology-based edge side lightweight deep learning target classification and detection method
applicants: MINGJIANG ZHIHUI CONSTRUCTION DEV CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an edge-side lightweight deep learning target classification and detection method based on a knowledge transfer technology, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, carrying out the initialization of a BWN model through a full-precision network; s2, performing fine adjustment on the initialized BWN model; s3, layering the BWN model, and grouping the number of layers; s4, binarizing the BWN model according to the reverse sequence of the groups; and S5, setting a full-precision CNN model, and enabling the BWN model to learn features similar to the full-precision CNN model through a knowledge transfer technology. A full-precision CNN model is used as a teacher network, a BWN model is used as a student network, the BWN simulates the response of a middle layer of the teacher network in the training process, the convergence of the BWN is improved through additional supervision, and the problem that the precision is reduced in conventional BWN training is effectively avoided; model complexity is not increased, calculation cost is not increased, and the method is easy to implement.

title: BREAST TUMOR IMAGE CLASSIFICATION AND PREDICTION METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MULTI-SOURCE DATA
abstract_text: Provided is a breast tumor image classification and prediction method for multi-source data. The method comprises: acquiring multi-source data of a breast tumor image to be subjected to detection, wherein the multi-source data comprises labeled image data and unlabeled image data; performing, by using the multi-source data, semi-supervised training on a teacher-student network segmentation model with a preset encoder/decoder structure, so as to obtain an ROI segmentation result; and performing feature extraction on the ROI segmentation result, so as to obtain an image geometric texture feature vector, and inputting the ROI segmentation result into an encoder part in the teacher-student network segmentation model, so as to obtain an image feature vector of deep learning, and in combination with a non-image data vector obtained by pre-processing non-image data, performing classification and prediction by using a pre-trained cascaded random forest classification model, so as to obtain a corresponding classification result which indicates either malignancy or benignancy. By implementing the present invention, the heterogeneity between different sources of data sets can be reduced, and the breast tumor image classification and prediction for multi-source data can be realized.

title: Sports action posture analysis system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: NANJING TIYUE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a sports action posture analysis system based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a bottom plate, the center of the top of the bottom plate is fixedly connected with a stand column, the center of the bottom of the inner cavity of the bottom plate is fixedly connected with a servo motor, the output end of the servo motor is fixedly connected with a threaded rod, and the threaded rod is fixedly connected with a threaded rod. The top of the threaded rod is rotationally connected with the top of the inner cavity of the stand column through a bearing, and the outer surface of the threaded rod is in threaded connection with a threaded sleeve. By arranging the servo motor, the threaded rod, the threaded sleeve and the connecting rod, the concave box and the camera body can be driven to move up and down, the height of the camera body is adjusted, by arranging the electric air cylinder, the tooth plate and the gear, the rotating rod can be driven to rotate, and then the camera body is driven to overturn up and down. Through the arrangement of the above structure, the device has the advantage that the camera can be adjusted according to the movement of a student.

title: Method for matching students with teachers to achieve optimal student outcomes
abstract_text: Techniques are provided for the optimal matching of teachers to students using machine learning models and analysis engines (MLMAEs). In an embodiment, historical and biographical teacher and student data is collected through a data ingestion layer. As the data is ingested, a process is spawned that automatically builds MLMAEs using a plurality of algorithms. The MLMAEs are automatically tested for accuracy, and the MLMAE with the highest level of accuracy is promoted as the winner. Students enter information through a user interface to request optimal teachers for a subject area, and this information is run against the winning MLMAE which returns a list of optimal teachers. Also provided are techniques for teachers to enter their availability, techniques for MLMAE creators to seamlessly test prospective new MLMAEs, and techniques for teachers to understand why they are not matches for specific segments of students and to receive associated professional development resources.

title: DEEP LEARNING-BASED SPEECH TRAINING METHOD AND APPARATUS, DEVICE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: Provided are a deep learning-based speech training method and apparatus, a computer device, and a storage medium, applied in the technical field of artificial intelligence. Provided is a method for training a speech synthesis model by means of teacher and student neural networks, which can train the speech synthesis model efficiently and rapidly with low resource consumption. The method comprises: coding a first phoneme sequence to obtain a first phoneme coded value (S101); performing duration prediction on the first phoneme coded value to obtain a first pronunciation duration predicted value (S102); expanding each phoneme in the first phoneme sequence to obtain an expanded feature of each phoneme in the first phoneme sequence (S103); transforming the expanded feature of each phoneme in the first phoneme sequence into a first Mel spectrum value (S104); and training a student neural network by means of latent variables provided by a trained teacher neural network and the first Mel spectrum value until a first loss function of the student neural network converges to obtain a trained student neural network (S105).

title: Deep learning knowledge tracking method and system based on attention mechanism
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of knowledge tracking, and provides a deep learning knowledge tracking method and system based on an attention mechanism, which can reserve context sequence information by adopting a self-attention mechanism, explicitly call question interaction in the whole historical sequence of students, and improve the knowledge tracking efficiency. Different weights among elements in long and short-term historical sequences are clearly calculated, dynamic long-term and short-term knowledge states are captured, the long-term and short-term knowledge states of students are accurately captured and enhanced in the form of subsequence division, and short-term knowledge representation of the students is reflected by continuous behaviors of the students in the current time span. All historical behaviors before the current time span reflect the long-term knowledge state of the student, and the self-attention mechanism can adaptively learn the corresponding dependency relationship of the long-term and short-term continuous behaviors of the student.

title: Continuous learning method and device based on machine learning
abstract_text: The invention provides a continuous learning method and device based on machine learning. The method comprises the following steps: determining to execute at least two training tasks; respectively inputting the training set of each task into a pre-stored machine learning model to obtain a generation model and a pseudo sample set corresponding to each task; respectively extracting center features of the corresponding tasks by using a feature extractor; inputting the pseudo sample set corresponding to the current task into a first teacher model for training to obtain a first generation sample; inputting the pseudo sample set corresponding to the previous task into a second teacher model for training to obtain a second generation sample; training a student model based on the first generation sample, the second generation sample and the center feature of the current task to obtain a target student model of the current task; according to the method, the continuous learning ability of a machine learning model in a complex scene is improved by adopting a training method combining sample generation and playback with distillation learning, and disastrous forgetting of the model is relieved.

title: Identifying optimal weights to improve prediction accuracy in machine learning techniques
abstract_text: A computer-implemented method,system and computer program product for improving prediction accuracy in machine learning techniques. A teacher model is constructed: wherein the teacher model generates a weight for each data case.The current student model is then trained using training data and the weights generated by the teacher model. After training the current student model, the current student model generates state features: which are used by the teacher model to generate new weights. A candidate student model is then trained using training data and these new weights. A reward is generated by comparing the current student model with the candidate student model using training and testing data,which is used to update the teacher model if a stopping rule has not been satisfied. Upon a stopping rule being satisfied, the weights generated by the teacher model are deemed to be the "optimal"weights which are returned to the user.

title: Student integral system comprehensive assessment method and system
applicants: GUANGDONG NANYUE SCIENCE AND EDUCATION RES INSTITUTE
abstract_text: The invention provides a student integral system comprehensive assessment method and system. The method comprises the following steps of S1, performing digital processing on paper documents in batches; s2, performing optimization processing on a digital processing result; s3, identifying the digital processing result to obtain name, student number, class, school information and score or grade information; s4, converting an identified result into points, accumulating and archiving the points, and synchronizing the points to the user side of the student or the parent; and S5, the user side can exchange different gifts by using the points. The paper documents are automatically recognized and processed in an artificial intelligence processing mode, the complexity of manual input is avoided, the possibility of input errors is avoided, points corresponding to student scores can be continuously accumulated, gifts can be exchanged after the points reach the corresponding levels, and therefore the learning interest of students is stimulated.

title: Model training method applied to image processing, image processing method and equipment
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCIENCE TECHNOLOGY CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a model training method applied to image processing, an image processing method and equipment, and relates to artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical fields of deep learning, image processing, computer vision technologies, chips and the like. According to the specific implementation scheme, a to-be-trained image is processed based on a to-be-trained student model to obtain a first feature map, and the to-be-trained image is processed based on a teacher model to obtain a second feature map; determining first loss function information according to the plurality of first feature maps and the plurality of corresponding second feature maps; determining second loss function information according to the plurality of first feature maps; and according to the first loss function information and the second loss function information, updating a student model to be trained to obtain an image processing model. The obtained image processing model learns the teacher model and the label information of the image, the precision of the image processing model is improved, and the accuracy of processing the to-be-identified image is improved.

title: Medical learning method and system based on VR technology
applicants: NANJING TROJAN CATTLE INTELLIGENT SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
JIANGSU LIMITED COMPANY OF INTELLIGENT TEACHING TECH RESEARCH INSTITUTE OF BARRIER ROAD
NANJING PLEASURE MEDICAL SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a medical learning method and system based on a VR technology, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, capturing the performance index data of a body of a patient through employing a web crawler technology, and recording the data information of a disease of the patient; s2, capturing doctor seeing performance index data of a doctor by adopting a web crawler technology, recording data information of an operation process, and uploading the data information to a control center through a cloud database; s3, the control center classifies and processes the collected and recorded data and information, and feeds a classification result back to the cloud; s4, the student wears a VR display, reads the classification result stored in the cloud, and learns the classification result by using a deep learning model constructed by regularization; and S5, setting a student login window in the VR display, and skipping to a learning assessment window after the student learns. According to the invention, an improved algorithm program is added for control, the calculation speed and precision are improved, and the method has positive significance in research of VR medical treatment.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR ASSESSING PET RADIOLOGY IMAGES
abstract_text: In one embodiment, the disclosure provides a computer-implemented method comprising: receiving a first labeled training data set comprising a first plurality of images each associated with a set of labels; programmatically training a machine learning neural Teacher model on the first labeled training data set; programmatically applying a machine learning model trained for NLP to an unlabeled data set comprising digital electronic representations of natural language text summaries of a second plurality of images, thereby generating a second labeled training data set comprising the second plurality of images; using the machine learning neural Teacher model, programmatically generating soft pseudo labels; programmatically generating derived labels using the soft pseudo labels; training one or more programmed machine learning neural Student models using the derived labels; receiving a target image; and applying an ensemble of one or more of the Student models to output one or more classifications of the target image.

title: Target category detection model training method, target detection method and electronic equipment
applicants: SUZHOU COEDA SCIENCE AND TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of deep learning, in particular to a training method of a target category detection model, a target detection method and electronic equipment, the training method comprises the following steps: obtaining at least two categories of sample images and labels thereof, the labels comprising the categories of the sample images; inputting the sample image into a teacher category detection model to obtain a prediction result so as to determine the difference between the prediction result and the label and the gradient of each parameter in the teacher category detection model; on the basis of the size relation among the difference, the gradient and the gradient threshold value and the first learning rate, parameters of the teacher category detection model are updated to determine a target teacher category detection model and a student category detection model, and the student category detection model is obtained after pruning processing is conducted on the target teacher category detection model; and training a student category detection model based on the sample image and a second learning rate, and determining a target category detection model, the first learning rate being greater than the second learning rate. The method can be operated on a terminal with low configuration, and the detection efficiency is improved.

title: Multi-behavior fusion graph neural network student score prediction method based on graph structure learning
abstract_text: The invention provides a multi-behavior fusion neural network classification prediction method based on graph structure learning, and relates to pattern recognition and machine learning, in particular to a student score prediction task oriented to multi-source heterogeneous campus big data. According to the method, student behavior feature extraction is performed by using a multi-source heterogeneous campus big data set, a K-proximity algorithm is introduced to construct a multi-behavior fusion feature graph, and on the basis, an optimized graph structure learning module is provided for learning. Compared with propagation of single-behavior node features on a feature graph, the multi-behavior feature graph can provide more comprehensive feature information for learning node embedding. Meanwhile, the optimized graph structure learning module can provide shared information representation for learning of the node feature graph. Compared with an existing classification prediction model, the method has the advantage that the classification prediction accuracy is remarkably improved.

title: CONTROLLING DISTRIBUTION OF TRAINING DATA TO MEMBERS OF AN ENSEMBLE
abstract_text: A machine learning system includes a coach machine learning system that uses machine learning to help a student machine learning system learn its system. By monitoring the student learning system, the coach machine learning system can learn (through machine learning techniques) “hyperparameters” for the student learning system that control the machine learning process for the student learning system. The machine learning coach could also determine structural modifications for the student learning system architecture. The learning coach can also control data flow to the student learning system.

title: Self-attention mechanism-based explainable prediction method for student class leaving behavior
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to a self-attention mechanism-based explainable prediction method for student class leaving behaviors by using online learning behavior information and natural statistical information of students. Compared with other student off-class behavior prediction methods, the method of the invention focuses on the interpretability of artificial intelligence products. In the data processing stage, an expandable cross-platform feature engineering strategy is provided on the basis of statistical analysis of a large real data set, effective information related to class withdrawing behaviors is extracted, and input of irrelevant information is reduced. In the prediction stage, the self-attention mechanism is utilized to encode the sequence in two dimensions of features and time, and mutual influence among various features and mutual dependence among time stages are captured, so that a final prediction result is obtained. In addition, the prediction result can be explained according to the distribution of the attention weight, namely, the larger the weight is, the larger the influence of the time stage on the off-class behavior of the student is.

title: Target image recognition method and device, storage medium and electronic equipment
abstract_text: The invention discloses a target image recognition method and device, a storage medium and electronic equipment. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a target image; inputting the target image into a target student network model, extracting target features of the target image through the target student network model, and executing N blurred screen level identification tasks according to the target features to obtain N identification tags; and determining a predicted blurred screen grade of the target image in the M blurred screen grades according to the N identification tags. The technical scheme of the embodiment of the invention can be applied to various scenes such as a cloud technology, artificial intelligence, intelligent traffic, auxiliary driving and the like, and solves the technical problem that the result accuracy of blurred screen recognition in related technologies is relatively low.

title: Model training method and device
applicants: BEIJING WONGJUN INFORMATION TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a model training method and device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. A specific embodiment of the method comprises the following steps: respectively inputting a plurality of training images which are pre-marked with semantic segmentation labels in a sample set into a trained teacher model and a to-be-trained student model, determining a probability distribution difference between a prediction result of the student model on the category of pixels in the training image and the semantic segmentation tag as a first difference; a loss function of the student model is constructed using the first difference in combination with the second difference and/or the third difference to train the student model. According to the embodiment, the expression ability of the model to the minister category and/or image detail information can be enhanced.

title: Electroencephalogram signal classification method and device, electronic equipment, medium and product
applicants: SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL RESEARCH COLLEGE OF QINGHUA UNIV
abstract_text: The invention provides an electroencephalogram signal classification method and device, electronic equipment, a medium and a product. The electroencephalogram signal classification method comprises the steps of obtaining a to-be-processed target electroencephalogram signal; inputting a target electroencephalogram signal to be processed into the electroencephalogram signal classification model to obtain an electroencephalogram signal classification result corresponding to the target electroencephalogram signal; wherein the electroencephalogram signal classification model is obtained by selecting a teacher network model and a student network model for multiple times from a plurality of to-be-trained neural network models sorted according to complexity for training based on labeled electroencephalogram signal training data and unlabeled electroencephalogram signal training data, and based on the student network model obtained through final training. According to the method, the electroencephalogram signal classification model with relatively high classification accuracy can be obtained, so that a more accurate classification result is obtained, the dependency degree of a deep learning model on high-quality data can be greatly reduced, and the labeling cost of the data is reduced.

title: Group perception-oriented teacher and student group privacy protection method and system
applicants: HUBEI AMERICAN AND EASY IDEOLOGICAL EDUCATION SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teacher and student group privacy protection method and system oriented to group awareness, and the method comprises the steps: collecting the interactive activity data related to the school learning of students and teachers, carrying out the classification preprocessing, and extracting the target data needing privacy protection; performing privacy labeling on the target data needing privacy protection, and making a training sample for privacy identification; constructing a privacy recognition model through a deep learning network, optimizing hyper-parameters of the deep learning network through an intelligent optimization algorithm, and training the privacy recognition model through the training sample; and carrying out privacy object identification on to-be-protected target data through the trained privacy identification model, and carrying out pasting processing on the identified privacy object. According to the invention, the privacy identification model is established based on the deep learning technology and the intelligent optimization algorithm, and privacy identification and shielding can be automatically carried out on learning interaction data of teachers and students.

title: Identifying optimal weights to improve prediction accuracy in machine learning techniques
abstract_text: A computer-implemented method, system, and computer program product for improving prediction accuracy in machine learning techniques. A teacher model is constructed, where the teacher model generates a weight for each data case. The current student model is then trained using the training data and weights generated by the teacher model. After training the current student model, the current student model generates state features that are used by the teacher model to generate new weights. Candidate student models are then trained using the training data and these new weights. A reward is generated by comparing the current student model to the candidate student model using the training and testing data, the reward being used to update the teacher model if a stop rule is not satisfied. When a stop rule is satisfied, the weight generated by the teacher model is considered as an "best" weight, which is returned to the user.

title: TEXT PROCESSING MODEL TRAINING METHOD, AND TEXT PROCESSING METHOD AND APPARATUS
abstract_text: A text processing model training method, and a text processing method and apparatus in the natural language processing field in the artificial intelligence field are disclosed. The training method includes: obtaining training text; separately inputting the training text into a teacher model and a student model to obtain sample data output by the teacher model and prediction data output by the student model; the sample data includes a sample semantic feature and a sample label; the prediction data includes a prediction semantic feature and a prediction label; and the teacher model is a pre-trained language model used for text classification; and training a model parameter of the student model based on the sample data and the prediction data, to obtain a target student model. The method enables the student model to effectively perform knowledge transfer, thereby improving accuracy of a text processing result of the student model.

title: NEURAL NETWORK MODEL COMPRESSION METHOD AND APPARATUS, STORAGE MEDIUM, AND CHIP
abstract_text: This application provides a neural network model compression method in the field of artificial intelligence. The method includes: obtaining, by a server, a first neural network model and training data of the first neural network that are uploaded by user equipment; obtaining a PU classifier based on the training data of the first neural network and unlabeled data stored in the server; selecting, by using the PU classifier, extended data from the unlabeled data stored in the server, where the extended data has a property and distribution similar to a property and distribution of the training data of the first neural network model; and training a second neural network model by using a knowledge distillation (KD) method based on the extended data, where the first neural network model is used as a teacher network model and the second neural network model is used as a student network model.

title: Student management equipment based on artificial intelligence face recognition
abstract_text: The invention relates to student management equipment based on artificial intelligence face recognition. The student management equipment comprises a shell and a bearing assembly arranged in the shell and used for supporting and conveying test papers. The bearing assembly comprises two connecting rods which are connected through a connecting plate and arranged in parallel, two rubber rolling wheels arranged in the vertical direction of the space are rotationally installed at the two ends of each connecting rod, and the rubber rolling wheels on the same side of the two connecting rods are connected through a transmission rod. And the two rubber rollers at the upper part of one connecting rod are connected through a belt. A frame body connected with the connecting rod is further arranged in the shell, the frame body is connected with a scanner through a first air cylinder, and video detection devices communicating with the first air cylinder are arranged at the two ends of the scanner; and a rotating mechanism for driving the connecting rod to turn over is further arranged in the shell, the rotating mechanism is connected with a power assembly arranged in the shell, the power assembly is connected with the connecting rod, and the practicability is high.

title: DEVICE FOR ESTIMATING COLLEGE ACCEPTANCE OF APPLYING AND THE CONTROL METHOD THEREOF USING MACHINE LEARCNING MODEL
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a device for estimating a college admission using a machine learning model and a control method thereof. According to the present invention, a method for estimating the college admission using a computer can comprise: a step of acquiring college application data of a student; a step of using a machine learning model and quantifying and dividing into a plurality of areas the acquired college application data; a step of determining one or more departments to be recommended to the student based on the acquired college application data; a step of comparing the admission line for each area generated based on the college application data of those students who have been admitted with each area divided of the college application data; a step of identifying the colleges with the one or more departments among the domestic colleges to which the student can be admitted in the order of awareness based on the results of comparison; and a step of providing related information of the identified colleges. The present invention aims to provide a device for estimating a college admission using a machine learning model and a control method thereof, which are capable of recommending colleges to which a student can be admitted.

title: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR PERSONALIZED LEARNING AMOUNT RECOMMENDATION BASED ON BIG DATA AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: Disclosed is a device for recommending a personalized learning amount based on big data and artificial intelligence (AI). The device for recommending the personalized learning amount based on big data and AI comprises: a learning data collection unit collecting a large number of learning data from student terminals corresponding to a large number of users; an academic achievement ability prediction unit predicting the type of academic achievement ability corresponding to each user of each of the student terminals by using the large number of learning data; a learning amount table generation unit pre-processing the learning data in accordance with the predicted type of academic achievement ability, and generating a learning amount table; and a recommended learning amount determination unit determining the recommended learning amount corresponding to a target user by referring to the learning amount table, and providing the determined recommended learning amount to the student terminal of the target user. The present invention aims to provide a device for recommending a personalized learning amount based on big data and AI, which is able to maximize learning effects.

title: DEVICE FOR CAREER RECOGNIZIE AND THE CONTROL METHOD THEREOF USING MACHINE LEARCNING MODEL
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a career recommendation method using a computer, which includes the steps of: obtaining student entrance examination data; quantifying the acquired entrance examination data and dividing the same into a plurality of areas using a machine learning model; determining a job to be recommended for the student and at least one department related to the job, based on non-subject areas among the plurality of areas; and providing the determined job, and at least one department related to the job.

title: Student emotion online analysis system based on artificial intelligence technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student emotion online analysis system based on an artificial intelligence technology. The system comprises an image acquisition module, a model construction module, a training module, a test module and an analysis module. The image acquisition module is used for acquiring student image information, preprocessing the student image information to obtain a student emotion information data set, and dividing the data set into a training set and a test set; the model construction module is used for constructing a student emotion detection model based on the LSTM network; the training module is used for inputting the student emotion information data in the training set into the student emotion detection model for training; the test module is used for testing the trained student emotion detection model based on the test set; and the analysis module is used for preprocessing the image information of the to-be-tested student to obtain emotion information of the to-be-tested student, and inputting the emotion information of the to-be-tested student into the student emotion detection model passing the test to obtain a student emotion recognition result. According to the invention, timeliness and accuracy of student emotion determination are effectively improved.

title: System and method for evaluating whether future development of student is appropriate through model
abstract_text: A system and a method for evaluating whether a future development of a student is appropriate through a model are provided. By obtaining alumni data of alumnus, using machine learning to build a predictive model based on the alumni data, obtaining student data of a student, using the predictive model to predict a future development of the student based on the student data, and determining whether a development direction chosen by the student is appropriate in accordance with the future development, the system and the method can achieve the effect of suggesting students for future development.

title: Personalized service processing method based on big data and AI and cloud computing service system
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a personalized service processing method based on big data and AI and a cloud computing service system, and the method comprises the steps: training a teacher network (a second AI network) through a reference offline behavior data group corresponding to a plurality of offline environment labels, and extracting a part of transmission relation characteristics of a reference offline behavior data sequence through different second AI networks; the method comprises the following steps of: extracting transfer relation characteristics, aggregating according to relation description components of the transfer relation characteristics to obtain aggregated reference offline behavior description, and transferring the aggregated reference offline behavior description to a student network (a third AI network) by means of a dark knowledge extraction mode so as to effectively learn characteristic relation characteristics of the transfer relation characteristics; and the prediction accuracy of the third AI network is improved, so that the offline user demand mining precision can be finally improved.

title: Cross-campus linkage attendance checking method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: ANHUI FISHY BLUE EDUCATION SOFTWARE TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a cross-campus linkage attendance checking method and system based on artificial intelligence, and belongs to the technical field of college student attendance checking, and the system comprises a server, a people number identification module and a roll call module; the people number identification module is used for identifying the number of people in a classroom, calculating the attendance rate, obtaining the classroom of the current school, establishing an identification library according to the classroom, identifying the number of the current classroom, and matching a corresponding identification model in the identification library according to the number of the classroom. Monitoring images of a current classroom in class are collected, the collected monitoring images are sent to the recognition model, the number of students in the current classroom in class is obtained, the number of the students in the current course is obtained, the attendance rate of the current course is calculated according to the collected number of the students and the number of the students in the current course, and the calculated attendance rate is sent to the display terminal to be displayed; and the roll call module is used for the teacher to call the roll and obtain the attendance rate of the current course.

title: Image classification method based on improved online knowledge distillation algorithm
abstract_text: The invention discloses an image classification method based on an improved online knowledge distillation algorithm, and belongs to the technical field of model compression in deep learning. According to the method, a wrong question set is set to store integrated output characteristics in the network training process of students, and whether the integrated output characteristics recorded in the wrong question set are correct or not is judged through real labels of training pictures; and if the recorded features are wrong, updating the network parameters to enable the distribution of the output features zi of each network in the network set to be close to the feature distribution recorded in the error question set, and if the recorded features are wrong, enabling the distribution of zi to be far away from the feature distribution recorded in the error question set. That is to say, historical information integrated and output by a network set is stored by using an error question set and is used as supervision information for student network optimization training, and a reflection mechanism is proposed to enable output distribution of a student network to be far away from wrong historical information and close to correct historical information, so that the student network is forced to learn better features, and the learning efficiency is improved. Therefore, a more accurate classification result is obtained when the image is classified.

title: Test paper correction method based on deep learning
