abstract_text: The invention discloses a test paper correction method based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a test paper image P1 written with a standard answer, collecting a test paper image P2 needing to be corrected, and carrying out the preprocessing; respectively carrying out Hough straight line detection on the pre-processed P1 and P2 to obtain a horizontal straight line position of an answer and further obtain an answer area of a single question; extracting coordinate information of each verification frame in the answer area and data in the verification frame by using a YOLO v3 network, and further calculating a distance between two adjacent verification frames; comparing each piece of data information in the answering area corresponding to the same question serial number in the two test paper images, and counting the number of correct questions and wrong questions in the test paper images needing to be corrected; according to the coordinate information of the test paper needing to be corrected, the student number corresponding to the test paper needing to be corrected is extracted, and whether the student number and all questions on the corresponding test paper are correct or not is stored in a database. The method can be applied to selection questions and gap filling questions of test papers or answer sheets, and is not limited by question types and answer sheet formats.

title: Live course evaluation method based on deep learning
applicants: SHANGHAI GAOTON EDUCATION SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention relates to a live course evaluation method based on deep learning, and the method specifically comprises the following steps: S1, obtaining the facial expression historical data of a student, training the recognition of the facial expression historical data according to deep learning, and obtaining a classroom expression recognition model; s2, a camera of a student end collects facial expression data of a student, and the facial expression data is recognized by a classroom expression recognition model to obtain learning state information; and S3, the learning state information is sent to the server, and the server summarizes and analyzes the learning state information in real time and then outputs the overall understanding degree of the current explanation knowledge point as a live course evaluation result. Compared with the prior art, the method has the advantages that a large number of network resources are saved, the transmission pressure of the server is relieved, the model precision is reduced as little as possible under the condition that the model size is reduced, and the timeliness is high.

title: Model training method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCIENCE TECHNOLOGY CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a model training method and device, equipment and a storage medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning and computer vision, and can be applied to scenes such as image processing and image detection. The model training method comprises the following steps: acquiring a first block feature map based on a first original feature map output by a teacher model; acquiring a second block feature map based on a second original feature map output by the initial student model; constructing a total loss function based on the first block feature map and the second block feature map; and adjusting parameters of the initial student model based on the total loss function to generate a final student model. The knowledge distillation precision can be improved.

title: Deep learning knowledge distillation method and system based on frequency domain supervision
applicants: GUANGDONG AIRPORT WHITE CLOUD INFORMATION TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a deep learning knowledge distillation method and system based on frequency domain supervision, and the method and system train a teacher network, design a student network according to the trained teacher network, employ the same to-be-trained sample data set, enable the teacher network to supervise the student network in the frequency domain, and improve the learning efficiency. The method can ensure that the student network can refine and simulate the edge features of the teacher network, thereby making up the defect that the student network is not ideal for the learning of an area with obvious teacher network feature edge change, and further achieving the purpose of improving the performance of the student network. Meanwhile, the technical scheme provided by the embodiment of the invention can be applied to knowledge distillation of various networks, compression of a complex network can be realized, and the requirements of deploying a lightweight network to a mobile terminal and the like can be favorably realized.

title: Lightweight gesture recognition method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a lightweight gesture recognition method based on deep learning, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: in a hand detection stage, providing an improved MobileNetv2-YOLOv3 network structure, and greatly reducing the parameter quantity and the calculation quantity of a model while ensuring the accuracy; in the hand key point detection stage, an attention-based selective gesture distillation method (Attention-based Selective HAND Distillation, ASHD) is provided, firstly, a knowledge network (Teaser Model, T) and a lightweight basic network (Student Model, S) which are high in expression ability and large in parameter quantity are designed, then structured knowledge of the knowledge network is selectively migrated through the attention-based gesture distillation method, and the hand key point is detected through the Attention-based Selective HAND Distillation method. Jointly training a basic network with a small number of parameters in combination with a real label; in the gesture classification stage, ResNet is adopted as a basic network, and a series of tricks are combined to improve the generalization ability of the model. The method is used for designing a lightweight model, the calculation amount is reduced while the accuracy is guaranteed, and the method can be deployed on embedded equipment with low calculation power requirements.

title: Model training method and device, image recognition method and device and electronic equipment
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCIENCE TECHNOLOGY CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a model training method and device, an image recognition method and device and electronic equipment, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical fields of deep learning, computer vision and the like, and can be applied to scenes such as images. According to the specific implementation scheme, a first sample image is input into a coding sub-network of a student model, a first mean value and a first variance corresponding to the first sample image are obtained, and the student model comprises the coding sub-network and a decoding sub-network; determining a first sample hidden feature of the first sample image based on the first mean value and the first variance; inputting the first sample hidden feature into the decoding sub-network of the student model to obtain a first sample reconstructed image; determining a distillation loss value based on the first mean value, the first variance, the first sample image, the first sample hidden feature and the first sample reconstruction image; and adjusting parameters of the student model based on the distillation loss value.

title: Middle and primary school classroom student face turning detection method based on deep learning
applicants: NANJING TOURIST INTELLIGENT SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention provides a face turning detection method based on deep learning, and the method comprises the following steps: 1, training a deep learning target detection model, and detecting a bounding box; 2, creating a background image; 3, calculating and drawing a central point of the bounding box; 4, carrying out linear detection on the background image; 5, filtering and extracting straight lines, and judging the range that the straight lines cannot intersect and the slope; 6, calculating the center points of the remaining bounding boxes; step 7, fitting the center point into a straight line; 8, dividing the bounding box to a straight line; step 9, dividing the bounding box into rows, and dividing the straight lines into columns; step 10, acquiring the posture of the head of the student; 11, calculating an included angle between a yaw angle of the student head and a straight line corresponding to the bounding box, and judging whether the student turns the face or not; and 12, drawing the straight lines, the bounding boxes, the rows, the columns and the included angles on the image. According to the invention, row and column information of students and face turning can be automatically positioned, and classroom learning listening conditions can be digitally embodied.

title: Method for recommanding educational institute based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a method for recommending a private educational institute based on artificial intelligence, which can analyze student data and private educational institute data using machine learning to recommend the optimal private educational institute suitable for learning propensity or characteristics of a student. To this end, the method for providing a private educational institute recommendation service in a private educational institute recommendation platform based on artificial intelligence, comprises the steps of: analyzing student data input by a user and private educational institute data stored in a database through a first deep learning model to generate private educational institute satisfaction; analyzing the student data input by the user and the private educational institute data stored in the database through a second deep learning model to generate grade improvement; and calculating a recommendation index for each private educational institute on the basis of the private educational institute satisfaction and the grade improvement.

title: AI P2P TECHNIQUE FOR IMPROVING ENVIRONMENT OF REALTIME ONLINE CLASS BY AI FACE ANALYSIS AND P2P CONNECTION
abstract_text: Disclosed is a non-face-to-face online class system. The non-face-to-face online class system comprises: a teacher client creating a lecture image of an online class held by a teacher; student clients generating learning images of students participating in the online class; a media server transmitting an image transmitted from one of the student clients and the teacher client, to the other clients; and a main server managing an interaction between the students and the teacher in the online class. The main server classifies the student clients by group. The student clients provide learning images and lecture images of the other student clients of a group, to which each of the student clients belongs, to the students. The teacher client provides learning images of students who are judged to be lacking in concentration among students, to the teacher. Therefore, the present invention is capable of enabling the students to share learning images with a high image quality.

title: Neural network training method and device, target detection method and device, equipment and medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCIENCE TECHNOLOGY CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a neural network training method and device, a target detection method and device, equipment and a medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to computer vision, image recognition and deep learning technologies. According to the implementation scheme, transformation operation is carried out on a first image sample and a second image sample to obtain a first transformed image to a fourth transformed image; respectively inputting the first transformation image and the third transformation image into a first teacher network and a second teacher network to generate a first pseudo tag and a second pseudo tag; respectively inputting the second transformation image and the fourth transformation image into the second student network and the first student network to generate a first detection result and a second detection result; adjusting parameters of the student network based on the false label and the detection result of the teacher network; adjusting the parameters of the teacher network based on the parameters of the student network; and generating a target neural network based on at least one of the two teacher networks.

title: Adaptive learning system and method compatible with multiple learning models and application
applicants: CHENGDU COMBINED SOURCE BEAUTY INTELLIGENCE EDUCATION SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of machine learning, and discloses an adaptive learning system compatible with multiple learning models, which comprises a student attribute module, a multiple learning model module and an intelligent algorithm and push module. The student attribute module comprises a student basic information unit and a full knowledge point mastering parameter list unit; the multi-learning model module comprises a learning classification label unit and a learning forgetting curve unit; and the intelligent algorithm and push module comprises a knowledge point mastering parameter list traversal unit, a push priority review unit and a weighted average knowledge point acquisition final priority ranking unit. The invention further discloses a self-adaptive learning method compatible with the multiple learning models and application. According to the invention, the learning model is integrated in the assessment of the online learning product, and the optimal learning path of the student is accurately matched.

title: Neural network training method and device, target detection method and device, equipment and medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCIENCE TECHNOLOGY CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a neural network training method and device, a target detection method and device, equipment and a medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to computer vision, image recognition and deep learning technologies. According to the implementation scheme, a first image sample is input into a first sub-network to obtain a first feature map and a first detection result, and the first image sample is input into a second sub-network to obtain a second feature map; performing encoding operation on each first detection frame result in the first detection results to generate a first frame encoding result corresponding to the first detection frame result in the first encoding results; performing self-attention calculation on the first coding result, the first feature map and the second feature map to obtain a first attention result and a second attention result; calculating a first loss value based on the first attention result and the second attention result; and training a student network in the first sub-network and the second sub-network based at least in part on the first loss value.

title: Model training method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCIENCE TECHNOLOGY CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a model training method and device, equipment and a storage medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning and computer vision, and can be applied to the scene fields of image processing, image detection and the like. The specific implementation scheme is as follows: inputting a sample image into a feature extraction network to obtain a sample feature map corresponding to the feature extraction network; wherein the feature extraction network comprises a teacher feature extraction network and a student feature extraction network; determining a first distillation loss according to a category relationship between at least two target objects in sample feature maps corresponding to different feature extraction networks; and training the student feature extraction network according to the first distillation loss. The accuracy of student feature extraction network training can be improved.

title: Natural language understanding model training method and device
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, discloses a natural language understanding model training method and device, and aims to improve the precision and performance of a model as much as possible while compressing the natural language understanding model. The method comprises the following steps: training a perception loss network through training statements and a teacher natural language understanding model and the perception loss network which are cascaded; inputting the training statement into the cascaded teacher natural language understanding model and the trained perception loss network for processing to obtain a third sentence vector, and inputting the training statement into the cascaded student natural language understanding model and the trained perception loss network for processing to obtain a fourth sentence vector; calculating the perception loss of the fourth sentence vector relative to the third sentence vector; and adjusting parameters of the student natural language understanding model according to the perception loss to obtain a trained student natural language understanding model.

title: AUTONOMOUS AND CONTINUOUSLY SELF-IMPROVING LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A system and methods are provided in which an artificial intelligence inference module identifies targeted information in large-scale unlabeled data, wherein the artificial intelligence inference module autonomously learns hierarchical representations from large-scale unlabeled data and continually self-improves from self-labeled data points using a teacher model trained to detect known targets from combined inputs of a small hand labeled curated dataset prepared by a domain expert together with self-generated intermediate and global context features derived from the unlabeled dataset by unsupervised and self-supervised processes. The trained teacher model processes further unlabeled data to self-generate new weakly-supervised training samples that are self-refined and self-corrected, without human supervision, and then used as inputs to a noisy student model trained in a semi-supervised learning process on a combination of the teacher model training set and new weakly-supervised training samples. With each iteration, the noisy student model continually self-optimizes its learned parameters against a set of configurable validation criteria such that the learned parameters of the noisy student surpass and replace the learned parameter of the prior iteration teacher model, with these optimized learned parameters periodically used to update the artificial intelligence inference module.

title: LEARNING COACH FOR MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A machine learning system includes a coach machine learning system that uses machine learning to help a student machine learning system learn its system. By monitoring the student learning system, the coach machine learning system can learn (through machine learning techniques) “hyperparameters” for the student learning system that control the machine learning process for the student learning system. The machine learning coach could also determine structural modifications for the student learning system architecture. The learning coach can also control data flow to the student learning system.

title: Image processing model training method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses an image processing model training method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining a student prediction result of a labeled source domain image through a student detection network; respectively obtaining a student prediction result and a teacher prediction result of the target domain image without the label through a student detection network and a teacher detection network; obtaining a domain classification result of the source domain image and a domain classification result of the target domain image through a domain classification network; and training the image processing model according to the student prediction result of the source domain image, the student prediction result and the teacher prediction result of the target domain image and the domain classification result. According to the method, the image processing model is trained based on the source domain images with the labels and the target domain images without the labels, so that the recognition accuracy of the image processing model can be ensured through a large number of target domain images without the labels under the condition that the number of the source domain images with the labels is limited.

title: TRAINING DISTILLED MACHINE LEARNING MODELS USING A PRE-TRAINED FEATURE EXTRACTOR
abstract_text: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on a computer storage medium, for training a student machine learning model using a teacher machine learning model that has a pre-trained feature extractor. In one aspect, a method includes obtaining data specifying the teacher machine learning model that is configured to perform a machine learning task; obtaining first training data; training the teacher machine learning model on the first training data to obtain a trained teacher machine learning model; generating second, automatically labeled training data by using the trained teacher machine learning model to process unlabeled training data; and training a student machine learning model to perform the machine learning task using at least the second, automatically labeled training data, wherein the student machine learning model does not include the pre-trained feature extractor and instead includes a different feature extractor having fewer parameters than the pre-trained feature extractor.

title: Circuit connection analysis algorithm based on image deep learning
applicants: SHANGHAI TIN TRIPOD INTELLIGENT SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a circuit connection analysis algorithm based on image deep learning, and the algorithm comprises the following steps: firstly adjusting an original image to a fixed size, then carrying out the preliminary feature extraction of the adjusted original image, carrying out the down-sampling, obtaining a first feature map, extracting the position features at the position of the first feature map, and carrying out the processing, thereby obtaining a second feature map; judging whether features in the second feature map are matched or not; performing loss calculation according to a matching relationship; performing up-sampling on the first feature map for multiple times, performing information labeling, performing calculation to obtain segmentation loss and connection point positioning part loss, and inputting an image. And outputting the segmentation result of the wire, the endpoint position corresponding to the wire and the feature vector corresponding to the endpoint, and judging whether the endpoint is in a connection state or not according to the feature vector corresponding to the endpoint. According to the invention, whether the circuit connection is correct or not during the experiment of the student is judged through the steps, so that a teacher can better know the mastering condition of the student on knowledge points.

title: Computational question intelligent judgment system based on deep learning
applicants: MIDDLE EDUCATION CLOUD INTELLIGENCE DIGITAL SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a calculation question intelligent judgment system based on deep learning, which comprises an information acquisition platform and a comparison platform, and is characterized in that the information acquisition platform comprises an information interception module, an information preprocessing module and a content identification module, and the information interception module is electrically connected with the information preprocessing module; the content identification module is electrically connected with the information preprocessing module, the information interception module is used for photographing student answer sheets, the information preprocessing module is used for preprocessing photos photographed by the information interception module, and the comparison platform comprises a content judgment module and a score calculation module. The content judgment module is electrically connected with the content recognition module, and the score calculation module is electrically connected with the content judgment module. According to the scheme, through the MASTER model and the easy confusion mechanism, the OCR recognition accuracy of the computational questions is effectively improved, intelligent judgment can be performed on the computational questions, and compared with previous intelligent judgment of selection questions and gap filling questions, obvious progress is made.

title: Identifying optimal weights to improve prediction accuracy in machine learning techniques
abstract_text: A computer-implemented method,system and computer program product for improving prediction accuracy in machine learning techniques. A teacher model is constructed: wherein the teacher model generates a weight for each data case.The current student model is then trained using training data and the weights generated by the teacher model. After training the current student model, the current student model generates state features: which are used by the teacher model to generate new weights. A candidate student model is then trained using training data and these new weights. A reward is generated by comparing the current student model with the candidate student model using training and testing data,which is used to update the teacher model if a stopping rule has not been satisfied. Upon a stopping rule being satisfied, the weights generated by the teacher model are deemed to be the "optimal"weights which are returned to the user.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR TRAINING IMAGE RECOGNITION MODEL, AND METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR RECOGNIZING IMAGE
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: The present disclosure provides a method and apparatus for training an image recognition model, and a method and apparatus for recognizing an image, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and particularly to the fields of deep learning and computer vision. A specific implementation comprises: acquiring a tagged sample set, an untagged sample set and a knowledge distillation network; and performing following training steps: selecting an input sample from the tagged sample set and the untagged sample set, and accumulating a number of iterations; inputting respectively the input sample into a student network and a teacher network of the knowledge distillation network to train the student network and the teacher network; and selecting an image recognition model from the student network and the teacher network, if a training completion condition is satisfied.

title: ENVIRONMENT-SPECIFIC TRAINING OF MACHINE LEARNING MODELS
abstract_text: A method for environment-specific training of a machine learning model, comprises receiving, for a local environment, a data stream including a plurality of sequential data snippets. Programmed labels are generated for each data snippet using a student version of a machine learning model. A portion of data snippets and associated programmed labels are selected and uploaded to a server-side computing device for evaluation by a teacher version of the machine learning model. An environment-specific training update is received from the server-side computing device. This training update is based on a comparison of the selected programmed labels and pseudolabels generated for the selected portion of data snippets by the teacher version. The environment-specific training update is applied to the student version to generate an updated student version. The updated student version of the machine learning model is then used to generate programmed labels for newly received data snippets.

title: Remote sensing image surface feature recognition and classification method and device based on weak supervised learning
applicants: COMPUTER NETWORK INFORMATION CENTER OF CHINESE ACAD OF SCIENCES
abstract_text: The invention relates to a remote sensing image surface feature recognition and classification method and device based on weak supervised learning. The method comprises the following steps: reading a partially labeled multi-source remote sensing image, and constructing a labeled sample data set and an unlabeled sample data set; establishing an annotation training set and an annotation verification set; establishing a teacher model and a student model; pre-training the teacher model; obtaining a prediction result of unlabeled data according to the trained teacher model, and taking the prediction result as a pseudo label; reading an unlabeled sample data set and a pseudo label, and constructing a pseudo-labeled training set; inputting an annotation training set, an annotation verification set and a pseudo-annotation training set, performing random data enhancement, and training a student model; and inputting the prediction data set into the trained student model to obtain a ground feature identification and classification result. According to the method, the machine learning model is established by using the partially labeled multi-source remote sensing image, and the established model is used for identifying the surface feature type, so that the accuracy of surface feature element identification and classification can be remarkably improved.

title: Cathexis learning system and method using AI in an untact learning based on Web browser
abstract_text: Disclosed are a cathexis learning system using artificial intelligence (Al) in web browser-based untact learning and a method thereof. The cathexis learning system comprises: a learning content server for providing untact lecture learning content; and a user terminal which connects to the learning content server to run an educational content viewer program, and has an educational content viewer installed thereon so that learners learn learning content in an Al cathexis manner by using AI face/motion recognition and sound playback technology for the image data of the front camera of the user terminal in untact learning. In the untact learning, the educational content viewer of the user terminal has a media playback unit and a facial contour recognition unit module, generates an alarm/warning message by using sound and messaging technology when the gaze of the student deviates therefrom at an angle through facial contour recognition on the feature points of five points of two eyes, a nose, and two ears so that the student learns untact lecture learning content focused on the camera of the user terminal linked to the learning content server (ubcloud server) while viewing the same, in the Al cathexis manner, and provides web browser-based untact cathexis learning using Al.

title: Personal solitary value detection method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides a personal soliton value detection method based on artificial intelligence, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and is mainly used for soliton value detection of student individuals. Comprising the following steps: acquiring a regional video image, acquiring real-time position information of each target in the regional video image, and performing face recognition on each target; the regional video image comprises at least one target; obtaining the action track of each target through the real-time position information, and calculating the action distance of each target; performing head posture detection on each target to obtain a visual attention value of each target; obtaining each target interaction value through the action distance and the visual attention value; establishing a directed weighted graph, and respectively obtaining a payment value and a harvest value of each target interaction value through an adjacent matrix of the directed weighted graph; and obtaining each target soliton value through the output value and the harvest value. Through the technical means provided by the invention, the soliton value is measured through personal payment and personal feedback, so that the soliton value is more in line with the feeling of students, and the measurement result is more accurate.

title: Model distillation method, device and equipment based on multi-teacher model and storage medium
applicants: SAFE SCIENCE AND TECH SHENZHEN LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a model distillation method based on a multi-teacher model, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining training sample data and corresponding hard tags, and carrying out the recognition of the training sample data through a plurality of teacher and first student models, and obtaining a plurality of first soft tags and second soft tags; performing knowledge distillation learning on the first student model according to the hard tag, the plurality of first soft tags and the second soft tag, generating a second student model, and obtaining a third soft tag through the second student model; updating a teacher model selection strategy according to the first soft label and the third soft label to obtain an updated teacher model selection strategy, re-determining a corresponding teacher model based on the updated teacher model selection strategy, and performing knowledge distillation learning on the first student model according to the re-determined teacher model until the first student model converges, and obtaining a target student model. Therefore, the student model obtained through distillation can achieve the best performance, and the user experience is improved.

title: Automatic student status authentication method and device, computer equipment and storage medium
applicants: CHINESE SAFETY LIFE INSURANCE STOCK LTD COMPANY
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and relates to an automatic school roll authentication method, which comprises the following steps: acquiring a to-be-recognized picture, and preprocessing the to-be-recognized picture to obtain a preprocessed picture; extracting text information and verification code pictures in the preprocessed pictures, obtaining a verification code classification model, and classifying and identifying the verification code pictures in the preprocessed pictures according to the verification code classification model to obtain verification code categories of the verification code pictures; matching a corresponding verification code extraction model according to the verification code category, and extracting verification code information in the verification code picture according to the verification code extraction model; and acquiring a network address of the target website, skipping to the target website according to the network address, logging in to the target website based on the verification code information and the text information, and automatically verifying the student status information according to the target website. The invention further provides an automatic school status authentication device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The verification code information may be stored in a block chain. The student status authentication efficiency is improved.

title: College professional course score prediction method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to a college professional course score prediction method based on deep learning, and the method comprises the following steps: selecting a course of which the score needs to be predicted as a subsequent course, and obtaining the correlation support degree of the subsequent course and a leading course set according to the historical data of student scores; selecting a leading course set with the maximum association support degree with the subsequent courses, and establishing a subsequent course score prediction neural network model; training the subsequent course score prediction neural network model to obtain a final training model; and inputting the score of the leading course set into the final training model to obtain a subsequent course prediction score. Compared with the prior art, the method has the advantages of accurate prediction result and the like.

title: Knowledge tracking method and system based on hierarchical refined LSTM (Long Short Term Memory) network
abstract_text: The invention provides a knowledge tracking method and system based on a hierarchical refined LSTM network, and belongs to the technical field of knowledge tracking, and the method comprises the steps: constructing a deep tracking knowledge model: constructing a deep tracking knowledge model through the layering process of a preliminary learning layer, a double-layer attention layer and a deep learning layer; the knowledge mastering condition of the student is obtained in the learning process of the student; the knowledge mastering condition of the student is fused with a self-attention mechanism to serve as input of the LSTM network, and the final knowledge mastering condition of the student is obtained through calculation; and predicting whether the student answers the question correctly based on the final knowledge mastering condition of the student. According to the method, the knowledge tracking performance is improved, meanwhile, interpretability is provided to a certain extent, and learners can be better helped to make personalized plans.

title: METHOD FOR EARLY DIAGNOSING GIFTEDNESS USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND THE SAME PLATFORM
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a method for early diagnosis of giftedness using artificial intelligence and a platform thereof. According to the present invention, the method for early diagnosis of giftedness using artificial intelligence can comprise: a step in which an input unit receives a written answer to a predetermined written survey from a user terminal of a subject student; a step in which a written test unit calculates a written assessment score on the written survey based on the written answer; a step in which an experience test unit provides an experience content performed in an online or offline space to the user terminal, and calculates an experience assessment score evaluating the performance ability of the experience content based on the answer to the experience content entered into the user terminal as multimedia data; and a step in which a report generation unit generates a report on giftedness based on the written assessment score and the experience assessment score. The present invention aims to provide a method for early diagnosis of giftedness using artificial intelligence and a platform thereof, which are capable of efficiently discovering and managing gifted children.

title: Binary neural network model training method and system and image processing method and system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a binary neural network model training method and system and an image processing method and system, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. Wherein in the online knowledge distillation enhanced binary neural network training framework, a teacher network is an initial real-value neural network model and an initial auxiliary neural network model, and a student network is an initial binary neural network model; the three network models are trained by using an online distillation method, so that the performance of the binary neural network is improved, and meanwhile, the binary neural network model is used for carrying out image classification processing on the to-be-processed image, so that the accuracy of image classification is improved.

title: Question and answer identification method and device, electronic equipment and readable storage medium
applicants: SUNLIGHT INSURANCE GROUP SHARE LTD COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a question and answer identification method and device, electronic equipment and a readable storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: receiving a question and answer request for a target question; based on the question-answering request for the target question, determining an answer corresponding to the target question by adopting a pre-trained question-answering model; wherein the question and answer model is a student model obtained by training based on the second sample data set and a teacher model, and the teacher model is constructed based on the first sample data set and a converter-based bidirectional coding representation model. Therefore, when the questions and answers are recognized, the response speed of question answering can be increased, and consumed resources can be reduced.

title: Student classroom behavior detection method, system and terminal based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student classroom behavior detection method and system based on deep learning, and a terminal, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the extraction of collected student classroom behaviors, and taking an obtained student abnormal behavior picture as a sample data set; dividing the sample data set into a training set and a test set, and labeling the training set according to the types of the abnormal behaviors to obtain training label data; processing the training label data based on a K-means + + algorithm to obtain a priori frame parameter; a YOLOv4-XS target detection model is constructed based on the training set, the prior frame parameters, a YOLOv4 target detection algorithm, a CBAM attention mechanism and DenseNets; based on the loss function of the YOLOv3 and the CIOU loss, constructing a loss function of a YOLOv4-XS target detection model; and inputting the training set into a YOLOv4-XS target detection model for training, continuously iterating a loss function until convergence, obtaining an optimal network weight, performing test verification with the test set, and identifying the classroom behavior of the student. According to the invention, multiple targets can be identified and detected, and the detection precision and speed are improved.

title: Decentralised artificial intelligence (AI)/machine learning training system
abstract_text: A decentralised training platform is described for training an Artificial Intelligence (AI) model where training data (e.g. medical images) is distributed across multiple sites (nodes) and due to confidentiality, legal, or other reasons the data at each site is unable to be shared or leave the site and so cannot be copied to a central location for training. The method comprises training a teacher model locally at each node and then moving each of the teacher models to a central node and using these to train a student model using a transfer dataset. This may be facilitated by setting up the cloud service using inter-region peering connections between the nodes to make the nodes appear as a single cluster. In one variation the student module may be trained at each node using the multiple trained teacher models. In another variation we train multiple student models where each student model is trained by each teacher model at the node the teacher model was trained on, and once the plurality of student models are trained, an ensemble model is generated from the plurality of trained student models. Loss function weighting and node under sampling to enable load balancing may be used to improve accuracy and time/cost efficiency.

title: UTILIZING A JOINT-LEARNING SELF-DISTILLATION FRAMEWORK FOR IMPROVING TEXT SEQUENTIAL LABELING MACHINE-LEARNING MODELS
abstract_text: This disclosure describes one or more implementations of a text sequence labeling system that accurately and efficiently utilize a joint-learning self-distillation approach to improve text sequence labeling machine-learning models. For example, in various implementations, the text sequence labeling system trains a text sequence labeling machine-learning teacher model to generate text sequence labels. The text sequence labeling system then creates and trains a text sequence labeling machine-learning student model utilizing the training and the output of the teacher model. Upon the student model achieving improved results over the teacher model, the text sequence labeling system re-initializes the teacher model with the learned model parameters of the student model and repeats the above joint-learning self-distillation framework. The text sequence labeling system then utilizes a trained text sequence labeling model to generate text sequence labels from input documents.

title: Model training method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a model training method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the method relates to the deep learning direction in the field of artificial intelligence, and comprises the steps: obtaining a teacher model and a student model; obtaining a first prediction result, wherein the first prediction result is obtained by predicting sample data in the sample data set by the teacher model; obtaining the credibility of the teacher model to the first prediction result, wherein the credibility is used for representing the credibility of the first prediction result; updating the first prediction result according to the credibility, and taking the updated first prediction result as a second prediction result; obtaining a difference between the second prediction result and a student model prediction sample data result; and based on the difference, updating parameters of the student model to train the student model. According to the embodiment of the invention, through the credibility of predicting the sample data by the teacher model, the label corresponding to the sample data can be accurately determined, so that the training effect and efficiency of the student model are improved.

title: Information recommendation method and system, storage medium and server
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses an information recommendation method and system, a storage medium and a server, and is applied to the technical field of information processing based on artificial intelligence. An information recommendation list corresponding to an information access request is output through a pre-trained information recommendation model, and in the pre-training process of the information recommendation model, a part of corresponding sample information can be selected through a teacher filtering sub-module and a student filtering sub-module; according to the method, training samples which interfere with training of the teacher sub-module and the student sub-module are filtered out, so that training of the information recommendation model is more accurate, and due to the fact that sample information processed by the teacher sub-module and the student sub-module is less, time spent on training of the information recommendation model is less, and training efficiency is improved. In the embodiment of the invention, when the application background carries out information recommendation to the application terminal, the information recommendation is more accurate, and the response time is reduced.

title: Image processing method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses an image processing method and device, equipment and a storage medium, belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and can be applied to a multimedia resource processing scene. In the embodiment of the invention, the student model is trained in a full supervision mode based on the first sample image and in an unsupervised mode based on the second sample image, and the teacher model is trained based on the second sample image, so that the first image processing model with relatively high accuracy is obtained; then, a pseudo label of the second sample image is determined through the first image processing model, so that a technician does not need to manually label the second sample image; according to the embodiment of the invention, the second image processing model is trained in a full supervision mode based on the labeled first sample image and the labeled second sample image, and the accuracy of the labeled images of the two types of sample images is high, so that the accuracy of the trained second image processing model is high. According to the scheme, the workload of data annotation is reduced, and the accuracy of model training is improved.

title: Oral calculation result identification method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING XIANGZHOU SCIENCE AND TECH DEVELOPMENT LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention provides an oral calculation result identification method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of obtaining reply voice of students for oral calculation questions; recognizing text content in the reply voice to obtain a reply text in a Chinese character format; when the predefined keyword exists in the reply text, converting Chinese characters with the same pinyin as the Arabic numerals before and after the keyword into Arabic numerals, and determining an export calculation answer according to the Arabic numerals and the keyword; and when the predefined keyword does not exist in the reply text, converting the Chinese characters with the same pinyin as the Arabic numerals in the reply text into Arabic numerals, determining an oral calculation answer according to the Arabic numerals, and matching the oral calculation answer with the standard reply to obtain an oral calculation result. According to the method and device, the electronic equipment and the storage medium provided by the invention, the oral calculation result of the student can be quickly, accurately and automatically identified, and intelligent oral calculation practice evaluation is realized.

title: Text keyword extraction method
applicants: TIANJIN PHOTOELECTRIC COMMUNICATION TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of text processing, in particular to a text keyword extraction method which comprises the following steps: S1, establishing a keyword extraction model which comprises a BERT model layer, a Bi-LSTM model layer and a CRF model layer; s2, a training sample is constructed, the training sample comprises a plurality of texts, the training sample is used for training the keyword extraction model, meanwhile, the keyword extraction model serves as a Student model, a Teaser model is constructed through a TF-IDF algorithm, a knowledge distillation framework is established through a TextRank algorithm, the Student model is made to be close to the Teaser model, and a knowledge distillation framework is established; further optimizing the keyword extraction model; and S3, extracting the text keywords by using the trained keyword extraction model. The method does not depend on priori knowledge excessively, a large-volume model can be trained by using a small amount of data, various defects existing in a traditional machine learning method are overcome, and the keyword extraction accuracy is improved.

title: In-school safety detection method and system based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention provides a school safety detection method and system based on deep learning, and relates to the field of deep learning. The school safety detection method based on deep learning comprises the following steps: collecting image data and basic data information of a student during a school, and carrying out data preprocessing; performing feature extraction on the original frame image of the student during the school through a convolutional neural network, and generating a feature map; a feature map is weighted in two dimensions of a channel and a space axis by using an attention mechanism, and a feature response value is adjusted to emphasize or suppress information, so that the expressive power of the network is improved; and performing weighted summation according to the feature map to obtain an attention weight coefficient, and further obtaining a safety judgment result. The method can recognize the occurrence of abnormal conditions of students based on a deep learning model, and carries out the prediction and blocking before the occurrence of dangerous conditions.

title: Wind turbine generator energy efficiency state monitoring method and device and storage medium
applicants: CLEAN ENERGY BRANCH COMPANY OF HUA ENERGY ZHEJIANG ENERGY DEV CO LTD
CHINESE CHINA ENERGY GROUP CLEAN ENERGY TECH RESEARCH INSTITUTE LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a wind turbine generator energy efficiency state monitoring method and device and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the fields of deep learning, neural networks, natural language processing, wind turbine generators and new energy. According to the specific implementation scheme, wind turbine generator monitoring data are obtained; preprocessing the monitoring data of the wind turbine generator; determining first data based on the preprocessed wind turbine generator monitoring data; determining a test set based on the first data; and inputting data in the test set into a pre-trained knowledge distillation student model to obtain a wind turbine generator energy efficiency state prediction result. The accuracy of monitoring the abnormal energy efficiency state of the wind turbine generator is improved, and the monitoring operation cost of the wind turbine generator is reduced.

title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR GENERATING LEARNING MAP
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a technique for using an artificial intelligence (AI)-based learning model to generate a learning map and providing an optimal learning plan in consideration of a student's current level on a learning map to guide the student's study. According to one aspect of the present invention, a method performed by the learning map generation apparatus comprises the following steps: receiving learning curriculum data, learning textbook data, and workbook data; extracting a plurality of learning terms from the learning curriculum data, the learning textbook data, and the workbook data; extracting associations between the plurality of extracted learning terms to generate a learning map on the basis of the plurality of learning terms and the associations; and extracting difficulty of learning terms extracted from problems included in the workbook data to generate problem difficulty data.

title: Model distillation method, device and equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCIENCE TECHNOLOGY CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a model distillation method, device and equipment and a storage medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning and computer vision, and can be used for scenes such as image processing and image detection. According to the specific implementation scheme, sample images are input into a teacher model and a student model respectively, and first sample features and second sample features are obtained; performing physical transformation on the first sample feature and the second sample feature to obtain a first disturbance feature and a second disturbance feature; determining distillation loss according to the first sample feature, the second sample feature, the first disturbance feature and the second disturbance feature; and training the student model according to the distillation loss. According to the technology disclosed by the invention, the training precision of the student model can be improved.

title: Query device for quickly searching student information by using AI face recognition in school
applicants: QINGDAO CLOUDING CLOTHING UNITED SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses an inquiry device for quickly searching student information by using AI face recognition in a school, which comprises an inquiry main body, a touch display screen is arranged on the surface of the front end of the inquiry main body, a camera is arranged right above the touch display screen, loudspeakers are respectively arranged on the left side surface and the right side surface of the inquiry main body, and the left side surface and the right side surface of the inquiry main body are respectively provided with a display screen. Two hanging holes are formed in the surface of the rear end of the query main body, and the interior of the query main body is mainly composed of a control circuit board, a Bluetooth module, a data storage module, a PLC, a face recognition system and a power module. The invention relates to a query device for quickly searching student information by using AI face recognition in a school, which is mainly applied to school classrooms, identifies and quickly searches personal information and academic performance of students by using an AI face recognition system, and can also be used for public query of curriculum arrangement, on-duty arrangement and the like. Compared with traditional posting score tables, curriculum schedules, duty tables and the like, paper is saved, and the intelligent degree and the humanization degree are more prominent.

title: Pronunciation evaluation method, training method of pronunciation evaluation system, device and equipment
applicants: ITALIAN MOUSSE INTELLIGENCE SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a pronunciation evaluation method, and a training method, device and equipment of a pronunciation evaluation system, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a to-be-evaluated pronunciation audio; extracting phoneme information of the pronunciation audio to be evaluated; based on the phoneme information of the to-be-evaluated pronunciation audio and the phoneme information of the teacher pronunciation audio corresponding to the to-be-evaluated pronunciation audio, obtaining the similarity between the to-be-evaluated pronunciation audio and the teacher pronunciation audio; and based on the similarity, determining the pronunciation score of the pronunciation audio to be evaluated. According to the technical scheme provided by the embodiment of the invention, the similarity between the pronunciation of the student and the pronunciation of the teacher is determined by comparing the universal phonemes applicable to multiple languages corresponding to the pronunciation of the student in any language and the pronunciation of the teacher, so that the score of the pronunciation of the student is obtained, and the pronunciation evaluation of multiple languages is realized without multiple models; the pronunciation evaluation complexity is effectively reduced, and meanwhile storage resources are saved.

title: College student score prediction method and device based on behavior characteristics, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a college student score prediction method and device based on behavior characteristics, equipment and a storage medium, and belongs to the field of score prediction. Compared with the existing algorithm, the data representation method and the behavior feature extraction method adopted by the invention can extract more effective behavior features. Specifically, in a first semester score prediction scene, compared with an existing algorithm, the algorithm provided by the invention has a great advantage in prediction precision, in a disqualified prediction task, the F1-measure is 0.5051, the F1-measure obtained by a GBDT algorithm with the highest precision in classical machine learning algorithms is 0.4849, in a comprehensive score prediction task, the R2 obtained by the algorithm provided by the invention is 0.2734, and the result is more accurate. R2 obtained by the random forest algorithm with the highest precision in classical machine learning algorithms is 0.2532.

title: Method and device for generating edge model and electronic equipment
applicants: BEIJING YONGXIANG CLOUD SCIENCE AND TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a method and device for generating an edge model and electronic equipment, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a plurality of pieces of sample data used for training a student model, and determining the difficulty value of at least part of the sample data; dividing the process of training the student model into n stages, and determining a sample set containing multiple pieces of sample data in each stage; and on the basis of the teacher model, sequentially inputting the sample set of each stage into the student model for training, and generating an edge model. Through the method and the device for generating the edge model and the electronic equipment provided by the embodiment of the invention, the student model is trained in stages from easy to difficult, so that the speed of training the student model can be improved; and because the edge model is used for replacing a machine learning model which occupies a large space resource, the consumption of the space resource can be reduced, and the bearing pressure of the edge equipment is relieved.

title: Privacy protection method for knowledge migration in distributed machine learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a privacy protection method for knowledge migration in distributed machine learning, which comprises the following steps that: each client respectively trains an own model as a teacher model, a service requester provides public data which is not labeled for the client to predict by using the teacher model, a cloud server aggregates the prediction result of the teacher model, and the prediction result of the teacher model is transmitted to the client; a corresponding label is given through a security comparison algorithm, and a service requester uses the given label for training to obtain a student model; according to the method, in the whole training process, the aggregated cloud server does not directly access any user data, and other any information is not leaked except for the tag which is the highest ticket after differential privacy noise addition.

title: Student posture detection analysis and efficiency evaluation method based on OpenPose
abstract_text: The invention provides an OpenPose-based posture monitoring analysis and efficiency evaluation method when a student writes homework. Comprising the following steps: 1) acquiring limb movement and facial expression data of a student during doing homework through real-time monitoring; 2) the collected data comprises facial expressions of shoulders, a neck, a head, elbow joints, wrists, fingers, eyes, a nose, a mouth and the like; and 3) analyzing the actions of the students through OpenPose human body posture recognition and deep learning. And 4) when the OpenPose identifies the action of the student, the OpenPose also can monitor the distance between the student and the desk, prompt the student to pay attention to the sitting posture, prompt the student to concentrate on learning for a long time, prompt the student to have a proper rest, and ensure health. And 5) analyzing the current learning state of the student, whether the student is distracted or not, whether the student is concentrated or not and the like through various collected data.

title: Student posture recognition analysis method based on computer vision
abstract_text: The invention aims to provide a student posture recognition and analysis method based on computer vision. The method is used for solving the problems that 1) real-time posture and posture data of a student during homework doing is acquired through a video sensor; (2) the distance between the body part of the student and the desk is measured in real time through an infrared distance sensor. And (3) the collected data comprises facial expressions of shoulders, necks, heads, elbow joints, wrists, fingers, waists, knees, feet, eyes, noses, mouths and the like of the students. And 4) analyzing the action posture of the student doing homework through a computer vision related technology, a convolutional neural network and other deep learning algorithms. And 5) training various actions, such as head scratching, lying, body inclining to one side and the like, which are easy to occur in standard sitting postures and homework doing of students, and establishing a comparison database. And 6) processing the video through a DensePose technology, comparing the result with the trained data, judging the current posture state of the student, and sending out a voice prompt if the posture state is not standard.

title: OpenPose-based student supervision auxiliary tool
abstract_text: In the learning process, real-time actions of pupils are monitored through a camera, a human body target of a deep learning human body detection model is used for detection, and then a human body target skeleton feature vector is extracted by using OpenPose; the extracted human body skeleton feature vector is sent to a pupil action recognition classifier of an offline training number for recognition and classification, and finally, the recognized human body target has a single-frame image which is not learned at ease for buffering and storing, and if the image appears too many times in a short time, an alarm prompt is given. Therefore, the non-learning state behaviors of primary and secondary school students can be identified and monitored. Student learning is supervised and assisted through data statistics and interconnection with parents.

title: METHOD FOR AUTOMATICALLY GENERATING VOCABULARY PROBLEMS BY USING DEEP LEARNING-BASED WORD MEANING CLARIFICATION MODEL, COMPUTER PROGRAM THEREOF, AND SERVER DEVICE THEREOF
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a method for automatically generating vocabulary problems by using a deep learning-based word meaning clarification model, a computer program thereof, and a server device thereof. According to the present invention, a deep learning-based word meaning clarification model is used to generate potential answers of high difficulty in vocabulary problems so as to provide an examinee or student who has been given the problems with the opportunity to deeply investigate and understand the meanings of the corresponding words. In addition, vocabulary problems are automatically generated using the deep learning-based word meaning clarification model merely by inputting target words, and thus the student can repeatedly receive problems about desired words, and a company that generates problems can also reduce the cost and time required to generate the problems.

title: Large-scale point cloud data processing method and device, equipment and medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCIENCE TECHNOLOGY CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an age recognition model generation method, an age recognition method and equipment, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning, and comprises the steps that a training image set is used for training a teacher model, and distributed age tags are marked in training images; inputting the plurality of label-free images into the trained teacher model, and marking matched distributed age labels in the label-free images according to a distributed age prediction result provided by the teacher model to form a new training image; and expanding the training image set by using the new training image, and training the student model by using the expanded training image set to obtain an age identification model. According to the technical scheme, the scale of the training set of the age recognition model can be expanded, and the effectiveness and accuracy of the age recognition model are improved.

title: Method, apparatus and computer program product for generating model clusters
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCIENCE TECHNOLOGY CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a method and device for generating a model cluster, electronic equipment, a storage medium and a computer program product, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning and computer vision, and can be used in face image processing and face image recognition scenes. According to the specific implementation scheme, different degrees of model distillation are carried out on a pre-trained teacher model, and a plurality of student models are obtained; based on training data in the training data set, first feature information is obtained through a teacher model, and second feature information is obtained through a plurality of student models; determining a loss function according to the first feature information and the second feature information; updating the plurality of student models based on the loss function; and determining the trained student models as a target model cluster. According to the invention, the model cluster comprising a plurality of student models with different scales and high accuracy can be obtained.

title: Intelligent analysis method for class attending state of student
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an intelligent analysis method for the class attending state of students. Respectively acquiring images of students and teachers and audio information of the teachers in the same time period; respectively analyzing each first image and each second image through a student posture analysis network and a teacher posture analysis network in an intelligent analysis network to obtain first posture information of each student and second posture information of a teacher; inputting the first attitude information, the average attitude information and the key point influence coefficient vector corresponding to each student into a first encoder to obtain a first feature map of the corresponding student; the second posture information is input into a second encoder to obtain a second embedded vector, the audio information is input into a full-connection network to obtain a first embedded vector, and the first embedded vector and the second embedded vector form a teacher state vector; and the first feature map and the teacher state vector are simultaneously input into the classification network to obtain the classification vector of the class attending state of each student. Compared with the prior art, the detection result is more accurate.

title: Information pushing method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: SAFETY INTERNATIONAL SMART CITY SCIENCE AND TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides an information pushing method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the student information of a plurality of students participating in a course activity event; according to the user relation information, the course activity information and the skill learning information in the multiple pieces of student information, constructing a heterogeneous graph corresponding to the course activity event; taking the plurality of heterogeneous graphs as training samples, and performing iterative training on a preset graph neural network to obtain a trained heterogeneous graph neural network; obtaining label information of the to-be-promoted advertisement, wherein the label information is related to at least one of the user relation information, the course activity information and the skill learning information; and inputting the label information into a heterogeneous graph neural network for prediction so as to determine a plurality of target users, and pushing the to-be-promoted advertisement to the plurality of target users. The invention also relates to a block chain technology, can realize accurate delivery of the advertisement information, and improves the conversion rate of the advertisement information.

title: Feature space reformation-based teacher-student architecture noise-tag-containing image classification method
applicants: UNIFORM ENTROPY EDUCATIONAL SCIENCE AND TECH TIN FREE LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teacher-student architecture noise-label-containing image classification method based on feature space reforming, and belongs to the field of noise label learning and image classification. The success of deep learning mainly depends on a large-scale tagged data set. Most of data sets are manually labeled, so that the labeling accuracy is difficult to guarantee. Therefore, noise tags are inevitable in a real-world data set. Due to the strong learning ability of the deep neural network, the noise label is very easy to over-fit, and the model performance is reduced. In order to solve the problem, the invention provides a teacher-student structure based on feature space reformation, and the teacher-student structure is used for learning noise labels. A teacher model is trained to correct noise labels for student models. A feature space reforming mechanism is applied to guide a student model to carry out self-learning, so that the student model learns more meaningful information. We assess our methods on the three reference data sets. Experimental results verify the effectiveness of the proposed architecture.

title: Radiation therapy plan parameters with privacy assurance
abstract_text: Techniques for generating partitions with privacy are provided. The techniques include receiving a medical image; processing the medical images using a student machine learning model to estimate radiation therapy plan parameters, the student machine learning model being trained to establish a relationship between a plurality of common training medical images and corresponding radiation therapy plan parameters, radiation therapy plan parameters for a plurality of common training medical images are generated by aggregating a plurality of radiation therapy plan parameter estimates, the radiation therapy plan parameter estimates are generated by processing a plurality of common training medical images using a plurality of teacher machine learning models to generate a set of radiation therapy plan parameter estimates, and reducing respective dimensions of the set of radiation therapy plan parameter estimates or the medical images, perturbing radiation therapy plan parameters of the plurality of public training medical images according to privacy criteria; and generating a radiation therapy treatment plan based on the estimated radiation therapy plan parameters.

title: Student skill assessment method and system based on multiple cognitive factors
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student skill assessment method and system based on multiple cognitive factors, and the assessment method comprises an initialization step, a cognitive factor obtaining step, a cognitive attention obtaining step, an input vector generation step, a model updating step, a model training step, a model testing step, and a skill assessment step. According to the method, the influence of answering time data on answering scores is fully considered, the interaction among potential ability factors, skill mastering factors and speed factors of students and the influence of the potential ability factors, the skill mastering factors and the speed factors on the answering scores are comprehensively considered at the same time, three cognitive factors are modeled by using a deep learning method, and through a three-layer neural network, the learning efficiency of the students is improved. And in combination with a multi-head self-attention mechanism, the cognitive assessment method and system which better fit the actual situation are constructed. According to the method, the nonlinear relationship of interaction between the students and the test questions is fully mined, and the beneficial effect of improving the skill assessment accuracy can be achieved.

title: APPARATUSES AND METHODS FOR SHARING TRAINED MACHINE LEARNING MODELS
abstract_text: A server (11) comprising:- means (111) for generating a set of candidate trained machine learning models configured to implement an analytics and/or a decision function by performing a knowledge distillation process between a teacher machine learning model and at least two student machine learning models;- means (1121) for sending information related to the set of candidate trained machine learning models to at least one apparatus (13-n);- means (1122) for sending to an apparatus (13-n) configuration data for a candidate trained machine learning model selected by the apparatus (13-n).

title: Continuous image semantic segmentation method based on multilevel knowledge distillation
abstract_text: The invention provides a continuous image semantic segmentation method based on multilevel knowledge distillation, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, selecting a teacher model and a student model, and carrying out the segmentation of continuous images; s2, extracting intermediate characteristic values of the teacher model and the student model as low-level knowledge, and designing improved intermediate characteristic distillation; s3, taking the multi-scale fusion feature map as middle-level knowledge, and designing spatial structure knowledge distillation on the basis of the middle-level knowledge; and S4, for continuous images, taking a model prediction value as high-level knowledge, coding a dependency relationship between adjacent frames by using the high-level knowledge, and designing an inter-frame dependency distillation item. According to the continuous image semantic segmentation method based on multilevel knowledge distillation provided by the invention, compared with a mainstream semantic segmentation model, a semantic segmentation model trained based on the method obtains better balance in model precision and operation efficiency, and has a good application prospect in the field of embedded artificial intelligence.

title: Artificial intelligence learning system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence learning system.
