The system specifically comprises the steps that a user side receives answer data input by any student for a preset evaluation test question; the artificial intelligence module obtains evaluation data according to the answer data, returns the evaluation data to the cloud question library to obtain test questions corresponding to the evaluation data and sends the test questions to the user side; the big data storage library stores personal basic data, answer data and evaluation data of the students and analyzes and predicts the evaluation data to obtain current learning conditions and future learning trends of the students; and a thinking training module of the artificial intelligence module performs reverse analysis on wrong question answers of the students according to the evaluation data and the test data so as to provide a series of learning suggestions for helping the users to establish logic and skills for solving different question types. The method has the elements of artificial intelligence, personalization, prediction and calculation, logical thinking inspiration and the like, and assists a user in establishing a personalized learning mode and finding out a learning mode suitable for each person.

title: Lightweight intention recognition model training method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: SHENZHEN NORTH CODE REYESHI SCIENCE AND TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and discloses a lightweight intention recognition model training method, which comprises the following steps: obtaining an original session training set, carrying out session role representation and session environment representation on the original session training set by utilizing a pre-constructed teacher model to obtain a standard session training set, and constructing an interactive distillation network by using the teacher model and a pre-constructed lightweight neural network, and performing interactive training on the interactive distillation network by using the standard session training set to obtain a standard student model. The invention further provides a lightweight intention recognition model training device, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium. According to the invention, the problem of inaccurate voice intention recognition of a voice recognition model in a mobile intelligent device can be solved.

title: Artificial intelligence anti-cheating method, device and equipment for driver training students and medium
applicants: JIANGSU COSMIC INTERNET OF THINGS SCIENCE AND TECH GROUP SHARE LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a driving training student artificial intelligence anti-cheating method and device, equipment and a medium. The artificial intelligence anti-cheating device for the driving training trainee is installed on a driving training vehicle. The monitoring device locator and the face recognition machine are jointly packaged on the identity monitoring device, and the monitoring device locator locates the identity monitoring device and locates the face recognition machine at the same time. On one hand, the cheating analysis equipment can confirm the identity of a current driver by periodically obtaining a face verification result to prevent other people from masquerading in the training process, and on the other hand, whether the identity monitoring device for face recognition is forcibly disassembled or not can be confirmed by comparing the device position with the vehicle body position.

title: Child behavior abnormity identification method and system based on intelligent wearable equipment
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an abnormal child behavior recognition method and system based on intelligent wearable equipment. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a humidity data sequence and an activity data sequence of each student in a classroom; acquiring the activity intensity of the student according to the activity data sequence and the humidity data sequence of any student; further calculating the consistency and difference between any two students; acquiring the heart rate fluctuation amplitude of each student in a period of time; obtaining a difference distance according to the heart rate fluctuation amplitudes and differences of any two students; and clustering all the students according to the difference distance, and obtaining whether the behavior of the child is abnormal or not according to a clustering result. By using the method, the real-time state of the student can be accurately mastered, and whether the student has an abnormal behavior or not can be timely found.

title: Model distillation method and device and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to model distillation in the field of artificial intelligence, and particularly discloses a model distillation method and device and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a text sample, the text sample comprises at least one pair of entity tags, and each pair of entity tags in the at least one pair of entity tags is used for representing an entity type; respectively inputting the text sample into a teacher model and a student model, and determining a loss set; and according to the loss set, adjusting model parameters of the student model so as to train the student model. According to the embodiment of the invention, the text intention recognition accuracy of the student model after model distillation can be improved.

title: Method for realizing intelligent student service based on artificial intelligence BERT model
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for realizing intelligent student service based on an artificial intelligence BERT model. The method comprises the following steps: collecting information to form a set; labelling the formed set to form a category, and then inputting the labeled corpus information into a database; then, constructing an AI model based on BERT + BM2; after the AI model is constructed, establishing an AI back-end service, realizing a middle-end service through java, and a front-end program can call the middle-end java service; after the system is built, performing interaction, and after interaction is completed, collecting the satisfaction degree of a user for the service so as to adjust and optimize a model or continuously supplement problems. The problems that an existing student service system does not have an intelligent answering function and is not intelligent enough even if similar tools exist are solved.

title: ONLINE MACHINE LEARNING-BASED MODEL FOR DECISION RECOMMENDATION
abstract_text: Aspects of the invention include selecting an activity as a selected activity. A method includes designating a subset of the set of activities as classes, collecting a log of inputs and outputs of each encountered activity as a data point each time the process is implemented, and extracting features from each data point that is collected to generate a feature vector from each data point. A teacher model is initialized with a first data point and updated with each data point subsequent to the first data point. A student model is initialized with a set of data points including the first data point such that every one of the classes is encountered at least once. The student model is updated with the teacher model. A set of features is input to the student model to obtain a prediction of the outcome of the selected activity.

title: - AI Traffic safety system technology - Using radar and AI to detect and information for Drowsy DUIDriving Under the Influenceviolation vehicle.
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a technology for detecting pedestrians and vehicles with a radar, relates to a technology which notifies sudden braking when there is a student between the vehicles in a school zone, relates to a technology for displaying radar information in HUD, relates to a technology for building a road and crosswalk image datasets after photographing a site, relates to a technology which can be operated by installing a microwave radar antenna anywhere on a LOS location on the road, and relates to a technology which can deliver entry information of the vehicles and pedestrians by outputting a screen and TTS voices to a smartphone.

title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR DETERMINING STUDENT'S STATE
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a technology for generating a learning map to guide studies of a student using an artificial intelligence-based learning model, and providing an optimal learning method in consideration of the current level of the student on the learning map. According to one aspect of the present invention, the provided method for determining an academic level performed by a device for determining an academic level includes the steps of: receiving the current level information of the student; determining a test question to determine an academic level based on the current level information; and determining the current academic level of the student based on correct/wrong answer information in which the student has solved the test question.

title: Student image recognition network training method and image recognition method
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a student image recognition networktraining method and an image recognition method, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning and computer vision. The method comprises the following specific steps:inputting sample images into a student image recognition network to obtain first prediction feature information of the sample images on the first granularity and second prediction feature information of the sample images on the second granularity; and inputting the sample images into a teacher image recognition network to obtain first feature information of the sample images on the first granularity and second feature information of the sample images on the second granularity; obtaining a target student image recognition network, so that the trained target student image recognition network can concentrate on the saliency region to obtain the region-level features of the image and can also obtain the pixel-level features of the image, the problem that the image recognition result is not accurate enough due to neglect of other important regions of the image is avoided, and the training effect of the student image recognition network is improved.

title: TRAINING TEACHER MACHINE LEARNING MODELS USING LOSSLESS AND LOSSY BRANCHES
abstract_text: Some embodiments of the present invention are directed to techniques for training teacher neural networks (TNNs) and student neural networks (SNNs). A training data set is received with a lossless set of data and a corresponding lossy set of data. Two branches of a TNN are established, with one branch trained using the lossless data (a lossless branch) and one trained using the lossy data (a lossy branch). Weights for the two branches are tied together. The lossy branch, now isolated from the lossless branch, generates a set of soft targets for initializing an SNN. These generated soft targets benefit from the training of lossless branch through the weights that were tied together between each branch, despite isolating the lossless branch from the lossy branch during soft-target generation.

title: METHOD FOR PREVENTING VIRAL INFECTIOUS DISEASE IN SCHOOL AND PREVENTION SYSTEM FOR VIRAL INFECTIOUS DISEASE USING THE SAME
abstract_text: To provide a method and a system for preventing a viral infectious disease which protect the privacies of children and students, respect their personalities, and are useful to manage schools.SOLUTION: A method using a school temperature checking system 10 checks the temperatures of a measurement target person who is a child or a student by a body temperature measuring unit 110 which is unreadable from the outside before the child or student enters a classroom. An identification code for identifying a measurement target person read by a barcode reader 120 is used as a key code, and a measured temperature value is related to personal information of the measurement target person and to environmental data for the date and time of the measurement and is stored in a database as measurement target person data. When the measured temperature value is at least a predetermined body temperature, a mail including the measured temperature value is sent to a predetermined mail address. The personal information is deleted from the measurement target person data so that measurement target person common data is obtained, and the common data is uploaded to a database 210 of a server system 20 on a cloud via a network. An artificial intelligence inference mechanism 230 analyzes the common data and reports information on prevention of viral infectious diseases.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Distillation method and device of neural network model and electronic system
abstract_text: The invention provides a distillation method and device of a neural network model and an electronic system, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of: obtaining a training sample picture and the annotation information of the training sample picture, wherein the annotation information is used for indicating the attribute of an object in the training sample picture; performing feature extraction on the training sample picture through a student model to obtain a first feature; based on the first feature and the annotation information, processing through a teacher model to obtain a second feature of the training sample picture; determining distillation loss between the teacher model and the student model according to the first feature and the second feature; updating the parameters of the student model based on the distillation loss. The problem of semantic gap between the teacher model and the student model can be relieved, and the effect of distilling knowledge from the teacher model to the student model is improved.

title: Detection model training method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a training method and device of a detection model, electronic equipment and a storage medium, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a computer vision and deep learning technology, and can be used in intelligent cities and intelligent traffic scenes. According to the specific implementation scheme, sample data are obtained, a reference teacher model is obtained, multiple to-be-trained teacher models are generated according to the reference teacher model, the different to-be-trained teacher models are different, the sample data are input into the multiple to-be-trained teacher models, and multiple pieces of result data output by the multiple to-be-trained teacher models are obtained; and training the initial student detection model according to the sample data and the multiple result data to obtain the target detection model, so that the training effect of the student detection model can be effectively improved, the detection performance of the target detection model can be effectively improved, and the detection accuracy of the target detection model can be improved.

title: Student anti-drowning positioning method and system based on AI big data
applicants: SHENZHEN KIWIGO IOT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a student anti-drowning positioning method and system based on AI big data. The method comprises the following steps that a cloud electronic platform sets a virtual electronic fence and a student daily behavior habit track; the cloud electronic platform judges the danger level of the student behavior according to the information uploaded by the electronic equipment; and the cloud electronic platform judges whether the state of the student is normal or several levels of dangerous states according to the position information uploaded by the electronic equipment, performs comprehensive judgment according to the level of the dangerous state, and issues a warning to a parent terminal, and the parent terminal can check the warning content and the position information and perform telephone communication with the student. The beneficial effects of the method are that the cloud electronic platform is arranged to collect the position information uploaded by the electronic equipment, and then whether the student is in the virtual electronic fence and on the student daily behavior habit track is judged, and the student daily behavior habit track is combined with the virtual electronic fence technology to carry out comprehensive judgment. Therefore, the judgment accuracy is improved, and the use experience of the user is improved.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR IMAGE SUPER RESOLUTION
applicants: UNIV SOGANG RES & BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT FOUND [KR]
abstract_text: A method of operating a computing device operated by at least one processor includes the following steps of: instructing a teacher model by using learning data including a low-resolution image and a high-resolution image corresponding to the low-resolution image, and then, initially instructing a student model with the learning data; applying a weighted value to characteristic values with high importance among characteristic values generated during the procedure of instructing the teacher model, and then, additionally instructing the student model by using the important characteristic values; and inputting a random image into the student model, and then, outputting an image made by increasing the resolution of the random image. The student model is a deep learning model which is equal to or smaller in size than the teacher model. Therefore, the present invention is capable of reducing computational complexity and memory consumption.

title: DEEP NEURAL NETWORK OPTIMIZATION SYSTEM FOR MACHINE LEARNING MODEL SCALING
abstract_text: The present disclosure is related to techniques for optimizing artificial intelligence (AI) and/or machine learning (ML) models to reduce resource consumption while maintaining or improving AI/ML model performance. A sparse distillation framework (SDF) is provided for producing a class of parameter and compute efficient AI/ML models suitable for resource constrained applications. The SDF simultaneously distills knowledge from a compute heavy teacher model while also pruning a student model in a single pass of training, thereby reducing training and tuning times considerably. A self-attention mechanism may also replace CNNs or convolutional layers of a CNN to have better translational equivariance. Other embodiments may be described and/or claimed.

title: Radiotherapy plan parameters with privacy guarantees
abstract_text: Techniques for producing segmentation with privacy are provided. The techniques include receiving a medical image; processing the medical image with a student machine learning model to estimate radiotherapy plan parameters, the student machine learning model being trained to establish a relationship between a plurality of public training medical images and corresponding radiotherapy plan parameters, the radiotherapy plan parameters of the plurality of public training medical images being generated by aggregating a plurality of radiotherapy plan parameter estimates produced by: processing the plurality of public training medical images with a plurality of teacher machine learning models to generate sets of radiotherapy plan parameter estimates; and reducing respective dimensions of the sets of radiotherapy plan parameter estimates or medical images, the radiotherapy plan parameters of the plurality of public training medical images being perturbed in accordance with privacy criteria; and generating a radiotherapy treatment plan based on the estimated radiotherapy plan parameters.

title: Smart campus management method based on big data and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to a smart campus management method based on big data and artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps: extracting first-order statistics and second-order statistics of first-class analysis data, second-class analysis data and third-class analysis data; performing feature fusion on the first-class first-order statistics, the second-class first-order statistics and the third-class first-order statistics to obtain a first-order interaction matrix, and generating a first-order aggregation vector according to the first-order interaction matrix; performing feature fusion on the first-class second-order statistics, the second-class second-order statistics and the third-class second-order statistics to obtain a second-order interaction matrix, and generating a second-order aggregation vector according to the second-order interaction matrix; and performing normalization and series operation on the first-order aggregation vector and the second-order aggregation vector to obtain an aggregation feature vector of the student analysis data, and inputting the aggregation feature vectors of all the student analysis data into the smart campus management model to output dormitory allocation data.

title: Student behavior analysis method based on machine learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student behavior analysis method based on machine learning. The student behavior analysis method comprises the following four steps: S1, carrying out data acquisition: uploading system data of a campus management system such as a one-card management system and a library system to a database; S2, carrying out data standardization: performing normalization, normalization and normalization on the acquired data to obtain standard data; S3, carrying out clustering model training: sending the processed data into a clustering model for training to obtain clustering results of various behaviors of the students; and S4, carrying out abnormal behavior judgment: performing abnormal analysis on various behaviors of the students through an SVM algorithm. According to the student behavior analysis method based on machine learning provided by the invention, student behaviors can be subdivided through the campus data of the students, and whether the student behaviors are abnormal behaviors or not is judged, so that the process of intelligently analyzing the student behaviors is realized, and the efficiency of managing workers by the students is effectively improved.

title: NEURAL NETWORK DISTILLATION METHOD AND APPARATUS
abstract_text: This application provides a neural network distillation method and apparatus in the field of artificial intelligence, to provide a neural network with a lower output bias, thereby improving output accuracy of the neural network. In addition, a proper distillation manner can be selected based on different scenarios, so that a generalization capability is strong. The method includes: obtaining a sample set, where the sample set includes a biased data set and an unbiased data set, the biased data set includes biased samples, and the unbiased data set includes unbiased samples; determining a first distillation manner based on data features of the sample set, where in the first distillation manner, a teacher model is trained by using the unbiased data set, and a student model is trained by using the biased data set; and training a first neural network based on the biased data set and the unbiased data set in the first distillation manner, to obtain an updated first neural network.

title: Student integrated management system based on artificial intelligence and block chain
applicants: NANJING SUWEN SOFTWARE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of campus management, in particular to a student integrated management system based on artificial intelligence and a block chain, which comprises a host, the host is connected with a management structure, the management structure comprises a loudspeaker, the loudspeaker is arranged in the host, one end of the host close to the loudspeaker is provided with a filter screen, and the other end of the host close to the loudspeaker is provided with a display screen. The host is connected with a protection structure, the protection structure comprises a campus card, the campus card is clamped to one end, close to the loudspeaker, of the host, a push rod is slidably connected to one end, close to the campus card, of the host, a protection plate is fixedly connected to one end of the push rod, the protection plate is slidably connected with the host, and a sound hole is formed in the protection plate. A first spring is mounted between the protective plate and the main machine; the communication or separation between the filter screen and the loudspeaker can be controlled by inserting or pulling out the campus card, and small dust can be prevented from falling on the loudspeaker through the filter screen, so that the loudspeaker can be well protected when the campus card is not used.

title: Deep neural network information recommendation system applied to smart campus
abstract_text: The invention relates to a deep neural network information recommendation system applied to a smart campus. The system comprises: a smart campus platform and student terminals, wherein each student terminal is in communication connection with the smart campus platform; the intelligent campus platform comprises: a data processing module, an artificial intelligence module, and a database, wherein the database is in communication connection with the data processing module and the artificial intelligence module, and the data processing module and the artificial intelligence module are in communication connection. The data processing module generates a first-order aggregation vector according to the first-class first-order statistics, the second-class first-order statistics and the third-class first-order statistics, generates a second-order aggregation vector according to the first-class second-order statistics, the second-class second-order statistics and the third-class second-order statistics, and generates an aggregation feature vector of student analysis data according to the first-order aggregation vector and the second-order aggregation vector. The artificial intelligence module inputs the aggregated feature vectors of all the student analysis data into a smart campus management model to output dormitory allocation data.

title: User intention recognition model generation method, user intention recognition method and equipment
applicants: CTRIP TRAVEL INFORMATION TECH SHANGHAI CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a user intention recognition model generation method, a user intention recognition method and equipment. The generation method comprises the steps of training a teacher model containing multiple layers of coding networks based on layer-by-layer knowledge distillation, and obtaining output Logits of each layer of coding network of a target teacher model, on the basis of a student model containing a multi-layer convolutional network, according to a target loss function of cross entropy loss between an output result containing the student model and a real label of training data and cross entropy loss between an output result of each layer of convolutional network and output Logits of each layer of coding network, carrying out micro neural network structure search, and obtaining a target student model, and according to the cross entropy loss between the output result of the target student model and the real label, performing fine tuning on the target student model to obtain a user intention recognition model. According to the method, the user intention recognition model can be automatically obtained through knowledge distillation, micro search and fine adjustment, and model parameter quantity and hardware resource consumption are reduced.

title: NEURAL NETWORK DISTILLATION METHOD AND APPARATUS
abstract_text: A neural network distillation method and apparatus in the field of artificial intelligence, which are used for providing a neural network having a lower output bias, and improving the output precision of the neural network, and can select a suitable distillation means according to different scenarios, and have a strong generalization capability. The method comprises: acquiring a sample set, the sample set comprising a biased dataset and an unbiased dataset (601), the biased dataset comprising a biased sample, and the unbiased dataset comprising an unbiased sample; determining a first distillation means according to a data feature of the sample set (602), training a teacher model by using the unbiased dataset in the first distillation means, and training a student model by using the biased dataset; and training a first neural network according to the first distillation means on the basis of the biased dataset and the unbiased dataset so as to obtain an updated first neural network (603).

title: Portable experimental operation video acquisition terminal
abstract_text: The utility model provides a portable experimental operation video acquisition terminal, which comprises an installation seat and an acquisition assembly installed on the installation seat, the acquisition assembly comprises an outer protective cylinder, an inner adjusting rod is installed in the outer protective cylinder through an electric lifting rod, and installation frames are fixedly installed on the outer protective cylinder and the top of the inner adjusting rod. Mounting rods are mounted at one end, far away from the outer protective cylinder, of the mounting frame on the outer protective cylinder and one end, close to the inner adjusting rod, of the mounting frame on the inner adjusting rod, an AI camera is fixedly mounted at one end, far away from the mounting frame, of the mounting rod, and a rotating motor is in transmission connection with the center of a rotating shaft of the mounting rod; a touch display screen is arranged between the mounting base and the mounting frame located on the outer protective cylinder. According to the utility model, the problem that examination instrument equipment occupies the space of a student desk is solved, the defect that the student cannot operate normally is avoided, and the convenience of examination and the accuracy of a test result are improved.

title: Russian spoken language training and learning desk
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a Russian spoken language training and learning desk, which relates to the technical field of learning equipment and comprises a pronunciation training body and a support plate fixedly mounted at the lower end of the pronunciation training body, an AI camera is fixed above a display screen through a corrugated pipe, a loudspeaker is arranged below the display screen, and an electric box shell is arranged at the upper end of the pronunciation training body. The main board, the 3D oral tooth pronunciation model and the pronunciation scoring system are all installed in the electric box shell, when a student carries out oral language training, pronunciation of the student and mouth shapes of the student during pronunciation can be recognized and recorded through the AI camera, the standard pronunciation mouth shapes of the 3D oral tooth pronunciation model are compared with the pronunciation mouth shapes of the student, and the pronunciation scoring system is used for scoring the pronunciation of the student. And scoring is performed through the pronunciation scoring system, so that students can understand changes of Russian pronunciation mouth shapes more deeply, and the keyboard is Russian letters, so that the students can practice from a single letter more accurately and lay a Russian pronunciation foundation.

title: SELF-SUPERVISED MULTI-SENSOR TRAINING AND SCENE ADAPTATION
abstract_text: A sensing system including at least a first sensor sensing first data from a scene, at least a second sensor sensing second data from the scene, a first teacher/student machine learning subsystem employable by the first sensor to process the first data and a second student/teacher machine learning subsystem employable by the second sensor to process the second data, the first teacher/student machine learning subsystem being operative to teach the second student/teacher machine learning subsystem in a first instance, and the second student/teacher machine learning subsystem being operative to teach the first teacher/student machine learning subsystem in a second instance.

title: Model distillation method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a model distillation method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of computer vision and deep learning processing, and can be applied to scenes such as image processing and image recognition. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps of: acquiring a sample image, a teacher model and a student model; analyzing the sample image by using the teacher model to obtain a first feature map; analyzing the sample image by using the student model to obtain a second feature map; calculating spatial features of the second feature map to obtain a spatial similarity matrix of the second feature map; weighting the second feature map and the spatial similarity matrix to obtain a third feature map; calculating the loss of the student model according to the first feature map and the third feature map; and according to the loss of the student model, adjusting training parameters of the student model to obtain a trained student model. The present disclosure enables model distillation.

title: ELECTRONIC APPARATUS FOR MANAGING LEARNING OF STUDENT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND LEARNING MANAGEMENT METHOD
abstract_text: Disclosed is a learning management method of an electronic device. The learning management method includes the steps of: identifying a user's problem-solving ability based on user's answers to a plurality of problems; generating at least one AI model which matches the identified problem-solving ability; inputting at least one problem into the AI model to obtain an answer of the AI model for the input problem; and providing evaluation information on the answers of the acquired AI model. Therefore, based on competitive learning between a user and the AI model, the present invention motivates the user and manages the learning schedule customized to the user.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR VIRTUAL ONLINE ASSESSMENT OF MEDICAL TRAINING AND COMPETENCY
abstract_text: There is disclosed a system and method for providing an assessment of medical competencies. In an embodiment, the method comprises: providing a virtual interactive environment for access by an expert and by a student; providing an artificial intelligence machine learning engine for generating random scenarios and interactions for testing competencies; and based on the student's response to the random scenarios and interactions, performing a machine assessment of the student's competency. In another embodiment, the method further comprises providing an expert assessment by the expert of the student's competency. In another embodiment, the method further comprises combining the machine assessment and the expert assessment to calculate an overall score. 1/11 Architectural Design of Competency Based Assessment System 102 e _______________ CCMIpeten(y.Based As,,c,,k,nictele; 104 106 Ph-atm-ill _____________________________ /N. _____________ Online Virtual Online Virtual Documentation Interactive Patient õ _______________________________________________________________________ 108 110 112 'V V 1, r,entbti-:,, EAT% 4,........ title: DEPTH-CONSTRAINED KNOWLEDGE DISTILLATION FOR INFERENCE ON ENCRYPTED DATA
abstract_text: This disclosure provides a method, apparatus and computer program product to create a full homomorphic encryption (FHE)-friendly machine learning model. The approach herein leverages a knowledge distillation framework wherein the FHE-friendly (student) ML model closely mimics the predictions of a more complex (teacher) model, wherein the teacher model is one that, relative to the student model, is more complex and that is pre-trained on large datasets. In the approach herein, the distillation framework uses the more complex teacher model to facilitate training of the FHE-friendly model, but using synthetically-generated training data in lieu of the original datasets used to train the teacher.

title: INTELLIGENT EXERCISE RECOMMENDATION METHOD AND APPARATUS, COMPUTER DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: An intelligent exercise recommendation method and apparatus, a computer device and a storage medium, which relate to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises: by means of a first preset formula, according to an exercise completion situation of each student, first calculating knowledge points which are fully mastered by each student and knowledge points which are possibly not fully mastered; and then by means of a second preset formula, further calculating exercises which are appropriate to be recommended to the students. The problems of wrong exercises being relatively singular in existing wrong exercise recommendation and the quality pertinence of wrong exercise recommendation not being high are solved. Personalized recommended practice exercises can be automatically generated with regard to the work situations and knowledge point mastering situations of students, so that the students spend time on exercises which need to be practiced the most, thereby helping the students to learn efficiently, and the exercise completion time can thus be reduced, thereby achieving the aims of performing personalized learning and improving the learning efficiency.

title: Model training method and device, equipment, storage medium and image detection method
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a model training method and device, equipment, a storage medium and an image detection method, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of computer vision and deep learning, and can be applied to intelligent robots and automatic driving scenes. The specific implementation scheme is as follows: inputting a first input object into a pre-trained teacher network to obtain a first prediction box; and inputting a second input object into the student network to be trained to obtain a second prediction box, adjusting parameters of the student network according to the difference between the first prediction frame and the second prediction frame to obtain a target detection model, wherein the target detection model is used for identifying 3D object information in the to-be-detected image. According to the technology disclosed by the invention, a distillation mechanism can be effectively utilized, a simple student network is trained into a target detection network with 3D object information in a detection image, and the target detection network has similar detection precision with a complex teacher network, so that the deployment cost is reduced, and the deployment efficiency is improved.

title: Industrial part surface defect detection method and system based on anomaly detection algorithm
applicants: FITOW TIANJIN DETECTION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of deep learning anomaly detection, and discloses an industrial part surface defect detection method and system based on an anomaly detection algorithm. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining an image of a to-be-detected product, and collecting the surface image data of a to-be-detected good product shot by an industrial camera; the image is input into a teach-student anomaly detection network model to be trained; detecting defect data and non-defective product data by using a model produced after training is completed; returning a detection result to the client, and displaying the detection result by the client; and transmitting the detected abnormal region and the size of the region to a client of software, and judging whether the defect needs to be eliminated or not through an area threshold value on the software. The detection of surface abnormal areas of most parts with simple surface structures can be met. Compared with target detection, a large amount of model training and data collection time is saved, and the method has a great promotion effect on project promotion and acceptance as soon as possible.

title: Intelligent contract vulnerability detection method based on cross-modal teacher-student network
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent contract vulnerability detection method based on a cross-modal teacher-student network, and the method comprises the steps: compiling an intelligent contract source code to generate a corresponding byte code, extracting program semantic graphs in two forms of the source code and the byte code, and carrying out the normalization processing of the semantic graphs; utilizing a BERT model to extract program semantic graph Block-level semantic information of the byte code mode; constructing a graph message passing network to respectively extract graph structure information of a source code and a byte code of the smart contract from the normalized semantic graph, and generating corresponding graph feature vectors; and constructing a teacher-student network to realize cross-modal mutual learning, so the intelligent contract detection accuracy under the byte code single-modal background is improved. Compared with a conventional intelligent contract vulnerability detection tool, the intelligent contract security vulnerability detection method based on expert rules and deep learning has higher accuracy, fills the vacancy of the current intelligent contract security vulnerability detection method based on expert rules and deep learning, and has good practical value and reference significance.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR VIRTUAL ONLINE ASSESSMENT OF MEDICAL TRAINING AND COMPETENCY
abstract_text: There is disclosed a system and method for providing an assessment of medical competencies. In an embodiment, the method comprises: providing a virtual interactive environment for access by an expert and by a student; providing an artificial intelligence machine learning engine for generating random scenarios and interactions for testing competencies; and based on the student's response to the random scenarios and interactions, performing a machine assessment of the student's competency. In another embodiment, the method further comprises providing an expert assessment by the expert of the student's competency. In another embodiment, the method further comprises combining the machine assessment and the expert assessment to calculate an overall score.

title: Artificial intelligence study desk
applicants: QINGDAO YUBO EDUCATIONAL EQUIPMENT MFG CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of smart home, in particular to an artificial intelligence study desk which comprises a desk plate, connecting columns are fixedly connected to the two sides of the lower surface of the desk plate, side plates are arranged at the lower ends of the connecting columns on the two sides, and first storage cavities are formed in the side plates on the two sides; the connecting column is arranged in the first storage cavity, first sliding grooves are formed in the two sides of the interior of the first storage cavity, first motors are installed at the lower ends of the first sliding grooves in the two sides, first lead screws are fixedly connected to the output ends of the first motors on the two sides, and protruding blocks are fixedly connected to the two sides of the lower end of the connecting column; when the air temperature is too low, hands and feet of a student can be warmed, the temperature of the hands and the feet can be kept in a cold environment, normal study is facilitated, the height of the desk plate can be adjusted, and therefore the desk can be used by students with different heights.

title: SPATIO-TEMPORAL PSEUDO THREE-DIMENSIONAL (STP-3D) NETWORK FOR PERFORMING VIDEO ACTION RECOGNITION
abstract_text: Novel tools and techniques are provided for implementing spatio-temporal pseudo three-dimensional ("STP-3D") network for performing video action recognition. In various embodiments, for training, a computing system may use a STP-3D student network to implement an artificial intelligence ("AI") model to apply spatio-temporal encoding to a first video file, based on 2D-CNN operations, to generate a first prediction of video action classification of actions captured in the first video file. The computing system may train the AI model based at least in part on iterative comparison of the generated first prediction with a video action label generated by a teacher network. For inferencing, the computing system may use a trained STP-3D network to implement the AI model to apply spatial-temporal encoding to a second video file, based on 2D-CNN operations, to generate (then output) a video action classification of actions captured in the second video file.

title: DEPTH-CONSTRAINED KNOWLEDGE DISTILLATION FOR INFERENCE ON ENCRYPTED DATA
abstract_text: This disclosure provides a method, apparatus and computer program product to create a full homomorphic encryption (FHE)-friendly machine learning model. The approach herein leverages a knowledge distillation framework wherein the FHE-friendly (student) ML model closely mimics the predictions of a more complex (teacher) model, wherein the teacher model is one that, relative to the student model, is more complex and that is pre-trained on large datasets. In the approach herein, the distillation framework uses the more complex teacher model to facilitate training of the FHE-friendly model, but using synthetically-generated training data in lieu of the original datasets used to train the teacher.

title: Intelligent AI course selection system for personal occupational planning
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent AI course selection system for personal occupational planning, and the system comprises a course selection module which comprises a course display module, a pre-selection module, and a database. The personal occupational planning module comprises a professional module, an occupational planning preview module and an occupational foreground analysis module. According to the invention, through bidirectional matching of the occupational module and the selection and repair module, a selection basis is provided for college students, so that course selection is more purposeful, and initial personal occupational planning is also established. The corresponding courses can be better matched for the planned career, and the course selection result is better matched with the career development plan of the student, so more learning time can be saved after the student enters the society, and a firmer foundation is provided for employment transition of the student from colleges to the society.

title: AI resume screening method, system, equipment and storage medium
applicants: ZHILIAN WUXI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI resume screening method. The method comprises the steps of inputting plain text contents of all resumes into an improved BERT model, wherein the BERT model adopts a multi-layer Transformer framework; arranging a tutor classifier on the back of the Transformer stack; connecting a student classifier to the back of each layer of Transformer architecture of the BERT model; calculating the classification confidence coefficient of the output result of the student classifier of each layer of Transformer; when the classification confidence coefficient is greater than a preset threshold value, continuing to run the next layer of Transformer, and repeating the previous step; and when the classification confidence is less than the preset threshold value, directly outputting the result. According to the screening method, a recruitment website can simply and quickly perform preliminary screening on massive resume information contents input by job seekers, suspected low-quality resumes are intelligently screened out through a neural network, the calculation speed is high, the model parameter scale is small, and the operability and convenience are provided for next-step accurate screening of the low-quality resumes.

title: Classroom student facial expression recognition method and related device
applicants: GUIZHOU JIUZHANG INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a classroom student facial expression recognition method and related device, which are used for reducing the situation that the recognition accuracy is reduced when deep learning is used for performing expression recognition due to shielding. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring face images of students in a classroom; inputting the face images of the students in the classroom into a trained target residual network model, wherein the target residual network model comprises a Baded layer, at least two Model layers, a residual fusion layer, a global average pooling layer and a softmax layer; carrying out residual extraction and fusion on the face images of the students in the classroom through a Based layer, at least two Model layers and a residual fusion layer, and generating a target residual; performing classification calculation on the target residual error through a global average pooling layer and a softmax layer, and generating a probability value set of each expression type to which the classroom student face image belongs; and determining the expression type of the classroom student face image according to the probability value set.

title: Supplementary label learning method based on self-supervision and self-distillation
applicants: BEIJING ZHONGKE ZHIYAN TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a supplementary label learning method based on self-supervision and self-distillation. The method comprises the following steps of constructing a self-supervision mode, constructing a classification network, training the network and constructing a knowledge distillation mechanism. A better feature expression is obtained in a self-supervision mode, so that a network learning model is better, finally the performance of a classifier is better, meanwhile, information contained in the model is explored in a self-distillation mode, a teacher-student network is constructed by means of the information. Therefore, the performance of the model can be further improved, the accuracy of the model is greatly improved, the loss function based on deep learning also obtains good performance to a certain extent, and the purpose of end-to-end training can be achieved.

title: Speech recognition model training method and device, equipment and medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and provides a speech recognition model training method and device, equipment and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a speech sample set containing speech samples; inputting the speech sample into an initial recognition model; obtaining a to-be-processed audio clip through audio enhancement processing; performing teacher acoustic feature extraction through a teacher network in the initial recognition model to obtain a first feature vector, and performing student acoustic feature extraction through a student network in the initial recognition model to obtain a second feature vector; performing alignment comparison processing in combination with a dynamic queue in a teacher network to obtain a loss value; and when the loss value does not reach a preset convergence condition, carrying out iterative updating until convergence, and obtaining a trained speech recognition model. According to the invention, common speech recognition through the teacher network and the student network is realized, and the training efficiency is improved. The method is suitable for the field of artificial intelligence, and can further promote the construction of a smart city.

title: Heart image processing method and device based on image segmentation, equipment and medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of medical treatment and the field of image segmentation in artificial intelligence, and provides a heart image processing method. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a first sample data set and a second sample data set; expanding the first sample data set to obtain a third sample data set, and obtaining a heart segmentation model to be trained, the heart segmentation model including a student network and a teacher network; performing iterative training on the heart segmentation model according to the second sample data set and the third sample data set to obtain a target heart segmentation model; and obtaining a to-be-segmented target heart image, and inputting the target heart image into the target heart segmentation model for image segmentation to obtain a target heart segmentation image. The data annotation cost of the heart segmentation model is reduced, and the accuracy of the heart segmentation model is improved. The invention further relates to a block chain technology, and the target heart segmentation model can be stored in a block chain.

title: Model distillation method and related equipment
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a model distillation method, which comprises the steps of distilling a student model at a first calculation node of a calculation node cluster through a partial model of the student model and a partial model of a teacher model, and performing a gradient return process of distillation inside the first calculation node, and the distillation of the responsible network layer is completed without depending on other calculation nodes, so that the higher calculation resource utilization rate is realized, and the acceleration of the distillation process is further realized.

title: Image processing method and device
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses an image processing method and device, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of in the process that a student answers a target homework, acquiring a real-time image in the process that the student answers the target homework and an original image for the target homework and determining the time duration used by the student to answer each question by processing the real-time image and the original image; and evaluating the knowledge point mastering condition of the student based on the duration used by the student to reply each question. Therefore, when the knowledge point mastering condition of the student is evaluated subsequently, comprehensive evaluation is carried out in combination with the duration used by the student to reply each question instead of simple evaluation directly according to the correct reply condition of each question, so that the knowledge point mastering condition of the student can be evaluated more objectively and specifically.

title: Image segmentation method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses an image segmentation method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a first image sample and a second image sample, wherein the quality of annotation data of the first image sample is higher than that of annotation data of the second image sample; performing segmentation processing on the first image sample and the second image sample through a student network and a teacher network to obtain a student segmentation result of the first image sample, a student segmentation result of the second image sample, a teacher segmentation result of the first image sample and a teacher segmentation result of the second image sample; determining training loss according to the annotation data of the first image sample and the segmentation result; and training the student network based on the training loss. The image information is extracted from the samples with the low-quality labels through the teacher network, and the student network is trained, so that the problem of model overfitting caused by lack of the samples with the high-quality labels is avoided.

title: Neural network training method and device, and neural network detection method and device
abstract_text: The invention discloses a neural network training method and a device in the field of artificial intelligence, and is used for obtaining a plurality of neural networks in combination with knowledge distillation, selecting at least one unlabeled sample for labeling through the deviation among the outputs of the plurality of neural networks, and performing training again by using the labeled sample. And the model training efficiency is improved. The method comprises the following steps: taking samples in a data set as inputs of a teacher model, a first student model and a second student model respectively to obtain a first output result, a second output result and a third output result, screening at least one unlabeled sample from the data set through a first deviation and a second deviation, and labeling the unlabeled sample, updating at least one labeled sample to the training set, training a teacher model by using the updated training set to obtain a trained teacher model, and performing knowledge distillation on a second student model by using the trained teacher model to obtain a trained second student model.

title: Model training method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a model training method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence such as deep learning and computer vision, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the training of a first data set composed of labeled data, and obtaining a teacher model; marking each piece of data in a second data set consisting of unmarked data by utilizing a teacher model, and selecting data meeting requirements from the second data set according to a marking result to form a third data set, wherein the number of data in the third data set is greater than that in the first data set; and performing distillation training on the student model by using the teacher model according to the data in the third data set to obtain the student model after distillation training. By applying the scheme of the invention, manpower and time cost can be saved, and the performance of the obtained student model is ensured.

title: System and method for knowledge-preserving neural network pruning
abstract_text: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on computer storage media, for knowledge-preserving sparse pruning on neural networks are described. An exemplary method includes obtaining a pre-trained machine learning model trained based on a plurality of general-purpose training data; training a task-specific machine learning model by tuning the pre-trained machine learning model based on a plurality of task-specific training data corresponding to a task; constructing a student network based on the task-specific machine learning model; simultaneously performing (1) knowledge distillation from the trained task-specific machine learning model as a teacher network to the student network and (2) network pruning on the student network; and obtaining the trained student network for serving the task.

title: METHOD, ELECTRONIC DEVICE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM FOR DISTILLING MODEL
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: The disclosure discloses a method for distilling a model, an electronic device, and a storage medium, and relates to the field of deep learning technologies. A teacher model and a student model are obtained. The second intermediate fully connected layer is transformed into an enlarged fully connected layer and a reduced fully connected layer based on a first data processing capacity of a first intermediate fully connected layer of the teacher model and a second data processing capacity of a second intermediate fully connected layer of the student model. The second intermediate fully connected layer is replaced with the enlarged fully connected layer and the reduced fully connected layer to generate a training student model. The training student model is distilled based on the teacher model.

title: Rapid learning system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a fast learning system based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a parent body installed on a teacher's desk and a plurality of child bodies installed on student's desks, a display panel is installed on the upper side surface of the parent body, a control module is installed inside the parent body, a multi-connection device is installed on the rear side surface of the parent body, and the multi-connection device is connected with the child bodies. According to the learning system provided by the scheme, under the mutual cooperation of all parts, the learning system achieves the effect of automatically judging whether students sleep or not through artificial intelligence, so that teachers can accurately master the states of the students in class, the phenomenon that the teachers cannot remind the students in time when the students sleep in class is avoided, and the learning efficiency is improved. And meanwhile, the facial recognition sensor is arranged, so that the workload of calling a roll by a teacher before class is greatly reduced.

title: Systems and methods for automated learning
abstract_text: In one embodiment of the invention, a training model for students is provided that models how to present training items to students in a computer based adaptive trainer. The training model receives student performance data and uses the training model to infer underlying student skill levels throughout the training sequence. Some embodiments of the training model also comprise machine learning techniques that allow the training model to adapt to changes in students skills as the student performs on training items presented by the training model. Furthermore, the training model may also be used to inform a training optimization model, or a learning model, in the form of a Partially Observable Markov Decision Process (POMDP).

title: Target detection method and target detection terminal based on knowledge distillation
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of deep learning, and particularly relates to a target detection method and a target detection terminal based on knowledge distillation, and the method comprises the following steps: obtaining image data; inputting the image data into the trained target detection model; the target detection model outputs a detection result; wherein the target detection model is trained by the following steps: constructing an initial teacher network, and compressing the teacher network to obtain a student network; performing knowledge distillation on the student network by using the trained teacher network through an attention weighted feature distillation mode to obtain a distilled student network; and training and testing the student network after distillation to obtain a final target detection model. The target detection model is obtained through compression, distillation optimization and training of the network, the distillation optimization can effectively improve the performance of the target detection model without introducing additional parameters and reasoning operand, and the accuracy of target detection is improved.

title: Learning partner recommendation method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a learning partner recommendation method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of machine learning. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring college basic information; constructing a preliminary knowledge graph according to college basic information, representing original nodes and original edges of the preliminary knowledge graph as low-dimensional vectors to obtain school entity data corresponding to school entities, importing student basic information into the preliminary knowledge graph, constructing a target knowledge graph, obtaining student entity data of each student entity according to the school entity data, searching a target knowledge graph through a preset agent, finding a link path between the current student entity and the target student entity, and according to the link path and the student entity data, calculating a correlation score value between the current student entity and the target student entity; and selecting a corresponding learning partner from the target student entity according to the correlation score value, and recommending the learning partner to the current student entity. Through the technical scheme of the invention, the recommendation accuracy can be improved.

title: ALPHA SCOUT STAR SYSTEM AND METHOD
abstract_text: A social media platform for recruiting student-athletes enables student-athletes of any age to create detailed profiles, upload videos and photos, and post information to generate recruiting interest. Coaches, scouts, recruiters, and the like can also create profiles on the platform so they can recruit student-athletes. Artificial intelligence enables coaches and scouts to build prototypical student-athlete profiles and receive notifications when a student-athlete's profile matches a prototypical profile. The coach can then provide a rating for the “match” and provide feedback based on how closely related the prototypical profile and student-athlete profiles are. The Artificial intelligence receives the rating input with feedback and can learn to identify better matches in the future.

title: Target detection method and device based on medium and low resolution remote sensing images and equipment
abstract_text: The invention relates to a target detection method and device based on medium and low resolution remote sensing images and equipment. The method comprises the following steps: constructing a deep learning framework which is based on a knowledge distillation concept and is used for performing target detection on medium and low-resolution images, including a teacher network and a student network, and training the deep learning framework by adopting an original high-resolution image and the medium and low resolution images. In the training process, an original high-resolution image not only serves as a truth value label to supervise training of a super-resolution unit in a student network, but also can provide a high-resolution feature representation to serve as a feature truth value to supervise training of the detection unit in the student network. Thus, the detection signal of the trained target detection model on the medium-low resolution remote sensing image is improved.

title: Multi-task model distillation method and system, medium and electronic terminal
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a multi-task model distillation method and system, a medium and an electronic terminal.The method comprises the steps that when a multi-task model is subjected to one-time alternating training of multiple tasks according to a preset task training sequence, an intermediate parameter layer of the multi-task model is frozen, an embedding layer and a plurality of classification layers corresponding to tasks are reserved, an intermediate parameter layer of the multi-task model comprises a plurality of first sub-layers, and the step of freezing the intermediate parameter layer of the multi-task model comprises freezing all parameters or partial parameters in the intermediate parameter layer of the multi-task model; and taking the embedded layer subjected to multi-task rotation training, the frozen intermediate parameter layer and any classification layer corresponding to the task as a teacher model, performing model distillation by utilizing the teacher model to obtain a plurality of distilled student models, performing secondary rotation training on the plurality of distilled student models, and further determining a final model. And confrontation among multiple tasks is avoided.

title: Student ideological and political condition analysis and early warning method and system, terminal and medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student ideological and political condition analysis and early warning method and system, a terminal and a medium, and relates to the technical field of information processing, and the technical scheme is characterized by establishing a real-time track distribution diagram of a corresponding user; constructing a real-time track sequence according to the frequency information of the place marks and the corresponding time information; training historical consumption information and clock-in information based on a deep learning algorithm, then establishing a standard track distribution diagram, and establishing a standard track sequence according to the standard track distribution diagram by adopting a real-time track sequence construction method; marking the place marks as corresponding main marks or auxiliary marks; calculating an abnormal superposition value according to the difference between the place marks in the real-time track sequence and the standard track sequence, and if the abnormal superposition value exceeds a basic abnormal threshold value, outputting abnormal early warning information. Early abnormal conditions of college students can be monitored, and data support is provided for ideological and political condition management of the college students.

title: Image detection model training method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an image detection model training method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of computer vision and deep learning, and can be applied to scenes such as face recognition and living body detection. According to the specific implementation scheme, The method comprises: obtaining training data, wherein the training data comprise sample images and labels of the sample images; determining a teacher image detection model corresponding to the label of the sample image, wherein the teacher image detection model is obtained by training training data with labels; determining feature vectors of the sample images according to a teacher image detection model; and according to the sample images, the labels of the sample images and the feature vectors, carrying out coefficient adjustment on the initial student image detection model to achieve training. The method can improve the detection accuracy of the student image detection model on the image corresponding to each label.

title: Pronunciation imagination brain-computer interface classification method based on cross-modal information migration
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of brain-computer interfaces, in particular to a pronunciation imagination brain-computer interface classification method based on cross-modal information migration. The method comprises the following steps of: training a network model in two stages, wherein the first stage is a teacher network with a double-flow architecture and the second stage is a student network with a single-flow architecture; training the teacher network to obtain features of a hidden layer of the teacher network and output of a classification layer; and respectively constraining the features of the student network hidden layer and the output of the classification layer by using the features of the teacher network hidden layer and the output of the classification layer, and training and obtaining a student network. The method solves the problem that under the condition that noise interference is large and training samples are few, an existing machine learning model generally cannot obtain good generalization performance, and an over-fitting phenomenon is prone to occurring.

title: Visual AI identification terminal for smart classroom
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a visual AI identification terminal for a smart classroom, relates to the technical field of smart classrooms, and aims to solve the problem that the security coefficient of the smart classroom is low due to the lack of student management and article safety control performance in the use process of the conventional smart classroom. A learning table top is arranged at the upper end of the smart classroom desk, a supporting vertical rod is arranged at the upper end of the learning table top, an AI recognition attendance machine is arranged on the front end face of the supporting vertical rod, a recognition camera is arranged on the front end face of the AI recognition attendance machine, and two storage drawers are arranged in the smart classroom desk. A closed end groove is formed in the outer portion of the storage drawer, and an electric mortise lock is arranged on the inner wall of the closed end groove.

title: Nethra Jyothi
abstract_text: [0001] The Netra Jyothi examination system aims to eliminate the problems associated with the current examination process for visually impaired students (i.e, uncertainty in finding a scribe, linguistic limitations, etc.). This is achieved through two applications, namely the Exam manager application and the virtual scribe (student application). The teacher who wants to set a question paper first logs on to the Exam manager application and does the same. The student who wants to take up the examination logs into the virtual scribe application and is first authenticated through facial authentication, passing which the exam session is started automatically. The student then interacts with the virtual scribe using simple voice commands, which has a minimal learning curve. The student answers the questions using speech which is then converted into text using Speech Recognition technologies. Upon completion of the paper, the answers given by the student are automatically saved into the database. The teacher can view each of these responses in PDF format using the Exam Manager application. Drawings VScribe Application YOi Student Databases L------------------------ -- - - - - - Exam Manager Teacher Figure 1 1. Front End for Vscribe (HTML+CSS+JS) 2. Backend for Vscribe (Flask Framework) 3. Facial Recognition 4. Speech to Text 5. Artificial Intelligence micro service for intent classification (RASA NLU service) 6. Response Generator 7. Text to Speech 8. Authentication Database 9. Questions Database 10. Student Response Database 11. Front End for Exam Manager (HTML+CSS+JS) 12. Backend for Exam Manager (Flask Framework)

title: AUTONOMOUS AND CONTINUOUSLY SELF-IMPROVING LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: Systems and methods are provided in which an artificial intelligence inference module identifies targeted information in large-scale unlabeled data, autonomously learns hierarchical representations from the data, and continually self-improves from self-labeled data points using a teacher model trained to detect known targets from combined inputs of a small hand labeled curated dataset prepared by a domain expert together with self-generated context features derived from the unlabeled dataset by unsupervised and self-supervised processes. The trained teacher model self-generates new weakly-supervised training samples that are self-refined and self-corrected, without human supervision, and then used as inputs to a noisy student model trained in a semi-supervised learning process. With each iteration, the noisy student model continually self-optimizes its learned parameters against a set of configurable validation criteria by replacing the learned parameter of the prior iteration teacher model with optimized learned parameters periodically used to update the artificial intelligence inference module.

title: Online learning input degree identification method and system based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention designs an online learning input degree identification method and system based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: firstly, carrying out the student face detection through YOLOv4 in order to guarantee that an image is not affected by an irrelevant background; secondly, aiming at the problems that the VGG16 network is huge in parameter quantity, time-consuming in training and the like, an improved VGG16 model is provided, and meanwhile, in the model training process, a depth deterministic information bottleneck method DIB is adopted to make up for the deficiency of a traditional loss function so as to obtain relatively compact feature expression, reduce generalization errors and improve the universality and stability of the model, and achieving precise identification of the learning input degree in a complex online learning scene; and finally, through comparison and analysis with various methods such as traditional machine learning and other deep learning, the effectiveness of the method is verified.

title: Distillation method, device and equipment suitable for BERT model and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a distillation method, device and equipment suitable for a BERT model and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a pre-trained BERT model and a gating linear unit; performing model construction according to the pre-trained BERT model and the gating linear unit to obtain a student model; obtaining a first training set and a teacher model, wherein the teacher model is an integrated model obtained through training based on a pre-training BERT model; and performing distillation training on the student model according to the first training set and the teacher model to obtain a target model. Through the gating linear unit, the dimensionality of the BERT model is reduced, the gradient dispersion of the BERT model is effectively reduced, and the non-linear capability of the BERT model is reserved, so that the calculation speed and accuracy of a student model are improved, and the real-time performance of a target model is improved.
