The method can be applied to the fields of intelligent government affairs, digital medical treatment, science and technology finance and the like.

title: Semi-supervised three-dimensional point cloud semantic segmentation method based on neural network
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of deep learning and computer vision, and particularly relates to a semi-supervised three-dimensional point cloud semantic segmentation method based on a neural network. A semi-supervised learning normal form is adopted, a three-dimensional point cloud semantic segmentation network model is combined, and a whole semi-supervised three-dimensional point cloud semantic segmentation method framework is formed; the network model is divided into a student network and a teacher network, and the two networks sample the same SSCNs network; the input of the student network is an original point cloud which is not transformed, and the input of the teacher network is a transformed point cloud; and the output of the labeled part of the student network is supervised by the corresponding label, and the overall output of the student network and the teacher network is subjected to consistency supervision, so that the weight of the student network is updated, and the weight of the teacher network is obtained by performing exponential moving average on the weight of the student network. Experiments show that by using semi-supervised learning with labeled data and unlabeled data, the performance of the network is obviously improved on each labeling rate.

title: Model distillation method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a model distillation method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence such as deep learning and computer vision, and the method comprises the steps: respectively obtaining a first score outputted by the last layer of a teacher model and a second score outputted by the last layer of a student model; determining JS divergence according to the first score and the second score; and performing distillation training on the student model according to the JS divergence. By applying the scheme of the invention, the accuracy of the obtained student model can be improved.

title: Multi-label image classification method based on global and local label relationship
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multi-label image classification method based on a global and local label relationship. The method comprises the following steps: A, acquiring an image set marked with object categories as a training sample set, and preprocessing each image in the training sample set; B, training the training sample to obtain a trained local deep learning model; C, training the training sample to obtain a trained global deep learning model; D, by means of knowledge distillation operation, setting the trained global deep learning model as a teacher model, setting the trained local deep learning model as a student model, and training according to a preset knowledge distillation loss function to obtain trained global and local deep learning models; and E, predicting a multi-label image without any category label according to the trained global and local deep learning model. According to the method, the classification precision is improved by modeling the relationship between the global and local labels.

title: Character recognition model training method and device, storage medium and electronic equipment
abstract_text: The invention relates to a character recognition model training method and device, a storage medium and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of machine learning. The method comprises the following steps: constructing a data set according to a historical image and a real character label of the historical image; inputting a historical image in the data set into the trained teacher model to obtain a soft target label of the historical image; inputting the historical image in the data set into a student model having the same output layer as the teacher model to obtain a soft prediction label and an actual prediction label of the historical image; constructing a first loss function according to the soft target label and the soft prediction label, and constructing a second loss function according to the real text label and the actual prediction label; and performing distillation training on the student model according to the first loss function and the second loss function to obtain a trained character recognition model. The calculation amount of the model is reduced.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: [Problem] To further improve the accuracy of an estimation using a student network. [Solution] Provided is an information processing device comprising an estimation unit that estimates an object class pertaining to an object included in an input image, by using a student network generated on the basis of a teacher network generated by machine learning using, as learning data, images saved in a large-scale image database. The student network is generated by machine learning using, as learning data, synthetic images obtained using the teacher network and actual environment images acquired by a plurality of different modalities for an actual environment where execution of estimation by the estimation unit is anticipated.

title: Distributed multi-source data fusion method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of data fusion, and discloses a distributed multi-source data fusion method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: dividing current experiment data according to preset nonlinear variable similarity, and obtaining space experiment data and time experiment data; performing feature extraction on the space experiment data and the time experiment data through a preset teacher network model; predicting the extracted target feature data according to a preset network model; and obtaining multi-source experiment data according to the first parameter information in the prediction result, a target teacher network model obtained by a preset teacher network model and the current experiment data, and fusing the preset experiment data in real time according to the multi-source experiment data and a target network model obtained by a preset student network model so as to realize efficient data acquisition. Compared with the prior art that data are fused through a random algorithm and an artificial intelligence algorithm, the invention is advantageous in that the occupancy rate of network resources can be effectively reduced, and the data fusion efficiency can be improved.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: To improve the accuracy of estimation using a student network.An information processing device includes an estimation unit that estimates an object class of an object included in an input image using a student network generated based on a teacher network generated by machine learning using images stored in a large-scale image database as training data. The student network is generated by machine learning using, as training data, synthetic images obtained using the teacher network and real environment images acquired by a plurality of different modalities in a real environment in which estimation by the estimation unit is expected to be executed.

title: Control method for support system of theproduction and sales of personal works
abstract_text: In the present invention, provided is a system that supports a production and sale of processed product printed with student works in order to utilize the works containing a feature and artistry of a student (author). The system includes a server, a work collection terminal, and a consumer terminal. The server can use AI image recognition to extract and categorize an artwork style and an artwork theme from artwork information.

title: PREDICTION DEVICE, PREDICTION METHOD, AND RECORDING MEDIUM
abstract_text: In this prediction device, an acquisition means acquires student data on a student. A pre-processing means generates training data on the basis of the student data. A learning means generates, on the basis of the training data, at least one model for predicting the promotion status of the student by means of machine learning. A prediction means uses the generated model to predict the promotion status of a target student, from the student data on the target student.

title: AI-based management method and system for identifying student behaviors
abstract_text: The invention provides an AI-based management method for identifying student behaviors and relates to the field of student behavior management. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring facial expressions and behavior actions of students, and identifying current students; analyzing the obtained facial expressions and behavior actions to obtain mood states of the students; acquiring academic records of the students, and acquiring personality characteristics of the students by calling psychological assessment data; through the mood states, the academic records and the personality characteristics, obtaining a reasonable communication mode with the students through analysis; and pushing the reasonable communication mode to parents and teachers of the students, and giving reasonable suggestions to the parents and the teachers when the parents and the teachers communicate with the students. The invention further provides a management system, which is used for realizing the method and has the advantages that the psychological state of the students can be accurately mastered, and communication between the students and a school and between the students and parents can be improved.

title: Student viewpoint estimation method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student viewpoint estimation method based on deep learning, and the method is characterized in that the method comprises the following steps: 1), obtaining a video frame; 2) carrying out face detection; (3) estimating a hopenet head posture; and 4) carrying out student viewpoint estimation. According to the method, the viewpoint position of the student is estimated by using the video data shot by the monitoring camera, so that the robustness of practical application can be improved, the viewpoint estimation of the student in a complex classroom environment is relatively high in accuracy, and the attention of the student is further analyzed by estimating the viewpoint position of the student, therefore, statistical analysis is carried out on the class attending quality of the students in the class, and technical support is provided for intelligent class management.

title: Rapid pedestrian detection method based on knowledge distillation
abstract_text: The invention relates to the fields of computer vision, deep learning, target detection, model compression acceleration and the like, in particular to a method for quickly identifying and positioning a pedestrian target in an image or a video. In order to solve the problems that a pedestrian detection network is large in parameter quantity calculation amount and cannot achieve real-time detection, the invention provides a rapid pedestrian detection method based on knowledge distillation. A conventional pedestrian detection model based on a convolutional neural network serves as a teacher model, the parameter quantity and the calculation amount of the pedestrian detection model are reduced through an optimized convolution mode, a lightweight detection model is obtained as a student model; and aimed at a detection task, training of a student model is assisted by utilizing a teacher model, and the detection performance of a lightweight model in a complex scene is improved, so that the detection speed is increased on the basis of not sacrificing excessive detection precision, and the requirement of real-time detection is met.

title: Driver operation evaluation system and method based on neural network
applicants: SHANGHAI BLACK SETTLER TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a driver operation evaluation system and method based on a neural network, and belongs to the technical field of driving assistance. Comprising the steps of receiving operation data and a vehicle motion state by using a data acquisition module; taking the operation data of each driving student as a matrix element; gathering all matrix elements into a multi-dimensional matrix, and inputting the multi-dimensional matrix as a data set into the trained neural network module; enabling the trained neural network module to perform driving level classification according to a scoring standard; and integrating the operation data of the driving student, the vehicle motion state and the virtual visual scene to obtain an evaluation result. The invention is scientific and reasonable, the three-layer stacked LSTM network layer enables the neural network model to learn higher-level time domain feature representation, and the trained neural network is more excellent in performance. Feature extraction of driver operation data is used as a data source of deep learning for neural network training, so that the student operation data processing speed is increased, and the evaluation intelligence is improved.

title: Recitation detection system and method based on smart classroom
abstract_text: The invention discloses a recitation detection system and method based on a smart classroom. A student can initiate a recitation request to other students in the same class to request the other students to help the student to perform recitation detection, so that the student can be helped to detect the recitation result of the student in real time. Even if no student accepts the recitation request, a server can also automatically accept the recitation request through an AI program, and the recitation requirement of the user is effectively met. Videos, recitation detection results and the like in the recitation process are recorded and stored, and a teacher can view and recheck the recitation conditions of the students at any time.

title: Steel rail welding seam monitoring method based on deep learning network model
abstract_text: The invention discloses a steel rail welding seam monitoring method based on a deep learning network model. The method comprises the following steps: S1, a Lamb wave structure in a steel rail welding seam is analyzed; S2, the data characteristics of Lamb waves are monitored on a crack of the steel rail welding seam; S3, a deep learning network model of two stages of a generator and a generator structure of a generative adversarial network is designed, in the first stage, a deep learning neural network which is complex in structure, has many parameters and can effectively extract and process data features is designed, so that the requirement for deep feature extraction of input data is met, and in the second-stage network model design, a model with a simpler network structure is designed according to teacher and student theories in transfer learning, and then the feature extraction capability and the specified data output capability of the first-stage network are learned; and S4, the performance analysis and comparison of the MDCD on a steel rail welding seam data set are obtained. According to the method, the crack damage on a welding seam structure can be detected.

title: AI auxiliary learning system and method based on learning table
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI auxiliary learning system and method based on a learning table. The system comprises the learning table and a cloud service platform, the learning table comprises a display screen which is used for inputting student information and user demands, and outputting learning information; a binocular camera is arranged on the display screen and used for collecting learning images of students; a processing device is connected with the display screen and the binocular camera and is connected to the cloud service platform through the Internet; a cloud service platform is provided with an artificial intelligence unit, and the artificial intelligence unit collects learning resources through the Internet, classifies and arranges the learning resources, and then distributes the learning materials to the processing device. The invention has the advantages that the learning system is arranged on the learning table, so that the use is convenient, and the display effect is good. Learning resources are collected from the Internet through the cloud service platform, and the learning resources are updated in real time; the learning resources are screened through the artificial intelligence unit, so that user requirements are better met.

title: Student academic warning method and system based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of big data processing, in particular to a student academic warning method and system based on deep learning; the method comprises the steps: obtaining first academic data of a student in a first learning period, inputting the first academic data into a first prediction model, and obtaining a first academic prediction result of the student; acquiring second behavior record data of the student in a second learning period, and inputting the second behavior record data into a second prediction model to obtain a second academic prediction result of the student; obtaining a comprehensive prediction result of the student according to the first academic prediction result and the second academic prediction result, wherein the comprehensive prediction result comprises a prediction grade corresponding to a second moment and a comprehensive occurrence probability corresponding to the prediction grade; and when it is determined that the comprehensive prediction result of the student reaches a preset early warning condition, performing academic early warning for the student. According to the invention, the accuracy of student academic performance prediction can be improved, and academic early warning can be carried out more accurately.

title: Semi-supervised three-dimensional point cloud target detection method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a semi-supervised three-dimensional point cloud target detection method. The method comprises the following steps: (1) carrying out random down-sampling on point clouds input into a teacher model and a student model, and taking random down-sampling data of the teacher model as input of the teacher model; (2) carrying out random transformation on random down-sampling data of the student model, and taking the random down-sampling data as input of the student model; and (3) synchronously training the teacher model by using the label data when training the student model, taking the trained student model as the teacher model for further training after each iteration, mining data without labels through the teacher network to obtain a pseudo label for guiding the learning of the student network, and obtaining a three-dimensional point cloud target detection result. According to the method, the dependence of a three-dimensional target detection deep learning model on data labels can be reduced, and the cost of data labeling is reduced; wherein the precision of 100% of labels used by the same model can be achieved by using part of the labels. The experimental model is high in generalization ability and can be used in various deep learning models.

title: Student performance prediction method based on hybrid deep learning and attention mechanism
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of machine learning, deep learning, data mining and the like, in particular to a student performance prediction method based on hybrid deep learning and an attention mechanism. On-line learning log information of students is utilized, preprocessing and feature extraction are firstly carried out on the log information, and a correlation feature selection method is used to obtain features having important influence on a prediction result. And then weekly accumulative statistics and all accumulative statistics are carried out on the extracted features according to feature categories. Then, the extracted time sequence features and potential features are spliced, and due to the fact that the difference between the two types of learned features is large in magnitude and category, a deep neural network is used for high-order feature interaction, and deeper features are learned; at the same time, different influence degrees of different features on student performance are considered, and an attention mechanism is used to distribute different weights for different deep-level features. And finally, a sigmoid classifier is used to predict whether the student can pass a certain course, thereby improving the prediction accuracy.

title: Language model training method and device thereof, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention provides a language model training method and a device thereof, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of machine learning. The method comprises the steps of performing full-amount pre-training on an initial student language model based on a full-amount pre-training corpus to obtain a full-amount pre-trained student language model; performing incremental pre-training on the student language model after the total pre-training based on an incremental pre-training corpus to obtain a student language model after the incremental pre-training; wherein the incremental pre-training corpus is a pre-training corpus newly added on the basis of the full pre-training corpus; performing knowledge distillation processing on the student language model after incremental pre-training by adopting a teacher language model to obtain a distilled student language model; and performing parameter adjustment processing on the distilled student language model by adopting the second training sample set of the target task to obtain a trained student language model. By adopting the technical scheme provided by the embodiment of the invention, the time of language model training can be saved.

title: Method and device for training fetal ultrasonic standard section image recognition network model
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a method and a device for training a fetal ultrasonic standard section image recognition network model. The method comprises the following steps: constructing a pre-trained teacher network model and an untrained first student network model, wherein the teacher network model and the first student network model are convolutional neural networks in residual connection; training a middle layer of the first student network model based on hidden layer knowledge of the teacher network model to obtain a second student network model; and training the second student network model based on the self-distillation knowledge of the second student network model and the similarity matrix prediction information between the teacher network model and the output sample of the second student network model to obtain a fetal ultrasonic standard section image recognition network model. The fetal ultrasonic standard section image recognition network model obtained through training has the advantages of being high in recognition efficiency, light in structure and convenient to deploy.

title: Knowledge distillation method and device, terminal equipment and medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention is suitable for the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a knowledge distillation method and device, terminal equipment and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: indicating a student model and a converged teacher model, carrying out the entity recognition of a test sample in a sample set, and obtaining a prediction sequence and a sequence probability; performing parameter updating on the student model according to the predicted sequences and sequence probabilities of the teacher model and the student model; and if the student model after parameter updating is not converged, returning to execute the step of indicating the student model and the converged teacher model and performing entity identification on the test samples in the sample set until the student model is converged. According to the method, the calculation complexity based on the prediction sequence and the sequence probability is relatively low, so that the parameter updating speed of the student model is relatively high based on the prediction sequence and the sequence probability of the teacher model and the student model, and the knowledge distillation efficiency is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence student classroom doze state detection system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence student classroom doze state detection system, which comprises a video acquisition module, a control module and a vibration reminding module, and is characterized in that the video acquisition module and the vibration reminding module are in signal connection with the control module; wherein the video acquisition module is used for periodically shooting students from the front side to obtain video images of the students; the control module receives the video image, calls a preset judgment model to analyze the video image, obtains the mental state of the student, and sends a trigger signal to the vibration reminding module if the mental state of the student is an abnormal state; the vibration reminding module is arranged on the desk and used for receiving and responding to the trigger signal to send out vibration reminding. The system can automatically judge whether the student is in a fatigue state according to the acquired video image of the student, and after the student is confirmed to be in the fatigue state, the vibration reminding module arranged on the desk vibrates to remind the student to adjust the class state in time.

title: INTERPRETABLE MACHINE LEARNING ALGORITHMS FOR IDENTIFYING AT-RISK STUDENTS IN ONLINE DEGREE PROGRAMS
abstract_text: Described systems and techniques provide actionable insights to enable student support staff to identify students who are in need of support, even when such students have not requested support. Fast and accurate training of multiple machine learning models may be implemented to enable iterative, updateable predictions of a student's grade in a course, even when the course has never been previously offered to students. As a student progresses through a course and towards a degree that requires that course, described techniques may update a predicted final course grade of that student, using one or more trained, selected machine learning models.

title: APPARATUS AND METHOD OF INTRAVENOUS INJECTION PERFORMANCE EVALUATION
applicants: GANGNEUNG WONJU NAT UNIV IND ACAD COOP GROUP [KR]
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an apparatus and a method of intravenous injection performance evaluation. According to an embodiment of the present invention, an apparatus of intravenous injection performance evaluation based on motion recognition technology comprises: a nursing information storage unit which receives, from a central server, nurse information including nurses' career, personal information, intravenous injection image data, and patient evaluation information, and student information including nursing student personal information and intravenous injection evaluation status, and stores the same for database; a skilled nurse extraction unit which extracts skilled nurses from nurses based on the nurse information; a standard data generating unit which analyzes the intravenous injection image data of each of the skilled nurse through a deep learning algorithm, derives a standard operation for each step of the intravenous injection, and generates standard data; an image data receiving unit which receives image data of a nursing student administering intravenous injection through a camera terminal; an evaluation data generation unit which classifies hands of the nursing student in the image data for each node by using a deep learning algorithm, and generates evaluation data by converting the operation of the divided nodes into data; a similarity calculating unit which compares the evaluation data and the standard data, compares the operation of the evaluation data and the standard data for each step, and calculates a degree of similarity; and a student information update unit which selects a nursing student who has acquired a similarity level greater than or equal to the set similarity for each step as many as a set number as a skilled nursing student, and updates the student information by reflecting the same on the status of the intravenous injection evaluation of the nursing student. The present invention relates to an apparatus and a method of intravenous injection performance evaluation for determining a standard motion by recognizing the motion of placing an intravenous injection of a skilled nurse, and evaluating the intravenous injection motion of a student to be evaluated by comparing the standard motion with the motion of the evaluation target.

title: Integrated management system for student evaluation and customized information using Big Data and Artificial Intelligence
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an integrated management system capable of providing student evaluation and student-customized information using big data and artificial intelligence. In more detail, in the integrated management system capable of providing student evaluation and student-customized information using big data and artificial intelligence, through an integrated management server, teachers can more objectively and systematically conduct process-oriented evaluation of students, and students can check their evaluation information and give feedback, and can receive customized college admission information, career information, subject recommendations, advance preparation information, or the like for career which matches their evaluation results and inclinations.

title: Reinforcement learning method and system in adaptive learning path recommendation
applicants: BEIJING GAOSI BOLE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a reinforcement learning method and system in adaptive learning path recommendation. The method comprises the following steps: constructing a multi-layer network by using deep learning, and mining the mastery degree of each knowledge point by a student according to processed historical learning behavior data of the student; using deep learning, an integration algorithm and a clustering algorithm, integrating historical learning data of the students and the mastering degree of knowledge points and accessing and predicting ability of students; according to the mastering degree of the students on the knowledge points and the ability evaluation result of the students, intelligently generating and providing an optimal learning path for the students by utilizing a knowledge graph and a deep learning technology; through reinforcement learning, proper learning content is selected for students to learn. According to the reinforcement learning method and system in adaptive learning path recommendation provided by the invention, analysis can be carried out from dimensions such as the ability of students and the current learning state, a knowledge point mastering matrix is constructed for the students, and a proper learning path is intelligently recommended for each student.

title: Image classification method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to artificial intelligence, and provides an image classification method and device, equipment and a storage medium. According to the method, a first loss value of a preset learner can be calculated according to a labeling result and an output result of a preset learner to a labeled image, network parameters are adjusted according to a labeled sample until convergence, an initial model is obtained, an unlabeled sample is predicted based on the initial model, a prediction result and confidence are obtained, a target sample is selected from the unlabeled samples, the initial model is cut to obtain a student model, the student model is trained based on the labeled samples and the target sample until convergence to obtain a classification model, an object image is obtained according to a preset object, the object image is processed to obtain object features, and the object features are inputted into the classification model to obtain a target type. The accuracy of the target type can be improved. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the target type can be stored in a block chain.

title: Student model training method and device and electronic equipment
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a student model training method and device, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the fields of natural language processing, deep learning technology and the like, can be applied to scenes of text generation, machine translation, model compression and the like. The method comprises the following steps: respectively inputting training samples into a student model and a teacher model for training; obtaining a first error of the student model and the teacher model on the embedded layer, a second error on the intermediate layer and a loss function on the output layer; determining a total loss function of the student model according to the first error, the second error and the loss function, adjusting model parameters of the student model based on the total loss function, continuing to use the next training sample to train the adjusted student model until the training is finished, and generating a target student model. In the application, the student model can learn the information of the middle layer of the teacher model, so that the training speed of the student model is accelerated, the training effect of the model is optimized, and the performance of the model is improved.

title: Small target face recognition method based on deep learning
applicants: SHANGHAI INST MICROSYSTEM & INFORMATION TECH CAS
abstract_text: The invention relates to a small target face recognition method based on deep learning. The method comprises the steps of: constructing a high-to-low generative adversarial network, inputting a first pixel face image into the trained generative adversarial network, and obtaining a second pixel face image close to a real scene; and constructing a teacher-student network, training the teacher-student network by using the first pixel face image and the second pixel face image, and inputting a second pixel face image to be recognized into the trained teacher-student network to obtain a recognition result. According to the small target face recognition method based on deep learning of the invention, the recognition capability of a small target face image can be improved.

title: Hierarchical Attention deep learning model course recommendation method
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of machine learning, deep learning, data mining and the like, in particular to a hierarchical Attention deep learning model course recommendation method. According to the method, dynamic changes of user interests are modeled by utilizing user sequential behavior data and using LSTM, and long-term and short-term preferences of a user are obtained by constructing a hierarchical Attention structure, so that advanced mixed representation of the user is generated, and user personalization and accuracy of a recommendation result are improved. The method specifically comprises the following steps: performing screening and preprocessing by using original online learning related behavior data, dividing the sequential behavior of a user into sessions, and then processing three types of data of fine granularity (information user ID and course ID) and coarse granularity information (course type) by using an embedding layer and a full connection layer to obtain user vector representation; capturing interaction and evolution of different historical session interests of a user by applying LSTM (Long Short Term Memory) to obtain a serialized interest vector, and inputting the interest vector into an Attention network to obtain long-term interest representation of the user; inputting the recent behavior data and the long-term interest representation of the user into a second-layer Attention network to obtain a mixed interest representation of the user; and finally, carrying out inner product on the mixed interest representation and the course vector representation of the user, taking an obtained value as a score of the candidate item, and sorting the scores of the candidate item to obtain a recommendation list for carrying out personalized recommendation on the student.

title: Model training method and device, brand word recognition method and device and electronic equipment
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a model training method, a brand word recognition method and device and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of natural language processing. The method comprises the following steps: training a first knowledge enhancement semantic representation model by adopting a first content sample to obtain a first brand word recognition model; taking the first brand word recognition model as a teacher model in knowledge distillation, taking the second knowledge enhancement semantic representation model as a student model in knowledge distillation, and training the second knowledge enhancement semantic representation model by adopting a knowledge distillation method to obtain a second brand word recognition model, wherein the output of the second brand word recognition model is consistent with the output of the first brand word recognition model, and the model parameters of the second knowledge enhancement semantic representation model are less than the model parameters of the first knowledge enhancement semantic representation model. According to the method, the brand word identification accuracy is improved.

title: Method, device and equipment for training model, medium and product
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a method, a device, equipment, a medium and a product for training a model, relates to the technical field of computers, in particular to an artificial intelligence technology, and can be applied to a model compression scene in deep learning. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps of: obtaining a to-be-trained student model set; for each to-be-trained student model in the to-be-trained student model set, determining a teacher model corresponding to the to-be-trained student model; sending training data to each teacher model, and receiving a soft label set returned by each teacher model based on the training data; and based on the soft label set, training each to-be-trained student model in the to-be-trained student model set to obtain each trained student model. According to the implementation mode, the model training effect can be improved.

title: METHODS, DEVICES AND MEDIA PROVIDING AN INTEGRATED TEACHER-STUDENT SYSTEM
abstract_text: Methods, devices and processor-readable media for an integrated teacher-student machine learning system. One or more teacher-student modules are trained as part of the teacher neural network training. Each student sub-network uses a portion of the teacher neural network to generate an intermediate feature map, then provides the intermediate feature map to a student sub-network to generate inferences. The student sub-network may use a feature enhancement block to map the intermediate feature map to a subsequent feature map. A compression block may be used to compress intermediate feature map data for transmission in some embodiments.

title: Training method of image enhancement model and method for enhancing image
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a training method of an image enhancement model, a method and device for enhancing an image, equipment and a storage medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of computer vision and deep learning, and can be applied to an image processing scene. The training method of the image enhancement model comprises the following steps: for a current training round, respectively taking a sample image as input of a teacher network model and a student network model, and respectively obtaining a first enhancement image and a second enhancement image; training a student network model based on the first enhanced image and the second enhanced image to obtain a trained student network model for the current training round; and determining the value of the image enhancement model parameter in the current training round based on the first value of the trained student network model parameter for the current round and the second value of the image enhancement model parameter determined by the previous training round, wherein the initial model of the image enhancement model is the same as the initial model of the student network model.

title: Object detection model training method and device, and image detection method and device
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an object detection model training method and device, and an image detection method and device, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of computer vision and deep learning. The methods can be applied to the fields of automatic driving, intelligent robots and the like. The training method specifically comprises the following steps: training a student detection model according to difference positions of training images in distance maps corresponding to feature maps output by a teacher detection model and a student detection model and differences between features of the difference positions in the corresponding feature maps. Therefore, mining of the detection information of the teacher detection model by the student detection model can be further improved, and the detection precision of the student detection model is improved, so that the simple student detection model can achieve the detection precision similar to that of a complex teacher detection model, the occupation and deployment cost of computing resources is reduced, and the calculation speed is improved.

title: UBIQUITOUS ATTENDANCE MONITORING WITH FACE RECOGNITION USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: UBIQUITOUS ATTENDANCE MONITORING WITH FACE RECOGNITION USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE Abstract: Let us imagine a class where it's the last period of the day and the teacher is tired after a long day of class, when it's almost time for the bell the teacher start s to take roll, now this is where the students get smarter. As the teacher starts to call out the roll the teachers face is always faced down on the attendance sheet, now as the names are called the students reply to their names to get the attendance for that subject. Now let us assume that 'student a' is not in class and his friend 'student b' is in class. When the name of 'student a' is called, 'student b' will answer in his place and the teacher will not know if it was actually 'student a' because the teacher is focused on the attendance sheet, and 'student a' will get away with a free attendance. So this is where our project comes into picture to counter this problem. Our project is based on the attendance that can be given to students more effectively and conveniently so as to eliminate any human error and labor and make it easier for teachers to provide attendance to the students. We started off with planning a system where the students will be given an RFID and then we would make a receiver to detect the ID and then provide the attendance. The receiver would be placed inside the class where it would be activated only with the consent of the concerned faculty. This way we can reduce the burden of the teachers to take attendance at the start of the class. But then we realized that this system has some flaws, for example if the receiver is activated at that time and when the student swipes the card twice it will provide the attendance for two days and if the student was carrying his ID as well as his friends ID he could easily provide the attendance for his friend, which is no equal to the first case where the teacher would take the attendance manually. title: METHODS, DEVICES AND MEDIA PROVIDING AN INTEGRATED TEACHER-STUDENT SYSTEM
abstract_text: Methods, devices and processor-readable media for an integrated teacher-student machine learning system. One or more teacher-student modules are trained as part of the teacher neural network training. Each student sub-network uses a portion of the teacher neural network to generate an intermediate feature map, then provides the intermediate feature map to a student sub-network to generate inferences. The student sub-network may use a feature enhancement block to map the intermediate feature map to a subsequent feature map. A compression block may be used to compress intermediate feature map data for transmission in some embodiments.

title: Student model training method and device, picture processing method and device and electronic equipment
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a student model training method and device, a picture processing method and device and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of computer vision and deep learning. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps of: determining and inputting sample pictures of different scenes into teacher models of the corresponding scenes, obtaining teacher features of the sample pictures in the scenes, wherein the number of the teacher models is at least two; inputting the sample pictures of the different scenes into a student model, and determining student characteristics of the sample pictures in each scene; and then training a student model based on the teacher features of the sample pictures in each scene, the student features of the sample pictures in each scene and a predetermined loss function. The student models are trained through the teacher models in the at least two different scenes, so that the generalization ability of the trained student models in the different scenes can be improved, and the trained student models can keep certain accuracy in the different scenes.

title: Image processing model training method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a training method of an image processing model, and relates to the technical field of computers, in particular to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as deep learning and computer vision, and the specific implementation scheme is as follows: obtaining a sample image which has a corresponding annotation image feature, obtaining an edge image feature corresponding to the sample image, and inputting the sample images into a student model and a teacher model to obtain student image features output by the student model and teacher image features output by the teacher model, processing the student image features according to the edge image features and the teacher image features to obtain target student image features, and using the teacher image features and the target student image features to obtain the target student image features. And marking the image features to train the student model to obtain the image processing model, so that the expression modeling capability of the image processing model obtained by training for the image features can be effectively assisted to be improved, and the image processing effect of the image processing model is improved.

title: METHOD DEVICE AND SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING SPEAKING ANALYSIS CONTENT USING FEEDBACK BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: According to one embodiment of the present invention, provided is a method of providing speaking analysis content using AI-based feedback, performed by a device. The method includes the steps of: generating and providing a classroom page for one-on-one lessons when a request for opening a classroom is received from an instructor terminal; transmitting a class participation notification message to the student terminal; when an admission request is received from the student terminal, connecting the instructor terminal and the student terminal to control a speaking class to proceed; generating answer information by recording the student's answer to the instructor's question while the speaking class is in progress; analyzing the student's speaking ability based on the artificial neural network; checking the student's speaking vulnerability; and providing learning content containing a prescription for the speaking vulnerability to the student terminal.

title: Chest CT image lesion segmentation model training method and system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a semi-supervised chest CT image lesion segmentation model training method and system, and the method comprises the steps of obtaining a sample CT image, and calculating the credibility of the sample CT image, the sample CT image comprising a labeled image and an unlabeled image; according to the credibility of the sample CT image, pairing of the CT image is carried out, an augmented CT image is generated, and the CT image is an image only containing a focus; training a deep learning network according to the augmented CT image to obtain a focus segmentation model; and optimizing the segmentation precision of the focus segmentation model based on a self-learning strategy of a teacher-student model. According to the semi-supervised chest CT image lesion segmentation model training method, lesion information is reserved, the advantages of a full-supervised loss function and a common semi-supervised loss function are integrated, a large amount of labor cost is saved, and the requirement for massive annotation data is avoided.

title: Knowledge distillation method and device, electronic equipment and computer readable storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a knowledge distillation method and device, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence such as computer vision and deep learning, the method can be applied to scenes such as image processing, and the method comprises the following steps: respectively inputting the same to-be-processed data into a teacher network and a student network; respectively acquiring predetermined information generated by the teacher network and the student network for the to-be-processed data, and executing the following predetermined processing: constructing a positive sample pair and a negative sample pair according to the predetermined information, and generating comparison loss according to the positive sample pair and the negative sample pair; and updating the student network according to the comparison loss. By applying the scheme of the invention, the performance of a student network can be improved.

title: Method and device for training image recognition model and image recognition
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a method and a device for training an image recognition model and image recognition, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the field of deep learning and computer vision. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps of obtaining a sample set with labels, a sample set without labels and a knowledge distillation network; executing the following training steps: selecting input samples from the sample set with labels and the sample set without labels, and accumulating the number of iterations; respectively inputting the input samples into a student network and a teacher network of the knowledge distillation network, and training the student network and the teacher network; and if the training completion condition is satisfied, selecting an image recognition model from the student network and the teacher network. Through the implementation mode, the manual labeling amount can be reduced, and the performance of the models can be improved.

title: Model training method and device, equipment, storage medium and program product
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a model training method and device, equipment, a storage medium and a program product, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of computer vision and deep learning. According to the specific implementation scheme, a sample image set is acquired; sample images in the sample image set are input into a pre-trained first model to obtain a first feature set, the first model being a teacher model; based on the first feature set, a first positive sample feature set and a first negative sample feature set are determined, and a sample feature pair is generated; sample images in the sample image set serve as input, the second feature set serves as output, a second model is trained, a feature extraction model is obtained, the second model is a student model, and a loss function of the second model is constructed based on the sample feature pairs of the first model and the sample feature pairs of the second model. According to the scheme, a knowledge distillation method aiming at the positive and negative sample feature pair relationship is realized, and the distillation precision is improved.

title: Autonomous and continuously self-improving learning system
abstract_text: A system and methods are provided in which an artificial intelligence inference module identifies targeted information in large-scale unlabeled data, wherein the artificial intelligence inference module autonomously learns hierarchical representations from large-scale unlabeled data and continually self-improves from self-labeled data points using a teacher model trained to detect known targets from combined inputs of a small hand labeled curated dataset prepared by a domain expert together with self-generated intermediate and global context features derived from the unlabeled dataset by unsupervised and self-supervised processes. The trained teacher model processes further unlabeled data to self-generate new weakly-supervised training samples that are self-refined and self-corrected, without human supervision, and then used as inputs to a noisy student model trained in a semi-supervised learning process on a combination of the teacher model training set and new weakly-supervised training samples. With each iteration, the noisy student model continually self-optimizes its learned parameters against a set of configurable validation criteria such that the learned parameters of the noisy student surpass and replace the learned parameter of the prior iteration teacher model, with these optimized learned parameters periodically used to update the artificial intelligence inference module.

title: Visual SLAM method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a visual SLAM (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping) method based on deep learning. The method comprises the following steps: establishing a feature point and descriptor extraction network based on depth separable convolution, applying the depth separable convolution to a Superpoint network on the basis of the Superpoint network, and improving an up-sampling mode and a loss function form of a descriptor decoder of the Superpoint network; the improved channel pruning algorithm is applied to deep separable convolution, a model provided in a Superpoint network thesis is used as a teacher network, the pruned model is used as a student network, and the precision of feature point extraction and descriptor extraction of the pruned network is improved by using a knowledge distillation mode; the lightweight network is applied to a feature point and descriptor extraction process of ORB-visual SLAM2, and a visual SLAM system based on deep learning is realized. According to the method, the problems of natural disadvantages of a feature point and descriptor extraction network and relatively low running speed of the feature point and descriptor extraction network on equipment with limited calculation resources can be solved.

title: Knowledge Distillation and Gradient Pruning-Based Compression of Artificial Intelligence-Based Base Caller
abstract_text: The technology disclosed compresses a larger, teacher base caller into a smaller, student base caller. The student base caller has fewer processing modules and parameters than the teacher base caller. The teacher base caller is trained using hard labels (e.g., one-hot encodings). The trained teacher base caller is used to generate soft labels as output probabilities during the inference phase. The soft labels are used to train the student base caller.

title: Real-time monitoring method, device and equipment for student discipline violation based on visual perception
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a real-time monitoring method, device and equipment for student discipline violation based on visual perception. According to the method, teacher and student posture information is extracted by collecting images, and a teacher posture feature vector and a student posture feature vector are further obtained. The method comprises steps of detecting a teacher face image according to the collected image, and obtaining teacher identity information, obtaining a teacher emotion category by using the teacher face image and the teacher posture feature vector, calculating the posture deviation and the overall posture deviation of each student according to the posture feature vectors, further determining a classroom atmosphere normal interval according to the teacher identity information, the teacher emotion category and the overall posture deviation, judging whether the real-time posture deviation of each student is in the classroom atmosphere normal interval or not, and determining the students in abnormal states, and further determining abnormal state students with the discipline violation behaviors, reducing the omission ratio, and eliminating the influence of the state information of the teacher on the monitoring of the discipline violation behaviors of the students.

title: Target detection method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and discloses a target detection method comprising the following steps: obtaining a training data set; training the original detection model by using the training data set to obtain training parameters, and initializing the teacher detection model and the student detection model; performing training and parameter updating on the student detection model to obtain contrast parameters; updating the teacher detection model according to the contrast parameters; returning the steps of training the student detection model and updating the parameters until the student detection model converges, and obtaining a target detection model; and identifying a target object contained in the to-be-detected image by using the target detection model to obtain a detection result. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the training data set can be stored in nodes of a block chain. The invention further provides a target detection device, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium. The method can solve the problem that the accuracy of the detection result is low when the annotation data volume of the target detection model is small.

title: Student ideological and political condition early warning method based on deep learning
abstract_text: A student ideological and political condition early warning method based on deep learning comprises the following steps: step 1, setting a standard; step 2, answering questions on the internet; step 3, carrying out analysis and judgment; and step 4, carrying out intervention and remedy. In the step 1 includes formulating a standard, randomly sampling 200-400 students in the early stage of a school, investigating the ideological and political conditions of the students, formulating fifty ideological and political problems according to scores, access places, behaviors and online retrieval information of the students, dividing each question into two parts, and making the problems into an ideological and political investigation website through a network computer; the working method is relatively simple in process and relatively simple to implement, the trouble of artificial questionnaire survey is omitted for the student ideological and political condition survey, the survey efficiency is improved, the ideological and political conditions of 200-400 students are sampled as original standard data, the survey accuracy is improved, and through intervention and remedy of a counselor, students with advanced ideological and political early warning can obtain correct tutoring and quickly return to the right track.

title: Self-service student experiment evaluation system and method
applicants: SHANGHAI ZHIHUIYUN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a self-service student experiment evaluation system, which comprises a first video collection device for recording an experiment operation process from a first visual angle to obtain a first video; a second video collection device for synchronously recording the experiment operation process from a second visual angle to obtain a second video; an evaluation terminal used for receiving answer information and personal information input by students, controlling the first video collection device and the second video collection device to work, storing the answer information, the first video and the second video as an experiment evaluation data packet and sending the experiment evaluation data packet to an external terminal; and the external terminal used for scoring the experiment evaluation data packet. According to the invention, operation videos of students in the experiment evaluation process are collected from the perspective of careful design, and operation steps in the evaluation process are clearly and visually reflected; and through sharing an experiment evaluation data packet, comment can be conveniently carried out in a manual or AI reviewing mode, and students can rapidly check the leakage and fill the vacancy.

title: METHOD FOR DISTILLATION OF MODEL, DEVICE, ELECTRONIC APPARATUS, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: To provide a method for distillation of a deep learning model, a device, an electronic apparatus, and a computer readable storage medium that remove the redundancy of a parameter and significantly increase the efficiency and the effect.SOLUTION: The method includes the steps of: acquiring a teacher model and a student model; converting a second intermediate full connection layer into an enlargement full connection layer and a reduction full connection layer on the basis of first data processing amount of a first intermediate full connection layer of the teacher model and second data processing amount of the second intermediate full connection layer of the student model; replacing the second intermediate full connection layer by the enlargement full connection layer and the reduction full connection layer and generating a training student model; and performing a distillation training on the training student model on the basis of the teacher model.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: An online homework correction method, device and equipment based on a neural network
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an online homework correction method, device and equipment based on a neural network. The method comprises the following steps: correcting a homework image through a neural network to obtain a current score; based on the error result identified by the neural network, obtaining the fuzzy degree of each handwritten character by comparing the handwritten character with the standard character and other handwritten characters so as to obtain the uncertainty index of the error result; and obtaining a misjudgment score of the student by using the uncertainty index so as to obtain a new score, and obtaining a manual reexamination necessity index of the student according to the score level difference between the current score and the new score so as to perform score correction processing. The uncertainty index of the error result is obtained according to the fuzzy degree of the handwritten characters of the student so as to obtain the misjudgment score, and the manual reexamination necessity index of the student is obtained according to the score grade difference between the current score and the new score, so that the problem of score grade evaluation of the student can be avoided, and the correction accuracy is ensured.

title: Learning content recommendation method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides a learning content recommendation method and system based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps of obtaining a test answer sheet of a student and a knowledge point distribution network corresponding to the test answer sheet, carrying out the statistics of the score of each knowledge point in the test answer sheet based on the knowledge point distribution network, and outputting a graph class statistical result; feeding the output of the graph class statistical result to the student, so that the student can know the knowledge mastering condition of himself; then, according to the graph class statistical result, determining a knowledge point to be promoted of the student; therefore, the learning content for learning and/or testing the knowledge points to be promoted is determined and pushed to the student for learning. In this way, automatic and accurate learning content pushing can be achieved, manpower and material resources are saved, man-made deviation can be overcome, man-made omissions can be overcome, more valuable learning content can be pushed to students, the learning efficiency of the students is improved, the mode does not need the psychological fatigue of teachers, and the mthod and system is very practical and effective.

title: Binary neural network model training method, image processing method and device
abstract_text: The invention relates to an image processing technology in the field of computer vision in the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a binary neural network model training method and device and an image processing method and device. The training method comprises the following steps: S1, determining a knowledge distillation framework, wherein the teacher network is a trained neural network model, and the student network is an initial binary neural network model M0; S2, training a binary neural network model Mj by using the (j + 1) th batch of images and a target loss function to obtain a binary neural network model Mj + 1, wherein the target loss function comprises an angle loss item, and the angle loss item is used for describing the difference between the included angle between the feature matrix and the weight matrix in the teacher network and the included angle between the feature matrix and the weight matrix in the student network; S3, when a preset condition is met, taking the binary neural network model Mj + 1 as a target binary neural network model; otherwise, enabling j to be equal to j + 1, and repeating the step S2. According to the embodiment of the invention, the prediction precision of the binary neural network model can be improved.

title: Intelligent assessment method for dance motion postures, rhythms and expressions
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent assessment method for dance motion postures, rhythms and expressions. The method comprises the following steps: S1, extracting student initial joint point data, student initial face key point data, teacher initial joint point data and teacher initial face key point data; S2, performing preprocessing and normalization processing to obtain final joint point data of the student, final face key point data of the student, final joint point data of the teacher and final face key point data of the teacher; S3, calculating the facial expression similarity of each frame of image; S4, extracting key frames in the teacher dance video and the student dance video; and S5, performing action posture accuracy judgment, action rhythm accuracy judgment and expression evaluation on the dance video of the student. According to the method, an artificial intelligence deep learning technology is combined, and a human body posture analysis technology and a face recognition technology are applied to the field of practical engineering.

title: Student classroom behavior identification method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of computer vision, and particularly relates to a behavior recognition method based on deep learning. The invention discloses a student classroom behavior recognition method based on deep learning. The method comprises the following steps: establishing a student classroom behavior database in a real classroom environment; constructing a deep convolutional neural network model, and training in the student classroom behavior database; and utilizing the trained model to predict the classroom behavior of the student. According to the method, the image quality of students in class can be effectively improved based on the super-resolution model of deep learning. Aiming at the problem that deep learning needs to take a large amount of data as training samples, a data enhancement method is used to maximize the utilization of existing data, and the effectiveness and expandability of an identification effect are ensured; and the 11-layer convolutional neural network structure is designed, so that the model training time is shortened to improve the performance of the algorithm on the premise of ensuring relatively high accuracy.

title: Neural network training method, image processing method and related equipment
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a neural network training method, an image processing method and related equipment; the method can be used in the image processing field of the artificial intelligence field, and the method comprises the steps of obtaining a first training data set and a second training data set, wherein a first training image in the first training data set is obtained by mixing a training image with a label of a source domain and a training image with a label of a target domain at a pixel level, and the second training data set comprises a training image without a label from the target domain; training the first neural network according to the first training data set to obtain a first teacher network; and training the first student network by adopting a knowledge distillation mode according to the first teacher network and the second training data set. The difficulty of the teacher network in the training process is increased, so that the processing capability of the trained teacher network on the image of the target domain is improved, and the performance of the trained student network in processing the image of the target domain is improved.

title: Test paper head student information automatic detection method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a test paper head student information automatic detection method based on deep learning, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, performing data acquisition: scanning the front surfaces of a plurality of pieces of student test paper through a scanner, and obtaining a plurality of test paper full images; s2, labeling data: performing manual labeling on the test paper head image to obtain a detection frame of student information, and dividing the detection frame into a training set and a test set; s3, expanding the data volume through the synthesized data; s4, constructing a text detector, to be more specifically, a convolutional neural network is used for constructing the text detector, the text detector comprises a feature extraction network, a candidate text region generation network, a region feature sampling module and a text positioning network, and different loss functions are designed for the composition networks; s5, training a text detector; and S6, testing: inputting test data into the trained text detector for detection. According to the method, the student information of the to-be-filled items and handwritten items of the printed bodies of the test paper heads can be detected, and the method has the advantage of being high in accuracy.

title: MODEL DISTILLATION METHOD DEVICE ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE MEDIUM
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a deep learning technology field, wherein a model distillation method, an apparatus, an electronic device and a storage medium thereof are disclosed. More specifically, the method includes the following steps of: acquiring a teacher model and a student model; thereafter, converting a second intermediate fully-connected layer of the student model into an enlarged fully-connected layer and a reduced fully-connected layer based on first data throughput of a first intermediate fully-connected layer of the teacher model and second data throughput of the second intermediate fully-connected layer of the student model, and replacing the second intermediate fully-connected layer with the enlarged fully-connected layer and the reduced fully-connected layer, thereby creating a training student model; and performing distillation training with respect to a training student model based on the teacher model. In the method, the second intermediate fully-connected layer is replaced with the enlarged fully-connected layer and the reduced fully-connected layer and distillation training is performed with respect to the training student model based on the teacher model, and, as a result, when an intermediate layer of the training student model is distilled, there is no need for the insertion of a fully-connected layer and there is no redundant parameter, which can lead to a considerable improvement in the efficiency and effect of distillation.

title: Fine-grained learning performance prediction method and device, equipment and medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a fine-grained learning performance prediction method, device and equipment, and a medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a learning feature record of a learner for an online course; constructing a multi-modal fusion learning feature matrix according to the learning feature record; obtaining adjacent elements according to the step range; screening similar dynamic features according to the Pico-distance; according to the adjacent elements and the similar dynamic features, obtaining joint elements; and performing fine-grained learning performance prediction on the joint element to obtain a prediction result. According to the method, process score prediction with finer grain is realized, and active and feasible feedback can be provided for students or other users in time. The learning condition of the learner individual can be timely and effectively acquired in different stages, the learning participation degree and the efficiency effect of the student in the online learning environment can be improved, and the method can be widely applied to the technical field of artificial intelligence.

title: Model training method, image enhancement method and equipment
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a model training method, an image enhancement method and equipment, can be applied to the field of image processing in the field of artificial intelligence, and particularly can be used for a super-resolution reconstruction task, and the method reconstructs a set of loss functions for a model composed of a generative network, a teacher network and a student network, and the training effect of a generative network and a student network is improved. In the aspect of improving the training effect of the generative network, a loss function for training the generative network is constructed for a super-resolution reconstruction task based on the characteristics of the super-resolution reconstruction task (that is, a super-resolution image has all information of a low-resolution image and contains more detail information), and the training effect of a model on the super-resolution reconstruction task is improved; in the aspect of improving the student network training effect, distillation is very difficult due to data-free knowledge, and in order to reduce the distillation difficulty, a progressive distillation mode is adopted to train the student network until the whole student network is trained, so that the distillation difficulty is reduced.

title: Living body face detection model training method and device, apparatus and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a living body face detection model training method, which is applied to the technical field of artificial intelligence and is used for solving the technical problem that the current living body face detection model does not have higher prediction accuracy in a real scene.
