The method provided by the invention comprises the following steps of acquiring the face sample image sets belonging to different fields; selecting teacher networks in one-to-one correspondence with the fields, and performing dichotomy training on the corresponding teacher networks through the face sample image sets; freezing the trained teacher network; outputting the face image as a prediction probability of a living body face through each teacher network; taking the average value of the output prediction probabilities as a target probability value of a student network to train the student network; and taking the parameter of a feature extractor of the trained student network as the initial value of the parameter of a feature extractor in the living body face detection model, and performing meta-learning training on the living body face detection model through the face sample image sets until a loss function of the living body face detection model is converged.

title: Campus sports digital management system and method
applicants: GUANGZHOU WEILAI SPORTS TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of digital management, in particular to a campus sports digital management system and method. The system comprises an AI intelligent sports cloud platform based on a big data technology and hardware equipment applied to the AI intelligent sports cloud platform. The AI intelligent sports cloud platform comprises a database, a student intelligent identification system, a playground equipment management and control system, a student sports performance management system and a basic information management system. The hardware equipment comprises an intelligent agent measurement kiosk, a multifunctional health column, a big data display platform, a multifunctional large screen and a multifunctional weather station. The AI intelligent sports cloud platform is constructed by adopting a big data technology, and physical exercise conditions, academic record conditions and health conditions of school students are recorded and displayed through hardware equipment such as the intelligent body measurement kiosk, the multifunctional health column, the big data display platform, the multifunctional large screen and the multifunctional weather station; and teachers, parents and students can monitor sports and health by themselves.

title: Vehicle floor foreign matter striking fault detection method based on deep learning
applicants: HARBIN KEJIA GENERAL MECH & ELECTRICAL CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a motor train unit floor foreign matter striking fault detection method, and belongs to the field of train operation fault detection. The invention aims to solve the problems of low efficiency and low accuracy of component fault caused by foreign matter striking during manual maintenance of the bottom plate of the action train unit. The method comprises the following steps: establishing a train floor image sample set, and obtaining a to-be-trained labeled image sample and an unlabeled learning image sample; carrying out sample amplification on the marked image with the label and the unmarked image without the label through a teach-student model, and creating a self-classification detection model; and calculating and detecting the position of the fault through a self-classification detection model, and transmitting back a message. The method is used for fault detection of the train floor foreign matter hitting trace.

title: Graph processing network model training method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a graph processing network model training method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and particularly relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as deep learning and computer vision. According to the specific implementation scheme, training samples are input into a student network and a teacher network respectively, so that a first feature map output by the ith layer of the student network and a second feature map output by the ith layer of the teacher network are obtained; the method also includes determining a first correction gradient corresponding to the student network according to the difference between the first feature map and the second feature map; acquiring a first soft label output by the student network and a second soft label output by the teacher network; determining a corresponding second correction gradient in the student network according to the difference between the first soft label and the second soft label; and correcting the student network based on the first correction gradient and the second correction gradient. Therefore, the learning ability and performance of the student network are improved.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MODEL DISTILLATION
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: The present disclosure provides a method, and an apparatus for model distillation, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and in particular, relates to technical fields of deep learning and computer vision. A specific implementation includes: obtaining a batch of teacher features corresponding to a teacher model and a batch of student features corresponding to a student model; determining a set of teacher similarities corresponding to the batch of teacher features and a set of student similarities corresponding to the batch of student features; determining weights of loss values of features of images based on difference values corresponding to the images; and weighting a loss value of a feature of each image in a batch of images, training the student model by using a weighting result. The present disclosure may use the difference values between the feature similarities of the student model and the feature similarities of the teacher model to determine the weights of the loss values. The distillation process of the present disclosure may improve the detection capabilities of the models, reduce the delay of the execution devices, and reduce the occupation and consumption of computing resources such as memories.

title: Homework duplicate checking method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a homework duplicate checking method based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining student curriculum homework data and a homework template file, judging the format of a homework template, carrying out the question-cutting processing of the obtained homework, judging whether the question in the homework is a subjective question or an objective question, carrying out the text preprocessing of the answer of the subjective question in the homework after the question-cutting, employing the deep learning technology (namely a convolutional neural network model) to calculate the similarity between student homework, analyzing a similarity calculation result, clustering the student homework with high similarity, and generating a similarity report. In order to facilitate a teacher to check similar content conditions, similar contents among similar homework are marked. According to the method, text contents with similar job semantics can be found out, and the problem that many plagiarism detection methods are poor in anti-interference effect is solved.

title: Model training method and device
abstract_text: The invention discloses a model training method which can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps: obtaining a video sample, a first video processing network and a second video processing network, and processing the video sample through the first video processing network and the second video processing network, respectively obtaining a first intermediate feature map output and a second intermediate feature map output; respectively processing the first intermediate feature map output and the second intermediate feature map output through a recurrent neural network to respectively obtain first inter-frame information and second inter-frame information, and determining target loss for knowledge distillation according to the first inter-frame information and the second inter-frame information, and performing knowledge distillation on the second video processing network based on the target loss. According to the method, the inter-frame information is added into the target loss, so that the video quality of the video obtained after the video processing task is carried out on the student model after knowledge distillation is improved.

title: Automatic subjective question marking neural network model with concept enhanced representation and unidirectional attention implication
abstract_text: The invention discloses an automatic subjective question marking neural network model with concept enhanced representation and unidirectional attention implication. A concept series in questions is automatically identified by combining a bidirectional long-short term memory neural network BiLSTM and a conditional random field CRF of machine learning; through a multi-head attention mechanism, enhanced representation modeling of a concept word embedding vector sequence on a answer word embedding vector sequence is realized; answer context information is coded through the BiLSTM; through a one-way attention implication matching mode, semantic inclusion of student answers to reference answers is estimated, information is gathered on the basis of one-way implication matching vectors, and probability distribution prediction of student answer score intervals is carried out. The model comprises a concept extraction layer, an answer presentation layer, a concept enhancement presentation layer, a context presentation layer, a one-way implication attention layer, an aggregation layer and a prediction layer. The model has the advantages that extra semantic analysis and artificial rules are not needed; the matching precision of paper marking is improved; and the adaptability and practicability of a paper marking system are expanded.

title: English composition marking system and method
abstract_text: The invention provides an English composition marking system and method. The marking system comprises a personalized user function module, an intelligent marking technology innovation module and a writing auxiliary application innovation module. The personalized user function module is used for providing different English composition reading functions for the common user module, the student module and the teacher module; the intelligent reviewing technology innovation module is used for carrying out online intelligent error correction on the English composition; and the writing auxiliary application innovation module is used for providing auxiliary writing and keyword retrieval. According to the invention, online intelligent error correction is performed on the composition by using an artificial intelligence algorithm, composition writing auxiliary functions such as auxiliary writing and keyword retrieval are provided, English writing and composition reading under a multi-user collaborative scene are realized, and the system is comprehensive in function, high in reading speed and high in accuracy.

title: Online learning interaction method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: BAIDU ONLINE NETWORK TECHNOLOGY BEIJING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online learning interaction method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of computers, in particular to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as computer vision. The specific implementation scheme is as follows: performing action recognition on a teacher video stream collected by a teacher client to obtain teacher action features; performing action recognition on the student video stream collected by the student client to obtain student action features; and determining whether the teacher action characteristics and/or the student action characteristics hit an interaction scene or not, and displaying an interaction effect of the interaction scene at the teacher client and/or the student client under the condition that the interaction scene is hit. According to the embodiment of the invention, the interaction mode of online learning can be enriched, and the interaction efficiency of online learning is improved.

title: Learning, evaluation and prediction system and method based on electronic drum set data
applicants: SHANGHAI JIZHA NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a learning, evaluation and prediction system and method based on electronic drum set data, and the system comprises an electronic drum set device, the electronic drum set device is provided with a signal collection and conversion module, the signal collection and conversion module is in conversion connection with a midi data output module, the midi data output module is connected with a midi data collection module, the midi data collection module is connected with the midi data comparison module, the midi data comparison module is connected with the midi data storage module, the midi data comparison module is connected with the local midi error correction data storage center and the cloud end midi error correction data storage center, the local midi error correction data storage center is connected with the deep learning and prediction module, and the deep learning and prediction module is connected with the prediction prompt and suggestion module. The system can prompt a user of a possible error position in advance through a deep learning prediction and evaluation method, so that error correction can be carried out in advance, the learning progress of a student can be accelerated, and the learning effect can be improved.

title: Marketing activity prediction model structure and prediction method based on knowledge distillation
applicants: SHANGHAI SHUMING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a marketing activity prediction method based on knowledge distillation. The method comprises the steps of data preprocessing, data set division and network training framework formation of a teacher model, data set division and network training framework formation of a student model, prediction model establishment, marketing activity prediction and the like. The method includes following steps: firstly, constructing a relatively complex teacher model Net-T with a residual neural network as a core, and then establishing a student model Net-S formed by a simple neural network; weighting a soft label obtained by training a teacher model Net-T at a high temperature and a hard label obtained by training a student model Net-S at the same temperature to obtain a total loss function of knowledge distillation; by taking the total loss function as a target function of a student model Net-S during actual deployment, training to obtain a final neural network model, and performing prediction, wherein the result shows that the hybrid model effectively expands the application of deep learning to advertisement calculation and recommendation system algorithms, so that the method significantly improves the accuracy of user click prediction.

title: Training method and device of point cloud instance segmentation model, electronic equipment and medium
applicants: INDUSTRIAL & COMMERCIAL BANK OF CHINA CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a training method of a point cloud instance segmentation model. The training method comprises the following steps: acquiring a teacher model and an initial student model; inputting the original point cloud data into a teacher model to obtain a first feature matrix output by a backbone network of the teacher model, a first probability matrix output by a semantic segmentation network of the teacher model and a second feature matrix output by an instance segmentation network of the teacher model; and taking the first feature matrix, the first probability matrix and the second feature matrix as labels of the original point cloud data, training an initial student model based on the original point cloud data, and obtaining a trained point cloud instance segmentation model. In addition, the invention also provides a training device of the point cloud instance segmentation model, electronic equipment, a readable storage medium and a computer program product. The training method and device of the point cloud instance segmentation model can be used in the field of artificial intelligence or other fields.

title: Student cooperation state evaluation method and system based on brain-computer interface
abstract_text: The invention provides a student cooperation state evaluation method and system based on a brain-computer interface. The method comprises the following steps: determining brain wave data of a student in a cooperation learning process, the brain wave data being collected by using a brain-computer interface technology; inputting the brain wave data into a trained classifier, and classifying the cooperation learning states of the students, wherein the cooperation learning states comprise interactive learning, construction learning, active learning and passive learning. The classifier is constructed based on a long short-term memory (LSTM) network and is used for classifying the cooperation learning states of the students according to the brain wave data in the cooperation learning process of the students. The brain-computer interface and machine learning technology is adopted, the cooperation learning state of the students is automatically monitored, and compared with a traditional method for judging the states of the students through observation of teachers, the method is more scientific and efficient.

title: Model distillation method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a model distillation method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical fields of deep learning, big data, natural language processing and the like. According to the specific implementation scheme, first prediction probability distribution obtained by predicting a first training sample in advance through a student model is obtained, second prediction probability distribution is obtained by predicting a second training sample through the student model, label probability distribution of the second training sample and the first prediction probability distribution are overlapped to obtain overlapped probability distribution, and the overlapped probability distribution is obtained; and distillation training is performed on the student model according to the difference between the superposition probability distribution and the second prediction probability distribution. Therefore, the student model is subjected to distillation training through the superposition probability distribution obtained by superposing the probability distribution obtained by pre-training the student model and the label probability distribution, so that the distillation effect is effectively improved on the premise of not introducing an additional model, the computing resources required in the training process are reduced. And the storage space of the model after distillation is reduced.

title: Data classification and identification method and device, equipment and readable storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a data classification and identification method and device, equipment and a readable storage medium, and relates to the field of machine learning. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a first data set and a second data set, wherein the second data set comprises second data marked with sample labels, and the second data belongs to a target classification set; training through the first data in an unsupervised training mode and the second data in a supervised training mode to obtain a classification teacher model; obtaining a classified student model; performing distillation training on model parameters of the classified student model to obtain a data classification model; and performing classification prediction on the target data through the data classification model. The teacher model is used for supervising and training to achieve the purpose of distillation, a student model with higher performance and precision is finally obtained, training mainly depends on a large amount of first data, the requirement for the data size of labeled second data is low, the complicated process of conducting a large amount of labeling on sample data is avoided, and the training efficiency and accuracy of the data classification model are improved.

title: Target area detection model training method, system and device, and medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a target area detection model training method, system and device, and a medium, and relates to the field of image processing. The method comprises the following steps: collecting a picture containing a preset target, marking the area where the preset target is located in the picture, and obtaining a data set; constructing a teacher model and a student model for identifying an area where the preset target is located in the picture, training the teacher model by using the data set to obtain a first model, and training the student model by using the data set to obtain a second model; and distilling the second model by using the first model knowledge to obtain a target area detection model, wherein the number of parameters needing to be learned in the teacher model is greater than the number of parameters needing to be learned in the student model. The problems that an existing optical character region detection technology model based on deep learning is complex and the real-time performance is difficult to meet are solved, and the reasoning speed of a text detection model is improved on the premise that the model recognition precision is guaranteed.

title: Knowledge tracking method and system fusing student knowledge point question interaction information
abstract_text: The invention discloses a knowledge tracking method and system fusing interaction information among students, knowledge points and questions. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a historical answer record set of students; encoding data in the historical answer record set of the student to obtain a current answer record code and a next question information code, and splicing the current answer record code and the next question information code to obtain an output vector; decoding an interaction parameter between the student and the question and an interaction parameter between the student and the knowledge point from the output vector, and decoding an interaction parameter between the knowledge point and the question from the next question information code; inputting all interaction parameters into the Bayesian probability model, and outputting an answer prediction result. According to the method, the deep learning model and the Bayesian probability model are fused, interaction between students and knowledge points, interaction between students and questions and interaction between knowledge points and questions are modeled, good interpretability is provided for the interpretation learning process, and knowledge tracking accuracy is improved.

title: Student learning situation analysis and detection device based on AI
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an AI-based student learning situation analysis and detection device which comprises an operation box body, auxiliary supporting legs are fixedly installed on the lower surface of the operation box body, a supporting rod is fixedly installed on the inner bottom wall of the operation box body, an installation plate is fixedly installed at the upper end of the supporting rod, a sliding groove is formed in the upper surface of the installation plate, and the upper end of the sliding groove is fixedly installed on the lower surface of the sliding groove. Sliding blocks are slidably connected to the inner walls of the sliding grooves, two binding posts are fixedly mounted on the upper surfaces of the sliding blocks, inserting holes are formed in the upper surface of the mounting plate, and inserting columns are fixedly mounted on the inner bottom walls of the inserting holes. According to the AI-based student learning condition analysis and detection device, through the arrangement of the sliding block and the wire card, electronic elements and wires are distributed more neatly during wiring of a student, a teacher can conveniently and rapidly check the connection condition of a line, through the arrangement of the camera, the wiring process of the student can be recorded, the teacher can conveniently check after class, and the student learning condition analysis and detection device is convenient to use. Errors occurring in the wiring process of students are known, and statistical analysis of the errors is facilitated.

title: A deep learning-based formula picture recognition question judgment system
applicants: EDUCLOUD ZHI DIGITAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a deep learning-based formula picture recognition question judgment system, which comprises: a central processing module used for reading an instruction, decoding the instruction and executing the instruction; the image input module that is used for collecting and inputting images; the subject classification module that is used for classifying the questions into different subjects; the formula identification module that is used for identifying the picture to obtain a Latex language; the data conversion module that is used for converting the obtained Latex language into a sympy grammar format which can be directly recognized by Python; and the answer comparison module that is used for comparing the answer with the correct answer to obtain the answer condition of each question of the student. According to the scheme, the subject classification module is arranged and used for classifying the subjects into different subjects, and during identification, the data models of the corresponding subjects are directly called for comparison and identification, so that the accuracy of formula identification between the different subjects is greatly improved.

title: SYSTEM FOR MANAGING STUDY FOR SELF DIRECTED LEARNING BASED BIG DATA AND METHOD THEREOF
abstract_text: An objective of the present invention is to provide a big data based learning managing system for self directed learning which supports self directed learning contents and student personalized learning to students having difficulty in self directed learning, systemattically anayzes a learning pattern of a learner to set a purpose and to make a plan in an in an artificial intelligence technology, modifies a wrong learning pattern of the learner to provide a proper learning method, competitiveness of learning by showing a current level of upper students taking similar subjects and a current level of oneself, and improves self-regulation and control by previously blocking unnecessary temptation for leaning to manage students who lack self directed learning, and a method thereof. The big data based learning managing system for self directed learning comprises: a study line storing unit to store a study line by step including a curriculum, a learning direction, and a learning method planed by subject as references to divide a learning process by subject; a study line providing unit for analyzing a learning pattern and a learning level of a lever through qustion and answer using an artificial intelligence technology to provide the study line by step relevant to a corresponding learner based on the analysis result; a learner learning managing unit for manage a learning time and a learning amount of a learner according to a curriculum determined in the study line by step using the artificial intelligence technology; and a learning weakness analyzing unit to grasp a learning level of a learner through a progress of the study line by step to derive a learning weakness based on the grasped result, and to provde learning information for improving the learning weakness.

title: Non-face-to-face personal learning management system using online
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a non-face-to-face AI personal learning management system using online, and more specifically, to a non-face-to-face AI personal learning management system using online, which includes a student smart terminal group (100g) consisting of a plurality of veterinary student smart terminals (100), a network (200), a non-face-to-face AI personal learning management server (300), a guardian wireless terminal group (400g) consisting of a plurality of guardian wireless terminals (400), and a homeroom teacher wireless terminal group (500g) consisting of a plurality of homeroom teacher wireless terminals (500). According to the present invention, an effect most similar to offline individual learning can be obtained even in an individual home while keeping rules of infectious diseases through a homeroom teacher, a study planner, a timetable, and a bell for each lesson.

title: Mathematical probability analysis and reinforced learning system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHANDONG LABOR VOCATIONAL AND TECHNICAL COLLEGE SHANDONG LABOR TECHNICIAN INST
abstract_text: The invention discloses a mathematical probability analysis and enhanced learning system based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a central processing unit, an identity recognition module is arranged at the connecting end of the central processing unit, an online answering module is connected to the output end of the central processing unit, and a test question review module is arranged at the connecting end of the online answering module. A data analysis module is arranged at the connecting end of the test question review module, an intelligent detection module is arranged at the connecting end of the data analysis module, a data storage module is arranged at the connecting end of the intelligent detection module, a grade evaluation module is arranged at the connecting end of the data storage module, and an artificial intelligence module is arranged at the connecting end of the grade evaluation module; the connection end of the artificial intelligence module is provided with a reinforced training module. Through the intelligent detection module and the artificial intelligence module, wrong knowledge of each student can be conveniently analyzed, detected and summarized, targeted learning is carried out, and knowledge is intelligently selected for learning according to different knowledge mastered by the students with different learning capabilities.

title: Lightweight multimode recommendation method based on generative adversarial and knowledge distillation
abstract_text: The invention discloses a lightweight multimode recommendation method based on generative adversarial and knowledge distillation, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the adversarial training through a generative adversarial network according to a click vector and a purchase vector of a user, and generating user historical data similar to original user data; respectively inputting the generated data into a discriminator in the generative adversarial network and a student model for deep learning training; taking the discriminator as a teacher network and a student network to carry out training of a loss function of cross entropy until the output of the student network can fit the output of the teacher network, and finishing the updated parameters are reversely propagated until the training; and finally, the user only needs to download the final student model from the cloud to carry out online recommendation, so the recommendation efficiency is improved. According to the method, the recommendation accuracy is improved based on the multi-modal user portrait, the lightweight deployment problem of the recommendation model is solved by adopting knowledge distillation and generative adversarial, meanwhile, the privacy security of the user is ensured, and the balance between the recommendation accuracy and the calculation efficiency is realized.

title: Deep neural network regression model based on density screening
applicants: MINI OF WATER RESOURCES INFORMATION CENTER
abstract_text: The invention discloses a deep neural network regression model based on density screening, and belongs to the technical field of water level estimation. According to the method, on the basis that the data density of normal data points is higher than the data density of abnormal points, abnormal data are screened out, an effective sample set is obtained, and useful data are screened out from a large amount of data. The sample set is subjected to standardization processing, so that the difference in quantity between different data is eliminated, the learning difficulty of a deep learning model is avoided, and the efficiency is improved. A deep student neural network model is constructed, the neural network model is continuously trained through historical data, and the trained neural network model can be used for water level prediction.

title: Model distillation method, device and equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a model distillation method, device and equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps of obtaining a pre-training model, a student model, a plurality of training samples with labels, and a plurality of unlabeled training samples, the pre-training model being a model obtained based on Bert network training; carrying out integral distillation learning on the pre-trained model by adopting an unmarked training sample and a student model to obtain a student model after first distillation; performing hierarchical distillation learning on the pre-trained model by adopting an unlabeled training sample and the student model after the first distillation to obtain a student model after the second distillation; and carrying out layered distillation learning on the student model after the second distillation by adopting a training sample with a label to obtain a trained student model. Therefore, through three times of distillation, the accuracy of the model obtained after distillation is improved, the requirement for training sample labeling is reduced, and the distillation cost is reduced.

title: IDENTIFYING OPTIMAL WEIGHTS TO IMPROVE PREDICTION ACCURACY IN MACHINE LEARNING TECHNIQUES
abstract_text: A computer-implemented method,system and computer program product for improving prediction accuracy in machine learning techniques. A teacher model is constructed: wherein the teacher model generates a weight for each data case.The current student model is then trained using training data and the weights generated by the teacher model. After training the current student model, the current student model generates state features: which are used by the teacher model to generate new weights. A candidate student model is then trained using training data and these new weights. A reward is generated by comparing the current student model with the candidate student model using training and testing data,which is used to update the teacher model if a stopping rule has not been satisfied. Upon a stopping rule being satisfied, the weights generated by the teacher model are deemed to be the "optimal"weights which are returned to the user.

title: IDENTIFYING OPTIMAL WEIGHTS TO IMPROVE PREDICTION ACCURACY IN MACHINE LEARNING TECHNIQUES
abstract_text: A computer-implemented method, system and computer program product for improving prediction accuracy in machine learning techniques. A teacher model is constructed, where the teacher model generates a weight for each data case. The current student model is then trained using training data and the weights generated by the teacher model. After training the current student model, the current student model generates state features, which are used by the teacher model to generate new weights. A candidate student model is then trained using training data and these new weights. A reward is generated by comparing the current student model with the candidate student model using training and testing data, which is used to update the teacher model if a stopping rule has not been satisfied. Upon a stopping rule being satisfied, the weights generated by the teacher model are deemed to be the “optimal” weights which are returned to the user.

title: Deep learning lightweight pulmonary nodule classification method based on ARM
abstract_text: The invention discloses a deep learning lightweight pulmonary nodule classification method based on ARM, and the method carries out the processing of an obtained training image, and inputs the image into a full-precision neural network for training. After the training is completed, ternary compression is carried out on the 32-bit full-precision weight by using a Ternary Quantification algorithm to obtain a ternary precision neural network. Then knowledge distillation is used, the full-precision network serves as a teacher network, the ternary precision network serves as a student network, two parameter factors Wp and Wn in ternary precision are finely adjusted, and the model is stored after fine adjustment is completed. And finally, the trained model weight is applied to a pulmonary nodule classification program in an embedded device to realize classification of pulmonary nodules. The model trained by the method and the classification program realized by the method can accurately classify the pulmonary nodules, and the problems that the performance of embedded equipment is insufficient and the accuracy is reduced after weight precision compression are avoided.

title: Student class behavior identification method based on deep learning and video track
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student class behavior identification method based on deep learning and a video track. The method comprises the following steps: 1, training a double-flow convolutional network by using a manually labeled student class behavior training sample; 2, extracting a video track from the behavior video by using an improved track algorithm; 3, using the track and the behavior video extracted in the step 2 as input, and extracting features of each video track moment through the double-flow convolutional network obtained through training in the step 1; 4, using the video trajectory features extracted in the step 3 as input, and extracting features of the video trajectory features in the time dimension by using a recurrent neural network; 5, splicing the features obtained in the step 4 after space-time pooling to obtain the features of the whole video; and 6, training a linear SVM classifier according to the video features obtained in the step 5 to classify the videos.

title: Abnormal sample detection method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an abnormal sample detection method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of data processing, in particular to artificial intelligence technologies such as deep learning and computer vision. The method specifically comprises the following steps: processing a to-be-detected sample by adopting a teacher network and a student network to obtain teacher features and student features associated with the teacher features; and determining whether the to-be-detected sample is an abnormal sample or not according to the teacher features and the student features. According to the invention, the teacher network and the student network are adopted for abnormal sample detection, so that the detection efficiency is improved, and the accuracy of the detection result is considered.

title: Point cloud completion method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a point cloud completion method and device in the field of artificial intelligence, equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining target original point cloud data to be completed; generating target complete point cloud data according to the target original point cloud data through a point cloud completion model, wherein the point cloud completion model is a student network model in a teacher-student network model, and the teacher-student network model is obtained by training original point cloud data and standard point cloud data corresponding to a training scanning target; and performing densification processing on the target point cloud data set to obtain target complemented point cloud data, wherein the target point cloud data set comprises the target complete point cloud data. According to the method, the complete and dense point cloud data can be recovered based on the original point cloud data.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR VALIDATION OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODELS
abstract_text: Systems and methods are described which relate to machine learning model validation. A first machine learning model may be trained to dependent variable data for a first population. A second machine learning model may be trained to simulate dependent variable data for the first population. The second machine learning model may then be applied to student activity data of a second population having different characteristics from the first population to produce simulated dependent variable data. The first machine learning model may then generate predictions for the second population, which may be validated via comparison to the simulated dependent variable data. A given simulated dependent variable value may be generated by the second machine learning model at a specific time TX, where some features input to the machine learning model may be derived from datapoints occurring before TX and others being derived from datapoints occurring after TX.

title: Student model training method and device, computer equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention provides a student model training method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a plurality of first labels obtained by respectively predicting a plurality of sample data in a sample data set by a teacher model; according to the teacher model, determining credibility information of the multiple first labels, wherein the credibility information is used for representing credibility degrees of the corresponding first labels; and training the student model according to the sample data set, the plurality of first labels and the credibility information of the plurality of first labels. According to the technical scheme, when the student model is trained based on the sample data set and the first label of the sample data in the sample data set, distinguishing training can be performed according to the credibility information of the first label, the influence of the first label with low credibility on training is reduced, and the learning efficiency of the student model is improved.

title: Voice training method and device based on deep learning, equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a voice training method and device based on deep learning, computer equipment and a storage medium, is applied to the technical field of artificial intelligence, provides a method for training a voice synthesis model through a teacher and student neural network, and can train the voice synthesis model efficiently and quickly with low resource consumption. The method provided by the invention comprises the following steps: encoding a first phoneme sequence to obtain a first phoneme encoding value; performing duration prediction processing on the first phoneme coding value to obtain a first pronunciation duration prediction value; performing extension processing on each phoneme in the first phoneme sequence to obtain an extension feature of each phoneme in the first phoneme sequence; converting the extended feature of each phoneme in the first phoneme sequence into a first Mel spectrum value; and training the student neural network through the hidden variable provided by the trained teacher neural network and the first Mel spectrum value, and obtaining the trained student neural network when the first loss function of the student neural network is converged.

title: Model distillation method and device for different scenes
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a model distillation method and device for different scenes, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning and computer vision. The specific implementation mode comprises the following steps: extracting features of a batch of scene images with the same scene in at least two batches of scene images by utilizing a scene teacher model in at least two scene teacher models to obtain scene teacher features; extracting features of at least two batches of scene images by using a student model to obtain batch student features; mapping features in the batch of student features into scene student features corresponding to one of the at least two scenes; and for the scene teacher features and the scene student features corresponding to the same scene, determining a feature distance, and further determining a loss value to train a student model. The distillation process of the invention can improve the detection precision and detection speed of the model for different scene images. Furthermore, the delay of the execution equipment is reduced, and the occupation and consumption of computing resources such as a memory are reduced.

title: Educational administration management system and method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides an educational administration management system and method based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises an image collection module, a face feature recognition module, a deep learning module, and a state analysis module, and the image collection module is used for collecting the face information of a target student; the face feature recognition is used for obtaining face abnormal state information through face information; the deep learning module is used for acquiring historical face information, acquiring corresponding student parameter information and historical face abnormal state information according to the historical face information, and inputting information data into the convolutional neural network model for training; and the state analysis module is used for inputting the face abnormal state information into the convolutional neural network model to obtain corresponding student state information, and outputting the corresponding student state information to the educational administration terminal. By adopting the system, the learning score state of the student can be managed through the learning state of the student, the learning attitude of the student is conveniently improved, and the learning efficiency of the student is improved.

title: A dynamic vocabulary enhancement combined model distillation method
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of natural language processing in the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a dynamic vocabulary enhancement combined model distillation method, which comprises the following steps: on the basis of an ALBert language model, adjusting the language model by combining a fine adjustment technology with a dynamic vocabulary enhancement technology to obtain a finely adjusted language model, and taking the finely adjusted language model as a teacher model; different from the conventional fine adjustment logic, when the language model is finely adjusted, in the fine adjustment process, combining the characteristics of the dictionary information with the output characteristics of the language model, and then performing fine adjustment; and after fine adjustment is finished, distilling the teacher model, and taking an obtained model prediction result as a training basis of the student model. According to the model distillation method provided by the invention, the dictionary information is introduced as the key information, so that the model can still capture the dictionary information as a feature under the condition of greatly reducing the size, thereby achieving the purposes of greatly reducing the size of the model and accelerating the inference speed under the condition of not sacrificing the extraction accuracy.

title: Self-adaptive question pushing method based on deep learning model
applicants: SHANGHAI SQUIRREL CLASSROOM ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a self-adaptive question pushing method based on a deep learning model, relates to the technical field of deep learning, and aims to predict a question solving result of each question in a candidate question set of a student by utilizing the pre-created deep learning model and generate the question solving result according to the current question solving condition of the student. Based on the prediction result of the question solving condition of each question in the student candidate question set, the question solving result set is generated, the corresponding question is selected from the question set and pushed to the student according to the question solving result and the student ability value, the question closest to the student ability value can be effectively pushed to the student. The learning effect of the student is effectively improved, and the pushing effect is improved.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR CONTINUAL META-LEARNING
applicants: BEIJING DIDI INFINITY TECHNOLOGY & DEV CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: Embodiments of the disclosure provide artificial intelligence systems and methods for training a continual meta-learner framework (CML) model. An exemplary artificial intelligence system includes a storage device and a processor. A plurality of tasks are received at the CML framework in a sequence, where each task comprises a training dataset and a test dataset. For each task, a fast-learning is performed by training the student network and the discriminator associated with the CML framework based on the training dataset associated with the task. One or more initial parameters associated with the student network and the discriminator are updated to generate updated initial parameters corresponding to the one or more initial parameters. A meta-update is performed to optimize the one or more initial parameters associated with the student network and the discriminator using the updated initial parameters.

title: Neural network model training method and device
abstract_text: The invention is suitable for the technical field of machine learning, and provides a neural network model training method, which comprises the steps of inputting a training sample set into a preset student neural network model for processing to obtain first feature information, and calculating a first loss value according to the first feature information and a first loss function; inputting the training sample set into a preset teacher neural network model for processing to obtain fourth feature information, and calculating a second loss value according to the first feature information, the fourth feature information and a second loss function; determining a target loss value according to the first loss value and the second loss value; if the target loss value does not meet the preset stopping condition, updating the preset student neural network according to the target loss value; and if the target loss value meets the preset stopping condition, outputting the trained student neural network model. According to the invention, the training convergence condition of the neural network model can be effectively improved, so that the neural network can better learn features, and the recognition precision and generalization ability of the neural network are improved.

title: Higher vocational student quality intelligent evaluation system and method
abstract_text: The invention provides a higher vocational student quality intelligent evaluation system and method, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. The system comprises an input module, a quantization module, a storage module, a multi-body averaging module, a multi-dimensional channel module, an inverse quantization module, an output module and a feedback module. The intelligent quality evaluation system is easy to operate and can effectively evaluate the quality of higher vocational students, and for quality indexes or single organization test points, quantification from a quality input language can be completed, quantification results to an intelligent output language can also be completed, and then quality evaluation results are given until comprehensive quality evaluation is finally given.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED STRUCTURED OBSERVATION SCHEDULE FOR EVALUATING ONLINE CLASSES AND VIDEOS
abstract_text: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED STRUCTURED OBSERVATION SCHEDULE FOR EVALUATING ONLINE CLASSES AND VIDEOS The present invention relates to Artificial intelligence based structured observation schedule for evaluating online classes and videos. The objective of the present invention is to solve the problems in the prior art related to adequacies in technologies for evaluating online classes and videos using artificial intelligence technology. Applicants: 1. Dr Sameer Babu M Developing of Lessons(Content) from the previous knowledge mention the strategies of introduction, and modalities used in a database Providing information to the teacher by explanation, demonstration, and illustration skills of the teacher Providing to the teachers about the Pattern of Questioning Assigning a point of total point ofvideo quality, student response,graphics, communication and feedback submitted by the learner Displaying Grading of the ClassNideo based on the score Date 14 th day of January, 2021

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR KEY FEATURE DETECTION IN MACHINE LEARNING MODEL APPLICATIONS USING LOGISTIC MODELS
abstract_text: Systems and methods are disclosed related to the identification of key features among features input to a complex predictive model. Logistic models may be created for each of a number of defined clusters of training data used to train the complex predictive model. Coefficients of each logistic model may be analyzed to identify key features that contribute to predictions made by the logistic models. Performance of the logistic models may be compared to that of the complex model to validate the logistic models. When a prediction is made for a given student by the complex predictive model, the student may be assigned to a cluster/by identifying the cluster center having the shortest Euclidean distance to the feature data associated with the student. Key features associated with the assigned cluster may be used as a basis for generating a recommendation for the reducing a risk level of the student.

title: Student handwritten choice question identification method
applicants: ANHUI SEVEN DAYS EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student handwritten choice question recognition method, and relates to the field of text recognition. For image data of handwriting choice questions of students, a scheme for solving handwritten text recognition based on an Attention mechanism is provided. The whole method is based on a residual network architecture, distorted character images are corrected by utilizing STN, character positions are positioned more accurately and what characters to be identified are judged more accurately in image features by utilizing channel Attention and space Attention mechanisms, character identification is more accurate in sequence features by utilizing a Seq2Seq and Attention mechanism, and the identification rate of fuzzy characters by an identification network is improved through a super-resolution branch network. Interference of factors such as the background environment on character recognition is reduced to the maximum extent, the handwritten character recognition rate is increased, and a foundation is laid for engineering landing of an artificial intelligence paper marking system. The method mainly comprises the following steps of data preprocessing, network structure design, target function design and network output post-processing. The method is reasonable in design, convenient to use and good in effect.

title: DECENTRALISED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI)/MACHINE LEARNING TRAINING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A decentralised training platform is described for training an Artificial Intelligence (AI) model where training data (e.g. medical images) is distributed across multiple sites (nodes) and due to confidentiality, legal, or other reasons the data at each site is unable to be shared or leave the site and so cannot be copied to a central location for training. The method comprises training a teacher model locally at each node and then moving each of the teacher models to a central node and using these to train a student model using a transfer dataset. This may be facilitated by setting up the cloud service using inter-region peering connections between the nodes to make the nodes appear as a single cluster. In one variation the student module may be trained at each node using the multiple trained teacher models. In another variation we train multiple student models where each student model is trained by each teacher model at the node the teacher model was trained on, and once the plurality of student models are trained, an ensemble model is generated from the plurality of trained student models. Loss function weighting and node under sampling to enable load balancing may be used to improve accuracy and time/cost efficiency.

title: English composition scoring method for image recognition
applicants: ANHUI SEVEN DAYS EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an English composition scoring method for image recognition, and relates to the field of text scoring. Aiming at an English composition scoring problem of test paper scanning identification, a solution of utilizing a plurality of modules to extract features and utilizing an xgboost model to map the features into a final score is provided. The scheme mainly comprises the following modules: a basic score module, a semantic score module, a theme score module, a writing score module and an integrated score module. According to the scheme, each module extracts features in various modes such as a traditional nlp processing method, deep learning and machine learning, student compositions can be analyzed thoroughly, and composition scoring accuracy is optimized by integrating all feature weights.

title: Cross-dimensional knowledge migration method for migrating knowledge from high-dimensional deep learning model to low dimension
abstract_text: The invention discloses a cross-dimensional knowledge migration method for migrating knowledge from a high-dimensional deep learning model to a low dimension. The method comprises the following steps:1) expanding n-1-dimensional data x to form pseudo n-dimensional data y; 2) inputting y into a teacher network, and extracting n-dimensional features; 3) calculating the mean value of the n-dimensional features extracted by the teacher network in the nth dimension; 4) inputting x into a student network, and extracting n-1-dimensional features; 5) enabling the feature output of the student networkto approach the feature output of the teacher network through the constraint of a loss function; (6) repeating the steps (1)-(5) for set times until the difference between the feature output of the student network and the feature output of the teacher network is smaller than a preset threshold value; and (7) migrating to the dimension n-2 according to the methods in the steps (1)-(6) until the dimension m is reached. When only low-dimensional data exists or only low-dimensional data can be adopted to improve the algorithm speed, a low-dimensional model can be obtained by adopting the method,knowledge of a high-dimensional model is stored in the low-dimensional model, and the feature extraction capacity similar to that of the high-dimensional model is achieved.

title: Classroom sign-in machine based on face recognition
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a classroom sign-in machine based on face recognition. The classroom sign-in machine comprises a shell and a student radio frequency ID card. A camera, a display screen, acontroller and a radio frequency card reader are arranged on the surface of the shell. The radio frequency card reader is used for reading ID information of a student radio frequency ID card; a face recognition processing system, a sign-in management system and an audio player are arranged in the shell. The face recognition processing system comprises an image acquisition module and a face recognition module. The face recognition module comprises an image segmentation module and a deep learning module; the sign-in management system comprises a memory, an information matching module and a network module. An association database of face information and ID information is stored in the memory; the camera is connected with the image acquisition module; and the face recognition module is connected with the image acquisition module. Classroom sign-in can be carried out through combination of face recognition and student radio frequency ID cards, cheating is prevented, and the sign-in speed ishigh.

title: IoT and Machine Learning-Based Student Management System
abstract_text: "IoT and Machine Learning-Based Student Management System" Exemplary aspects of the present disclosure are directed towards the "oT and Machine Learning Based Student Management System" consisting of a plurality of Image Acquisition System (IAS) 101, connected to the Central Management Console (CMC) 102 through a Wi-Fi Mesh network 103. The plurality of Image Acquisition System (IAS) 101 consists of ESP camera 101a, wherein ESP camera 101a is a combination of microcontroller l0la-I and camera 10la-2. Microcontroller 101a- Iis tweaked accordingly to support machine learning algorithms (MLA) for identifying students and mark attendance. Central Management Console (CMC) 102 execute relevant machine learning algorithms (MLA) to predict the student's performance based on the information of students past and present academic-performance and Students-attendance. Where in academic performance of a student is a database compiled of semester internal and external grades and past attendance records. The predict performace and attendance is sent to stakeholders concern. FIG 1 Student Management System

title: Scanning dictionary pen
applicants: HUNAN NIUSIMAN STORAGE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of scanning pens, and particularly relates to a scanning dictionary pen which comprises a display screen module, a mainboard assembly, a battery and abottom shell, the display screen module is provided with a display screen, the bottom of the display screen module is in threaded connection with a face shell, the bottom of the face shell is in threaded connection with the mainboard assembly, and the right side wall of the mainboard assembly is provided with a USB interface. A power supply controller is arranged on the front side wall of the mainboard assembly, and a central processing unit, a Bluetooth chip and the like are arranged at the top of the mainboard assembly. An existing scanning dictionary pen function is improved, the learning scanning habit of a student user can be recorded in time through the Ai artificial intelligence algorithm chip, an intelligent report is formed, and the phenomenon that the student excessively dependson the product without actively mastering mastered knowledge points is prevented. When the electric quantity of the scanning pen is lower than 20%, the loudspeaker prompts a user to charge; when the scanning pen scans characters, the characters behind the scanning frame can be watched through the photoscope, so that the scanning accuracy is improved, and the practicability of the scanning dictionary pen is greatly improved.

title: Methods and device for model distillation
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method and device for model distillation, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning and computer vision. The specific implementation mode comprises the steps of obtaining features corresponding to a teacher model and features corresponding to a student model by utilizing the teacher model and the student model; determining a teacher category center corresponding to the teacher model, and determining a student category center corresponding to the student model; and supervising a student categorycenter with the same category as the teacher category center by utilizing the teacher category center to obtain a trained model. The feature center of the student model can be supervised through thefeature center of the teacher model so as to enrich the distillation mode of the model. And meanwhile, the detection precision and the detection speed of the distilled model on different types of targets can be improved. Furthermore, the delay of the execution equipment is reduced, and the occupation and consumption of computing resources such as a memory are reduced.

title: Expressway foreign matter recognition method and system based on deep learning target detection
abstract_text: The invention discloses an expressway foreign matter recognition method and system based on deep learning target detection, and belongs to the field of target detection. The method comprises the following steps: respectively training N teacher networks by using a highway foreign matter training set, progressively decreasing the scale multiples of the receptive fields of the output layers of the Nteacher networks, simultaneously transmitting the receptive field information of different scales output by the N trained teacher networks to the same student network through knowledge distillation, and training the student network by using the training set, and obtaining a trained student network; and inputting the measured image into the trained student network to obtain an identification result. According to the invention, knowledge distillation is utilized to transmit information learned by a complex teacher network to a student network with a simple structure, so that the student networkhas high detection precision; multi-scale information is fused through knowledge distillation of a plurality of teacher networks, and the method and system have higher robustness and detection precision for the condition that the size difference of objects in close-range and distant-range places in images collected by expressway cameras is large.

title: Recommendation model training method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a recommendation model training method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of computers, in particular to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as intelligent recommendation, user understanding, deep learning and big data processing. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method includes obtaining sample portrait data and sample recommendation data; generating a portrait representation vector corresponding to the sample portrait data; generating a feature representation vector corresponding to the sample recommendation data; and training a student model according to the portrait representation vector, the feature representation vector and a prediction recommendation result of a teachermodel, the teacher model being obtained by training according to sample behavior data, sample portrait data and sample recommendation data of a user to which the sample portrait data belongs; therefore, under the guidance of the teacher model, the student model is trained only by using part of the user features, and the student model can learn the generalized recommendation ability of the teachermodel, so that the accuracy of personalized recommendation of the student model can be effectively improved.

title: Model training method and device, poverty degree information identification method and device and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BEIMING SHUKE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence model training method, a poverty degree information identification method, a computer device and a storage medium, and the artificial intelligence model training method comprises the steps of obtaining a plurality of neural networks, feature data and label values, and executing a plurality of rounds of training and testing processes until a termination condition is met; and determining a sample weight set and corresponding weights of the neural networks, and recombining the neural networks into an artificial intelligence model according to thecorresponding weights. The invention has the capability of identifying the poverty degree information to which the student data belong, and the weight set of the feature data used for training the neural network in the next order is adjusted according to the training result of the neural network in the previous order, so that the training result of the neural network in the previous order can betransmitted to the training process of the neural network in the later order, and the finally obtained artificial intelligence model has strong classification performance. The invention is widely applied to the technical field of computers.

title: Neural network model updating method, device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a neural network model updating method, a device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of computer vision and deep learning. The specific implementation scheme is an updating method of a neural network model. The updating method comprises the steps of obtaining an input image; adding a neural network module to the trained student model; respectively using a student model added with a neural network module and the teacher model to carry out feature extraction on an input image; and based on the difference between the feature extraction result of the student model and the feature extraction result of the teacher model, adjusting the parameters of the neural network module added to the student model to obtain an updated model of the student model.

title: Method and device for model distillation
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method and device for model distillation, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning and computer vision. The method comprises the following steps: extracting features of a batch of scene images, which are the same as scenes of a scene teacher model, in at least two batches of scene images by utilizing each scene teacher model to obtain batch teacher features respectively corresponding to the at least two scenes; extracting features of at least two batches of scene images by using a student model to obtain batch student features; for the features of the images in the target batch features, determining the feature similarity between the features and the features of each image in the target batch features to obtain at least two scene teacher similarity sets and student similarity sets; and training a student model by using the at least two scene teacher similarity sets. According to the invention, the detection precision and detection speed of the model for different scene images can be improved. The delay of the execution equipment is reduced, and the occupation and consumption of computing resources such as a memory are reduced.

title: Model distillation method and device
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a model distillation method and device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of deep learning and computer vision. The method comprises the steps of obtaining batch teacher features corresponding to a teacher model and batch student features corresponding to a student model; determining a teacher similarity setcorresponding to the batch teacher features and a student similarity set corresponding to the batch student features; determining the weight of the loss value of the feature of the image based on thedifference value corresponding to the image; and weighting the loss value of the feature of each image in the batch images, and training a student model by using a weighting result. According to the method, the weight of the loss value can be determined by utilizing the difference value of the feature similarity between the student model and the teacher model, so that the model is accurately distilled. Through the distillation process, the detection capability of the model can be improved, the delay of execution equipment can be reduced, and the occupation and consumption of computing resources such as a memory can be reduced.

title: Psychological pre-judgment method and system based on K-means clustering and XGBoost algorithm
abstract_text: The invention discloses a psychological pre-judgment method and system based on K-means clustering and an XGBoost algorithm, and the method comprises the following steps: 1) building and training a psychological pre-judgment model based on sample decision features through a machine learning method based on the decision features in a known sample; and 2) obtaining decision characteristic data of anew individual, obtaining the psychological health condition of the new individual according to the psychological pre-judgment model based on the sample decision characteristics, and pre-judging the psychological health of the student according to a result. The beneficial effects achieved by the invention are that the model uses the XGBoost algorithm in machine learning to extract the key decisivefeatures, and facilitates the more accurate assessment of the mental health state. After proper parameter adjustment, a test set test is carried out on the test set, and the accuracy can reach 98%-100%, which indicates that the effect is obvious and the model universality is high. According to the invention, an accurate psychological pre-judgment model can be provided, and convenience is providedfor student management work of schools.

title: Dormitory sleep checking intelligent attendance checking device and method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a dormitory sleep checking intelligent attendance checking device and method based on artificial intelligence, and the device comprises a dormitory monitoring assembly which isused for monitoring the attendance checking condition of a student dormitory, an information receiving and transmitting assembly which is installed in a dormitory corridor, is connected to the outputend of the dormitory monitoring assembly, and is used for transmitting processing information, and a terminal monitoring assembly which is arranged at the accommodation management part, is connectedto the output end of the information receiving and transmitting assembly and is used for facilitating the accommodation management part to check the attendance condition of students. The number of students detected by the human body infrared induction module is compared with the number of students who actively sign in, different people can be accurately and quickly found out, response can be madein time, the safety of students is improved, the labor intensity of related personnel is reduced through intelligent equipment attendance checking, the working efficiency is improved, and meanwhile, the situation of falsification is avoided, and the practicability is high.

title: Image processing method, device and equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an image processing method, device and equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of image processing, in particular to the fields of deep learning, artificial intelligence and intelligent search. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps: acquiring a target video, wherein the target video comprises at least one image frame containing motion actions of a user; determining the category of each motion action in the image frame; determining a false action image frame in the image frames based on the category; and correcting the wrong action in the wrong action image frame to generate a correct action image frame. According to the implementation mode, the wrong action image frame is determined according to the categoryof each motion action in the image frame in the target video, and the wrong action of the determined wrong action image frame is corrected, so that a coach can conveniently guide the action of a student, the review of the student is facilitated, the training quality of the student is effectively promoted, and the utilization rate of a large number of training videos is improved.

title: Input method long sentence prediction model training method and device, electronic equipment and medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a training method and device for an input method long sentence prediction model, electronic equipment and a medium, and relates to the technical field of computers, in particular to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as natural language processing and deep learning. The specific implementation scheme comprises the steps of obtaining a plurality of first sample texts; performing enhancement processing on the first sample text according to a pre-trained teacher model to obtain a plurality of second sample texts; generating an initialized student model according to the teacher model; and training the initialized student model according to the plurality of first sample texts and the plurality of second sample texts to obtain an input method long sentence prediction model, so that the input method long sentence prediction model has relatively good long sentence prediction capability, the prediction efficiency of the input method long sentence prediction model is improved, and the model prediction effect is improved.

title: Knowledge distillation method and system
