abstract_text: The invention relates to a method for training a neural network through knowledge distillation in the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of training at least one teachermachine learning model according to training data; inputting the training data into a trained teacher machine learning model to obtain an output result of the trained teacher machine learning model; and adjusting parameters of a student machine learning model according to the loss function, thereby enabling a difference value between an output result of the student machine learning model for the training data and an output result of the trained teacher machine learning model to be smaller than a preset threshold. The loss function comprises a first part and a second part, the first part of theloss function is determined according to an output result of the trained teacher machine learning model, and the second part of the loss function is determined according to an intermediate layer output feature generated by an intermediate layer included in the trained teacher machine learning model.

title: Learner learning process attention degree perception method based on multi-space fusion
abstract_text: The invention discloses a learner learning process attention degree perception method based on multi-space fusion. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a sensing temperature image of a studentteacher in a classroom learning process; preprocessing the sensing temperature image, and selecting a key frame of the sensing temperature image according to a preset frequency; inputting the selectedkey frame into a 2D convolutional neural network to obtain a first output feature; obtaining a mouse movement track of a student in an online learning process; inputting a plurality of mouse movementtracks with time sequences into a 3D convolutional neural network to obtain a second output feature; and inputting the first output feature and the second output feature into an SVM linear classifierto obtain an attention degree classification result. According to the method, the features are extracted in a deep learning mode, different features are extracted from the two-dimensional convolutional network and the three-dimensional convolutional network respectively, wherein the features are classified by using the SVM linear classifier, so that a better classification effect can be obtained.

title: Student model training method, and device, equipment, medium and program product
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student model training method and device, equipment, a medium and a program product, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as computer vision anddeep learning. The specific implementation scheme comprises the following steps of acquiring student feature data obtained after an image training sample is input into a student model obtaining teacher feature data obtained after the image training sample is input into a trained teacher model; wherein the teacher feature data is associated with the student feature data; determining target weightdata according to the student feature data; and guiding subsequent training of the student model according to the student feature data, the teacher feature data and the target weight data. According to the invention, the learning ability and the model effect of the trained student model are improved.

title: Text processing model training method and text processing method and device
abstract_text: The invention discloses a text processing model training method, a text method and a device in the field of natural language processing in the field of artificial intelligence. The training method comprises the steps of obtaining a training text; respectively inputting the training text into a teacher model and a student model to obtain sample data output by the teacher model and prediction data output by the student model, the teacher model and the student model respectively comprising an input layer, one or more intermediate layers and an output layer, wherein the sample data comprises sample semantic features output by a middle layer of the teacher model and sample labels output by an output layer, and the prediction data comprises prediction semantic features output by the middle layerof the student model and prediction labels output by the output layer; and training model parameters of the student model based on the sample data and the prediction data to obtain a target student model. According to the technical scheme, knowledge migration is effectively carried out on the student model, so that the accuracy of the text processing result of the student model is improved.

title: Near-Zero-Cost Differentially Private Deep Learning with Teacher Ensembles
abstract_text: Systems and methods are provided for near-zero-cost (NZC) query framework or approach for differentially private deep learning. To protect the privacy of training data during learning, the near-zero-cost query framework transfers knowledge from an ensemble of teacher models trained on partitions of the data to a student model. Privacy guarantees may be understood intuitively and expressed rigorously in terms of differential privacy. Other features are also provided.

title: TEXT PROCESSING MODEL TRAINING METHOD, AND TEXT PROCESSING METHOD AND APPARATUS
abstract_text: A text processing model training method, and a text method and apparatus in the natural language processing field in the artificial intelligence field are disclosed. The training method includes: obtaining training text (510); separately inputting the training text into a teacher model and a student model to obtain sample data output by the teacher model and prediction data output by the student model, where the teacher model and the student model each include an input layer, one or more intermediate layers, and an output layer; the sample data includes a sample semantic feature output by the intermediate layer of the teacher model and a sample label output by the output layer of the teacher model; the prediction data includes a prediction semantic feature output by the intermediate layer of the student model and a prediction label output by the output layer of the student model; and the teacher model is a pre-trained language model used for text classification (520); and training a model parameter of the student model based on the sample data and the prediction data, to obtain a target student model (530). The method enables the student model to effectively perform knowledge transfer, thereby improving accuracy of a text processing result of the student model.

title: TEXT PROCESSING MODEL TRAINING METHOD, AND TEXT PROCESSING METHOD AND APPARATUS
abstract_text: A text processing model training method, and a text method and apparatus in the field of natural language processing in the field of artificial intelligence. The training method comprises: obtaining training text (510); respectively inputting the training text into a teacher model and a student model to obtain sample data output by the teacher model and predicted data output by the student model, wherein the teacher model and the student model each comprises an input layer, an output layer, and one or more intermediate layers, the sample data comprises a sample semantic feature output by the intermediate layer of the teacher model and a sample label output by the output layer of the teacher model, the predicted data comprises a predicted semantic feature output by the intermediate layer of the student model and a prediction label output by the output layer of the student model, and the teacher model is a pre-trained language model for text classification (520); and training model parameters of the student model on the basis of the sample data and the predicted data to obtain a target student model (530). The method enables a student model to effectively carry out knowledge transfer, so that the accuracy of text processing results of the student model is improved.

title: IMPROVED TWO-STAGE MACHINE LEARNING FOR IMBALANCED DATASETS
abstract_text: Class-balanced distillation can train recognition models with little to no bias even if the training dataset has a class imbalance. A two stage training process with instance sampling and class-balanced sampling can train the recognition model to recognize both head classes and tail classes. Moreover, one or more teacher classification models can be trained, and the knowledge can be distilled to a student classification model.

title: INTERACTIVE LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: The interactive learning system comprises the following interconnected modules: 1. "Load distribution" 2. “Network Security” 3. "Server" 4. "User interface" 5. "Server applications" 6. "Artificial Intelligence" 7. "Machine learning" 8. “Format Conversion” The communication part of the system is designed via the client-server model, and the latter is upgraded with various algorithms and capabilities in order to optimize and improve the connection, which in turn facilitates the learning process. The teacher creates a virtual classroom and allows a certain number of students to the class session. Everyone (both teacher and students) sees on their screen a virtual "whiteboard" which occupies most of the screen. You can write, draw, start presentations, video and audio clips or pre-designed lessons on the board. These functionalities can be indefinitely extended and upgraded. The developed "Whiteboard", which is the central part of the learning process, is specially created in a way that resembles the interface of popular drawing applications in order to look and function in a way familiar to students. The specially developed algorithms with the use of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning monitor both the learning process and the self-preparation of students, as based on the submitted tests create a personal profile of each learner. Aggregated reports on different characteristics of a student, group of students, subjects and topics are also created. The reports and profiles are available to teachers and management bodies so that they can quickly track the processes and results. The system has the ability to warn of various events (e.g .poor results of a student, class, teacher, the so-called "hate speech" and so forth. The system has developed options for a chat, audio connection, file exchange, "drawing" on the virtual board by students, etc., however only upon authorization by the teacher.

title: NEURAL NETWORK MODEL COMPRESSION METHOD AND APPARATUS, AND STORAGE MEDIUM AND CHIP
abstract_text: Provided are a neural network model compression method in the field of artificial intelligence, the method comprising: a server acquiring training data, uploaded by a user equipment, of a first neural network model and of a first neural network; obtaining a PU classifier according to the training data of the first neural network and unlabeled data stored in the server; selecting, by using the PU classifier, extended data from the unlabeled data stored in the server, wherein the extended data has attributes and distribution similar to those of the training data of the first neural network model; and training, according to the extended data, a second neural network model by using a knowledge distillation (KD) method, wherein the first neural network model atcs as a teacher network model, and the second neural network model acts as a student network model. The PU classifier is used to select, from unlabeled data, data having attributes and distribution similar to those of the training data of the first neural network model, thereby improving the accuracy of neural network model compression, and preventing the transmission of a large amount of positive sample data.

title: Three-dimensional voxel image segmentation method based on knowledge distillation and adversarial training
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of image segmentation, and provides a three-dimensional voxel image segmentation method based on knowledge distillation and adversarial training, and the method comprises two parts: training a plurality of teacher networks for ensemble learning, and enabling the plurality of teacher networks to serve as priori knowledge to obtain a soft target for the training ofa student network; performing adversarial training on the student network, performing supervision training by using a soft target and an image label of the teacher network, performing supervision byusing an intermediate feature graph of the teacher network, and adding a discriminator to construct GANs loss supervision training. According to the method, available data is expanded by using knowledge distillation, knowledge migration is carried out by using knowledge distillation, and model compression is realized. For a deep learning model of a three-dimensional voxel image, parameters are saved, and deployment is easier. Knowledge distillation and adversarial training are combined, so that the regularization effect is more obvious, and the over-fitting problem of a three-dimensional voxelimage due to a small data volume is solved to a certain extent.

title: Examination student violation behavior identification method and system
applicants: SICHUAN TIANYI NETWORK SERVICE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an examination student violation behavior identification method and an examination student violation behavior identification system. The examination student violation behavioridentification method comprises the following steps of S1, performing video frame extraction processing on an examination monitoring video; s2, constructing an examination student violation behavior recognition and prediction model based on deep learning; s3, inputting the video frames extracted in the step S1 into a prediction model; s4, performing examination student violation behavior identification prediction on the input video frame according to a time sequence, if the prediction model detects that the current video frame has examinee violation behaviors, marking the examinee in the videoframe, storing an image locally, and repeating the step S3 for the next video frame; if the prediction model does not detect that the current video frame has the examinee violation behavior, directlyrepeating the step S3 on the next video frame. According to the method, the traditional non-maximum suppression algorithm is combined with the linear function, so that the problem that the detectioneffect on the shielded object is poor due to the native non-maximum suppression algorithm is solved.

title: Visual display system and method for student growth
applicants: SHANGHAI LITRIX INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a visual display system and a display method for student growth, and relates to the field of smart campuses, the system comprises a display space and a background business subsystem, the display space comprises an interactive display screen, artificial intelligence equipment and an identity recognition device, and the display space comprises a three-dimensional space defined by a plurality of vertical faces; an entrance and exit is formed in one vertical face, the identity recognition device is arranged outside the entrance and exit, the interactive display screen is arranged in the display space and located on at least one vertical face, the artificial intelligence equipment is arranged on the bottom face of the display space, the identity recognition device is configured to recognize the identity of an accessor, the identity information of the accessor is transmitted to a data processing module, the data processing module is configured to feed back data related to the accessor to the interactive display screen according to the student growth data acquired by the acquisition module, and the accessor acquires information in interaction with the interactive display screen and the artificial intelligence equipment.

title: AI intelligent gesture correction equipment
applicants: SHANGHAI YUSHEN INTERNET OF THINGS TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to AI intelligent gesture correction equipment which comprises an intelligent watch, a gyroscope, a sensor, an integrated chip set, a wireless communication module and a communication terminal are arranged in the intelligent watch, the sensor is in data connection with the gyroscope and the integrated chip set, the integrated chip set is connected with the communication terminal through the wireless communication module, and the wireless communication module is in data connection with the communication terminal. And an app for receiving data sent by the integrated chip set is installed in the communication terminal. When a piano learner wears the smart watch to practice piano playing, the trigger is turned on to activate the gyroscope, the XYZ axes are triggered through the sensor, original XYZ data conversion is carried out, the converted data are uploaded to the communication terminal app through the network base band on the integrated chip set to be rendered, and the data are rendered and then displayed on the interface. When a teacher downloads the app, the teacher can directly view data displayed on the smart watch on the wrist of the student, correctthe wrong posture and realize the standardization of the wrist strength and the operation state when playing the piano.

title: Neural network model compression method and device, storage medium and chip
abstract_text: The invention provides a neural network model compression method in the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps that a server acquires a first neural network model uploaded byuser equipment and training data of a first neural network; obtaining a PU classifier according to the training data of the first neural network and the unmarked data stored in the server; using a PUclassifier to select extended data from the unmarked data stored in the server, the extended data having attributes and distribution similar to those of the training data of the first neural networkmodel; and training a second neural network model by utilizing a knowledge distillation KD method according to the extended data, taking the first neural network model as a teacher network model, andtaking the second neural network model as a student network model. And a PU classifier is adopted to select data with attributes and distribution similar to those of the training data of the first neural network model from the unmarked data, so that the compression accuracy of the neural network model is improved, and the transmission of a large amount of positive sample data is avoided.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS OF MATCHING TUTOR BASED ON APPLICATION
abstract_text: Disclosed are an application-based private lesson matching method, and a device thereof. A method for providing application-based private lesson matching based on artificial intelligence comprises the steps of: obtaining student information of a student account logged in an application installed in a student terminal; obtaining private lesson waiting applications from tutor accounts logged in the application installed in tutor terminals and including pieces of tutor information pre-stored in the tutor accounts that have applied for private lesson waiting in a preliminary private lesson waiting list; obtaining a private lesson waiting list view request from the student terminal; creating each student-customized tutor information based on the student information and each tutor information of the preliminary private lesson waiting list, and including each student-customized tutor information in the private lesson waiting list; transmitting the private lesson waiting list to the student terminal; obtaining a tutor account selected by the student account; transmitting a private lesson matching acceptance request to a tutor terminal logged in the selected tutor account; obtaining, by the selected tutor account, the acceptance of the private lesson matching from the tutor terminal that is logged in; and transmitting the acceptance of the private lesson matching to the student terminal. Each piece of student-customized tutor information includes a unit time-specific private lesson fee of each tutor account customized to the student account, the unit time-specific private lesson fee of each tutor account customized to the student account is determined based on inference made by artificial intelligence, and the inference by the artificial intelligence is based on the student information and each piece of tutor information. According to the present invention, a student account user can receive fee conditions of each tutor account in a more reasonable manner.

title: KNOWLEDGE DISTILLATION AND GRADIENT PRUNING-BASED COMPRESSION OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED BASE CALLER
abstract_text: The technology disclosed compresses a larger, teacher base caller into a smaller, student base caller. The student base caller has fewer processing modules and parameters than the teacher base caller. The teacher base caller is trained using hard labels (e.g., one-hot encodings). The trained teacher base caller is used to generate soft labels as output probabilities during the inference phase. The soft labels are used to train the student base caller.

title: Test question evaluation model training method and device
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a test question evaluation model training method and device, and relates to the technical field of data processing, and the test question evaluation model training method comprises the steps: obtaining a student answer corpus and a teacher evaluation corpus; preprocessing the student answer corpus and the teacher evaluation corpus to obtain answer data andevaluation data; performing feature extraction on the answer data and the evaluation data to obtain answer features and evaluation features; performing weighted clustering on the evaluation features to obtain clustering features; matching the answering features with the clustering features to obtain a feature combination; carrying out artificial intelligence training according to the feature combination to obtain a test question evaluation model, evaluating test questions by the trained test question evaluation model, so that great consumption of teacher resources is avoided, and the situationthat the overall learning efficiency of students is reduced due to excessive waiting time can be avoided.

title: Intelligent robot response method and device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to an intelligent robot response method and device based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a voice signal of a student, carrying out voicerecognition of the voice signal, obtaining a plurality of initial keywords related to the voice signal, obtaining a target keyword determined by selection of the student for the plurality of initialkeywords according to the plurality of initial keywords, inputting the target keyword into a target response database, obtaining a target text corresponding to the target keyword, and displaying the target text. The intelligent robot response method based on artificial intelligence provided by the invention is an automatic response method, namely an automatic consulting method, the required text is obtained according to voice recognition and the target response database, and compared with manual consulting of Chinese textbooks or other related Chinese reading materials, the efficiency is greatly improved, so that the learning efficiency is improved.

title: System for using machine learning to predict future development of student and method thereof
abstract_text: A system for using machine learning to predict a future development of a student and a method thereof are provided. By gathering basic information, learning history and status data of alumnus, using machine learning to set up a predictive model based on the basic information, the learning history and the status data of alumnus, gathering basic information and learning history of a student, and using the predictive model to predicting future development of the student based on the basic information and the learning history of the student, the system and the method can achieve the effect of suggesting students for future development.

title: Learning scheme planning method based on machine learning
applicants: EDUCLOUD SMART DIGITAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a learning scheme planning method based on machine learning, and the method comprises the steps: data collection, data analysis, learning scheme planning, execution condition feedback, learning by a student according to a planned task, and collection of the completion condition of the student, wherein the completion conditions of the students include the total task time consumption, the completion rate, the completion quality, the preference of task completion and the progress statistics of the academic achievements of all subjects. According to the scheme, the learningtask is formulated according to the detected current learning situation model and the learning scheme set in the database and pushed to the student, and the learning schemes formulated by different current learning situation models are different and more targeted; according to the completion condition of the student, the completion condition is fed back to a database for optimization, and then alearning scheme more suitable for the student is given; feedback and optimization are continuously and circularly carried out to form a virtuous cycle, the longer the same student uses the method, themore fitting the learning rule of the student is, the higher the efficiency is, and the higher the individuation degree is.

title: Binocular image-based model training method and device and data processing equipment
abstract_text: The invention provides a binocular image-based model training method and device, and data processing equipment. An image matching model comprises a teacher model and a student model. The method provided by the invention comprises the following steps: firstly, acquiring two groups of sample images acquired by a binocular image acquisition device at different time points; and then for any two sampleimages in the two groups of sample images, performing optical flow estimation through a teacher model according to a preset geometric constraint between the two sample images, obtaining a more accurate high-confidence optical flow estimation result, and the preset geometric constraint being a geometric constraint based on a binocular image; and finally, taking an optical flow estimation result with high confidence as annotation information, and performing machine learning training of image element matching on the student model by using the two sample images. Thus, self-supervised training using the unlabeled images can be realized, and the model obtained by training has high recognition accuracy.

title: Method for analyzing learning concentration degree of students through AI videos
applicants: SHANGHAI ZIJIAN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for analyzing student learning concentration degree through an AI video, and relates to the technical field of AI video analysis, in particular to a method for analyzing student learning concentration degree through an AI video, which comprises the following steps: S1, collecting video data; s2, analyzing the data; and S3, calculating the concentration degree. According to the method for analyzing the learning concentration degree of the student through the AI video, video stream data collection is achieved based on cooperation of two neural networks, real-timeanalysis is carried out based on a KNN neural network, classification induction is carried out through a Logistic regression algorithm, student limb movement and head movement vector data are obtained, then the movement vector data serve as an input end based on an NEAT neural network, the concentration degree index is used as an output end, so that periodic self-learning and self-optimization ofneural network nodes are realized in a typical sample marking mode, the concentration degree judgment accuracy is continuously improved, and the student concentration degree judgment is realized.

title: BINOCULAR IMAGE-BASED MODEL TRAINING METHOD AND APPARATUS, AND DATA PROCESSING DEVICE
abstract_text: Embodiments of the present application provide a binocular image-based model training method and apparatus, and a data processing device. An image matching model comprises a teacher model and a student model. In the method provided in the present application, two groups of sample images acquired at different time points by a binocular image acquisition apparatus are first obtained; then, for any two sample images in the two groups of sample images, optical flow estimation is performed according to a preset geometric constraint between the two sample images by means of the teacher model, so as to obtain a more accurate high-confidence optical flow estimation result, the preset geometric constraint being a binocular image-based geometric constraint; and finally, the high-confidence optical flow estimation result is taken as labeling information, and machine learning training of image element matching is performed on the student model by using the two sample images. Therefore, self-supervised training using unlabeled images can be achieved, and a model obtained by the training has higher identification accuracy.

title: Knowledge distillation method and device based on self-attention and computer device
applicants: SHENZHEN YOUJIE ZHIXIN TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a knowledge distillation method based on self-attention, which comprises the following steps: inputting input data into a first model to obtain a first feature matrix output by a middle layer of the first model, and inputting the input data into a second model to obtain a second feature matrix output by a middle layer ofthe second model, wherein the first model is a trained teacher model, and the second model is a to-be-trained student model; calculating first self-attention weight distribution corresponding to the teacher model according to the first feature matrix, and calculating second self-attention weight distribution corresponding to the student model according to the second feature matrix; calculating a distribution difference between the first self-attention weight distribution and the second self-attention weight distribution; taking the distribution difference as a knowledge distillation loss function between the teacher model and the student model; according to the knowledge distillation loss function, migrating the data mapping relation of the middle layer of the teacher model to the middle layer of the student model, and knowledge distillation training of models of different task types can be met.

title: Ideological and political course-oriented subjective question automatic scoring technology based on Transformer
abstract_text: The invention discloses an ideological and political course-oriented subjective question automatic scoring technology based on a Transformer, relates to natural language processing and deep learning,belongs to the technical field of computer application, and solves the problem of low accuracy of ideological and political course subjective question automatic scoring technologies. The technology comprises the following steps: S1, inputting an initial text of a student answer, and segmenting the initial text into a plurality of semantic integrity clauses through a semantic integrity analysis model based on BERT and sequence labeling; S2, expressing each student answer clause and each standard answer score point as an embedded matrix through the BERT; S3, inputting embedded matrix representation of the student answer clause and the standard answer score point, and calculating the similarity between two texts through a Transformer-based short text similarity calculation model; S4, repeating the S3 until the similarity between each student answer clause and each standard answer score point is calculated; and S5, acquiring a score matrix of each student answer clause for each score pointaccording to the score of each score point and the similarity calculated in the S4, and selecting a score sequence with non-overlapping rows and columns and the highest total score to obtain a finalscore.

title: Artificial intelligence-based student desk lamp with bulb convenient to replace
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence-based student desk lamp with a bulb convenient to replace. The student desk lamp comprises a base, a fixing rod is arranged on the upper surface of the right end of the base, a connecting rod penetrates through an adjusting block, a fixing plate is installed at the upper end of the connecting rod, and an extrusion rod is welded to the interior ofa bearing; an extrusion plate is located above the fixing plate, a bearing block is installed in the right side of the bearing plate, the upper end of the bearing block is of a groove-shaped structure, a power line is wound around the outer side of the winding rod, connecting plates are arranged on the surfaces of the left side and the right side of the first lamp panel, and the bulb is installedin a groove; and a fixing groove is formed in the right end of the limiting groove, and the reset spring is located on the right side of the groove-shaped structure of the upper surface of the bearingblock. According to the artificial intelligence-based student desk lamp with the bulb convenient to replace, the problems that the bulb of an existing student desk lamp is inconvenient to replace andphysical keys of the desk lamp are prone to damage are solved.

title: Communication coordination simulation training system and method power regulation and control personnel
applicants: STATE GRID TIANJIN JINGHAI POWER SUPPLY CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a communication coordination simulation training system for power regulation and control personnel. The communication coordination simulation training system comprises a dataacquisition server, a deep learning server and a network docking server. The invention also relates to a communication coordination intelligent simulation training method. The method comprises the following steps: step 1, collecting or manually inputting organization coordination data; step 2, defining organization coordination data as an input tensor, defining a target value as a target tensor, and mapping the input tensor as a predicted value; comparing the predicted value with a target value by using a loss function to obtain a target loss value; updating the weight of the network by usingthe target loss value to obtain a mature neural network; and step 3, inputting communication coordination characters and audio data input in the power grid system into a mature neural network to obtain an expected value, and transmitting the expected value to a system side. According to the invention, students can adapt to and be familiar with organization, communication and coordination between different majors and departments during accident handling in actual combat, and the training efficiency of student communication and coordination is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence scoring training method and device
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence score training method and device, and the method comprises the steps of obtaining original data for training artificial intelligence, and enabling theoriginal data to comprise comparison data and iteration data; cleaning the original data according to a preset data cleaning rule to generate sample data; extracting a classification regression modelsample corresponding to the attribute of the sample data according to the attribute of the sample data; constructing a similarity classification regression model according to the classification regression model sample; and obtaining user data, and analyzing the similarity of the user data according to the similarity classification regression model. The invention is used for generating a semanticsimilarity score between a student and a training standard on the basis of multiple natural language processing technologies such as an attention mechanism, a twin network and a pre-training model incombination with process mechanisms such as data collection, data cleaning and augmentation, model architecture design, model training and model online, so that a robot has the functions of understanding the training level of the student, identifying the follow-up intentions of students intelligently, and achieving intelligent man-machine training.

title: Student abnormal behavior analysis method based on deep learning
applicants: FUZHOU BRANCH OF THE SMART CITY RESEARCH INSTITUTE OF CHINA ELECTRONICS TECH GROUP CORPORATION
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student abnormal behavior analysis method based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: collecting the related data of students in the aspects of school consumption, life and learning, and carrying out the preprocessing of the data; constructing a student portrait feature library by analyzing the availability of the data and evaluating the school behaviors of the students, describing the behavior features of the students through different indexes, and quantifying the indexes according to the collected data; constructing an abnormal behavior prediction model based on a wide&deep neural network according to the behavior characteristics; and predicting and analyzing the abnormal behaviors of the students in combination with the abnormal behavior prediction model. According to the method, fusion of different data can be efficiently processed, the parallelization program is high, and the system is stable; meanwhile, the prediction model can learnlow-order and high-order combined features at the same time, a linear model and a Deep model are mixed, faster training and more accurate training and learning can be achieved, and abnormal students can be accurately predicted.

title: Personalized question recommendation method and system using machine learning model
abstract_text: The invention discloses a personalized question recommendation method and system using a machine learning model, and the method comprises the steps: collecting the related questions of a student, building a question bank, carrying out the multi-target estimation of each question in the question bank through the machine learning model, scoring the questions in the question bank according to the estimated targets and the contribution value of each question to the total score of the student, selecting a first number of questions according to the scores, establishing a first question set, sortingthe questions in the first question set under each estimated target, converting the corresponding rank into scores, and performing fusion sorting; and selecting a second number of questions in the fusion sorting result according to set question selection factors and recommending the questions to the students. According to the invention, personalized questions can be provided for students, maximized question solving efficiency is achieved, and powerful support is provided for score improvement.

title: Method and system for estimating student scores in real time by using machine learning model
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method and a system for estimating student scores in real time by using a machine learning model. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring historical learning dataand examination scores of students; performing machine learning model training by taking the historical learning data as an input feature and taking the examination score as a target, training a relationship between the input feature and the target, and constructing a score estimation model of the student; when the learning behavior data of the students with the scores to be estimated is obtained, according to the learning behavior data, utilizing the score estimation model of the students to perform real-time estimation of the examination scores, and obtaining an examination score estimationresult. According to the invention, the learning conditions and scores of students can be timely and effectively fed back to teachers or parents, the labor cost for estimating the scores of studentsin offline examinations, examination papers and other modes is saved, the score estimation efficiency is improved, and the learning interest and confidence of students are promoted.

title: Academic anomaly prediction method based on machine learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses an academic anomaly prediction method based on machine learning. The method comprises the following steps: 1 carrying out data preprocessing on one-card data of students in a certain college, and calibrating students with abnormal academic affairs and students without abnormal academic affairs according to related regulations of graduation requirements of the college; and 2clustering non-academic abnormal students in a training set by adopting DPCA, carrying out undersampling at different sampling rates according to the quantity proportion of different clusters in a clustering result, and finally combining undersampled data with academic abnormal students in the original training set to form a new training set. By collecting all-purpose cards and score related dataof students in the college, students with abnormal academic affairs are predicted by adopting a machine learning method, and help is provided for college student management.

title: Method and device for training model for predicting click rate on line and recommendation system
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a method and a device for training a model for predicting a click rate online and a recommendation system in the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method and device are used for reducing delay of online prediction. The method provided by the embodiment of the invention comprises the following steps: obtaining a predicted value of the click rate of each teacher model in a plurality of teacher models to each sample in a sample set, and fusing the predicted values of the click rates of the plurality of teacher models to the same sample intoa fused predicted value, and determining a loss function based on the fusion prediction value of the click rate corresponding to each sample in the sample set, and finally training the student model based on the loss function and the sample set until the student model meets a first convergence condition, the student model can be used for predicting the click rate on line.

title: Few-sample false news detection method based on knowledge distillation
abstract_text: The invention discloses a few-sample false news detection method based on knowledge distillation, belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and is named as FSKD (Determining Fake Networks). According to the method, a knowledge distillation thought is adopted, a Teach-Student (teacher and student) model is used as a framework, BERT is used as a Teacher (teacher) model, and a smallamount of labeled data is used for fine adjustment to give soft labels to unlabeled data, so that the model can be trained by using the labeled data and the unlabeled data at the same time; the problem that an existing false news detection means needs to depend on a large amount of labeled data is solved, and meanwhile the method uses a certain optimization algorithm to avoid the overfitting problem. Experimental results show that the effect of the method is superior to that of an existing few-sample false news detection method.

title: Ultrasonic image intelligent training method and system based on artificial intelligence and application system
applicants: SHISUN INTELLIGENT TECH SHANGHAI CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an ultrasonic image intelligent training method and system based on artificial intelligence, and an application system, and the method enables a conventional ultrasonic physician regular training method to be upgraded to a manual and intelligent combined ultrasonic physician intelligent standard training method in an artificial intelligence mode, and improves the training efficiency and training quality. The training system is composed of a student training subsystem, a tutor management subsystem, an artificial intelligence subsystem and a system administrator subsystem, and a more flexible and free learning environment which is not limited by environment and time is provided for trained students. According to the invention, the purposes of ultrasonic training self-training and self-examination under the assistance and supervision of an artificial intelligence system are achieved, the training workload of an ultrasonic department can be greatly reduced, the training efficiency is improved to a great extent, and the training quality is ensured in a relatively scientific manner. The training system can be deployed in various modes, including a network mode, astand-alone mode, an integration or embedding mode and the like.

title: Test system for student physique detection
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of physique data detection, and discloses a test system and a test method for student physique detection, and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: reading student identity information recorded in a student campus card, and collecting the facial image information of a student at a collective side; detecting weight data, height data and physiological indexes of students; recording physical examination item scores, and analyzing the detected physique data; evaluating the health of students; and finally, carrying out cloud storage and display on the data. Accurate assessment analysis, assessment calculation, assessment processing and assessment storage of the body health state are performed through the health assessment module by using an AI algorithm; meanwhile, the current dangerous situation of the student is judged through the health early warning module according to the response time when the student is monitored to receivethe first warning information, and when the student does not operate the mobile device for a long time, second warning information is sent to the emergency contact of the student so as to inform theemergency contact of the current situation of the student.

title: Student-side-oriented display device for centralized meter reading operation and maintenance fault simulation and AI interaction content
applicants: HENAN NENGCHUANG ELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a student-side-oriented centralized meter reading operation and maintenance fault simulation and AI interaction content display device comprising a housing, a backboard isfixedly installed on a panel on one side of the housing through a plurality of connecting bolts, a side edge heat dissipation hole array is arranged on the backboard, a bottom radiator is fixedly installed at the bottom end in the housing, and a side edge heat dissipation hole array is fixedly installed on the bottom end of the interior of the housing. A bottom heat dissipation hole array is arranged on a side panel, corresponding to the bottom heat dissipation device, of the shell, a first support is fixedly welded to the position, above the bottom heat dissipation device, in the shell, and an AI server body is fixedly installed on the first support. The AI server body and the operation and maintenance fault simulation server body designed by the utility model have the functions of operation and maintenance fault simulation and AI interaction, and because the AI server body and the operation and maintenance fault simulation server body are located in the same machine body, when the AIserver body and the operation and maintenance fault simulation server body are displayed for colleges, students do not need to walk frequently, and convenience is provided; and the probability that the display effect becomes poor due to forgetting of the student is reduced.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR DISTILLING MODEL, ELECTRONIC DEVICE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: The disclosure discloses a method and apparatus for distilling a model, an electronic device, and a storage medium, and relates to the field of deep learning technologies. A teacher model and a student model are obtained. The second intermediate fully connected layer is transformed into an enlarged fully connected layer and a reduced fully connected layer based on a first data processing capacity of a first intermediate fully connected layer of the teacher model and a second data processing capacity of a second intermediate fully connected layer of the student model. The second intermediate fully connected layer is replaced with the enlarged fully connected layer and the reduced fully connected layer to generate a training student model. The training student model is distilled based on the teacher model.

title: Student classification method and system based on deep learning
applicants: SHANGHAI SONGSHUKETANG ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a student classification method and system based on deep learning, and the method and system can achieve the whole-course tracking and photographing of the class states of different students, so as to obtain the corresponding class state images of the students, and carry out the preprocessing and pixel binarization of the class state images of the students. Therefore, the pixel point plane color state change information and the direction angle change information of the sub-image corresponding to each student can be accurately calculated subsequently, and the current corresponding class performance type of the student can be determined according to the two kinds of information, so that whether the student is in a state of attending intentionally can be accurately distinguished; therefore, automatic and controllable tracking monitoring can be effectively performed on students, timely attention reminding can be performed on the students, and the learning efficiencyand the learning quality of the students can be improved.

title: Interpretable classroom student emotion analysis method, system and device and medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses an interpretable classroom student emotion analysis method, system and device and a medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining student intelligent classroom facial expression data; establishing a student learning emotion analysis model based on an interpretable convolutional neural network; constructing a visual model of the student expression recognition process;and performing expression recognition on the expression data of the smart class through the student learning emotion analysis model and the visualization model, and determining the emotion type of thestudent. The emotion analysis problem of the students in the smart class is modeled into an interpretable convolutional neural network task, the interpretable convolutional neural network is used forrecognizing the expressions of the students in the smart class, the emotion states of the students in the learning process are obtained, the emotion states of the students can be rapidly determined,the emotion analysis accuracy is improved, and the emotion analysis efficiency is improved. The method can be widely applied to the technical field of artificial intelligence.

title: Student score prediction system and method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student score prediction system and method based on deep learning, and relates to the technical field of deep learning. The student score prediction system comprises a data management module and a model operation module, and the data management module comprises a user information module and a score information module; wherein the user information module is used for realizing functions of user registration, user login and user information modification, the score information module is used for realizing score information query and score information modification of a user, and the model operation module comprises a model training module and a model prediction module. The model training module realizes multiple times of model initial training, the model prediction module communicates with the model training module to realize score prediction of a model after initial training, a deep learning algorithm is utilized, important features of sparse data can be rapidly extracted through deep learning, complex nonlinear data is processed, and therefore, the accuracy of the prediction model is improved.

title: Student class stop prediction method based on hybrid deep neural network
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of machine learning, deep learning, data mining and the like, in particular to a student class stop prediction method based on a hybrid deep neural network. According to the invention, time sequence data is considered, fine grit division is carried out, and an Onehot coding rule and feature engineering are combined to construct a behavior feature matrix, so that the prediction accuracy is improved, and a newly built convolutional neural network (CNN) is used to carry out local relationship feature extraction. In view of the sequence relationship between behaviors and the influence of the model itself, time sequence relationship feature extraction is performed through a gated cycle unit (GRU) network, and a final prediction task is performed through a softmax layer so as to improve the accuracy of curriculum termination prediction. According to the invention, three layers of GRUs are used for extracting potential behavior characteristics witha time sequence relationship among behavior matrixes.

title: Distillation system training method, device and equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a distillation system training method, device and equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as deep learning, cloud computing, image processing and natural language processing. The specific implementation scheme is as follows: obtaining a distillation training request sent by a first terminal device, wherein the distillation training request comprises a training sample set and a target type of teacher resources; obtaining a target teacher model corresponding to the teacher resource according to the target type; and inputting the training sample set into the target teacher model, generating a target training result, and sending the target training result to the first terminal device, so as to enable the first terminal device to train a student model according to the training sample set and the target training result, thereby effectively improving the calculation efficiency of the distillation system.

title: College student dormitory allocation method based on machine learning algorithm
abstract_text: The invention discloses a college student dormitory allocation method based on a machine learning algorithm. The invention belongs to the crossing field of social behavioristics, data science and system science. According to the method, a prediction model of a student score change trend is established mainly through historical score data and dormitory data of college students and through a classical algorithm based on machine learning, including a BP neural network, Logistic regression, local linear regression and a support vector machine, and a data model suitable for the actual situation ofeach college is screened out through model precision comparison; dormitory states are defined according to student score classification, and based on the score change trend prediction model, a conversion score under each dormitory state is calculated; constraint conditions are reasonably set according to actual conditions, the maximum conversion score serves as a target function, the number of dormitories in each state under the maximum target function value is solved through a CPLEX optimization solver, and optimal allocation of the dormitories is achieved.

title: Student archive storage management system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to a student archive storage management system based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a student archive information acquisition module, an archive name information voice signal acquisition module, a voice recognition module, an archive name information comparison module, a student archive storage data packet generation module, a target storage position acquisition module, a storage control module and a storage relationship generation module. After obtaining the file information of the target student file, performing file verification through a voice signal, generating a student file storage data packet after the verification is passed, and obtaining a target temporary data container and a target storage database corresponding to the target file name information according to the target file name information, through temporary storage of the target temporary data container, frequent data writing operation in the target storage database is avoided, and the data storage rate is increased. According to the student file storage management system, intelligent storage management of student files can be realized, and the reliability of storage management is improved.

title: VR virtual driving training and examination method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention provides a VR virtual driving training and examination method based on deep learning. The method comprises the following steps of S1, obtaining a road condition real scene; S2, performing 3D modeling; S3, performing filing classification; S4, performing searching; S5, performing fusion; and S6, performing system testing and use. The invention discloses a new, safer, more convenient and more comprehensive vehicle virtual driving training and driving examination system. The virtual driving examination system is popularized on the basis of 5G and VR through deep learning, so that the wrong driving habit of each student can be changed in a targeted manner for many safety accidents; and a preventive driving technology can be popularized in a targeted manner according to many safety accidents. A traditional field system road section examination is completed in a virtual manner in an immersive manner, so that the learning efficiency is high, the learning technology is safer, andpeople can accept the examination more easily and popularize the examination more easily.

title: Intelligent campus management system of artificial intelligence core algorithm
applicants: SHANGHAI UKIN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent campus management system based on an artificial intelligence core algorithm, which comprises a recharge reminding module, a dish budget module and a dish matching module, and the dish matching module is used for dish matching between a student terminal and a canteen terminal, so that the most convenient canteen which meets the taste of students is pushed andselected for the students. The students do not need to spend much time in finding proper dishes; and the dish budget module is used for budget of the sold food quantity by a plurality of canteen terminals, the canteen can conveniently prepare the corresponding food quantity according to the food quantity budget value, and extravagance and waste of grains are avoided. The recharge reminding moduleis used for reminding the students to recharge the expense of the canteen. The system can remind students whether the students need to recharge dining cards or not, and the situation that the balanceof the students is insufficient when the students consume in canteens is avoided.

title: MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE AND METHOD
abstract_text: A probability calculation unit (14) calculates a value (soft label) indicating a likelihood of labeling of a class Ci for each voxel of a second slice image by means of a learned teacher model (13a). A detection unit (15) detects “bronchus” and “blood vessel” for the voxels of the second slice image using a known method, such as a region expansion method and performs labeling of “bronchus” and “blood vessel”. A correction probability setting unit (16) replaces the soft label with a hard label of “bronchus” or “blood vessel” detected by the detection unit (15). A distillation unit (17) performs distillation of a student model (18a) from the teacher model (13a) using the soft label after correction by means of the correction probability setting unit (16). With this, the learned student model (18a) is obtained.

title: Student classroom learning behavior monitoring system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides a student classroom learning behavior monitoring system based on artificial intelligence. The student classroom learning behavior monitoring system comprises the following program modules: a registration unit; an imaging unit; a storage unit; a data processing center; a body shape detection unit; and a virtual robot, wherein the data processing center comprises a classroom position picture processing unit; a student behavior track synthesis unit; a sitting posture model library; and a student sitting posture matching unit; and the virtual robot uses the classroom behavior trajectory diagram corresponding to the student identity provided by the student behavior trajectory synthesis unit in the set stage time and the sitting posture abnormal condition report provided by the student sitting posture matching unit as feedback information to provide feedback for the outside. The personalized traceless monitoring can be realized, and the normal experience of students inclass learning is not affected.

title: Campus safety monitoring and early warning management system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a campus safety monitoring and early warning management system based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a campus area division module, a GPS positioning module, astudent activity image acquisition module, an image preprocessing module, a student dangerous behavior information base, a behavior comparison and identification module, a duration statistics module,a danger coefficient statistics module, a total monitoring platform and an early warning module. According to the invention, outdoor areas in a campus are divided; student activity images in all thesub-regions are collected; meanwhile, student behaviors in the collected student activity images are compared to identify whether the behaviors are dangerous behaviors or not; the main monitoring platform arranges related personnel to go to the site for processing the identified dangerous behaviors, and graded early warning is carried out to avoid processing delay; intelligent monitoring management on campus safety is achieved, the defects of an existing campus video monitoring patrol system are effectively overcome, the probability of dangerous behaviors of students is greatly reduced, and the safety of the students is guaranteed.

title: Handwriting score input system based on bionic image enhancement algorithm and FPGA hardware acceleration
abstract_text: The invention discloses a handwriting score input system based on a bionic image enhancement algorithm and FPGA hardware acceleration. The handwriting score input system comprises an image preprocessing module, a score recognition module and a score statistics module. The image preprocessing module performs color enhancement on the test paper image through an LDRF algorithm and then filters out ared handwritten digital image; the score recognition module is combined with a CNN network based on FPGA hardware acceleration to recognize a handwritten score; the score statistical analysis module displays statistical data of scores of students in the whole class to a teacher through a human-computer interaction interface after the system completes score proofreading. According to the invention,an analysis model is established through machine learning, the work efficiency of the system is improved through FPGA hardware acceleration, and the understanding speed of teachers for student examination conditions and test paper score conditions is greatly improved through a score recognition network accelerated by FPGA hardware and a score statistical analysis function.

title: AUTOMATIC EVALUATION OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED PROCESSES
abstract_text: A conversation for simulation by an artificial intelligence-based tutor is automatically generated. The conversation relates to content on which the artificial intelligence-based tutor is being trained. The automatically generating the conversation includes automatically generating inputs from a simulated student regarding the content, and automatically generating on behalf of the artificial intelligence-based tutor expected responses to the inputs generated from the simulated student. The conversation is provided as an output to be input to the artificial intelligence-based tutor for simulation by the artificial intelligence-based tutor.

title: PRIVATE DEEP LEARNING
abstract_text: A method for training parameters of a student model includes receiving one or more teacher models trained using sensitive data. Each teacher model includes one or more intermediate layers and a prediction layer coupled to the one or more intermediate layers. The method includes receiving, from the one or more teacher models, one or more intermediate layer outputs and one or more prediction layer outputs respectively based on public data. Student model training is performed to train parameters of the student model based on the intermediate layer outputs and prediction layer outputs of the one or more teacher models.

title: Drug rehabilitation training system based on virtual reality riding exercise
abstract_text: The invention relates to a drug rehabilitation training system based on virtual reality riding exercise, which comprises a central control end management system, an artificial intelligence main scenecontrol system, a physiological data acquisition management system, a big data management storage system and a virtual reality riding training system.A virtual reality riding scene is combined with exercise and fitness hardware; exercise rehabilitation training is carried out on drug rehabilitation personnel, physiological data, including electroencephalogram and heart rate data, of a user are recorded in time, an analysis technology of artificial intelligence machine learning is used for carrying out operational analysis on the physiological data, and monitoring and management on the physicalhealth condition of the training personnel are achieved. According to the invention, the problem of interaction and interconnection between people and sites and between people and instruments in a rehabilitation training center is solved; the problems of student physique monitoring and automatic acquisition, summarization and analysis of exercise data are solved; the problem of specialized formulation of student exercise prescriptions is solved; the problem of exercise safety monitoring of a rehabilitation training venue is solved.

title: Drug rehabilitation training system based on virtual reality rowing exercise
abstract_text: The invention relates to a drug rehabilitation training system based on virtual reality rowing movement, which comprises a central control end management system, an artificial intelligence main scenecontrol system, a physiological data acquisition management system, a big data management storage system and a virtual reality rowing training system. Exercise rehabilitation training is carried out on drug rehabilitation personnel, physiological data, including electroencephalogram and heart rate data, of a user are recorded in time, an analysis technology of artificial intelligence machine learning is used for carrying out operational analysis on the physiological data, and monitoring and management on the physical health condition of the training personnel are achieved. According to the invention, the problem of interaction and interconnection between people and sites and between people and instruments in a rehabilitation training center is solved; the problems of student physique monitoring and automatic acquisition, summarization and analysis of exercise data are solved; the problem of specialized formulation of student exercise prescriptions is solved; the problem of exercise safety monitoring of a rehabilitation training venue is solved.

title: Drug rehabilitation training system based on virtual reality mountaineering
abstract_text: The invention relates to a drug rehabilitation training system based on virtual reality mountaineering, which comprises a central control end management system, an artificial intelligence main scene control system, a physiological data acquisition management system, a big data management storage system and a virtual reality mountaineering training system.A virtual reality mountaineering scene is combined with exercise and fitness hardware; exercise rehabilitation training is carried out on drug rehabilitation personnel, physiological data, including electroencephalogram and heart rate data, ofa user are recorded in time, an analysis technology of artificial intelligence machine learning is used for carrying out operational analysis on the physiological data, and monitoring and managementon the physical health condition of the training personnel are achieved. According to the invention, the problem of interaction and interconnection between people and sites and between people and instruments in a rehabilitation training center is solved; the problems of student physique monitoring and automatic acquisition, summarization and analysis of exercise data are solved; the problem of specialized formulation of student exercise prescriptions is solved; the problem of exercise safety monitoring of a rehabilitation training venue is solved.

title: Intelligent paper marking system and method based on machine learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent paper marking system based on machine learning. The intelligent paper marking system is characterized by comprising a student terminal, a server terminal and a teacher terminal, and the server terminal is connected with the student terminals and the teacher terminal through a network to realize bidirectional data transmission, wherein the server terminal comprises an image processing module, a character recognition module, a training module, a storage module, a central control module and a communication module.

title: AI robot-based auxiliary device for student garden entering test
applicants: WEIFANG CHENSHENG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of AI robots, in particular to an AI robot-based auxiliary device for a student garden entering test, which can be adjusted according to the height andposition of a detected person during identification and detection, can prevent other persons from entering the device to cause potential safety hazards, and improves the practicability. The device comprises a placement plate, a push plate, electric telescopic rods, a positioning telescopic rod, a speed reduction motor, a fixing plate, supporting legs, a first ball bearing, a supporting rod, a second ball bearing, a servo motor and a blocking rod, the four electric telescopic rods are installed at the top end of the fixing plate, the push plate is installed at the top ends of the four electrictelescopic rods, and the top ends of the four electric telescopic rods are fixedly connected with the push plate; the two sets of positioning telescopic rods are installed on the left side and the right side of the bottom end of the push plate correspondingly, and the bottom ends of the two sets of positioning telescopic rods are fixedly connected with the left side and the right side of the topend of the fixing plate correspondingly.

title: SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING TOFEL COURSE RECOMMENDATION SERVICE USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MACHINE LEARNING BASED AUTOMATIC EVALUATION
abstract_text: The present invention provides a TOEFL lecture recommendation service providing system using artificial intelligence machine learning-based automatic scoring which can recommend a required lecture by analyzing weaknesses. The TOEFL lecture recommendation service providing system using artificial intelligence machine learning-based automatic scoring comprises: at least one student terminal to provide answers to multiple-choice questions including reading and listening of TOEFL and short-answer questions including speaking and writing in number selection, text, and voice, and receive lecture data recommended based on incorrect answer data among the provided answers; and a TOEFL lecture recommendation service providing server including a check unit to compare number selection-type answers to the multiple-choice questions received from the at least one student terminal and previously stored answers to check incorrect answers, an automatic scoring unit to score text-type answers and voice-type answers to the short-answer questions based on previously constructed big data and artificial intelligence, an analysis unit to analyze weaknesses of the at least one student terminal based on the incorrect answers to the multiple-choice questions checked by the check unit and scoring results of the automatic scoring unit, and a providing unit to search previously stored lectures with the analyzed weaknesses as input values to provide a recommendation lecture for the at least one student terminal.

title: Student score prediction method fusing self-attention mechanism and depth matrix decomposition
abstract_text: The invention provides a student score prediction method fusing a self-attention mechanism and depth matrix decomposition. The method is characterized in that a triple score matrix of students, courses and scores is constructed, and score prediction is realized through a model fusing deep learning and matrix decomposition. According to the invention, a depth matrix decomposition model with an attention mechanism is designed, score matrixes of students and courses are constructed, then student and course vectors corresponding to the score matrixes are used as input and projected, and potentialfeature vectors of the students (courses) are obtained; then, a self-attention mechanism is added to the potential feature vectors of the students (courses) to construct a multilayer perceptron network; and finally, a bilinear pooling layer is built, and the output vectors of the rows and the columns are fused to obtain a score prediction value, thereby improving the accuracy and interpretabilityof a prediction result.

title: Course planning method and device, storage medium and system
applicants: SHANGHAI ZHANGXUE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a course planning method and device, a storage medium and a system. The method comprises the steps: obtaining the learning information of a student, screeninga corresponding course system from a preset course cluster according to the learning information of the student, and enabling the course system to consist of a plurality of knowledge points; readingthe knowledge point mastery degree of the students; planning different types of course systems according to the knowledge point mastery degree; and storing the planned different types of course systems to a search server. According to the method, the BKT and course system recommendation algorithm is combined, tedious manual analysis and screening work is reduced, and the advantages of products inthe artificial intelligence era are further embodied; and the reasonability of course recommendation is improved to a certain extent, so that courses recommended to students are more effective.

title: Model distillation method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a model distillation method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of deep learning. According to the specific implementationscheme, the method comprises steps: firstly, obtaining a teacher model and a student model; then, according to the first data processing amount of the first middle full-connection layer of the teacher model and the second data processing amount of the second middle full-connection layer of the student model, converting the second middle full-connection layer into an amplification full-connectionlayer and a reduction full-connection layer, and replacing the second middle full-connection layer with the amplification full-connection layer and the reduction full-connection layer to generate a training student model; and then carrying out distillation training on the trained student model according to the teacher model. According to the method, the second middle full-connection layer is replaced with the enlargement full-connection layer and the reduction full-connection layer, and distillation training is carried out on the training student model according to the teacher model, so thatdistillation is carried out on the middle layer of the training student model, an extra full-connection layer does not need to be introduced, parameter redundancy is avoided, and the distillation efficiency and effect are greatly improved.

title: Face recognition network training method, device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a face recognition network traning method, a device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of deep learning, cloud computing and computer vision in artificial intelligence, in particular to the aspect of mask-wearing face recognition. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps of inputting a shielded face image in a training data pair into a teacher network, inputting an unshielded face image into a student network, and alternately training the teacher network and the student network according to prediction resultsof the teacher network and the student network for the training data pair; wherein the training data pair is composed of a shielded face image and a non-shielded face image which have the same identity; and determining a general face recognition network from the trained teacher network and student network. The problem that the accuracy of a face recognition result is unbalanced is solved, and theaccuracy of face recognition is improved.

title: Voice recognition model training method and device, and voice recognition method and device
applicants: SHANGHAI YITU INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
