abstract_text: The invention discloses a voice recognition model training method, a voice recognition model training device, a voice recognition method and a voice recognition device, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The voice recognition model training method comprises the steps of: acquiring a labeled voice sample set and an unlabeled voice sample set; according to the annotated voice sample set, training each preset voice recognition teacher model to obtain a trained voice recognition teacher model; for each trained voice recognition teacher model, inputting each voice samplein the unlabeled voice sample set into the voice recognition teacher model, and outputting corresponding text information; training a preset speech recognition student model according to the labeledspeech sample set, the unlabeled speech sample set and the corresponding text information to obtain a target speech recognition model; acquiring voice data to be recognized; and inputting the voice data into the trained target voice recognition model, and outputting a voice recognition result. In this way, the performance of the target speech recognition model is improved.

title: LEARNING COACH FOR MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A machine learning (ML) system includes a student ML system, a learning coach ML system, and a reference system that generates training data for the student ML system. The learning coach ML system learns to make an enhancement to the student ML system or to its learning process, such as updated hyperparameter or a network structural change, based on training of the student ML system with the training data generated by the reference system. The system may also comprise a learning experimentation system that communicates with the reference system to conduct experiments on the learning of the student learning system. Also, the learning experimentation system can determine a cost function for the learning coach ML system.

title: Human face living body detection method and device, equipment and medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a human face living body detection method and device, equipment and a medium. The human face detection method comprises the steps of obtaining a training set; inputting the training data into a teacher network for first training to obtain a trained teacher network model; inputting the training data into a student network for second training to obtain a trained face living body detection model; and inputting the to-be-detected face image into the face living body detection model to obtain a detection result whether the object in the face image is a living body or not. According to the invention, the knowledge distillation learning device is used to guide the student network to carry out training, the student network model with fewer model parameters is obtained as the trained face living body detection model, and the calculation speed of the model and the speed of face living body detection are improved; the training process of the human face living body detection model is assisted by updating and optimizing the model parameters through the meta-learning device, and the universality is better. The method and device can be widely applied to the field of artificial intelligence.

title: Model distillation method and device, electronic equipment and readable storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a model distillation method and device, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, deep learning and image processing. A specific embodiment of the method comprises the steps of obtaining at least two teacher models, and obtaining actual feature distribution of each teacher model; taking a Laplace operator for each actual feature distribution to obtain an inverse matrix of a Hessian matrix; performing operation on each inverse matrix according to a quadratic expression ofNewton iteration to obtain a weight corresponding to each actual feature distribution; weighting each actual feature distribution by using a corresponding weight to obtain comprehensive feature distribution; and performing model distillation operation on the original student model by using the comprehensive feature distribution to obtain a target student model. According to the embodiment, when knowledge of the teacher model is transmitted to the student model, actual feature distribution of each teacher model is fully combined, so that the knowledge of the teacher model is more accurately transmitted to the student model.

title: Model distillation method and device, electronic equipment and readable storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a model distillation method and device, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, deep learning and image processing. One specific embodiment of the method comprises the following steps: firstly, constructing a search space based on a preset search space design rule; secondly, initializing a multi-feature fusion mode generator according to the search space; then, using a multi-feature fusion mode generator for obtaining fusion features of the multiple teacher models; andfinally, performing model distillation processing on the original features of the original student model based on the fusion features to obtain a target student model. According to the embodiment, when knowledge of the teacher model is transmitted to the student model, the concept of a search space in an automatic search technology is introduced, so that the designed search space can be utilized to automatically determine the optimal fusion feature generation mode and distillation strategy, and the knowledge of the teacher model can be more accurately transmitted to the student model.

title: Image defogging method based on knowledge distillation
abstract_text: The invention discloses an image defogging method based on knowledge distillation, and belongs to the technical field of image processing and deep learning. An image defogging network is trained by simulating knowledge of heterogeneous tasks, and the image defogging network comprises two sub-networks, wherein one sub-network is a teacher network and is composed of a self-encoding network; and theother sub-network is a student defogging network which is an end-to-end defogging network; the teacher network aims to learn feature representation of a clean image, and the student defogging networkaims to map a foggy image to the clear image by simulating the feature representation of the clean image; the student defogging network improves the performance of the defogging network by learning dark knowledge contained in the teacher network.

title: Artificial Intelligence Learning Diagnostic System Using Knowledge Map Based On Ontology
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence learning diagnostic system using an ontology-based knowledge map which correctly extracts analysis and diagnosis results for learning activity based on evaluation result data of a student to provide the results to the student. According to the present invention, the artificial intelligence learning diagnostic system comprises: a database unit storing questions, explanation of the questions, student profiles, and learning results of the students; an information extraction and conversion unit; a question recommendation unit; a learning course recommendation module unit; a knowledge system unit connected to the question recommendation unit and the learning course recommendation module unit to use data transmitted from the question recommendation unit and the learning course recommendation module unit as unit knowledge to form a knowledge system map; and a terminal connected to at least one of the question recommendation unit, the learning course recommendation module unit, and the knowledge system unit to output the questions, the knowledge system map, or a learning course.

title: SOFT-TYING NODES OF A NEURAL NETWORK
abstract_text: A machine learning system includes a coach machine learning system that uses machine learning to help a student machine learning system learn its system. By monitoring the student learning system, the coach machine learning system can learn (through machine learning techniques) “hyperparameters” for the student learning system that control the machine learning process for the student learning system. The machine learning coach could also determine structural modifications for the student learning system architecture. The learning coach can also control data flow to the student learning system.

title: Image recognition model training method, device and equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses an image recognition model training method, device and equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, deep learning and image processing. A specific embodiment of the method comprises the steps of image set; for a sample image in the sample image set, inputting the sample image into a pre-trained teacher model to obtain probability distribution that a target in the sample image belongs to multiple categories; and taking the sample image as input, taking probability distribution corresponding to the sample image as output, and training a student model to obtain an image recognition model. According to the embodiment, a new knowledge distillation technology is provided; the probability distribution predicted by the teacher model is introduced as supervision to induce the training of the student model, so that the knowledge distillation technology does not depend on the annotation sample any more inthe training process, the unannotated sample can be fully utilized to improve the precision, and the sample annotation cost in image recognition is effectively reduced.

title: Student model training method and device and electronic equipment
abstract_text: The invention provides a student model training method and device and electronic equipment, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, a student model learns from a trained teacher model ina knowledge distillation mode, the student model and the teacher model are object detection models, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a candidate sample area of a training sample; performing feature extraction on the candidate sample area of the training sample through a student model and a teacher model to obtain a first feature extracted by the student model and a second feature extracted by the teacher model; obtaining the confidence coefficient of the first feature; determining distillation loss between the student model and the teacher model according to the first feature, thesecond feature and the confidence coefficient of the first feature; and updating parameters of the student model based on the distillation loss. The student model can perform different degrees of parameter updating for different samples, so that the trained student model has more excellent performance, and the object detection effect is improved.

title: Electronic machine learning device
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an electronic machine learning device. The system comprises a screen projection device and an interesting entertainment device, according to the utility model, a teacher controls the switch to open and close the electronic handwriting board of a corresponding student; therefore, students under the platform can write by using the electronic handwriting board; then the handwriting is projected on the projection curtain through the PC host; at the moment, the interactive answering of the students can be realized; therefore, the traditional blackboard answering can be improved; same effect, more convenient and more environmentally friendly, rotating disc rotates, the positive contact piece and the negative contact piece slide relatively; at the moment, the positiveelectrode contact piece and the negative electrode contact piece make contact with each other and are powered on to enable the corresponding LED lamps to emit light, so that student selection can be achieved by entering student names on the fan-shaped plates, the function of random drawing is achieved, the interaction effect with students is easily improved on the whole, and the interestingness isricher.

title: Student psychological state recognition method and device and computer
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of graph deep learning, and discloses a student psychological state recognition method. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining relationship between feature information of a student to be tested and the student to be tested; and recognizing the psychological state of the student to be tested according to the relationship between the featureinformation of the student to be tested and the student to be tested. According to the method, the psychological state of the to-be-tested student can be recognized according to the relationship between the feature information of the to-be-tested student and the to-be-tested student, the psychological state identification accuracy of the student is improved by considering the relationship betweenthe students, and the accuracy of student psychological state recognition is improved. The invention further discloses a student psychological state recognition device and a computer.

title: Student network model generation method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student network model generation method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of natural language processing. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method includes: acquiring a teacher network model of a target domain; predicting a first training sample through the teacher network model to generate a first prediction result; and inputting the first training sample and the first prediction result into an automatic machine learning model to generate a student network model corresponding to the teacher network model, the automatic machine learning model being used for training a network structure of the student network model according to the first training sample and the first prediction result. Therefore, the student network model is generated according to the teacher network model based on the automatic machine learning model, and the generated student network model has excellent performance, so that prediction is performed by using the generated student network model in the prediction stage, and the prediction efficiency and effect are improved.

title: DATA PRIVACY PROTECTED MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEMS
abstract_text: Approaches for private and interpretable machine learning systems include a system for processing a query. The system includes one or more teacher modules for receiving a query and generating a respective output, one or more privacy sanitization modules for privacy sanitizing the respective output of each of the one or more teacher modules, and a student module for receiving a query and the privacy sanitized respective output of each of the one or more teacher modules and generating a result. Each of the one or more teacher modules is trained using a respective private data set. The student module is trained using a public data set. In some embodiments, human understandable interpretations of an output from the student module is provided to a model user.

title: Dance scoring method based on posture recognition model and related equipment
applicants: PING AN INT SMART CITY TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a dance scoring method based on a posture recognition model and related equipment, and the method comprises the steps: calling a posture recognition model to recognize dance videos of a coach and students, and obtaining a limb point sequence; aligning the action start-stop frames of the dance videos of the coachand the student according to the limb point sequence; determining a first target limb point sequence corresponding to the action start-stop frame of the dance video of the coach and a second target limb point sequence corresponding to the action start-stop frame of the dance video of the student; and calculating an action standard degree score, a rhythm mastery degree score and a dance skill degree score according to the first and second target limb point sequences, and calculating a total score of the second dance video based on the three degree scores. The starting and ending time of the first dance video of the coach and the starting and ending time of the second dance video of the student can be aligned, it is ensured that the student corresponds to the action of the coach, and therefore the calculated score is more reliable and higher in accuracy.

title: Pure idea control intelligent rehabilitation method based on distillation learning and deep learning and application
abstract_text: A pure idea control intelligent rehabilitation method based on distillation learning and deep learning comprises the steps of: constructing a teacher network and a student network according to collected electroencephalogram signals of an existing testee, constructing a space-time convolution block, and constructing the teacher network and constructing the student network; pre-training the teachernetwork by using the acquired electroencephalogram signals of the testee; pre-training the student network on the basis of the pre-trained teacher network; training the student network again on the basis of pre-training the student network; controlling an intelligent rehabilitation system to collect electroencephalogram signals of a testee through a pure idea; and recognizing the input electroencephalogram signals on the basis of the trained student network, and after the motion intention of the testee corresponding to the electroencephalogram category is recognized, controlling the exoskeleton rehabilitation instrument of the intelligent rehabilitation system through the pure idea to assist the testee in executing corresponding limb actions, so that rehabilitation training is completed. According to the invention, active rehabilitation training of a user can be realized.

title: LEARNING DEVICE, LEARNING METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: [Problem] To enable an appropriate temperature to be determined automatically in deep learning using distillation. [Solution] This learning device is equipped with: a first estimation unit that uses a temperature parameter to carry out estimation on the basis of a student model; a second estimation unit that uses the temperature parameter to carry out estimation on the basis of a teacher model; and a temperature calculation unit that calculates the temperature parameter on the basis of estimation information generated by the first estimation unit and the second estimation unit.

title: Multi-student individual segmentation and state autonomous identification method based on deep learning
applicants: NANJING JIREN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a multi-student individual segmentation and state autonomous recognition method based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: collecting a normal class video, carrying out the framing, and obtaining continuous frame images of a class video; segmenting out students' individuals and non-students' individuals, and marking the non-students' individuals as masks ofdifferent colors; finding a human eye feature point of each student individual through a human face feature point positioning method, calculating a human eye closure feature value of each student individual, and judging whether each student individual is in a lecture attending state at present or not; judging whether faces are detected by all the student individuals or not, and judging the class attending state grades of the student individuals; and designing the student lecture attending efficiency evaluation method in the whole class period according to whether each student is in a lecture attending state or not and whether each student is in a non-head-up state or not. The invention provides a solution for realizing the autonomous identification of the student lecture attending state and the judgment of the lecture attending efficiency, and has the advantages of high speed, high identification rate and strong environmental adaptability.

title: Kindergarten real-time photographing management system and method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a kindergarten real-time photographing management system and a kindergarten real-time photographing management method. The kindergarten real-time photographing management system is characterized by comprising an image acquisition terminal, a server, a background management system, a mobile equipment terminal and a teacher management terminal, wherein the image acquisition terminal comprises a plurality of intelligent cameras and is arranged in a kindergarten student learning and living place; an artificial intelligence algorithm restoration module and an intelligent face recognition module are arranged in the server; the background management system is used for opening and maintaining accounts of all classes; the teacher management terminal is used for managing class accounts, uploading student photos and checking images captured by means of the image acquisition terminal; and the mobile equipment terminal is used for receiving and checking the images which areshot by the image acquisition terminal and pass the auditing. According to the kindergarten real-time photographing management system and the kindergarten real-time photographing management method, anintelligent instantaneous acquisition and monitoring service platform is established through using the intelligent acquisition terminal and the mobile equipment terminal, the kindergarten managementprocess is simplified, the management cost is saved, and the interaction and communication among the kindergarten, students and parents are enhanced.

title: One-stage direction remote sensing image target detection method based on student-T distribution assistance
applicants: BEIJING ZHONGKE QIANXUN TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a one-stage direction remote sensing image target detection method based on student-T distribution assistance, and solves the problem of frames in any direction by using a geometric method based on a horizontal frame. The method comprises the following steps: S1, converting a remote sensing image by using a geometric conversion method based on the horizontal frame; S2, extracting remote sensing image features; S3, carrying out the regression and classification on feature maps obtained from a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) and a Feature Pyramid Network (FPN) respectively, and extracting the feature maps of the feature maps of the CNN and the FPN from the feature maps of the Feature Pyramid Network; S4, carrying out the result optimization and output: adopting student-T distribution as a result of joint distribution, synthesizing a classification branch and a regression branch, optimizing the one-stage direction detection model based on the student-T distribution, and outputting a target detection result. According to the student-T distribution assistance-based one-stage direction remote sensing image target detection method, the special rigidity and bird's-eye view characteristics of the remote sensing image target are fully utilized, and the CNN and FPN models based on deep learning and Gaussian distribution and inverse gamma distribution are adopted, so that more accurate remote sensing image target detection is realized.

title: Computer-based apparatus system for assessing, predicting, correcting, recovering, and reducing risk arising from an operator?s deficient situation awareness
abstract_text: A computer-based apparatus system for assessing, predicting, correcting, recovering, and reducing risk arising from an operator's deficient situation awareness (SA). This system identifies operator situation awareness by computer-apparatus and method that utilizes neurogenic-psychophysiological-neurocognitive-artificial intelligence processes. This system is configured to receive psychophysiological data from the operator via the neurogenic sensor(s) and configured to be loaded with data corresponding to the operator's baseline SA capacity and/or possesses AI algorithms to learn and calibrate the operator's baseline SA capacity and sound a warning in response if an SA deficiency threshold has been exceeded. Optionally, an autopilot/auto-driver/auto-operator/auto-worker/student alert/player & coach alert interface is configured to activate an autopilot/auto-driver/auto-operator/auto-worker command in response an SA deficiency threshold has been exceeded.

title: Field-adaptive deep knowledge tracking and personalized exercise recommendation method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a domain-adaptive deep knowledge tracking and personalized exercise recommendation method, and the related knowledge tracking method comprises the steps: obtaining the historical answering record data and corresponding exercise data of a student, and dividing the historical answering record data and the corresponding exercise data into source domain data and target domain data; for the source domain data, training a knowledge tracking model of the source domain by using a deep learning method; According to the knowledge tracking model of the source domain, migration from the source domain to the target domain is realized by using a migration learning method, so that knowledge tracking of target domain data is realized. According to the method, the knowledge trackingmodel trained in the source field can be migrated to the target field by applying deep learning and transfer learning methods, the problem that a large number of models need to be trained due to a large number of fields is solved, and meanwhile the problem that a reliable knowledge tracking model cannot be obtained through training due to a small number of field data is also solved. And in cooperation with a corresponding personalized exercise recommendation method, proper exercises can be recommended to students, and a personalized test scheme is provided for the students.

title: Knowledge point backtracking learning evaluation method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: DREAM SHARING EDUCATION TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a knowledge point backtracking learning evaluation method based on artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to the field of learning methods. A video database, a testquestion database, a video watching module, a test module, a knowledge point evaluation screening module and a backtracking learning module are included in the method. The evaluation method comprisesthe following steps: S1, establishing a knowledge graph through related knowledge points, recording a learning record at each knowledge point as input data of a deep neural network through learning paths of a plurality of students in the knowledge graph, and outputting the input data as a plurality of optimal learning paths through a multilayer deep neural network; and S2, if the learning score ofthe current knowledge point of the student is not good, enabling the ability of the model of the deep neural network to trace back to know which knowledge point the learning path belongs to is not matched with the ability of the knowledge point in the optimal learning path, so that the knowledge point needing to trace back for learning is recommended, and the learning path is updated. According to the invention, knowledge points which are not mastered in the past are traced back through an artificial intelligence technology to learn again, and a new learning path is established.

title: Intelligent laboratory robot system
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an intelligent laboratory robot system. Artificial intelligence technology, offline password identification and cloud online identification are integrated; a teacher knowledge base and a knowledge graph on the cloud are combined; real-time semantic analysis and voice interaction are realized; awakening of the robot is realized by using a face recognition technology; theapproaching of a client can be sensed from a distance of about 2 meters in front; when the approaching distance is one meter, the motor is started; robot capable of being awakened, triggering the robot to display a welcome interface and actively call people; iNTELLIGENT DEGREE, the arrangement of the microphone array is used for obtaining voice signals emitted by a sound source, the problem of remote recognition is solved, voice recognition in a real scene is ensured, a laboratory management mode of intelligent teacher online management and offline student scientific research is fused, the teacher management efficiency is improved, and students can be more conveniently fused into a teacher scientific research system.

title: Neural network training method, video frame processing method and related equipment
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a neural network training method, a video frame processing method and related equipment. The methods can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence image processing. The method may include: inputting the at least two groups of input video frames into a student network and a teacher network respectively, obtaining at least two first output results output by the student network and at least two second output results output by the teacher network, according to the at least two first output results, obtaining a first similarity between the first output results, according to the at least two second output results, obtaining a second similarity between the second output results, training the student network through a first loss function indicating the similarity between the first similarity and the second similarity, and obtaining the student network after the training operation is executed until the convergence condition is met, and enablingthe inter-frame stability of the student network to be close to the inter-frame stability of the teacher network in the process of executing the training operation in the training stage so as to improve the inter-frame stability of the student network.

title: Classroom student behavior detection method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a classroom student behavior detection method, relates to image processing and recognition, and mainly solves the technical problems of low accuracy, low speed and poor robustness of a current full-image detection method. The classroom student behavior detection method comprises the following steps: converting an original image of a classroom student into a grey-scale map;inputting the grey-scale map into a deep learning model to carry out head and shoulder frame detection and prone table identification, and obtaining a head and shoulder frame; determining a hand raising detection area according to the head and shoulder frame, and performing hand raising detection in the hand raising detection area. The hand raising detection area is determined according to the head and shoulder frame, and hand raising detection is performed in the hand raising detection area so that the detection input image can be greatly reduced, the detection area can be greatly reduced, the hand detection efficiency can be effectively enhanced, the hand detection accuracy can also be greatly enhanced and the robustness is high.

title: Intelligent scoring device and method for chemical carbon dioxide preparation experiment
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent scoring device and method for a chemical carbon dioxide preparation experiment. The device comprises transparent glassware with a color ring label, a black experiment desktop for reducing reflectance, a fisheye lens for expanding a video field of view, a recording scheme of double-lens cooperative work, an efficient and accurate deep learning neural network model and a computer for rigorous and accurate scoring logic judgment. According to the invention, a deep learning neural network model is utilized; by matching with the hardware device, the dependenceof an examination site on the number of teachers can be reduced, and the workload of teachers is also reduced; the accuracy of experiment examination scoring is improved; the experiment process of each student is archived, and if questions about examination scores exist, teachers and students can recheck the examination scores through the reserved videos, so that the burden of the teachers and the workers can be reduced at the same time, the judgment efficiency and the judgment accuracy can be improved, and the interest of the students in chemical experiments is improved.

title: Physicochemical experiment AI classroom system based on image recognition
applicants: SHANGHAI CHUANGSHITONG SOFTWARE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a physicochemical experiment AI classroom system based on image recognition. The physicochemical experiment AI classroom system comprises an experiment table, experiment classroom intelligent analysis equipment and external equipment. The experiment table comprises a student terminal and a network camera. The external equipment comprises a teacher terminal, a teacher mobileterminal and a student terminal. A network camera of the experiment table is communicated with the experiment classroom intelligent analysis device through a network, and student operation experimentvideos are collected through the network camera. The experimental classroom intelligent analysis equipment comprises a receiving unit, an intelligent analysis unit and a control unit. And the intelligent analysis unit obtains current experiment table experiment state video data shot by the network camera according to the experiment step judgment request sent by the experiment table student terminal and the information of the related network camera received by the receiving unit, performs image processing and AI analysis, and further judges whether the result of the current step is correct ornot. And when the artificial intelligence analysis unit cannot judge whether the steps submitted by the students at present are correct or not, the teacher mobile terminal acquires the real-time videopictures of the corresponding student experiment tables through the network, and manually judges that the student experiment steps pass the operation and do not pass the operation.

title: METHOD AND SERVER FOR PROVIDING GUIDE TO PASS ENTRANCE EXAMINATION
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a method and a server for providing an entrance examination pass guide by using artificial intelligence and a standard model by major constituted based on deep learning. According to one embodiment of the present invention, the server includes: a university student information management part obtaining university student information, and calculating a successful applicant standard model based on the university student information; an entrance examination preparation student information management part creating a database for a preset category by obtaining entrance examination preparation student information and analyzing the entrance examination preparation information; and an entrance examination information providing part calculating a gap value indicating the difference between a numerical value indicating the current competence of the entrance examination preparation student obtained from the entrance examination preparation student information and a numerical value indicating the competence of the successful applicant standard model, and providing the entrance examination pass guide to the entrance examination preparation student in reference to the gap value.

title: An attendance check system using deep learning based face recognition
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an attendance check system using deep learning based face recognition and, more particularly, to a system which is provided in a university lecture room and manages attendance information of students participating in a lecture. The system includes at least one camera in a classroom to acquire an image of a participant through the camera, recognizes the face of the participant through analysis of the acquired image, and checks the attendance through comparison with a student face image stored in advance. The system analyzes the images repeatedly captured through the camera at predetermined time intervals to grasp the situation in the classroom, such as the lateness or unauthorized departure of the participant, and repeatedly analyzes the image to continuously and additionally store and update the recognized face image of the participant in the database, so that a recognition rate is increased through image learning using deep learning, thereby enabling attendance check with increased accuracy and reliability.

title: GENERATING RENTAL RATES IN A REAL ESTATE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
abstract_text: A system may include a rental property listing portal and a rental price prediction unit. The rental price prediction unit may additional include an amenity price prediction unit. The rental price prediction unit and the amenity price prediction unit may use one or more mathematical models, such as constrained optimization model and/or a machine learning approach such as a random forest model, to generate a suggested rental price at a given level of portfolio occupancy. The system may also provide risk thresholds to simulate leasing strategies based on market situations, predicting revenue potential and possible vacancy for each strategy. The system may also generate a delist time (time to rent) for a property at a given price. The system and method may be implemented in a multi-family apartment rental system, a storage space rental system, a student accommodation, and single family apartment rental systems.

title: Classroom performance evaluation method and system
abstract_text: The invention relates to a classroom performance evaluation method and system, and the method comprises the steps: collecting a classroom image, and recognizing the position of a human skeleton pointof each student in the classroom image; estimating a corresponding face position according to the recognized human body skeleton point position of each student and obtaining a face image of the position; comparing each obtained face image with a pre-stored class student face image, and determining a student identity corresponding to the face image; based on a student behavior analysis model, determining a student behavior type corresponding to the human skeleton point position information corresponding to each identity student; determining an expression type corresponding to the face image corresponding to each student based on a face expression neural network of deep learning; student score estimation: collecting student behavior types, expression types and student scores of a single student in a time period to construct a behavior score model, solving weights by using an optimal algorithm, and constructing a behavior score model; and utilizing the behavior score model to estimate thelearning score of the single student.

title: Student class termination prediction method based on Attention deep learning model
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student class stop prediction method based on an Attention deep learning model, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the coding and time window score processing of a behavior record, and generating a plurality of time slice behavior vector matrixes; processing the plurality of time slice behavior vector matrixes based on an improved convolution layer of the CNN network to obtain a plurality of feature vector matrixes with a local association relationship; based on a BI-GRU model, carrying out feature extraction of time series features on the plurality of feature vector matrixes with the local association relationship to generate a plurality of behavior feature vector matrixes with the time series relationship; and giving different weights to the hiddenlayer features at each moment based on an Attention mechanism, performing weighted summation on the hidden layer states and the weights at different moments to generate a behavior feature representation vector, inputting the behavior feature representation vector into a classification layer, and performing prediction through a Sigmoid function to obtain a prediction result. By considering the relationship between the learning behaviors of the students and the degree of influence of different behavior characteristics on class termination prediction, prediction is realized, and the precision ofclass termination prediction is improved.

title: Edge-preserving image smoothing method based on deep learning knowledge distillation technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses an edge-preserving image smoothing method based on a deep learning knowledge distillation technology, and belongs to the technical field of image processing. The method is based on a novel deep learning knowledge distillation technology, and the edge detection capability of an edge detection teacher network is distilled into an image smoothing student network, so that the student network has an edge-preserving image smoothing capability. Wherein the task of the student network is to perform image smoothing, and the task of the teacher network is to extract information of structural edges. The teacher network is used for distilling and migrating structural edge knowledge to the student network, so that the student network has the capability of retaining structural edges of the teacher network while carrying out an image smoothing task. According to the method, the structural edge of image smoothing can be reserved on the premise of not additionally introducing adepth network for reserving edge information, the visual influence of image quality loss such as incapability of well reserving image edge information and blurring in a traditional image smoothing enhancement method is overcome, and the image smoothing effect is greatly improved.

title: LEARNING COACH FOR MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A machine learning system includes a coach machine learning system that uses machine learning to help a student machine learning system learn its system. By monitoring the student learning system, the coach machine learning system can learn (through machine learning techniques) “hyperparameters” for the student learning system that control the machine learning process for the student learning system. The machine learning coach could also determine structural modifications for the student learning system architecture. The learning coach can also control data flow to the student learning system.

title: Low-light image enhancement method based on deep learning knowledge distillation technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses a low-light image enhancement method based on a deep learning knowledge distillation technology, and belongs to the technical field of image processing. The method is based ona novel deep learning knowledge distillation technology, and the denoising capability of an image denoising teacher network is distilled into an image enhancement student network, so that the studentnetwork suppresses and removes noise in a picture in an image enhancement process. A student network and a teacher network are set, wherein the task of the student network is to perform low-light image enhancement, and the task of the teacher network is to remove image noise. The teacher network is used for distilling and migrating the image denoising capability to the student network, so that thestudent network has the image denoising capability of the teacher network while performing a low-light image enhancement task. According to the method, the quality loss and the visual influence caused by the fact that noise is correspondingly enhanced along with image enhancement in a traditional low-light image enhancement method are overcome, and the low-light image enhancement effect is greatly improved.

title: Chemical funnel device construction experiment operation device and intelligent scoring method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a chemical funnel device construction experiment operation device and an intelligent scoring method. The chemical funnel device construction experiment operation device comprises an experiment table, an operation assembly, a student cloud terminal display screen and a network camera, the operation assembly is placed on the experiment table, the student cloud terminal display screen is installed right above the experiment table, and the network camera is also installed on the experiment table; the operation assembly comprises an iron stand, a long-neck funnel, a beaker and filter paper, and the long-neck funnel is placed on the iron stand. According to the invention, a forward-looking camera and a downward-looking camera are used for collecting videos of the experiment operation process of students, a target object in the acquired video is identified by using a deep learning target detection algorithm, according to the current scoring rule of the funnel device construction experiment, the funnel device construction experiment of the student is scored, the final operation score is obtained, and the problems that in the current chemical funnel device construction operation experiment process, the quality requirement of scoring personnel is high, the scoring workload is large, and scoring standards are difficult to unify are solved.

title: AI-based intelligent classroom comprehensive management platform
applicants: SHENZHEN WEIKU INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an AI-based intelligent classroom comprehensive management platform. The platform comprises a master server, a 5G network wireless classroom terminal, a teacher terminal and astudent terminal. The master server is used for storing and processing data and storing a semester schedule, a student information database and a teacher information database; the classroom terminalis used for acquiring facial information and names of students of all classes and facial information and names of teachers of all classes in corresponding classrooms; a scanning module has preset scanning time threshold and is used for scanning facial information of students entering a classroom; a registration module is wirelessly connected to the scanning module, registers names of students whodo not enter the corresponding classrooms after the scanning time is over, and transmits the names to the main server; the teacher terminal is used for acquiring class classrooms, class time information and name information of students who do not enter the classrooms in class time from the total server; and the student terminal is used for acquiring class classrooms and class time information fromthe total server. The platform has the effect of enhancing the student attendance management convenience.

title: METHODS AND SYSTEMS OF SMART CAMPUS SECURITY SHIELD
abstract_text: A Smart Campus Security Shield System comprising a Smart Student ID Card, wherein the card comprises a set of sensors inside the Smart Student ID Card. The set of sensors send a crime alert through a wireless network to a cloud server. The cloud server memory comprises a student crime alert model which describes the crime alert severity, student ID number, name, location, date, time, and a set of details of the student, so that the student risk control model can generate a plurality of corrective actions and preventive actions for each individual student. The crime alerts personalized and adaptive machine learning method presents a set of customized corrective actions and preventive actions to a student, based on at least one student attribute data. A set of student safety performance statistics is used to generate an optimal safety management strategy for the school security staff to reduce school crime.

title: Remote supervision relationship extraction method based on course learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a remote supervision relationship extraction method based on course learning, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence and natural language processing. According to the method, a relation extractor is regarded as a student network, and a tutor network is designed for a relationship extraction task to monitor the training process of the relation extractor. The tutor network receives related feature information input of the relationship extractor, learns the weight of each sentence in the packet, and feeds back the weight to the relationship extractorso that more sentences with good quality participate in the training process of the relationship extractor. In order to efficiently cooperatively train two networks, the method is improved on the basis of an alternating local gradient descent method, and a joint optimization method suitable for the relationship extraction task is provided. According to the method, the effect of relation extraction in a noise environment is improved and the method is superior to a traditional method in a mainstream relationship extraction data set.

title: Rational diet method suitable for students, expert system and client
abstract_text: The invention provides a rational diet method and system suitable for students, an expert system and a client. The method comprises the following steps: determining basic data of food intake accordingto nutrition standards for student meals; generating a quantified recipe according to a catering program; checking the quantified recipe, and/or providing a scheme for replacing food with the same values; carrying out identity registration on students to obtain basic information data of the students; recording dining conditions of the students; acquiring actual eating conditions of the students;and giving dietary guidance to the students, realizing interaction with parents through the artificial intelligence expert system, providing dietary guidance to the parents, receiving feedback information sent by the parents, and allowing a school or meal supply unit to conduct meal supply adjustment according to the actual conditions of the students. Thus, the diet habits of the students can be met on the basis of guaranteeing balanced diet of the students, dietary complementation between families and the school is achieved, and long-term diet balance of the students is achieved.

title: Student ability evaluation method and device based on behavior big data
applicants: JIANGSU JINZHI EDUCATION INFORMATION CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student ability evaluation method and device based on behavior big data. According to the method, the method comprises the steps of: according to a student ability three-dimensional measurement vector of each school year being constructed for each sample student according to student ability associated information of each sample student, normalizing the three-dimensional measurement vector, carrying out three-dimensional measurement on the student ability of the last school year of each sample student, through adoption of a clustering method, classifying and dividing the student abilities of the sample students, and then inputting the student ability three-dimensional measurement vector of each non-last school year of each sample student and the corresponding student ability category into a machine learning tool for training to obtain model training feature information; inputting the student ability three-dimensional measurement vector of the to-be-evaluated student into the machine learning tool, and analyzing and evaluating the student ability category of the to-be-evaluated student by the machine learning tool. According to the invention, students can find the difference between their own abilities and occupational targets in time, thereby guiding the students to complete and improve.

title: Model compression method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a model compression method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The method relates to the machine learning direction in the field of artificial intelligence,and comprises the steps of extracting features of a detection sample through a to-be-compressed student network and a to-be-compressed teacher network to obtain a first feature and a second feature ofthe detection sample; calculating a feature difference between the first feature and the second feature; adjusting the student network based on the feature difference; cutting the adjusted student network; performing preset iterative compression processing on the clipped student network to obtain a student network meeting a preset compression condition; according to the method, the student network can be compressed by cutting and iteratively compressing the student network, Meanwhile, the teacher network is used for adjusting the performance of the student network so as to compensate reduction of the performance and precision of the student network caused by compression, so that the performance of the compressed model is ensured while the model is compressed.

title: MACHINE LEARNING FOR OPTIMAL STUDENT GUIDANCE
abstract_text: Techniques for training and evaluating machine-learning models for providing student guidance are described herein. In some embodiments, a network service generates a set of clusters that group a plurality of students by similarity. The network service trains a machine-learning model based on variances in outcomes and actions leading to the outcomes for students that belong to a same cluster in the set of clusters. The network service evaluates the machine-learning model for a student that has been mapped to the same cluster to identify at least one action that the student has not performed that is predictive of an optimal outcome for other students that belong to the same cluster. Responsive to evaluating the machine-learning model, the network service presents, through an interface, a recommendation that the student perform the at least one action.

title: Natural language processing model training method, task execution method, equipment and system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a natural language processing model training method, a natural language processing method, natural language processing equipment and a natural language processing system, whichbelong to the field of natural language processing, and the method comprises the following steps: training a teacher model by utilizing a marked original data set; enhancing text sentences in the original data set to obtain enhanced text sentences, and labeling the enhanced text sentences by using a trained teacher model to obtain a labeled enhanced data set; taking the original data set and theenhanced data set as a training data set, training the student model, and taking the trained student model as a natural language processing model, wherein the teacher model and the student model are both deep learning models and execute the same natural language processing task, and the teacher model is more complex and larger in scale. According to the invention, the data set of the natural language processing task can be effectively enhanced in a knowledge distillation scene, and the processing capability of the natural language processing model is improved, so that the execution effect of the natural language processing task is improved.

title: Multi-language model compression method and device based on knowledge distillation
applicants: BEIJING ZHIDAO SMART INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a multi-language model compression method and device based on knowledge distillation, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of machine learning. The method comprises the following steps: taking trained N language models of different languages as teacher models; training a student model by utilizing the teacher model through a knowledgedistillation algorithm, wherein the vocabulary of the student model comprises all vocabularies in the teacher model. In the embodiment of the invention, the trained N language models of different languages are taken as teacher models; through the knowledge distillation algorithm, the teacher model is used for training the student model, so that compared with a multi-language model in the prior art, the student model obtained through final training has the advantages that model parameters are few, the structure of the model is simplified, and the performance and effect of the model can be guaranteed under the condition that the model parameters are few.

title: SYSTEM AND METHODS FOR AUTOMATED INTERACTIVE LEARNING
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a system and methods for automated interactive learning providing an interactive learning system for one or more users. The users of the learning system and methods may be students, trainees, or any user that generates queries and/or questions to the system. In one embodiment, the system and methods for automated interactive learning comprises a semantic routing model, a deep learning model, an automated student learning needs model, a helping service model, a content priori knowledge service model, a computer implemented system, and mobile objects. The semantic routing model provides routing of user queries to one or more tutors. The one or more tutors may have knowledge necessary to answer the user queries. If not, the semantic routing model directs the user query to a tutor possessing knowledge sufficient to adequately provide an accurate answer to the query. The semantic routing model also provides real-time interaction with users to the selected tutor.

title: Artificial intelligence-based student posture correction adjustable device
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence-based student posture correction adjustable device, which comprises a posture correction chair and a backrest, and is characterized in that the posture correction chair is connected with the backrest through a backrest adjusting device, an elastic cushion is arranged on the front surface of the backrest, a massage equipment cavity is arranged in the backrest corresponding to the elastic cushion, and a massage device is arranged in the massage equipment cavity; the backrest adjusting device comprises a backrest adjusting assembly and a drivingassembly, the horizontal part of the posture correcting chair is of a hollow structure, a partition plate is arranged in the horizontal part of the posture correcting chair, the backrest adjusting assembly is located between the partition plate and the inner wall of the rear side of the posture correcting chair, and the driving assembly is located between the partition plate and the inner wall ofthe front side of the posture correcting chair; according to the invention, a student can adjust the angle of the backrest according to the usual sitting posture condition of the student, so that thedevice conforms to the general condition of the student, the student can obtain comfortable experience due to the massage function, and in addition, the posture of the student in the correction process can be monitored.

title: School bus student get-off omission detection device and method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a school bus student get-off omission detection device based on deep learning. The device comprises an image acquisition module, a camera shooting intelligent processing module, a transmission module, a main control unit, a vehicle interface module, a storage module, a main control unit, an early warning module and a display module. According to the method, image samples indifferent environments are collected through an image collection module, a target classification model in a school bus compartment is trained through a deep learning technology, and the classification model is transplanted into the camera shooting intelligent processing module; when the school bus is located at an end point and is to be parked, the image acquisition module acquires a carriage image and sends the carriage image to the camera shooting intelligent processing module for image target identification and sends the identified image and the identification result to the main control unit, and the main control unit decodes, fuses and identifies different images and then outputs the images to the display module. No extra sensor is installed, the hardware system cost can be reduced through continuous optimization of the algorithm, and the safety and the intelligent degree of the school bus are improved.

title: Campus psychological counseling method and device based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to a campus psychological counseling method and device based on deep learning. The method comprises the steps of: establishing an emotion monitoring model by inputting source data of students in school in advance; acquiring to-be-detected data of the students in school in real time, preprocessing the to-be-detected data, inputting the preprocessed to-be-detected data into theemotion monitoring model, obtaining a corresponding school student emotion index through the emotion monitoring model, performing psychological assessment on the students in school according to the emotion indexes, and performing psychological counseling on the students in school with abnormal psychological assessment.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR DETERMINING WHEN A STUDENT WILL STRUGGLE WITH HOMEWORK
abstract_text: Systems and methods for automatically triggering an action in response to a user being likely to struggle with an assignment are disclosed herein. The systems and methods use an artificial intelligence model to determine a likelihood or plausibility of struggling score which is compared with one or more thresholds. Should the likelihood or plausibility of struggling score exceed one or more of the thresholds, an action corresponding with the threshold exceeded is triggered.

title: LEARNING MOTOR PRIMITIVES AND TRAINING A MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEM USING A LINEAR-FEEDBACK-STABILIZED POLICY
abstract_text: A computer-implemented method of training a student machine learning system comprises receiving data indicating execution of an expert, determining one or more actions performed by the expert during the execution and a corresponding state-action Jacobian, and training the student machine learning system using a linear-feedback-stabilized policy. The linear-feedback-stabilized policy may be based on the state-action Jacobian. Also a neural network system for representing a space of probabilistic motor primitives, implemented by one or more computers. The neural network system comprises an encoder configured to generate latent variables based on a plurality of inputs, each input comprising a plurality of frames, and a decoder configured to generate an action based on one or more of the latent variables and a state.

title: Brain wave acquisition terminal for English listening based on Internet of Things
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a brain wave acquisition terminal for English listening based on the Internet of Things. The brain wave monitoring device is used for monitoring brain waves in the Englishlearning process. Brain wave sensor, digital-to-analog conversion, brain waves in the learning process of students are converted into digital signals; the data is sent to a remote server for persistent transmission through the Internet of Things of China Telecom, brain wave data generated in the learning process of students is remotely collected, the data is matched and fused with learning resultsin a student information management system, and finally a machine learning model used for analyzing the learning process of the students is established.

title: Campus personnel safety management system based on deep learning and face recognition features
applicants: JIANGSU GAOTAI SOFTWARE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a campus personnel safety management system based on deep learning and face recognition features, which comprises a background management system and a channel group consistingof a plurality of access control systems, the background management system comprises teacher and student card information and attendance management, embedded equipment information maintenance and face acquisition App; the channel groups are divided into barrier channel groups and barrier-free channel groups, wherein the barrier channel is provided with card swiping equipment or video recognitionequipment, the barrier-free channel group is provided with video identification equipment and a high-definition monitoring camera; when students and teachers swipe campus cards and pass through the barrier channel group, the card swiping equipment collects information of campus cards or the video recognition equipment collects face images of passing persons. The identification equipment carries out comparison and identification on campus card identification codes preset in a background system database by students and teachers or personal photo information stored in the database according to anidentification method, so as to judge whether the students enter school, leave school, get in and out of dormitories through the channel group and whether the students and teachers normally work or not.

title: AC-DC power grid operation state parameter local disturbance feature learning method and system
applicants: CHINA ELECTRIC POWER RES INST CO LTD
ELECTRIC POWER RES INST OF STATE GRID SHANDONG ELECTRIC POWER CO
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AC/DC power grid operation state parameter local disturbance feature learning method and system. The method comprises: performing noise reduction processing on acquired historical operation parameters; for the operation parameters after noise reduction processing, generating operation parameter feature vectors of deep learning by utilizing smooth pseudo-affine Wigner-Viller distribution; learning the hidden variables of the operating parameter feature vectors by using a Student-t distributed hybrid model to generate state tags corresponding to the operating parameterfeatures; and based on the state label corresponding to each operation parameter characteristic, identifying the operation state of the AC/DC power grid by adopting a deep shrinkage self-encoding network-Gaussian process. According to the invention, the corresponding state labels are generated for different operation parameter characteristics corresponding to each operation parameter, and the operation state of the AC/DC power grid is identified by adopting the deep shrinkage self-encoding network-Gaussian process based on the state labels corresponding to each operation parameter characteristic, so that the identification accuracy is improved.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR MANAGING THE EDUACATION LECTURES
applicants: NAT UNIV CHUNGBUK IND ACAD COOP FOUND [KR]
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a learning course management system and a method thereof. The learning course management system comprises an automatic customized content generation part that automatically generates recommended courses, recommended lecturers or recommended enrollment plans based on artificial intelligence or big data as student-specific content and provide the same to a student, thereby increasing efficiency of course management and increasing efficiency of course enrollment planning and course enrollment management functions by providing an intuitive interface.

title: Artificial intelligence type senior high school student anti-lost knapsack
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of backpacks. The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence type high school student anti-lost knapsack. Waterproof bag, the bottom of the waterproof bag side is fixedly connected with a waterproof side bag; a first buckle is fixedly mounted at the top of one side of the waterproof side bag; the middle part of one side of the waterproof bagis fixedly connected with a connecting belt; a second buckle is fixedly mounted at the bottom of the other side of the connecting belt; and a protective sleeve is fixedly installed at the bottom of the front face of the waterproof bag, a GPS positioning card is placed in an inner cavity of the protective sleeve, a carrying handle is fixedly installed at the top of the waterproof bag, and a firststrap is fixedly connected to one side of the top of the front face of the waterproof bag. According to the artificial intelligence type senior high school student anti-lost backpack, through mutual cooperation of the protective sleeve and the GPS positioning card, the lost backpack can be better found, so that the problem that after the backpack is lost, the lost position of the backpack cannot be accurately found is solved, and finding of the lost backpack is improved.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR PREDICTION OF STUDENT OUTCOMES AND PROACTIVE INTERVENTION
abstract_text: Systems and methods of the present invention provide for one or more machine learning models configured to generate one or more student outcome predictions, such as whether a student will correctly respond to items of an assessment or will pass the assessment, based on monitored student activity and associated parameters. Inputs to the machine learning models may include outputs of other predictive models, such as an item response theory model and a short term prediction model. The machine learning models may output a student outcome prediction vector containing student outcome predictions for each uncompleted item of an assessment being delivered to a student in real-time. Remediation activities may be recommended to or automatically initiated for the student based on the student outcome predictions. A delivery order of the assessment may be modified based on the student outcome predictions.

title: Multispectral remote sensing image change detection method and system based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multispectral remote sensing image change detection method and system based on deep learning, and belongs to the technical field of image processing. The method comprises thesteps: calculating the change vector amplitude of a remote sensing image; obtaining a pseudo training sample set according to a change vector amplitude EM algorithm, wherein the pseudo training sample set comprises a mark sample set (including a change type sample set and a non-change type sample set) and a non-mark sample set; constructing two networks, namely a student network and a teacher network, constructing a cross entropy loss function for the mark sample set, and constructing a mean square error function for the non-mark sample set; optimizing the student network by adopting a stochastic gradient descent optimization algorithm, and updating weight parameters of the teacher network in each training round; and obtaining a corresponding final change detection result according to thefinal teacher network. Besides, the non-mark sample set is added in network training to participate in training so that the change detection result is enabled to be more reliable and more robust.

title: Big data and artificial intelligence online examination method and system based on virtual container graphical interface
applicants: HEILONGJIANG XIN LIANHUA INFORMATION CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a big data and artificial intelligence online examination method and a system based on a virtual container graphical interface, and belongs to the technical field of virtualization. Big data and artificial intelligence multi-person simultaneous examination cannot be completed on one server; the method comprises the following steps of: setting virtual servers in a server, namely a mirror image server and a container server; setting a mirror image server, a container server and a Web server; storing a new examination experiment mirror image on the basic mirror image by ateacher terminal; generating a relatively independent student container according to the examination mirror image by a student terminal; rendering the graphical interface to the student terminal in real time by utilizing socket communication, completing all operations of student experiments in real time, automatically storing contents in the student containers, submitting experiment reports and the student containers to teachers for examination and approval by students, giving corresponding scores by the teachers, and logging in by the students to check the scores; according to the method, multi-person examination can be completed on one server; the system can reduce the cost of big data and artificial intelligence related examinations.

title: Machine learning system for a training model of an adaptive trainer
abstract_text: In one embodiment of the invention, a training model for students is provided that models how to present training items to students in a computer based adaptive trainer. The training model receives student performance data and uses the training model to infer underlying student skill levels throughout the training sequence. Some embodiments of the training model also comprise machine learning techniques that allow the training model to adapt to changes in students skills as the student performs on training items presented by the training model. Furthermore, the training model may also be used to inform a training optimization model, or a learning model, in the form of a Partially Observable Markov Decision Process (POMDP).

title: Attendance management system and method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to an attendance management system and a method based on deep learning. The system comprises a student photo acquisition module, a student identity recognition module, an attendance time recording module, an attendance time prediction module and an attendance time segmentation module. Wherein the student identity recognition module is used for carrying out identity recognition; judging a time period to which the identification time belongs; and selecting the time period to which the identification time belongs and the photos of the students predicted to be in the school in two time periods before and after the time period as comparison photos, comparing the photos of the students in the school with the comparison photos, and selecting the student number correspondingto the comparison photo with the maximum similarity as the student number of the students in the school. According to the system, the student attendance time is reasonably predicted, the image comparison range is reduced, the attendance time prediction model based on deep learning only needs to be re-operated once at the beginning of each semester or at the beginning of each year, the deep learning model does not need to be operated every time identity recognition is carried out, and the calculated amount and the processing burden of the system are reduced.

title: Network training method and device for knowledge distillation, medium and electronic device
abstract_text: The invention provides a network training method and device for knowledge distillation, a storage medium and an electronic device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: inputting sample data into a teacher network to obtain soft label data corresponding to the sample data, and inputting the sample data into a student network to obtain prediction data corresponding to the sample data; constructing a loss function based on the prediction data, the soft label data and the hard label data corresponding to the sample data; and updating parameters in the teacher network and parameters in the student network according to the loss function. According to the invention, the teacher network and the student network can be synchronouslytrained, the dependence of the student network on the teacher network is reduced, the training effect of the student network is improved, the training process can be accelerated, and the efficiency is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence-based student desk lamp with bulb convenient to replace
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence-based student desk lamp with a bulb convenient to replace. Including a base, a fixed rod is arranged on the upper surface of the right end of thebase; a connecting rod penetrates through the interior of the adjusting block; a fixed plate is mounted at the upper end of the connecting rod; an extrusion rod is welded in the bearing; the extrusion plate is positioned above the fixed plate; a bearing block is mounted in the right side of the bearing plate; the upper end of the bearing block is of a groove-shaped structure, a power line is wound around the outer side of the winding rod, connecting plates are arranged on the surfaces of the left side and the right side of the first lamp panel, a bulb is installed in a groove, a fixing grooveis formed in the right end of a limiting groove, and a reset spring is located on the right side of the groove-shaped structure of the upper surface of the bearing block. According to the student desk lamp convenient to replace the bulb and based on artificial intelligence, the problems that the bulb of an existing student desk lamp is inconvenient to replace and physical keys of the desk lamp are prone to damage are solved.

title: An online Student Success Management system
abstract_text: An online Student Success Management system [1] The present invention is an online and fully integrated student success management system including; (a) a centralised database that analyses the student data and based on industry best practise calculates measures, such as Student Risk Index, Student Success Index and Student Gap Index. (b) an integrated 360 degree view of the student with 1-click communications for interactions (c) a case management framework with programs and case plans to manage the different student cohorts and outcomes, (d) a surveying & diagnostics framework providing an holistic real-time view of the student's, (e) a real-time dashboard for insights and analytics (f) an online Artificial Intelligence (AI), machine learning and predictive analytics tool. WillowSoft architecture Institution view Tutor portal Student portal *Dashboard *Team page Student profile WillowSoft Student Success System Machine learning centralised database Fig. 1

title: College entrance examination score conversion system and method
applicants: SHANDONG YUNZHIYUAN EDUCATION TECH GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a college entrance examination score conversion system and method, and relates to the technical field of big data analysis.
