The system comprises a processor, an input module, aclient, a database, a condition screening and returning module, an intelligent analysis module and a score conversion module, wherein table information that each province enrollment examination roomdivides one score into one segment over the years, score distribution of each senior high school over the years and student trend information are stored in the database. Through massive data analysis,student trends are collected and analyzed by taking a school as a unit, each trend of each student is obtained accurately, and score distribution of each senior high school and student trends over the years are stored in a database; through intelligent analysis, in combination with score results over the years and through an artificial intelligence big data method in combination with comprehensive strength evaluation of schools, the most appropriate score distribution and trend are recommended, and the most authoritative, accurate and scientific score basis is provided for users.

title: Student expression recognition method and system based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to a student expression recognition method and system based on deep learning. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a face information video frame of a first student in a video sequence; performing feature extraction on the face information of the first student, and constructing an expression recognition model; performing first recognition on the face information basedon the features; and when the first identification result exceeds a preset threshold, sending prompt information.

title: Student homework page number identification method based on text matching
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of image matching, particularly relates to a student homework page number recognition method based on text matching, and aims to solve the problems that the page number recognition accuracy cannot reach expectation and the expansibility is not high in the prior art. The method comprises the following steps: identifying a character communication area ofa to-be-identified page and dividing the character communication area to obtain a plurality of text line pictures; converting the text line pictures into texts through a text sequence recognition model; extracting N-gram features of the text, and querying in a feature inverted table corresponding to the database; and taking the pictures with the most common features and the feature number higher than a set threshold value in the database as matching pictures of the text. According to the method, the text sequence recognition model constructed based on the deep learning neural network is used,the pictures are matched from the database in an N-gram feature query mode, the page matching and page number recognition accuracy is greatly improved, and the method also has a good effect on improvement of the recognition accuracy of irregular characters such as mathematical formulas.

title: Liquid level temperature control equipment for student practical training
applicants: SHIJIAZHUANG HUAHAO ELECTRIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides a liquid level temperature control device for student practical training, which comprises a liquid level temperature control box, and the liquid level temperature control box comprises a water tank, a three-phase water pump, a liquid level tower, a heater, a temperature sensor and a drainage electromagnetic valve; the three-phase water pump introduces liquid in the watertank into an inlet of the liquid level tower through a pipeline, an outlet of the liquid level tower is communicated with the water tank through a drainage pipeline, and a drainage electromagnetic valve is arranged on the drainage pipeline. A heater is arranged at the bottom of the liquid level tower, and a detection part of the temperature sensor is arranged in the liquid level tower; the liquidlevel temperature control box and the junction box are small in size, the liquid level temperature control box is convenient to assemble and disassemble, students can assemble the liquid level temperature control box by themselves and then connect circuits in the junction box by themselves when the liquid level temperature control box is used, deep learning and understanding of the students are facilitated, and the operational ability of the students is improved.

title: MULTI-TASK LEARNING USING KNOWLEDGE DISTILLATION
abstract_text: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on computer storage media for performing multi-task learning. In one method a system obtains a respective set of training data for each of multiple machine learning tasks. For each of the machine learning tasks, the system configures a respective teacher machine learning model to perform the machine learning task by training the teacher machine learning model on the training data. The system trains a single student machine learning model to perform the multiple machine learning tasks using (i) the configured teacher machine learning models, and (ii) the obtained training data.

title: Campus safety management system based on AI face recognition
applicants: ANHUI JINXING INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a campus safety management system based on AI face recognition. The system comprises a face recognition terminal. The face recognition terminal is electrically connected with the management center. The management center comprises a management service host and a database. The management service host comprises a data comparison module and a safety management module. The safety management terminal is in signal connection with the management center. The safety management terminal comprises a campus management terminal, a parent management terminal and a student management terminal and is used for receiving safety warning. According to the invention, the AI face recognition technology is used to obtain the face features of the school personnel. Outsiders can be discriminated in time. Foreign personnel are prevented from entering the campus at will. The safety of teachers and students in the school is guaranteed. Absent students can be found in time through curriculumschedule data, teachers, students and parents can master the states of students in the school in time and master the behaviors of students in the school in time. The supervision and management of teachers and parents on students are improved. The safety of students in the school is guaranteed.

title: Pre-testing method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHANGHAI YIXUE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a pre-testing method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: finding out the condition of a student on a knowledge point of a class through pre-testing when the student enters system learning and before a first-step test, and determining whether the student learns the knowledge point or not; and if the knowledge point is learned, entering subsequent learning, and if the knowledge point is not learned, entering a review or preview stage. In the first step of testing, the most suitable questions are searched for in the question bank based onbig data to conduct testing firstly, it is guaranteed that the testing result is accurate, and then a suitable path is selected according to the testing result.

title: Campus bullying behavior early warning system and method based on artificial intelligence technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses a campus bulwark behavior early warning system and method based on an artificial intelligence technology. The system comprises a processor, a student terminal and a teacher terminal. The processor is used for executing calculation and artificial intelligence analysis; the student terminal is used for students to carry out bulking alarm, the teacher terminal is used for teachers to receive information sent by the processor and carry out subsequent processing according to the sent information, the processor comprises a memory, a basic database is stored in the memory, andthe basic database comprises information of all students. The system can be used for carrying out accurate bulking early warning.

title: Multifunctional table lamp based on artificial intelligence
applicants: DONGGUAN AYOUWEI INTERACTION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a multifunctional table lamp based on artificial intelligence. The utility model discloses a desk lamp. Simple structure, single function, at present, students are easy todevelop improper sitting postures during learning; influence on later physical development, and illumination intensity fixation, the adjustment cannot be performed according to specific conditions; the eye health of students is damaged. The desk lamp comprises a desk lamp base, an electric push rod is vertically fixed to the top of the rear end of the table lamp base. A first control key is embedded in the lower part of the front end of the electric push rod; a power socket is formed in the rear-end bottom of the electric push rod; the top of the electric push rod penetrates the top end and isconnected with a connecting frame through a rotating assembly; based on artificial intelligence, the multifunctional desk lamp has the advantages that the functions are diversified, the sitting posture of a student can be conveniently corrected, the illumination intensity can be conveniently changed, the monitoring and the interaction of parents are facilitated, and the learning interestingness is improved.

title: LEARNING MOTOR PRIMITIVES AND TRAINING A MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEM USING A LINEAR-FEEDBACK-STABILIZED POLICY
abstract_text: A computer-implemented method of training a student machine learning system comprises receiving data indicating execution of an expert, determining one or more actions performed by the expert during the execution and a corresponding state-action Jacobian, and training the student machine learning system using a linear-feedback-stabilized policy. The linear- feedback-stabilized policy may be based on the state-action Jacobian. Also a neural network system for representing a space of probabilistic motor primitives, implemented by one or more computers. The neural network system comprises an encoder configured to generate latent variables based on a plurality of inputs, each input comprising a plurality of frames, and a decoder configured to generate an action based on one or more of the latent variables and a state.

title: Knowledge distillation method based on position sensitive graph
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of deep learning and target detection, and relates to a knowledge distillation method based on a position sensitive graph. According to the method, the position sensitive graphs are generated through the characteristic graphs of the guidance layer in the teacher network and the guided layer in the student network, the parameter updating of the student network is guided based on the loss functions of the two position sensitive graphs, and the performance of the light-weight target detection network is improved under the condition that the network detection time and the parameter scale are not increased.

title: Data analysis method and device
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a data analysis method and device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining multi-dimensional data of a student to be evaluated during school, the multi-dimensional data comprising numerical data and text data; quantifying the multi-dimensional data by using different data analysis tools to obtain scores of a plurality of influence factors; constructing an analysis model, and training the analysis model by utilizing pre-stored influence factors of excellent students; inputting the influence factor of the to-be-evaluated student into the trained analysis model, and obtaining the weak factor of the to-be-evaluated student output by the analysis model, the weak factor being at least one of a plurality of influence factors; calling pre-stored targeted strengthening suggestions corresponding to the weak factors according to the weak factors; generating visual evaluation information based on a plurality of impact factors, weak factors, and targeted reinforcement suggestions. According to the embodiment of the invention, the problem of low accuracy of student data through a manual analysis mode in the prior art can be solved.

title: MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE AND METHOD
abstract_text: Provided are a machine learning device and method which enable machine learning of labeling, in which a plurality of labels are attached, at once and with a high degree of accuracy, to volume data using learning data having label attachments intermingled therein. A probability calculation unit (14) calculates, according to a teacher model (13a) in which learning has been completed, a value (soft label) indicating the likelihood of labeling a class Ci for each voxel of a second slice image. A detection unit (15) detects a "bronchial tube" and a "blood vessel" for the voxels of the second slice image by means of a commonly-known method such as a region expansion method, and performs labeling of the "bronchial tube" and the "blood vessel". A correction probability setting unit (16) replaces the soft label with a hard label of "bronchial tube" or "blood vessel", which was detected by the detection unit (15). A distillation unit (17) carries out distillation of a student model (18a) from the teacher model (13a) using the soft label after correction by the correction probability setting unit (16). Thereby, the student model (18a) in which learning was completed can be obtained.

title: RADIOTHERAPY PLAN PARAMETERS WITH PRIVACY GUARANTEES
abstract_text: Techniques for producing segmentation with privacy are provided. The techniques include receiving a medical image; processing the medical image with a student machine learning model to estimate radiotherapy plan parameters, the student machine learning model being trained to establish a relationship between a plurality of public training medical images and corresponding radiotherapy plan parameters, the radiotherapy plan parameters of the plurality of public training medical images being generated by aggregating a plurality of radiotherapy plan parameter estimates produced by: processing the plurality of public training medical images with a plurality of teacher machine learning models to generate sets of radiotherapy plan parameter estimates; and reducing respective dimensions of the sets of radiotherapy plan parameter estimates or medical images, the radiotherapy plan parameters of the plurality of public training medical images being perturbed in accordance with privacy criteria; and generating a radiotherapy treatment plan based on the estimated radiotherapy plan parameters.

title: ENHANCING LEARNING THROUGH PEDAGOGICAL DRIVEN RESPONSE TO INFERRED AFFECT
abstract_text: ENHANCING LEARNING THROUGH PEDAGOGICAL DRIVEN RESPONSE TO INFERRED AFFECT This invention is related to an affect-sensitive monitoring method and system for determining frustration of a student. The method comprises receiving a selected software application from a user. In response to receiving the selected software application, the method receives sequence of images from the image capturing device; receives a mouse timing log file; receives a keyboard timing log file; determines aggregated keyboard actions based on the keyboard timing log file; determines aggregated mouse actions based on the mouse timing log file; determines aggregated image actions based on the sequence of images; arranges each of the aggregated keyboard actions, mouse actions and image actions according to at least one selected machine learning based classifier; applies a decision template fusion algorithm on the arranged aggregated keyboard actions, mouse actions and image actions to obtain a final classification that indicates affect state of a subject. Figure 1 to accompany the abstract

title: College student health detecting system based on automatic perception
abstract_text: The invention discloses a college student health detecting system based on automatic perception. The college student health detecting system based on automatic perception comprises a central processing unit, a health detecting module, a communication module, a smart cloud sharing center platform, a client, a warning module, a printing module, a displaying module and a power supply module. The health detecting system is mounted in a student dormitory of a college, so that students can conveniently monitor own basic health condition at any time, and teachers and student parents can convenientlycontrol the physical and mental condition of the students. The students can perform health examination in the manner of scanning a two dimensional code to pass identity authentication, after examination is completed, relevant health information is stored on a cloud platform, the health trend of the students is analyzed through advanced techniques of big data analysis, artificial intelligence, a data mining technique and the like, and health reports are regularly provided for the students, so that psychological quality and the physiologic quality of the students are improved essentially, and afavorable guarantee mechanism is provided for study and life in the college.

title: College student professional recommendation method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a college student professional recommendation method based on deep learning. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, carrying out data preprocessing on basic information and core course information of a student to obtain a data set Student, Course and Rating; building a deep learning neural network model; constructing a Tensorflow calculation graph; obtaining student information characteristics and core course information characteristics to train a neural network model; generating a student information feature matrix and a core course feature matrix; professional recommendation for students. According to the method, basic personal information of college students and core course scores of college students in a new period are utilized to analyze the learning attitude and self-positioning of the college students on the core courses, so that professional recommendation is provided for the college students during class enrollment or professional transfer,and the result can assist college and university in professional construction and provide effective suggestions and information for improvement of a talent training scheme.

title: Chord arrangement detection method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a chord arrangement detection method based on deep learning, and relates to the technical field of chord detection. According to the chord arrangement detection method, a partchord note is subjected to feature extraction by applying a deep learning algorithm, dimensional information is further compressed by using a principal component analysis method, whether a chord is erroneous or not and the type of error are judged and classified by an SVM classifier, notes in the chord with density alignment errors are located by using a target detection algorithm, then the pixeldistance is measured and converted into the interval degree through a predicted frame of adjacent parts, error information is determined based on a chord arrangement rule, and the note with an error is annotated. According to the chord arrangement detection method based on deep learning, workload of a teacher on checking student homework is reduced by means of a voluntary inspection of students, and at the same time the purpose of improving the learning efficiency is achieved.

title: MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEM USING JOINT LEARNING AND THE METHOD THEREOF
abstract_text: The present invention relates to technique jointly learning a teacher learning module and student learning module. A method of a machine learning system using joint learning comprises the steps of: minimizing error and feature differences between the teacher learning module and student learning module branched from a shared engine extracting features of input data using a loss function; and jointly learning the teacher learning module and student learning module by the loss function.

title: Distillation learning method, system and device based on characteristic space change
applicants: STATE GRID GENERAL AVIATION CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of computer vision and machine learning, particularly relates to a distillation learning method, system and device based on characteristic space change, and aims tosolve the problem that a student network cannot learn teacher network global knowledge. The method comprises the following steps: constructing a corresponding student network according to a parameterstructure of a distillation learning teacher network; respectively selecting a preset network layer, and calculating the feature space representation of each layer and a cross-layer feature space change matrix between two specific layers; calculating a loss function based on the characteristic space change, and calculating a classification loss function according to the real label; and migrating the characteristic space change of the teacher network into the student network as knowledge through weighting of the two loss functions. According to the invention, the change of the feature space between layers of the teacher network is described as new knowledge, so that the student network can learn the overall knowledge of the whole teacher network when learning the change of the feature spacebetween layers.

title: College student part-time accurate matching method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a college student part-time job accurate matching method based on artificial intelligence. The accurate matching method comprises the following steps of collecting resumes provided by applicants, previous part-time job records and browsing part-time job habits; extracting a predetermined number of resumes and part-time job record vectors thereof as training samples; using amachine deep learning algorithm to train the training sample, and constructing a user data portrait; utilizing the user data portrait to obtain a user part-time job, a relation and a label relation;and establishing a sparse matrix through a collaborative filtering algorithm by using the user and the part-time work entity label, and converting the sparse matrix into a real matching result. According to the college student part-time accurate matching method based on artificial intelligence, digitization of user information is achieved, resumes with corresponding score values can be conveniently provided according to users, an efficient machine deep learning algorithm is used for replacing low-efficiency browsing behaviors, the method is more efficient, and the requirements of a network recruitment platform and an employment unit are met.

title: Campus security monitoring method and device and computer readable storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and discloses a campus security and protection monitoring method, which comprises the following steps: obtaining student names and faceimage information, filling the student names and the face image information into student information tables, obtaining face images of parents, filling the face images and the contact information intoparent information tables, and associating each student information table with at least one parent information table; obtaining a video monitoring picture in real time, carrying out face detection onthe video monitoring picture by utilizing a face detection technology, identifying a student who is picked up from the video monitoring picture according to the student information table, and furtheridentifying a current pick-up person of the student; according to the association relationship between the student information table and the parent information table, verifying whether the picked-up student is matched with the current pick-up person or not; and when the picked-up student is not matched with the current pick-up person, sending out an alarm prompt. The invention further provides a campus security monitoring device and a computer readable storage medium. According to the invention, the safety protection of students in a campus is realized.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR ASSESSING AND IMPROVING STUDENT COMPETENCIES
abstract_text: A skills learning method for a student gathers objective data relating to the student in response to various stimuli, and produces a predicted feedback units as a function of the objective data using a machine learning-base classifier. The method can include training a neural network using objective data of student interactions and associated subjective assessments of a skill of each objective data. The method includes receiving a new dataset with objective data of a new student and an associated subjective assessment of a skill of the first student represented by the new objective data. A predicted assessment of the skill of the new objective data is calculated by inputting the new objective data into the neural network. The method can include updating the neural network by combining the initial dataset and the new dataset and recompiling the neural network to fit the model dataset based on a learning algorithm.

title: Virtual reality learning platform
abstract_text: Provided is a virtual reality learning platform. The platform comprises student access sides, teacher access sides and a project access side; the project access side is used for issuing work demands,and the learning platform creates a first task according to the work demands and introduces at least one teacher access side and at least one student access side into the first task. In an acceptancemode, the project access side checks a work result of the first task, wherein the checking process comprises the steps of selecting characters or pictures or models or scenes, displaying work codes and displaying operators of the learning platform or labeling the operators. Compared with the prior art, the technical scheme is different in that a three-dimensional object can be identified by creating a feature library and training machine learning, and the operation of stroking, highlighting, display of supplementary information and the like can be carried out when a specific object is identified, so that the technical effect of providing more supplementary information for interactive scenes in an augmented reality environment is achieved.

title: Artificial intelligence-based deep learning implementation system and method
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of Internet, and discloses an artificial intelligence-based deep learning implementation system and method. The artificial intelligence-based deep learningimplementation system comprises an image storage module, a word group storing module, a correct matching storage module, a moving module, a sending unit and a server, wherein the image storage moduleis used for storing to-be-learnt images and matching areas corresponding to the to-be-learnt images one to one; the word group storing module is used for storing word groups which comprise the word groups corresponding to the to-be-learnt images; the correct matching storage module comprises the matching relationship between the matching areas and the word groups; the moving module is used for moving the word groups into the matching areas; the server comprises a first judgment module used for judging whether the word groups moving to the matching areas are correct or not, if the word groupsare correct, a correct prompt is given, and if the word groups are not correct, the word groups are made to return back to an original position. By means of the artificial intelligence-based deep learning implementation system, it can be achieved that the correctness that a student matches the word groups with the images is automatically judged, and the deep learning efficiency of the student is improved.

title: Metal health early-warning method based on deep learning of student sequencing behavior
applicants: HANGZHOU HUAWANG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a metal health early-warning method based on deep learning of a student sequencing behavior. The method comprises the steps of acquiring student in-school behavior data, usingstudent individuals as classifying labels, using a fixed period as the time length of a data statistics content, forming a set of data in the fixed period, and recording as a single set of data; constructing a de-nosing automatic encoder model for extracting characteristics from the single set of data; constructing a cyclic neural network model, standardizing the characteristics and using the standardized characteristics as an input, and performing network training; setting an abnormity threshold theta, and determining whether the student is abnormal according to a comparison result between areconstruction error and the threshold. The metal health early-warning method has beneficial effects of extracting the characteristic by means of an automatic encoder in deep learning, capturing an essential discrimination between a normal student and a suspected metal problem student, sufficiently utilizing time information by means of a recursion neural network, and realizing higher robustness of a model change correspondingly with a time dimension.

title: Academic achievement prediction and early warning method based on deep learning student serialization behaviors
applicants: HANGZHOU HUAWANG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an academic achievement prediction and early warning method based on deep learning student serialization behaviors, which comprises the following steps: collecting student in-school behavior data, taking student individuals as classification labels, taking a fixed period as the duration of data statistics content, forming a group of data in the fixed period, and recording the group of data as a single group of data; performing normalization and dimension reduction processing on the single-group data of the same student to form a single-group feature data set with student individuals as classification labels and a fixed period as data collection duration; and constructing a long-short-term memory network model in the form of many2one, and carrying out model substitution on a plurality of continuous single-group feature data sets of the same student to obtain an early warning value of the student score. The method has the advantages that comprehensive data is used, causal relations between learning achievements and behaviors and time seriousness of behavior data are comprehensively considered, and the time series is subjected to classified prediction through the recurrent neural network.

title: Artificial intelligence K12 knowledge graph making management system and implementation method
applicants: SHANGHAI YIXUE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence K12 knowledge graph making management system. Massive knowledge points can be subjected to friendly management, hierarchical splitting and relation storage. More importantly, accurate generation and verification of the graph can be intelligently realized, so that a teacher can quickly and accurately select and use the map during course development; the students can obtain the most effective learning path according to the relationship between the knowledge points in the map to obtain the best learning effect; even dynamic knowledge graph generation in the learning process of the student is realized, and the learning graph and path most suitable for each person in front of thousands of persons are really realized; based on the map information, big data can accurately analyze and trace weak points of students, and learning targets and learning plans are dynamically adjusted for the students in an artificial intelligence mode.

title: Intelligent paper marking implementation method and system based on deep learning and computer program
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an intelligent paper marking implementation method and system based on deep learning, and a computer program. Thetest paper of the student is scanned, and test paper information is converted into picture information to be stored in a local computer hard disk; through optical character recognition, a natural scene text detection model is used for detecting the answer positions of subjective questions of examinees, and a text recognition model and a connection main sense time classification model are used forrecognizing text information of the answered contents of the examinees; through natural language processing, subjective question scoring is helped to be carried out by a volume batch person, similarity matching is carried out through word segmentation, spelling and grammar errors are found through semantic analysis of contexts, and the volume batch person is helped to give a score of the test paper. According to the method, the handwritten text can be highly accurately identified, and a volume holder can be helped to correctly score objective questions and subjective questions; the paper inspection time is greatly reduced, the objectivity of an examination is enhanced, and the labor of manpower resources is saved; and the cost loss caused by purchasing an expensive paper marking machine is reduced.

title: Poor student prediction method for student serialization behaviors
applicants: HANGZHOU HUAWANG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a poor student prediction method for student serialization behaviors, which comprises the following steps: collecting student behavior data in school, taking student individuals as classification labels, taking a fixed period as the duration of data statistics content, forming a group of data in the fixed period, representing the data in a matrix form, and recording the data as a single group of data; after normalization processing is carried out on the single-group data of the same student, carrying out importance degree construction and screening are on all features of the single-group data, and obtaining an effective feature data matrix; and constructing a long and short term memory network model in the form of many2one, and substituting a plurality of continuouseffective characteristic data of the same student before the current time period into the model to obtain the poverty category of the student. The method has the advantages that the data used in thescheme can comprehensively cover various behaviors of students in the school, and the recurrent neural network in deep learning is adopted to accurately judge the poverty level of the students.

title: Classroom attendance checking method and equipment based on neural network, storage medium and classroom attendance checking device based on neural network
abstract_text: The invention discloses a classroom attendance checking method and equipment based on neural network, a storage medium and a classroom attendance checking device based on neural network. The method comprises the following steps of: obtaining a class image of a target class, and improving a traditional deep learning algorithm of a candidate region by using a K-means clustering algorithm; obtaininga deep learning target detection algorithm model based on the candidate region, performing face detection on the class image through the improved deep learning target detection algorithm model based on the candidate region, obtaining a target student face image, and improving the face detection efficiency and accuracy; improving the convolutional neural network to obtain the recognition model, ANDenabling the target student face image to be subjected to identity recognition through the improved recognition model. The recognition speed and accuracy are improved, and the class attendance recordis generated based on the recognition result, so that the attendance efficiency is improved.

title: Deep learning semantic segmentation model compression method for embedded mobile terminal
abstract_text: The invention discloses a deep learning semantic segmentation model compression method for an embedded mobile terminal. According to the invention, teacher network parameter weight obtained by training is fixed. Identification network and student network are continuously trained and learned. Distillation (paired distillation, pixel distillation and integral distillation) is performed on three different levels. An overall optimization target (cross entropy loss, pixel distillation loss, paired distillation loss and overall distillation loss) is continuously optimized. Finally, the number of parameters of the student network obtained through distillation is greatly reduced and the forward calculation time of the network is greatly reduced under the condition that the student network obtainedthrough distillation meets extremely small reduction of IEU (Interoperability Union). The problem that the embedded mobile terminal cannot carry a large deep learning network under the condition thatGPU capacity and power supply are limited is solved. The task calculation time is greatly shortened and the embedded mobile terminal platform carries a complex deep network model.

title: Intelligent operation method based on two-dimensional code
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent operation method based on a two-dimensional code. after answering, the test paper is photographed through the electronic product and analyzed to generate a testpaper two-dimensional code; the two-dimensional code comprises a student ID and a test paper ID; answer parts of test paper objective selection questions are scanned; a machine learning technology isused for identifying a student handwriting choice question solving process; answers are input in the database, the answer is compared with an answer in the database; score is determined, the result isdirectly displayed to the terminal of the user through handwriting neatening; and in an answering area of the question-solving process, on one hand, a machine learning technology is used for automatically identifying the handwriting neatening degree and obtaining and storing handwriting neatening scores, and on the other hand, teachers are used for reviewing whether questions exist in the question-solving process or not, reviews of the teachers are obtained and stored, and results are displayed to a terminal of the user. And finally, the system reviews the correct questions according to the wrong questions of the students in combination with an Ebbinghaus curve, and the test paper for reviewing the questions still adopts the process, so that the workload of teachers is greatly reduced.

title: A deep learning method for driving training planning and application thereof
applicants: BEIJING BOYUAN NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a deep learning method and device, electronic equipment and a computer readable medium. The deep learning method for driving training planning comprises the following steps: preprocessing student characteristics to obtain preprocessed student characteristics; preprocessing the customized training features to obtain preprocessed customized training features; collecting progress characteristics of the student from the first preset time point to the Nth preset time point; and taking the preprocessed student characteristics, the preprocessed customized training characteristics and the progress characteristics as input, and predicting the remaining training duration by using a sequential neural network model. Through the method, the remaining training duration can be predicted, and cost management can be effectively carried out.

title: Personalized terminal service campus health platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence management system, and particularly to a campus health management platform based on artificial intelligence. The campus health managementplatform is characterized in that the health information of each individual is acquired; health models are respectively established in three aspects of metal health, physical culturing health and physique health; an artificial intelligence intelligent dynamic data model is established according to the time information records in adding the health models; the artificial intelligence dynamic data model is added into three models of metal health, physical culturing health and physique health; three kinds of separated dynamic data are input into the artificial intelligence campus health platform for big data analysis, marking, evaluating and statistics; multidimensional data analysis, modeling, outputting and linking are performed according to platform management; health application data whichare dynamically generated by the platform are output to two terminals, namely health management data which are dynamically supplied to a manager, and the health management data which are supplied tothe student, the teacher and the parents, and through the APP of the terminal, the health management data are supplied to the individual and the manager.

title: LEARNING COACH FOR MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A machine learning system includes a coach machine learning system that uses machine learning to help a student machine learning system learn its system. By monitoring the student learning system, thecoach machine learning system can learn (through machine learning techniques) ''hyperparameters'' for the student learning system that control the machine learning process for the student learning system. The machine learning coach could also determine structural modifications for the student learning system architecture. The learning coach can also control data flow to the student learning system.

title: An expression and psychological health management system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence face recognition and psychological analysis management systems. The invention particularly relates to an expression and psychological health management system based on artificial intelligence. The system is characterized by comprising an intelligent device module, a student facial expression capturing module, a scene module, a scene pairing module for establishing facial expressions, an artificial intelligence deep learning module, a psychological health model module, an expression and psychological health database module and an artificial intelligence early warning module, A face image is collected through an image collection module, and an expression recognition method is used for recognizing expressions of the face image; Thescene module records geographic position information of the face image; and a facial expression scenarized pairing module is established to match and analyze the current psychological state of the character and the position of the environment, and meanwhile, the facial expression scenarized pairing module is compared and matched with the expression and psychological health database module, so that an early warning function can be actively performed for the expression abnormal condition which should exist in each scene. Real-time updating of the expression and psychological matching model is achieved, the correct or normal expression and psychological state of the scene can be analyzed in combination with the geographic position where the object is located, and meanwhile an early warning function is given to a collective terminal and a personal terminal for abnormal expression and psychological analysis of any scene.

title: middle school student academic career planning and college entrance examination volunteering filling intelligent recommendation system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a middle school student academic career planning and college entrance examination volunteering reporting intelligent system. The system comprises the following steps of selecting conditions to screen and select college characteristics, college conditions, actual recording scores recorded by colleges, average scores, highest scores, score segment number of people, planning and recording which meet the conditions, and converting the scores into equivalent scores, equivalent difference, equivalent bits and recording indexes of scores of examinees in current provinces of previous years to form a group of comparison data models; when the academic plan is selected, recording the total score according to the previous year of the school, recording the scores in each unidentistry in detail, and performing adaptive preparation according to the unidentistry record scores by referring to the planning scale; when an occupational plan test is selected, the steps of answering,industry recommendation, college selection and condition screening are carried out. According to the invention, big data + artificial intelligence + old expert intelligence is used as an operation basis; Historical data required for realizing academic affairs, subject performance targets, college entrance examination volunteering targets, old expert experience intelligence and the like are provided for middle school students, teachers and parents, the data are presented to users in a convenient, intelligent, multifunctional, integrated and few-window browsing manner, query and statistics arefacilitated, examinees and parents are worried and difficult to worry, and the popularization and application value is achieved.

title: laboratory man-hour data processing method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a laboratory man-hour data processing method, terminal and system based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: employing a deep learning camera to collect a face image and current laboratory environment data, carrying out the analysis through a server, and obtaining the face data; calculating and counting the current face data according to a persontime processing instruction, the person time processing instruction comprising a registration instruction, a sign-in instruction, a sign-out instruction, a people counting instruction and a use time instruction; generating and outputting processing results. The method is used for civilian use to solve the technical problems that existing student roll calling is manually carried out by teachers, the roll calling process is tedious and time-consuming, and the constraint force is poor.

title: Biosensor-based student watch
abstract_text: The invention discloses a biosensor-based student watch, comprising a dial plate, a three-axis gyroscope and a power supply module, wherein the dial plate is fixedly mounted with a display screen, oneend of a watch strap is fixedly mounted with a detection block and a convex clasp, a sliding slot is arranged in the middle of the detection block, the output ends of the three-axis gyroscope, a three-axis acceleration sensor and a biosensor module are respectively electrically connected to the input end of an amplifying and shaping circuit, the output ends of a power control circuit and a user operation module are respectively electrically connected to the input end of a microprocessor, the microprocessor is respectively electrically connected to a wireless communication module and a memory,and the output end of the microprocessor is respectively electrically connected to the input ends of a voice prompt module and the display screen. The scheme of the invention adopts the biosensor module, can accurately capture the wave signal of the radial artery of a human body, and cooperates with a biological big data artificial intelligence model to accurately reproduce multiple physiologicalinformation of the user.

title: Online learning stagnation prediction system combined with business rules
applicants: BEIJING OPEN DISTANCE EDUCATION CENTER CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an online learning stagnation prediction system combined with business rules. The online learning stagnation prediction system comprises a data loading module, a data markingmodule, a feature engineering module, a model training module and a result prediction module. The data loading module is used for reading student data from a database; reading a learning stagnation judgment rule from the rule base. The data marking module marks student data according to the learning stagnation judgment rule, and marks the student data meeting the learning stagnation judgment ruleas stagnation; If not, marking as non-stagnation. The feature engineering module is used for carrying out feature engineering processing on the student data, and the feature engineering processing comprises feature selection, feature processing and feature normalization. The model training module is used for selecting a machine learning model to train the student data processed by the feature engineering, and then selecting the machine learning model with the optimal performance as a learning stagnation prediction model according to a model evaluation index. And the result prediction module isused for inputting the to-be-predicted student data into the learning stagnation prediction model for calculation to obtain a prediction result.

title: Emotional Artificial Intelligence Training
abstract_text: Physical reactions of students may be monitored during a first training lesson, and the physical reactions may be used to determine the depth of learning, whether and when a second training lesson should be presented to the students. The type and/or timing of the second training lesson can be based on biometric scores obtained based on student physical reactions such as facial expressions, Galvanic skin response, and heart rate variability. The biometric scores may be used to modify test scores associated with the students and the first training lesson, in order to determine the type and/or timing of the second training lesson.

title: A student ideological and political condition early warning method based on deep learning
applicants: BEIJING TAOHUADAO INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student ideological and political condition early warning method based on deep learning, which is used for accurately analyzing retrieval records and keywords in retrieval records and sentiment problem tendency in student internet surfing behaviors by collecting whole network news data training prediction material libraries, so that the purposes of complete data and noveldata are achieved. Meanwhile, an artificial intelligence algorithm and a big data analysis technology are integrated, the whole ideological and political condition analysis process does not need to participate in analysis tasks subjectively, teachers can be guided to conduct academic or ideological and political condition early warning on students, and compared with traditional ideological and political condition analysis, the method is more objective and more comprehensive.

title: Method for analyzing student psychology based on artificial intelligence, device and storage medium
abstract_text: An embodiment of the invention discloses a method for analyzing student psychology based on artificial intelligence, a device and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of acquiring a training set which comprises behavior data of students and psychology interval data of the students; training a psychology quantification model by means of the training set; extracting a hidden characteristic from the training set; predicating new psychology data of each student based on the trained psychology quantification model, generating displaying information, wherein the displaying information comprises a predication name list and behavior data; and determining a reason which causes a psychology abnormity of the students in the predication name list according to the displaying information. Through the method, the device and the storage medium, the psychology abnormity of the student can be found in real time.

title: Myopia prevention device based on a face recognition technology
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to a myopia prevention device based on a face recognition technology. The device comprises a processorfixedly arranged in the device, the processor is in data transmission connection with a clock module, a memory, a WIFI module, a video decoding chip and a face recognition algorithm module which arefixedly arranged in the device, and an illumination sensor fixedly arranged on the side wall of the device, the video decoding chip is in data transmission connection with a camera fixedly arranged outside the device, the WIFI module is connected with a background server through a wireless communication technology, and the background server is connected with a mobile phone end through the wirelesscommunication technology. The collected information judges whether the eye using posture of the person is correct or not and whether the eye using time is too long or not, and reminds the student toachieve the effect of preventing myopia.

title: A human eye movement measuring and calculating method based on a visible light source and a camera
abstract_text: A human eye movement measuring and calculating method based on a visible light source and a camera belongs to the technical field of computer artificial intelligence. At present, all schools hope to assist in estimating interest points in a classroom or judging the classroom effect of a teacher through eye gaze areas of students; However, most of devices for tracking eye movements of students on the market need to purchase related special accessories independently and are deployed in front of each student; the price is expense, and the device is difficult to maintain and manage; and data summarization needs to be independently acquired from each terminal, so that the working steps of teachers or operators are increased, data acquisition errors are easy to occur, the deployment period is long, and an original auxiliary property system becomes a system consuming more energy and manpower. The human eye movement measuring and calculating method based on the visible light source and the camera is characterized in that funds of eye movement collecting equipment can be saved, the difficulty of system deployment can be reduced, unified collection of data is facilitated, and visual and psychological pressure cannot be caused to a collected person.

title: A college entrance examination volunteer accurate measurement method and system based on big data and artificial intelligence
applicants: FUJIAN DADAOZHIXING EDUCATION & TECH CORP LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a college entrance examination volunteer accurate measurement method based on big data and artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps: selecting a school-based application mode or a professional-based application mode, and inputting the personal information of students; When an application mode mainly based on a school is adopted, the score of the student is adjusted to be a correction score equivalent to the last year, the admission score line of the last year of the school is corrected to obtain a school correction admission score line, the school correction admission score line and the school correction admission score line are subtracted to obtain a first score difference, and the school with the first score difference within a certain range is screened for the student to select; When a profession-oriented application mode is adopted, the score of the student is adjusted to be a correction score equivalent to the last year, the admission score line of the last year of the willingness specialty is subtracted to obtain a second score difference, and the willingness specialty with the second score difference within a certain range is screened for the student to select. The invention also provides a college entrance examination volunteer accurate measurement system based on big data and artificial intelligence, the system is compatible with the application modes under new and old college entrance examination policies, and a relatively accurate application basis is provided.

title: student attention detection model based on machine learning
applicants: NANJING JIYU INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a student attention detection model based on machine learning. The invention relates to the technical field of student attention detection devices. The classroom comprises a classroom main body, a mounting frame and a first monitoring module, student seats are arranged at the lower end in the classroom main body, a blackboard is arranged on the inner wall of the right sideof the classroom main body, the mounting frame is embedded in the upper ends of the inner walls of the two sides of the classroom main body, and a first camera is connected to the upper end of the inner wall of the right side of the classroom main body. The monitoring system has the beneficial effects that students can be monitored in all directions, the situation that the first camera is hindered by student seats is avoided, the class state of teachers in front can be monitored while the students are monitored, and therefore schools can comprehensively monitor and detect the states of the students and the teachers.

title: A deep learning-based college student credit assessment method and device
abstract_text: The invention discloses a college student credit assessment method and device based on deep learning. The method comprises the steps of A, obtaining credit data of a to-be-assessed student; B, converting text information in the credit data sample into word vectors by using a word2vec framework, and processing the word vectors corresponding to the to-be-evaluated students by using a pre-trained LSTM model to obtain text characteristic index data; C, performing feature assignment on other credit data except the text information in the credit data of the to-be-evaluated student, and performing normalization processing to obtain non-text feature index data; And D, using a pre-trained BP neural network to map the student text feature index data and the non-text feature index data as continuousinput and continuously output to obtain a target credit assessment result of the to-be-assessed student. By applying the embodiment of the invention, the efficiency and accuracy of credit assessment for students can be improved.

title: Deep learning method, apparatus, electronic apparatus, and computer-readable medium
applicants: BEIJING POYUAN NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a depth learning method and apparatus, an electronic device and a computer readable medium. An in-depth learning method for customized training includes: preprocessing student characteristics to obtain preprocessed student characteristics; Customized training features are preprocessed to obtain preprocessed customized training features; The pre-processed student characteristics and pre-processed customized training characteristics are used as inputs, and the training results are predicted by using depth learning association model. The deep learning associationmodel includes: a first CNN network receiving preprocessed student features and generating first feature data; a second CNN network receiving preprocessed student features and generating first feature data; a full connection layer that receives the first feature data and the second feature data and generates a third feature data; an output layer that outputs the predicted training result based onthe third feature data from the full connection layer. Improve training efficiency by customizing training methods.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR ASSESSING AND IMPROVING STUDENT COMPETENCIES
abstract_text: A skills learning method for a student gathers objective data relating to the student in response to various stimuli, and produces a predicted feedback units as a function of the objective data using a machine learning-base classifier. The method can include training a neural network using objective data of student interactions and associated subjective assessments of a skill of each objective data. The method includes receiving a new dataset with objective data of a new student and an associated subjective assessment of a skill of the first student represented by the new objective data. A predicted assessment of the skill of the new objective data is calculated by inputting the new objective data into the neural network. The method can include updating the neural network by combining the initial dataset and the new

title: New student identity authentication method, electronic device and computer readable storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a new student identity authentication method, an electronic device and a computer readable storage medium. The server triggers a face collection device in the client to carry out face collection; the client side carries out face collection on new student and transmits a face picture to the server; the server obtains the collected face feature information and compares the face feature information with the face feature information in the database, and if the similarity between the collected face feature information and the face feature information in the database is smaller than a preset threshold value, a new identity authentication failure is prompted; and if the similarity between the collected face feature information and the face feature information in the database is greater than or equal to a preset threshold value, storing the photo and prompting that the new identity authentication is successful. According to the invention, the school is prevented from organizing newly-collected photos after newly-born school, time and energy are saved, and the possibility of new student masquerading is reduced.

title: Voice attendance method and device, computer device and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The present application relates to the field of artificial intelligence technology and provides a voice attendance method and device, a computer device and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps of receiving the voice attendance information sent by attendance equipment; extracting target speech attendance content from the speech attendance information through a speech recognition model, and extracting target voice print features from the speech attendance information through a voice print recognition model; querying a pre-stored student number matched with the target voiceattendance content; querying preset voice print features stored in advance according to the student number correspondence; when the target voiceprint feature matches the preset voiceprint feature, sending the attendance information corresponding to the student number to the terminal. The method can improve the attendance efficiency and accuracy.

title: 220kV intelligent substation digit physical simulation platform
applicants: SKILL TRAINING CENTER OF STATE GRID HENAN ELECTRIC POWER COMPANY
abstract_text: The utility model provides a 220kV intelligent substation digit physical simulation platform, includes teacher's platform and student's platform, teacher's platform and student's platform carry out communication connection through wireless network, teacher's platform include treater I and treater II to and and merging cells, protected location and the intelligent terminal of treater I through protocol converter communication connection, treater I on still be connected with display screen I, camera, fingerprint sampler, IC -card card reader, treater II on be connected with display screen II. The utility model discloses a two treaters are dealt with differently outside physics subtotal and are carried out emulation, have promoted the speed and the precision of emulation, through the artificial intelligence of complete demonstration display screen of a plurality of student's platforms I and display screen II, more are favorable to appearing and exchanging of between coach and student information, and the utility model discloses concentrate the hardware mainboard adoption layering of treater I and treater II and place, reduced the horizontal occupation of land of controlling the platform to the wiring of adoption interface board, the overall arrangement is simple, concentrated.

title: A method of monitoring students' emotion based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SICHUAN WINSHARE EDUCATION SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for monitoring students' emotion based on artificial intelligence, which comprises the following steps: S1, presetting quantitative index of emotion change elements, pre-storing students' facial information and voice print information; 2, collectting that video information of the students; S3, processing and recognizing the image information through the student video; S4, extracting the audio information of the students in the video, processing and identifying the audio information; 5, monitoring and warning that emotion of the students through image information and audio information; The invention reduces the error of the emotion monitoring, makes the monitoring more accurate, and at the same time can clearly analyze the direction of the emotion change ofthe students, which is helpful for teachers to enlighten the students pertinently. The invention effectively reduces the contradictions between students and students, students and teachers, helps to reduce the pressure of students in school life, and enables students to face various difficulties positively and optimistically through monitoring the emotions of students. The invention has low cost and is favorable for popularizing and using.

title: MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEM AND METHOD OF GRANT ALLOCATIONS
abstract_text: A cloud-based system and method for providing an interactive graphical user interface of a variable population set of applicants to a university for grant allocation are disclosed. The system receives student population data, target data, and historical data from one or more data sources. The received student population data, the historical data, and the target data are processed to create a master database, which includes a plurality of master database parameters. Subsequently, a plurality of scores for each applicant are determined based on various sets of the master database parameters. Based on the master database parameters and target data, threshold levels for grant allocation and success index are determined using a machine learning system. The threshold levels are dynamically changed using new target data to obtain a range of values for grant allocation. A simulation rendering the dynamic change of threshold levels is provided to the user.

title: A system for preventing myopia in a student classroom
abstract_text: The invention discloses a system for preventing myopia in a student classroom. The system of the invention uses an artificial intelligence method to judge the phenomena of students' sitting position,head tilt, head bow and the like in class, and provides a method of individual alarm, which does not affect teachers' class and other students' listening and speaking.

title: Course arrangement method based on artificial intelligence and computer-readable medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a course arrangement method based on artificial intelligence and a computer-readable medium. The course arrangement method comprises the following steps: a mobile terminal collects students' basic information and sends the collected students' basic information to a course arrangement center platform; the mobile terminal collects students' basic information and sends them toa course arrangement center platform. Determine the scope of course selection by the course arrangement center platform; The platform of curriculum arrangement center chooses the individualized curriculum scope for each student; The platform of the course arrangement center selects the desired courses and generates a space-occupying message for the desired courses; The total number of placeholdermessages for each course is counted by the course arrangement center platform. The total number of elective courses is calculated by the platform of curriculum arrangement center. If the total numberof elective students of the first course is higher than the predetermined maximum number of elective students of the first course, the priority of each elective student of all elective students of the first course to select the first course is set by the course arrangement center platform; And prioritizing the participation of high-priority students in the first course by the Curriculum Arrangement Centre.

title: DISTRIBUTED PROCESSING SYSTEMS
abstract_text: A distributed processing method is disclosed herein for evaluating student work product. The distributed processing system includes a server, a database server, and an application server that are interconnected via a network, and connected via the network to a plurality of independent processing units. The independent processing units can include an analysis engine that is machine learning capable, and thus uniquely completes its processing tasks. The server can provide one or several pieces of data to one or several of the independent processing units, can receive an analysis results from the one or several independent processing units, and can update the result based on a value scoring the machine learning of the independent processing unit.

title: System for processing and supplying personalized information based on Artificial Intelligence
abstract_text: The present invention discloses a system for writing and supplying a resume, a cover letter and the like, optimized for a student or job seeker through artificial intelligence by collecting various big data of the job seeker for employment or the student for an entrance into a school of a higher grade and collecting various big data for an enterprise or school which the student or job seeker wants by including an applicant terminal, an application object server, and a platform server.

title: Combined school bus management system based on artificial intelligence and a working method thereof
applicants: TAICANG YUHE NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: A combined school bus management system based on artificial intelligence and a method thereof. The combined school bus management system includes the vehicle body, uan nmanned aerial vehicle and a control mechanism, The control mechanism comprises a processor, a drive device and a first navigation device, the first navigation device is configured to generate a moving route of the vehicle body, Thevehicle body comprises an identification device, a conveyor, a first imaging device, an extraction device, a stage, a first storage chamber and a second storage chamber, the identification device isused for identifying the identity information of the student, the conveying device is used for conveying the schoolbag to the stage, A first storage chamber is used for storing the schoolbag, A secondstorage chamber stores a target book, A first image pickup device is used for photographing images in the schoolbag, The extracting device is used for extracting the target book from the schoolbag, the unmanned aerial vehicle includes a second navigation device, a transfer device, a third storage chamber and a fourth storage chamber; the second navigation device is used for generating the flightpath of the unmanned aerial vehicle; the transfer device is used for transferring the schoolbag to the third storage chamber, and the target book is transferred to the fourth storage chamber.

title: Deep learning based method for determining students from low-income families
abstract_text: The invention discloses a deep learning based method for determining students from low-income families. Features of each student are extracted from consumption data of an all-purpose card, score dataand library borrowing data of the student, students are divided into four poverty levels and coded by one-hot, and a coding result serves as a type label of the student. The extracted features and thetype labels are used to train an established neural network model. When it is required to determine the student from the low-income family, the consumption data of the all-purpose card, score data and library borrowing data of the student are extracted, and the type of the student is obtained after prediction by the neural network model. The result helps determine the student from the low-incomefamily. The method is characterized by high accuracy and sufficient hidden layer depth.

title: School bus management system based on artificial intelligence and operating method thereof
applicants: TAICANG YUHE NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a school bus management system based on artificial intelligence and an operating method thereof. The school bus management system comprises a bus body and a control mechanism,wherein the control mechanism comprises a processor, a driving device, a positioning device and a navigation device, wherein the positioning device is used for acquiring position information of the bus body, the navigation device is used for generating a mobile path of the bus body, the bus body comprises an identification device, a first extraction device, a transmission device, a first camera shooting device, a second extraction device, an object carrying table and a storage cavity, the identification device is used for identifying identity information of a student getting on the bus body, the first extraction device is arranged right above a front door of the bus body, the first extraction device is used for extracting a schoolbag of the student, an input end of the transmission deviceis arranged at the front door of the bus body, an output end of the transmission device is connected with the object carrying table and is used for transmitting the schoolbag to the object carrying table, the first camera shooting device is arranged between the first extraction device and the second extraction device, the first camera shooting device is configured to shoot an image inside the schoolbag, and the second extraction device is used for extracting a target book from the schoolbag.

title: Student learning evaluation method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: TAICANG YUHE NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a student learning evaluation method based on artificial intelligence. The student learning evaluation method adopts a system comprising an acquisition module, an identification module and an analysis module. The student learning evaluation method comprises the steps that: the acquisition module acquires situations of answers of a student under a current test question; theacquisition module acquires standard answers of all answering methods corresponding to the current test question; the identification module identifies steps of the student answers and steps of the standard answers; the analysis module compares the student answers with the corresponding standard answers according to the steps of the student answers and steps of the standard answers; the analysismodule assigns a value to each step of the student answers; the analysis module calculates a correctness degree of the step, corresponding to each step of the student answers, of the standard answersaccording to the steps of the student answers; and the analysis module estimates a learning degree of the student about a knowledge point of the test question according to the assigned values of thesteps and the correctness degree of the steps.

title: Method for predicting question doing wrong position on basis of Bayesian network
applicants: BEIJING XIZI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of machine learning, discloses a method for predicting the question doing wrong position on the basis of a Bayesian network. According to method, an estimation method which can ensure the prediction accuracy of the question doing performance of an answering person or the question doing wrong position while minimize the labor cost is provided, then moreaccurate information can be provided for targeted explanation, that is to say, compared with similar methods, the estimation accuracy rate detailed to the step level can be provided, therefore, the performance of the current student on a question can be more effectively predicted, and the completion condition of the current student instead of traditional rough question-level right and wrong is evaluated; and in addition, current estimation can be corrected by collecting more facts, therefore, the collected fact number and type can be flexibly adjusted according to the needed precision, and then the method cannot be limited by application scenes basically.

title: Accurate learning evaluation method and learning evaluation robot system based on big data and artificial intelligence
applicants: DAGUO INNOVATION INTELLIGENT TECH DONGGUAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an accurate learning evaluation method and learning evaluation robot system based on big data and artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps that: according to learning process big data, establishing the learning performance portrait of each student, and obtaining the learning performance of an evaluation unit to be inquired from the learning performance portrait of a student to be inquired. By use of the above method and system, through the reaction of the student in a course in big data in the learning process, the learning performance of the student is drawn, the portrait is used for evaluating the learning of the student so as to more truly and objectively reflect the learning performance of the student, and evaluation objectivity and accuracy for the learning performance portrait and the learning evaluation of the student can be greatly improved.

title: NB-IoT (Narrow Band Internet of Things) based school badge positioning system
applicants: ZHEJIANG ATTACLOUD INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a NB-IoT (Narrow Band Internet of Things) based school badge positioning system.
