A positioning node serves as student tracking front-end equipment, the student positioning information is acquired through GPS or Beidou Satellite, and the daily travel track is learned by a machine learning algorithm; if a safety risk exists, the position of the positioning node is judged by adisplacement sampling timer which reads the GPS data once every 60 seconds and compares the GPS data with previous positioning coordinate point; if the difference of the coordinate point exceeds a regulated threshold, the student moves, the positioning node reports a displacement occurrence notification, and a control center sends a student movement prompt short message to a user. By adopting NB-IoT, the system disclosed by the invention solves the problems of inability in indoor positioning, high equipment cost, high power consumption, short battery endurance and limited base station in theprior art, and learns the student movement through the machine learning algorithm so as to save energy; moreover, the system learns the travel track so as to enhance safety protection on the students.

title: College entrance examination score estimation and college preference selection method and system based on deep learning algorithm
abstract_text: The invention discloses a college entrance examination score estimation and college preference selection method based on a deep learning algorithm. The method comprises the following steps: accordingto score lines and line differences of origins of students of of majors of colleges and universities in previous years, predicting the line differences of the origins of students of the majors of thecolleges and universities in the present year by using the LSTM neural network algorithm, and determining the score lines of various levels of colleges and universities in the present year of the origin of student of a student according to the line differences of the origins of students; judging the performance of the student in the present year according to the origin of student of the student,and calculating a related major result of the colleges and universities by using the DNN neural network algorithm; obtaining a preliminary application scheme according to the matched major result of the colleges and universities; and performing combined analysis on the preliminary application scheme with the policy information of the colleges and universities to obtain a final application scheme.The invention further provide a college entrance examination score estimation and college preference selection system based on the deep learning algorithm. The college entrance examination score estimation and college preference selection method and system disclosed by the invention have the beneficial effects of removing the subjective influence, so that the major selection is more scientific andmore accurate.

title: Leaning portrayal method based on big data and artificial intelligence, and leaning portrayal robot system
abstract_text: The invention provides a leaning portrayal method based on big data and artificial intelligence, and a leaning portrayal robot system. The method comprises the following steps: performing statistics on work data o each student, performing weighted averaging on work accuracy corresponding to each knowledge point in a first knowledge point set to obtain total accuracy, using the total accuracy as amastery degree value of a knowledge point label corresponding to each knowledge point in each student portrayal, and performing leaning portrayal on the student through work big data. According to themethod and the system, the leaning portrayal is performed on the student through work big data to objectively and accurately reflect the mastery conditions of different students on different knowledge points by leaning portrayal, thereby improving the objectivity and accuracy of leaning portrayal, and in view of different students and different knowledge points, personalized learning and review,and accurate learning and review are achieved, and the efficiency of learning and review is improved.

title: College aspiration fill-out decision-making method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a college aspiration fill-out decision-making method and system based on artificial intelligence. According to the method and the system, on the basis of the artificial intelligence and big data, through intelligent judgment, major and college selection relatively suitable for own features is provided for an examinee. According to the system, college query, decision-makingsupport and the like can be provided when aspiration fill-out is carried out, the examinee is helped to make a scientific decision, an information platform for the aspiration fill-out of the examineeis provided, and the aspiration fill-out scientificity and high efficiency are improved. The college aspiration fill-out decision-making system comprises a college recommendation module, a self-cognition module, a college performance prediction module, a student portrait module, a occupational interest evaluation system module, a college data module, a college admission data module, an AI data module and a self-learning system module based on industries.

title: STUDENT ENGAGEMENT AND ANALYTICS SYSTEMS AND METHODS WITH MACHINE LEARNING STUDENT BEHAVIORS BASED ON OBJECTIVE MEASURES OF STUDENT ENGAGEMENT
abstract_text: Embodiments leverage wireless data passively collected by access points of a school to correlate a student's behavior with respect to time and place. This data-driven approach can quantify student behaviors and objectively measure and track how students move and interact on campus. For example, if a student accesses a wireless router that is in the same physical location as a class on the student's schedule at the time the class takes place, the correlated time and place quantifies how the student behaves with respect to class attendance. The invention takes the sum of such interactions (e.g., attending classes, studying in the library, etc.) and produces a student engagement score (SES) for each student. The SES is evaluated to determine how student behaviors change over time (e.g., throughout a semester) and whether the student is trending to a low engagement score and thus “at-risk” of dropping out.

title: LEARNING COACH FOR MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A machine learning (ML) system includes a student ML system, a learning coach ML system, and a reference system that generates training data for the student ML system. The learning coach ML system learns to make an enhancement to the student ML system or to its learning process, such as updated hyperparameter or a network structural change, based on training of the student ML system with the training data generated by the reference system. The system may also comprise a learning experimentation system that communicates with the reference system to conduct experiments on the learning of the student learning system. Also, the learning experimentation system can determine a cost function for the learning coach ML system.

title: ОБУЧЕНИЕ DNN-СТУДЕНТА ПОСРЕДСТВОМ РАСПРЕДЕЛЕНИЯ ВЫВОДА
Student watch based on artificial intelligence technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student watch based on an artificial intelligence technology. The student watch comprises a watch body. A voice recording module, a voice generating module, a microprocessormodule, a self-study module, a wireless communication module, a data storage module and a power supply module are arranged in the watch body. The microprocessor module is electrically connected with the voice recording module, the voice generating module, the self-study module, the wireless communication module, the data storage module and the power supply module. The self-study module comprises adata downloading instruction sending sub-module, a response message receiving sub-module and an encoding sub-module. The student watch is simple in structure, convenient to use and practical; by establishing a database on a cloud server, big data can be stored and managed, proper answers can be given for most conversations, and the watch can conduct feedback and automatic encoding according to the everyday use conditions of a user by means of the self-study function, can adjust the difficulty of the conversations according to the different grasping degrees of vocabulary by the user, and is wide in application range.

title: DEEP ACADEMIC LEARNING INTELLIGENCE AND DEEP NEURAL LANGUAGE NETWORK SYSTEM AND INTERFACES
abstract_text: A knowledge acquisition system and artificial cognitive declarative memory model to store and retrieve massive student learning datasets. A Deep Academic Learning Intelligence system for machine learning-based student services provides monitoring and aggregating performance information and student communications data in an online group learning course. The system uses communication activity, social activity, and the academic achievement data to present a set of recommendations and uses responses and post-recommendation data as feedback to further train the machine learning-based system.

title: Student work intelligent monitoring method and system
abstract_text: The present invention discloses a student work intelligent monitoring method and system. A perception device is employed to perform omnibearing real-time perception of conditions of students doing homework to perform total-process intelligent monitoring, parents employ smart phones to perform grasp and guidance for the conditions of the students doing homework, teachers (special teachers in chargeof classes) can check the collected analysis data of a student doing the homework and regulate the quantity of work according to the situation; formal written agreements between parents and studentsare employed to control both behaviors and encashment of rewards and punishment, based on technologies such as a sensor, computer visual processing, image enhancement, big data analysis and machine deep learning, 7 functions such as system agreement generation, work time arrangement intelligent guidance, work station omnibearing monitoring, encourage intimation display, work condition one-key uploading, integration reward with happiness and time and knowledge comprehensive management and application are achieved to emphatically prompt students to recognize the time importance, improve the timeutilization and work efficiency and increase the interest in doing homework. The student work intelligent monitoring method and system prompts students to gradually form a good habit for scientific arrangement and usage of time to facilitate success and growth of students and allow the students to benefit for a lifetime.

title: ARTIFICIAL COGNITIVE DECLARATIVE-BASED MEMORY MODEL TO DYNAMICALLY STORE, RETRIEVE, AND RECALL DATA DERIVED FROM AGGREGATE DATASETS
abstract_text: A knowledge acquisition system and artificial cognitive declarative memory model to store and retrieve massive student learning datasets. The memory storage model enables storage and retrieval of massive data derived using multiple interleaved machine-learning artificial intelligence models to parse, tag, and index academic, communication, and social student data cohorts as applied to academic achievement. Artificial Episodic Recall Promoters assist recall of academic subject matter for knowledge acquisition. A Deep Academic Learning Intelligence system for machine learning-based student services provides monitoring and aggregating performance information and student communications data in an online group learning course. The system uses communication activity, social activity, and the academic achievement data to present a set of recommendations and uses responses and post-recommendation data as feedback to further train the machine learning-based system.

title: Intelligent student work and rest time control robot based on machine vision and voice interaction
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent student work and rest time control robot based on machine vision and voice interaction, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The robotcomprises a robot body and a mobile phone APP (application) matched with the robot body, and the robot body mainly comprises a hardware portion which comprises a main controller, a data storage, a video processor, a binocular camera component, a human body infrared sensor, a voice recognition module, a microphone, a WIFI (wireless fidelity) data interface, a Bluetooth wireless data interface, a USB (universal serial bus) wired data interface, a loudspeaker, base cloud deck and the like. The robot automatically supervises and urges students to learn and rest according to plans by the aid of a microprocessor and voice interaction, sitting postures of the students in learning are monitored by the aid of binocular vision identification and are corrected in a reminding manner through voice broadcast, vision and infrared are combined to detect get up states of the students, the robot urges the students to get up by the aid of personalized wake-up modes, and the work and rest plans are conveniently written, generated, downloaded and monitored by the aid of the matched intelligent mobile phone APP.

title: Student financial situation predicting method based on campus data
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student financial situation predicting method based on campus data. The method is characterized by including the steps of S1, collecting the behavior data of all students; S2, performing data cleaning on the collected student data, and storing the cleaned data into a data storage module; S3, extracting the behavior feature vector of each student; S4, building a deep-learning Encoder-Decoder model, and separately performing training; S5, predicting the campus behaviors of the students according to the trained models; S6, using training set data to train a classification model; S7, predicting student financial situations according to the classification model. The method has the advantages that the campus behaviors of the students on the basis of the LSTM Encoder-Decoder model, the student financial situations are predicted by building the classification model, and the method is low in data labeling requirements, sufficient in training data and good in predictingeffect.

title: Automatic controlling and following type intelligent accompanying system cloud platform
abstract_text: The invention discloses an automatic controlling and following type intelligent accompanying system cloud platform. The cloud platform can be applied to transportation devices such as a trunk, a supermarket shopping cart, a grocery shopping cart, an airport cart, an aged boosting cart, a goods pickup utility cart, a student schoolbag and the like, wherein the transportation devices need to be carried, conveyed, pulled and pushed along with people. A protective shell is wrapped outside the box body of each above tool. The whole device comprises a complete set of control hardware equipment, namely the artificial intelligence automatic controlling and following "followme intelligent accompanying hardware terminal", a "followme intelligent accompanying big data application and service cloud platform" and a "followme intelligent accompanying APP ". According to the invention, the inconvenience brought by traditional manual pushing and carrying is solved, wherein two hands are liberated. Thefatigue of the long-time push-and-pull operation is relieved, and the automatic control of the followme intelligent accompanying mobile service is realized.

title: Pre-warning method for student study pre-warning system based on machine learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a pre-warning method for a student study pre-warning system based on machine learning. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, cleaning data of ResultsData of a student score data set in order to obtain a student cleaning score data set CleaningData; then, pre-processing data of CleaningData in order to obtain a student statistical score data set StatiscticalData; and finally, classifying data of the StatiscticalData by scores of each grade and each semester, predicting the pre-processed data set through an XGBoost algorithm in order to obtain a student academic performance pre-warning data set WarningData, analyzing data of the WarningData and sending a warning to relevant personnel. The pre-warning method for a student study pre-warning system based onmachine learning can effectively predict whether students need academic performance pre-warning or not. Services are offered to teachers and parents. Therefore, accuracy of pre-warning predictions ofstudents academic performance is increased.

title: LEARNING COACH FOR MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A machine learning system includes a coach machine learning system that uses machine learning to help a student machine learning system learn its system. By monitoring the student learning system, the coach machine learning system can learn (through machine learning techniques) "hyperparameters" for the student learning system that control the machine learning process for the student learning system. The machine learning coach could also determine structural modifications for the student learning system architecture. The learning coach can also control data flow to the student learning system.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR AI-BASED STUDENT TUTORING
abstract_text: Embodiments can provide dynamic assessment by an expert system software (ESS) module. The ESS module may determine a minimum set of diagnostic questions to identify a student's strengths and/or weaknesses for a given subject matter. Each diagnostic question may be a unique question variant generated from a dynamic question template. The ESS module may automatically and dynamically build a personal lesson plan that includes lessons on topics of the subject matter that the student has not mastered. The ESS module may dynamically modify the personal lesson plan to change a lesson and/or add lesson(s) considered by the ESS module as necessary for the student to master the subject matter. Given the ESS module's knowledge on various components of a question such as equation(s) used to produce a correct answer to the question, the ESS module may generate image(s), customized hint(s), customized explanation(s), and/or examine student solutions in step-by-step fashion.

title: FEATURE EXTRACTION AND MACHINE LEARNING FOR EVALUATION OF MEDIA-RICH COURSEWORK
abstract_text: Conventional techniques for automatically evaluating and grading assignments are generally ill-suited to evaluation of coursework submitted in media-rich form. For courses whose subject includes programming, signal processing or other functionally expressed designs that operate on, or are used to produce media content, conventional techniques are also ill-suited. It has been discovered that media-rich, indeed even expressive, content can be accommodated as, or as derivatives of, coursework submissions using feature extraction and machine learning techniques. Accordingly, in on-line course offerings, even large numbers of students and student submissions may be accommodated in a scalable and uniform grading or scoring scheme. Instructors or curriculum designers may adaptively refine assignments or testing based on classifier feedback. Using developed techniques, it is possible to administer courses and automatically grade submitted work that takes the form of media encodings of artistic expression, computer programming and even signal processing to be applied to media content.

title: Artificial intelligence student tutoring system
applicants: HEFEI BOYAN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence student tutoring system, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The system comprises a user, a client, an artificial intelligence server, a knowledge base used for storing knowledge-type data information, and a user base used for storing user data information. The artificial intelligence server is arranged between the client and theknowledge base, a student's parent unit and a teacher unit are established in the artificial intelligence server, and the student's parent unit provides an intelligent answering, testing and materialdownloading platform for students; when there is no answer to a question in the knowledge base, the system sends the question to a related subject teacher in a message mode, and then the teacher helpsto answer the question and stores the answer in the knowledge base. By using the system, the learning interest and learning efficiency of students are improved, the contact between students, teachersand parents is enhanced, and parents can conveniently learn about the learning conditions of students.

title: Code copying behavior recognition method, device and system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a code copying behavior recognition method, device and system. The system includes an editing end device and a client device. The editing end device includes a UI module, a behavior recording module and a job electronic-package generation module. The behavior recording module is used for extracting input and output records, of editing code by students in the UI module, of keyboards and mouses to generate editing behavior records. The job electronic-package generation module is used for packaging job code sets and the editing behavior records into job electronic-packages. A recognition end device includes a job input module, a similarity analysis module, a classification learning module and a copying recognition module. The recognition end device finds out a similarity student set through analyzing student code similarity degrees, then adopts a machine learning algorithm according to the editing behavior records of a similarity student to carry out analysis to obtain whether a copying behavior of the similarity student exists.

title: MULTI-TASK LEARNING USING KNOWLEDGE DISTILLATION
abstract_text: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on computer storage media for performing multi-task learning. In one method a system obtains a respective set of training data for each of multiple machine learning tasks. For each of the machine learning tasks, the system configures a respective teacher machine learning model to perform the machine learning task by training the teacher machine learning model on the training data. The system trains a single student machine learning model to perform the multiple machine learning tasks using (i) the configured teacher machine learning models, and (ii) the obtained training data.

title: MOTIVATIONAL ONLINE STUDYING SYSTEMS AND METHODS
abstract_text: According to embodiments of the disclosed technology, a study method and system are provided for motivating students to conduct school exercises while allowing parents to assess whether the students fully comprehend given subject areas. The method may facilitate student interaction within given subject areas. The method & system may employ artificial intelligence in that it may monitor a student's moral and/or motivation while studying a given a subject. As such. the system may detect a dip in moral by assessing several parameters surrounding the answering of one or more questions. The system may, in turn, seek to increase moral by feeding that student easier questions or questions which are deemed to be of a subject area in which the student is proficient. The system may take countermeasures if a student is demonstrating high proficiency in a subject.

title: DISTRIBUTED PROCESSING SYSTEMS
abstract_text: A distributed processing method is disclosed herein for evaluating student work product. The distributed processing system includes a server, a database server, and an application server that are interconnected via a network, and connected via the network to a plurality of independent processing units. The independent processing units can include an analysis engine that is machine learning capable, and thus uniquely completes its processing tasks. The server can provide one or several pieces of data to one or several of the independent processing units, can receive an analysis results from the one or several independent processing units, and can update the result based on a value scoring the machine learning of the independent processing unit.

title: Method for Personalized Learning Using a Seamless Knowledge Spectrum
abstract_text: The software system gives students the teacher homework question. The system also asks the students to write a more difficult question than teacher question and a less difficult question to be linked with original. The system uses machine learning techniques to rank the questions. The software system then asks students who are part of the class to rank these unordered questions. The system re-ranks the question list and repeats the process all the questions are ranked. The system uses these ranked lists to personalize learning of students. The system first presents the student with a teacher question from the list used by the majority of the students. Then the system provides synonym questions and midway questions to determine student's current knowledge. The system then seemlessly increases the student knowledge by presenting questions which are increasingly difficult.

title: Artificial intelligence system for English writing of student based on depth semantic analysis
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence system for English writing of student based on depth semantic analysis. The system comprises: a word classification module, used for collecting word meaning statistics of words, dividing part of speech, storing the words into a cloud knowledge library according to different classes, and recording a usage frequency of each word; a sentence classification module, used for storing sentence structures into the cloud knowledge library according to different classes, and recording a frequency of each sentence; a paragraph analysis module, used for generating an central idea of each chapter through analysis; and a title analysis module, used for generating a degree of bringing out a theme of a chapter and a title through analysis according to the obtained central idea of the chapter through analysis by the paragraph analysis module. Compared with the prior art, the system applies part-of-speech and meaning classification of words, analyzes the central idea of the article in combination with sentences, and finally obtains evaluations for the article. An intelligent English writing analysis manner is provided, so that semantics can be accurately and automatically analyzed.

title: Method of Managing Student Arrival and Student Dismissal
abstract_text: A method of managing student arrival and student dismissal is executed within a remote server as the remote server is communicably coupled with at least one automobile identification (AI) device. The AI device scans an incoming vehicle in order to identify at least one authorized profile. The authorized profile is assigned to a student profile and recognize as one of the driver profiles within the remote server. Upon validation of the authorized profile, the remote server generates an updated instruction that includes at least one student management instruction and at least one additional instruction that are accessed and defined by parent profiles or faculty profiles. Then the updated instruction is sent from the remote server to a selected computing device so that the student arrival and student dismissal can be processed.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR INCENTIVIZATION OF LEARNING
abstract_text: Parents and entities incentivize students to learn using pledges of cash, goods, and services. Students earn incentivized rewards by interacting with lessons on a digital computing device, such as a desktop computer, notebook, tablet, or “smart phone.” The lessons may include digital flash cards, text, pictures, figures, audio and video recordings ranging from classroom lectures, to classical music, to animation of scientific principles. In flashcard embodiments, the accuracy of each answer is recorded on a histogram corresponding to a particular flashcard, or the principles taught therein. The application generates performance metrics from histogram data. The performance metrics are used to generate control parameters that control the frequency and order flashcard presentation. Statistical analysis, adaptive learning and/or artificial intelligence programs refine the control parameters governing flashcard review, thereby optimizing the functionality. As a student satisfies various performance metrics and/or courseware requirements, incentives are released to the student.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR ADVANCING THROUGH A DECK OF DIGITAL FLASHCARDS
abstract_text: Parents and entities incentivize students to learn using pledges of cash, goods, and services. Students earn incentivized rewards by interacting with lessons on a digital computing device, such as a desktop computer, notebook, tablet, or “smart phone.” The lessons may include digital flash cards, text, pictures, figures, audio and video recordings ranging from classroom lectures, to classical music, to animation of scientific principles. abstract_text: Conventional techniques for automatically evaluating and grading assignments are generally ill-suited to evaluation of coursework submitted in media-rich form. It has been discovered that media-rich, indeed even expressive, content can be accommodated as, or as derivatives of, coursework submissions using feature extraction and machine learning techniques. Using developed techniques, it is possible to administer courses and automatically grade submitted work that takes the form of media encodings of artistic expression, computer programming and even signal processing to be applied to media content.

title: SYSTEM FOR AUTOMATIC ASSESSMENT OF STUDENT LEARNING
abstract_text: A system for using a smartpen as a tool for automatically assessing student learning that is simple and accurate. The system has a computer with at least one processor, a memory, a storage, and communications through a protocol, one or more than one smartpen in communication with the computer and a plurality of software modules having non-transitory instructions executable on the processor for at least a characterization module, for characterizing spatial and temporal organization of a student's work, and a machine learning module utilizing the spatial and temporal organization to assess student learning.

title: Feature Extraction and Machine Learning for Evaluation of Audio-Type, Media-Rich Coursework
abstract_text: Conventional techniques for automatically evaluating and grading assignments are generally ill-suited to evaluation of coursework submitted in media-rich form. title: MACHINE LEARNING FOR STUDENT ENGAGEMENT
abstract_text: Apparatuses, systems, methods, and computer program products are disclosed for determining student engagement. A method includes receiving 902 data collected from interactions of a plurality of students 104 with an electronic learning system. A method includes identifying 904 a plurality of archetypal learning patterns in received 902 data using machine learning. A method may also include associating 906 a student 104 with at least one identified 904 archetypal learning pattern using machine learning 204, 222.

title: Machine Learning for Student Engagement
abstract_text: Apparatuses, systems, methods, and computer program products are disclosed for determining student engagement. A method includes receiving data collected from interactions of a plurality of students with an electronic learning system. A method includes identifying a plurality of archetypal learning patterns in received data using machine learning. A method may also include associating a student with at least one identified archetypal learning patterns using machine learning.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR CREATING SIMULATED HUMAN INTERACTION
abstract_text: In the preferred embodiment, a student is able to talk to a pre-recorded actor displayed on a workstation/computer and have the pre-recorded actor respond directly and precisely to the things that the learner is saying, resulting in a fluid and challenging practice conversation without the use of artificial intelligence. A second user (partner) observes the first user (student) either directly or via videoconference or other means and monitors his interaction with the simulated user/actor in the pre-recorded video displayed on the first user's computer screen. The partner has access to an interface that allows her to direct the simulated user/actor by interpreting the first user's communications and selecting among presented options. These options direct the simulated user/actor to respond to the first user's communication in a convincing and helpful manner.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR CREATING SIMULATED HUMAN INTERACTION
abstract_text: In the preferred embodiment, a student is able to talk to a pre-recorded actor displayed on a workstation/computer and have the pre-recorded actor respond directly and precisely to the things that the learner is saying, resulting in a fluid and challenging practice conversation without the use of artificial intelligence. A second user (partner) observes the first user (student) either directly or via videoconference or other means and monitors his interaction with the simulated user/actor in the pre-recorded video displayed on the first user's computer screen. The partner has access to an interface that allows her to direct the simulated user/actor by interpreting the first user's communications and selecting among presented options. These options direct the simulated user/actor to respond to the first user's communication in a convincing and helpful manner.

title: VIRTUAL UNIVERSITY USING RFID TECHNOLOGY AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: PURPOSE: A virtual university using an RFID technology and artificial intelligence is provided to implement learning by level by controlling a lecture level through a neural network. CONSTITUTION: Plural RFID(Radio Frequency Identification System) cards(10) includes identification information of a student. An RFID reader(20) performs the reading, writing and encryption of the identification information in a remote lecture room. A person authentication system(30) includes biometric recognition system and an image recognition system, and an academic affair management server(40) issues a grade result and provides test information. A client server(50) performs person confirmation and the grade result issue based on the authenticated identification information.

title: Artificial intelligence software for grading of student problem-solving work
abstract_text: Described is a method using a computer for grading student work on a problem when the student's own steps are shown in detail. A reference trace is created representing a best solution path to the problem. A student trace of the student's own work is then created, which involves searching explicitly for a specific rationale for appending a step to the student trace; deeming the step a correct production provided the step was able to be reproduced and marking the step as traced; provisionally accepting the step as part of the best solution path subject to revocation if a better-quality step is later found by a step conflict check; implicitly tracing the student's work to discover implicitly taken mental steps provided the explicit tracing has failed to justify the step; appending any remaining untraced steps to the student trace and excluding them from the best solution path; computing a value of the steps in the student's work to form a student value; and, comparing the student value to a total value of the steps in the reference trace to obtain a score.

title: Interactive simulations utilizing a remote knowledge base
abstract_text: A system is disclosed that provides a goal based learning system utilizing a rule based expert training system to provide a cognitive educational experience. The system provides the user with a simulated environment that presents a training opportunity to understand and solve optimally. Mistakes are noted and remedial educational material presented dynamically to build the necessary skills that a user requires for success in the business endeavor. The difficulty level is automatically adjusted to the student's skill level. The system utilizes an artificial intelligence engine driving individualized and dynamic feedback with synchronized audio, video, graphics and animation used to simulate real-world environment and interactions. Multiple "correct" answers are integrated into the learning system to allow individualized learning experiences in which navigation through the system is at a pace controlled by the learner. A robust business model provides support for realistic activities and allows a user to experience real world consequences for their actions and decisions and entails realtime decision-making and synthesis of the educational material. A dynamic feedback system is utilized that narrowly tailors feedback and focuses it based on the performance and characteristics of the student to assist the student in reaching a predefined goal.

title: System, method and article of manufacture for a goal based educational system with support for dynamic characteristic tuning
abstract_text: A system is disclosed that provides a goal based learning system utilizing a rule based expert training system to provide a cognitive educational experience. A robust business model provides support for realistic activities and allows a student to experience real world consequences for their actions and decisions and entails realtime decision-making and synthesis of the educational material optimized to the characteristics of the student.

The system provides student controls that guide a student through a presentation in a manner designed to optimize the learning experience.

title: Simulation enabled feedback system
abstract_text: A system is disclosed that provides a goal based learning system utilizing a rule based expert training system to provide a cognitive educational experience. The system provides the user with a simulated environment that presents a business opportunity to understand and solve optimally. Mistakes are noted and remedial educational material presented dynamically to build the necessary skills that a user requires for success in the business endeavor. The system utilizes an artificial intelligence engine driving individualized and dynamic feedback with synchronized video and graphics used to simulate real-world environment and interactions. Multiple "correct" answers are integrated into the learning system to allow individualized learning experiences in which navigation through the system is at a pace controlled by the learner. A robust business model provides support for realistic activities and allows a user to experience real world consequences for their actions and decisions and a tutorial system analyzes student inputs to determine appropriate feedback to teach new skills.

title: Automated, computer-based reading tutoring systems and methods
abstract_text: An automated, computer-based reading tutoring system is accessed via a computer system and includes a plurality of instructional passages of different, predetermined levels of reading difficulty. A semantic space module of the reading tutoring system operates on a semantic space, which is produced by a machine-learning method, to automatically evaluate a student-submitted summary of a selected instructional passage for congruence with the selected instructional passage and to automatically determine which instructional passage the student should optimally read next. The reading tutoring system includes immediate feedback data provided to the student and including an indicator reflective of the student's reading comprehension and the identity of the instructional passage that the student should read next. An automated, computer-based method of reading tutoring comprises the steps of receiving a student-submitted summary of a selected instructional passage from a domain of discourse, automatically evaluating the summary to obtain a measure of the student's reading comprehension and, based on this evaluation, automatically selecting an instructional passage for the student to read next.

title: Intelligent tutoring methodologh using consistency rules to improve meaningful response
abstract_text: A computerized method for providing a meaningful response in an intelligent tutor. The method includes the steps of receiving an input from a user solving a problem and determining if the input violates at least one consistency rule. The consistency rules are rules implemented to allow a constraint of the input to be evaluated and compared to a fundamental rule set for the problem. The fundamental rule set includes a plurality of principles that impose the constraints on a resulting solution. A student's mistake is applied to the consistency rules to allow the artificial intelligence program to respond to the answer by either providing a necessary principle overlooked by the student, or allows the program to, at a minimum, generate feedback to say something educationally useful to the student. This can be done even when buggy rules have failed to match and provide a rationale for the mistake.

title: Interactive tutorial system and method
abstract_text: The present invention is an intelligent interactive tutorial system. The tutorial system includes a computing system having artificial intelligence, which enables the communication in a two-way conversation mode between a student at a computer station and the computing system thereby facilitating anytime one-on-one individual assistance for the student. The computing system provides tutoring on a specific curriculum and/or a specific subject matter. The tutoring includes assistance on problems or questions associated with a specific textbook in any subject matter or other course load assigned to the student. The student may optionally communicate with a live tutor if further assistance is necessary.

The system utilizes an artificial intelligence engine driving individualized and dynamic feedback with synchronized video and graphics used to simulate real-world environment and interactions. Multiple ""correct"" answers are integrated into the learning system to allow individualized learning experiences in which navigation through the system is at a pace controlled by the learner. A robust business model provides support for realistic activities and allows a user to experience real world consequences for their actions and decisions and entails real time decision-making and synthesis of the educational material. A dynamic feedback system is utilized that narrowly tailors feedback and focuses it based on the performance and characteristics of the student to assist the student in reaching a predefined goal.

title: A system, method and article of manufacture for a simulation engine with an expert system example processing engine
abstract_text: A system is disclosed that provides a goal based learning system utilizing a rule based expert training system to provide a cognitive educational experience. The system provides the user with a simulated environment that presents a business opportunity to understand and solve optimally. Mistakes are noted and remedial educational material presented dynamically to build the necessary skills that a user requires for success in the business endeavor. The system utilizes an artificial intelligence engine driving individualized and dynamic feedback with synchronized video and graphics used to simulate real-world environment and interactions. Multiple ""correct"" answers are integrated into the learning system to allow individualized learning experiences in which navigation through the system is at a pace controlled by the learner. A robust business model provides support for realistic activities and provides examples with process sensitive help that guides a student to intuitively develop the appropriate next step.

title: CYBER CONCURS
abstract_text: A cyber concours is provided to transmit a mark after a lesson or training to a teacher in real-time by offering a student a developed keyboard, and a game type lesson program using an AI(Artificial Intelligence) application for checking a correct position of hands and fingers, and the position changed according to chord shift. A key to be touched is directed in a beginner mode by displaying a direction line in a score displayed to a computer monitor. The keyboard displayed on the computer monitor is lighted if the directed key is correctly touched. In case that the directed key is not touched, the direction line is not advanced to a next note. A left/right hand mark and a finger number are displayed to the end of the direction line.

title: AUTOMATED, COMPUTER-BASED READING TUTORING SYSTEM AND METHOD
abstract_text: An automated, computer-based reading tutoring system is accessed via a computer system and includes a plurality of instructional passages of different, predetermined levels of reading difficulty. A semantic space modu le of the reading tutoring system operates on a semantic space, which is produc ed by a machine-learning method, to automatically evaluate a student-submitted summary of a selected instructional passage for congruence with the selected instructional passage and to automatically determine which instructional passage the student should optimally read next. The reading tutoring system includes immediate feedback data provided to the student and including an indicator reflective of the student's reading comprehension and the identity of the instructional passagd that the student should read next. An automated , computer-based method of reading tutoring comprises the steps of receiving a student-submitted summary of a selected instructional passage from a domain of discourse, automatically evaluating the summary to obtain a measure of the student's reading comprehension and, based on this evaluation, automatically selecting an instructional passage for the student to read next.

title: MENTOR ON CALL
abstract_text: The invention is novel, has utility and possesses ingenuity in that: 1.) It is a managed distance learning system which comprises three inventive steps to facilitate distance learning; 2.) The three inventive steps in summary are: a.) A meaning parser; b.) A lexical analyzer; c.) A course development module; 3.) These steps allow a student to write a test in an expanded sub-set beyon d true-false or multiple choice by allowing narrative whereby the invention is able to grade the student's retention of the subject matter utilizing basic artificial intelligence; 4.) The course development module allows a teacher to create course content simply and effectively utilizing Windows 95, 98, 2000 or NT; 5.) The first step involves a teacher producing course content with his or h er personality stamped thereon within the parameters of instruction or parameters of informational dissemination set by the sponsoring body whether it be educational, corporat e, university level, professional body or commercial; 6.) The second step involves the student, learner or consumer responding in narrative form whether by E-mail, VOIP or telephone with voice recognition technology to answer a question beyond the simple true-false or multiple choice sub-set; 7.) The meaning parser and lexical analyzer then produces for thelearner or student a grading that can be used by the teacher for plotting the progress of the student or learner outside of the distance learning system and delivered to the sponsoring body.The invention is novel, has utility and possesses ingenuity in that: 1.)
